title: Tutorial Checkpoint
notes: Starting Area

title: The Ring
notes: Unlocked by pre-ordering Elden Ring or by defeating a boss as a Yellow Phantom

title: Tarnished Wizened Finger
notes: Online/PVP Item

title: Grafted Scion Boss (1st Attempt)
notes: You can activate the boss and jump off the cliff. If you manage to win, you'll receive Ornamental Straight Sword and Golden Beast Crest Shield. You'll get another chance later

title: Cave of Knowledge
notes: Tutorial Cave

title: Soldier of Godrick
notes: Tutorial Boss

title: Strength!
notes: Emote on the cliff at the end of the tutorial area

title: Stranded Graveyard
notes: After going through the door, rest at this SoG

title: Finger Severer
notes: Just past SoG

title: Tarnished's Furled Finger
notes: Just past SoG

title: Limgrave
notes: First main area after leaving the Stranded Graveyard SoG and going up the lift

title: First Step
notes: nan

title: Varre
notes: Speak to Varre at First Step SoG. Exhaust all dialogue

title: Small Golden Effigy
notes: Down slope from Varre

title: Church of Elleh
notes: North of The First Step SoG, past the Tree Sentinel boss. Kale can be found here, as well as a Smithing Stone 1

title: Kale
notes: Merchant who sells items. Exhaust "About Kale" and "Recommendation" options and Dialogue. Buy crafting kit, reload area, speak to him again for additional dialogue

title: Crafting Kit
notes: Sold by Kale. Purchase this ASAP

title: Nomadic Warrior's Cookbook 1
notes: Sold by Kale

title: Nomadic Warrior's Cookbook 2
notes: Sold by Kale

title: Missionary's Cookbook 1
notes: Sold by Kale

title: Telescope
notes: Sold by Kale

title: Torch
notes: Sold by Kale. Purchase this now, having light in darker areas will make things easier

title: Large Leather Shield
notes: Sold by Kale

title: Chain Set
notes: Sold by Kale

title: Cracked Pot
notes: Sold by Kale, three are sold

title: Gatefront
notes: From the Church of Elleh, head through the cracked wall and North/East along the dirt road. Follow this until you see the ruins over the hill, and head toward the large gate to the left of these ruins

title: Melina
notes: Found when resting at the Gatefront Ruins SoG for the first time. Accept her proposal. She will give you the Spectral Steed Whistle

title: Spectral Steed Whistle
notes: Given to player by speaking to Melina at the Gatefront Ruins SoG

title: Lordsworn's Greatsword
notes: In chest on back of wagon, Northwest part of the Gatefront Ruins

title: Map: Limgrave West
notes: Found near pillar from Agheel Lake North

title: Ash of War: Storm Stomp
notes: In Cellar, South part of the Gatefront Ruins

title: Whestone Knife
notes: In Cellar, South part of the Gatefront Ruins

title: Flail
notes: In chest on the back of wagon, Northeast part of the Gatefront Ruins

title: Agheel Lake North
notes: East side of the Gatefront Ruins

title: Ranni
notes: Warp back after getting Torrent to speak to Renna (Ranni). Exhaust Dialogue to get Spirit Calling Bell and Lone Wolf Ashes. Continue exhausting dialogue until she disappears

title: Spirit Calling Bell
notes: Received from Ranni when you first meet her at the Church of Elleh

title: Lone Wolf Ashes
notes: Received from Ranni when you first meet her at the Church of Elleh

title: Melina
notes: Rest at Church of Elleh SoG and speak to Melina

title: Kale
notes: Speak to Kale to hear about the merchants and some lore

title: Boc
notes: Head Southeast from the Agheel Lake North SoG. Between bridge and telescope, roll into a little tree to reveal Boc

title: Ash of War: Determination
notes: Head Southeast from the Agheel Lake North SoG. Near the bridge you can find a scarab to kill for this Ash of War

title: Mistwood Outskirts
notes: From Agheel Lake North, head Southeast past where you found Boc and the Ash of War Scarab and go across the bridge. Once across, head North/Northeast along the road. Will be just to the right of the road near a boulder

title: Map: Limgrave East
notes: Head East from the Mistwood Outskirts SoG. You can go into your map and mark the "glowing pillar" to make this easier to find

title: Nomadic Warrior's Cookbook 4
notes: West from Map: Limgrave East, near a Runebear scratching a tree

title: Ash of War: Ground Slam
notes: Head South/Southwest from the Nomadic Warrior's Cookbook 4, to the right of the Minor Erdtree, and kill the scarab

title: Minor Erdtree
notes: South/Southeast of the Map: Limgrave East locaiton. Look for the massive tree

title: Spiked Cracked Tear
notes: Found near Minor Erdtree in East Limgrave

title: Greenspill Crystal Tear
notes: Found near Minor Erdtree in East Limgrave

title: Siofra River Well
notes: North of Minor Erdtree and East of the map. Look for building and go down well, activate SoG, then come back up

title: Siofra River Well Depths
notes: Found at the bottom of the Siofra River Well lift

title: Mistwood Ruins
notes: South/Southwest of where you picked up the map, along the road. You will hear howling when you get close, this is Blaidd and necessary later. There is a chest that contains a Smithing Stone 2

title: Howl
notes: in the Mistwood Ruins, you should hear a howl. Once you hear it, warp back to Church of Elleh

title: Finger Snap
notes: Given by Kale in Church of Elleh after hearing the Howl in the Mistwood Ruins

title: Blaidd
notes: Go back to the Mistwood Ruins, then use the snap gesture near where you heard the Howl. You can see Blaidd on top of a tower in the ruins and he will jump down. Exhaust his dialogue

title: Axe Talisman
notes: Underground beneath the Mistwood Ruins

title: Sacrificial Twig
notes: Found West of Mistwood Ruins in front of a large gravestone near a cliff

title: Agheel Lake South
notes: From Agheel Lake North SoG, head South and cross the bridge, then head South along the East edge of the lake and past the giant crab

title: Larval Tear
notes: From Agheel Lake South SoG, head East to find a Wandering Noble enemy. They will transform into a Lesser Runebear. Drops this if killed

title: Forlorn Hound Evergaol
notes: From Agheel Lake South SoG, head South and enter the Evergaol (glowing purple insignia on the ground). Summon Blaidd

title: Bloodhound Knight Darriwil
notes: Found in Forlorn Hound Evergaol. Drops the Bloodhound's Fang weapon

title: Bloodhound's Fang
notes: Received from defeating Bloodhound Knight Darriwil in the Forlorn Hound Evergaol. This is a decent weapon to use as it has bleed and can make most of the game easier

title: Blaidd
notes: Once you beat Bloodhound Knight Darriwil in the Forlorn Hound Evergaol, speak to Blaidd. He will give you a Somber Smithing Stone 2

title: Large Club
notes: South from Forlorn Hound Evergaol, lowest cliff near spiritspring

title: Kenneth Haight
notes: Northeast from Mistwood Outskirts SoG, on top of the ruin platform

title: Fevor's Cookbook 1
notes: North from Kenneth near the graves, you need to go up from where Kenneth is

title: Third Church of Marika
notes: Northeast from Mistwood Outskirts SoG and past Kenneth

title: Melina
notes: Third Church of Marika SoG. Exhaust Dialogue

title: Sacred Tear
notes: Found in Third Church of Marika

title: Flask of Wondrous Physick
notes: Found in Third Church of Marika

title: Crimson Crystal Tear
notes: Found in Third Church of Marika

title: Ash of War: Sacred Blade
notes: From the Third Church of Marika, go across the water and up the hill to the right. Kill the Scarab

title: Stormfoot Catacombs
notes: Return to the Church of Elleh and head Northwest. This will be tucked away behind some boulders. Go through the door. You can shoot the fire shooting pillars with an arrow to lower them. Has Grave Glovewort 1 and Ghost Glovewort 1

title: Ghost
notes: Found in a chair just past the Stormfoot Catacombs SoG. Typically these ghosts can be ignored but they do offer up pieces of lore

title: Prattling Pate (Hello)
notes: Move through catacombs, found after first fire shooting pillar

title: Wandering Noble Ashes
notes: After fire pillars and going up the ladder, in room straight ahead

title: Erdtree Burial Watchdog
notes: Drops the Noble Sorcerer Ashes

title: Noble Sorcerer Ashes
notes: Dropped by Erdtree Burial Watchdog

title: Groveside Cave
notes: North from Curch of Elleh, in the forest along the cliff face

title: Cracked Pot
notes: Found on a corpse just past the entrance of the cave

title: Beastman of Farum Azula
notes: Drops the Flamedrake Talisman

title: Flamedrake Talisman
notes: Dropped by Beastman of Farum Azula

title: Night's Cavalry
notes: Head Southeast from Agheel Lake North SoG, at night, you can find this boss roaming the bridge. He will drop the Ash of War: Repeating Thrust. Can be a difficult fight this early, you can return to this step later if you need

title: Ash of War: Repeating Thrust
notes: Received from defeating the Night's Cavalry boss in West Limgrave

title: Waypoint Ruins
notes: Return to Agheel Lake North SoG, then head Southeast, across the bridge, then Southeast

title: Mad Pumpkin Head
notes: In the cellar at Waypoint Ruins

title: Waypoint Ruins Cellar
notes: After Mad Pumpkin Head boss in the Waypoint Ruins, this SoG will appear

title: Sorceress Sellen
notes: After Mad Pumpkin Head boss in the next room, under the Waypoint Ruins. Accept to become her apprentice to buy sorceries. If you purchase a sorcery from her, she will have an additional dialogue option in the menu

title: Nod in Thought
notes: After speaking to Sorceress Sellen and becoming her apprentice

title: Glintstone Pebble
notes: Sold by Sellen

title: Glintstone Stars
notes: Sold by Sellen

title: Glintstone Arc
notes: Sold by Sellen

title: Crystal Barrage
notes: Sold by Sellen

title: Scholar's Armament
notes: Sold by Sellen

title: Scholar's Shield
notes: Sold by Sellen

title: Greataxe
notes: Near Waypoint Ruins, reload area just outside to find caravan. Attack giants and grab weapon from the chest in the wagon

title: Ash of War: Unsheathe
notes: Southeast part of the Agheel Lake, guarded by giant crabs. Easiest to come at this from the Agheel Lake South SoG

title: Royal House Scroll
notes: Unnamed enemy camp near the Agheel Lake South site of grace. On top of a building near the sorcerer shooting spells. ONLY GIVE TO TURTLE AT CHURCH OF VOWS

title: Great Epee
notes: Unnamed Enemy Camp near the Agheel Lake South SoG. In a chest

title: Starlight Shard
notes: Southeast from camp in previous step. NOTE: It would be worth saving this pickup until you've progressed in Seluvis' quest later in the guide

title: Yura
notes: Directly West of Agheel Lake South SoG, under archway. Exhaust dialogue

title: Seaside Ruins
notes: Directly West of Agheel Lake South SoG

title: Ash of War: Gravitas
notes: From Seaside Ruins SoG, head to the cliff edge West of the SoG, and carefully descend while on Torrent. Kill the pale giant enemy at the bottom to obtain

title: Haligdrake Talisman
notes: North part of the beach after descending from the Seaside Ruins SoG and fighting the pale giant enemy. Go through cave. This will return you to the Cave of Knowledge

title: Stonesword Key
notes: From the Agheel Lake South SoG, head South/Southeast along the road between the cliff edges. Will be at the other end of the Bridge of Sacrifice

title: Bridge of Sacrifice
notes: South/Southeast from the Agheel Lake South SoG, across the Bridge of Sacrifice (location)

title: Irina
notes: Just East of Bridge of Sacrifice SoG. Exhaust Dialogue. Receive Irina's Letter

title: Irina's Letter
notes: Received after speaking to Irina at Bridge of Sacrifice

title: Dragon-Burnt Ruins
notes: Return to Seaside Ruins SoG, then head North. Located in the South part of Agheel Lake

title: Stonesword Key
notes: Base of a small tower guarded by a rat

title: Twinblade
notes: Chest underground in the ruins. You need Torrent to jump over part of the ruins to access this

title: Trapped Chest - To Caelid/Dragonbarrow
notes: Trapped chest is underground. Do not stay in the new area. Run to the site of grace, then run outside to warp out

title: Flying Dragon Agheel
notes: Return to the First Step SoG and head East to Agheel Lake. Found in the center of the lake after you reach the large fire with enemies nearby. Use Torrent. Drops a Dragon Heart

title: Yura
notes: NOTE: If you die to Flying Dragon Agheel, you can speak to Yura again and then his summon sign will appear next to the stake of Marika

title: Dragon Heart
notes: Dropped by Flying Dragon Agheel. Used to get Dragon Incantations

title: Limgrave Tunnels
notes: Northwest part of Agheel Lake. Contains Smithing Stone 1 and Somber Smithing Stone 1

title: Stonedigger Troll
notes: Drops the Roar Medallion

title: Roar Medallion
notes: Dropped by the Stonedigger Troll in the Limgrave Tunnels

title: Bloody Finger Nerijus
notes: Head North from the Agheel Lake South SoG and continue into the canyon. You will get invaded. Yura will join this fight, DO NOT LET HIM DIE

title: Reduvia
notes: Received from defeating Bloody Finger Nerijus

title: Murkwater Cave
notes: Follow the river in the Northeast part of the Agheel Lake, near where you fought Bloody Finger Nerijus Invader

title: Cloth Garb
notes: In a chest in the room. Grab this to trigger boss fight. This is part of the Guilty Set

title: Cloth Trousers
notes: In a chest in the room. Grab this to trigger boss fight. This is part of the Guilty Set

title: Patches
notes: DO NOT KILL HIM. When he begs for mercy, stop attacking

title: Grovel for Mercy
notes: Received from Patches

title: Margit's Shackle
notes: Sold by Patches

title: Parrying Dagger
notes: Sold by Patches

title: Horse Crest Wooden Shield
notes: Sold by Patches

title: Stonesword Key
notes: Sold by Patches

title: Missionary's Cookbook 2
notes: Sold by Patches

title: Sacrificial Twig
notes: Sold by Patches, sells 1

title: Open the Chest
notes: Open the chest near Patches after reloading and making him a merchant. This will be trapped, teleporting you to the Mistwood. Make your way back to Murkwater Cave immediately

title: Calm Down!
notes: Received from Patches after activating the trapped chest in Murkwater Cave. Must have defeated him without killing him

title: Murkwater Catacombs
notes: From Murkwater Cave, continue to the end of the canyon, found through a door. Contains Ghost Glovewort 1 and Grave Glovewort 1

title: Grave Warden Duelist
notes: Drops the Banished Knight Engvall Ashes

title: Banished Knight Engvall Ashes
notes: Dropped by Grave Warden Duelist

title: Tree Sentinel
notes: Return to Church of Elleh. This is the giant on the horse roaming outside the church. Drops the Golden Halberd

title: Golden Halberd
notes: Dropped by Tree Sentinel

title: Ash of War: Stamp Sweep
notes: From the Church of Elleh, head West and downhill until you find the beach with Land Octopus enemies. You'll find a light trail indicating there is an invisible scarab. Kill it to receive this ash of war

title: Coastal Merchant
notes: Head West from the Church of Elleh SoG and down to the beach, then head South until you pass the Coastal Cave and find the merchant under a rock structure. Has 3 Smithing Stone 1. Kill for Nomadic Merchant's Bell Bearing 3

title: Nomadic Merchant's Bell Bearing 3
notes: Kill Coastal Merchant on the West beaches of Limgrave

title: Club
notes: Sold by merchant on the beach

title: Broadsword
notes: Sold by merchant on the beach

title: Shortbow
notes: Sold by merchant on the beach

title: Iron Roundshield
notes: Sold by merchant on the beach

title: Armorer's Cookbook 2
notes: Sold by merchant on the beach

title: Coastal Cave
notes: From the First Step SoG, make your way West and down the slopes to find the cave on the beach

title: Boc
notes: Speak to him near the grace

title: Old Knight Istvan
notes: Right before boss

title: Demi-Human Chiefs
notes: Defeat to receive Sewing Needle and Tailoring Tools

title: Sewing Needle
notes: Received from Demi-Human Chiefs boss. Give to Boc

title: Tailoring Tools
notes: Received from Demi-Human Chiefs boss. Used for altering clothes

title: Church of Dragon Communion
notes: Continue through the tunnel in the Coastal Cave where you found the Demi-Human Chief bosses. Used for offering Dragon Hearts to get special Incantations

title: Golden Seed
notes: Return to the Gatefront SoG. Go through the large gate and along the road through the canyon. You will find the Golden Tree on the right containing this item

title: Stormhill Shack
notes: After finding the golden seed along the road from the Gatefront SoG, continue along the road North and you'll find this SoG to the right

title: Roderika
notes: Speak to her in the Stormhill Shack until she gives you the Sitting Sideways gesture and the Spirit Jellyfish Ashes

title: Sitting Sideways
notes: Received from talking to Roderika

title: Spirt Jellyfish Ashes
notes: Received from talking to Roderika. Needed for content later

title: Godrick Soldier Ashes
notes: From the Stormhill Shack SoG, head South/Southwest along the cliff edge, hug it to your right and you should be able to double back on the higher spot. Look for the graveyard area with the red jellyfish spirits

title: Crossed Legs
notes: From the Starlight Shard found in the previous step, or directly South from the Stormhill Shack SoG. Look for the structure with a corpse sitting on top

title: Arrow's Reach Talisman
notes: Return to the Stormhill Shack SoG. Return to where you found the Golden Seed and follow the elevated area to the right. You'll see the two towers that make the large gate, go inside the tower on your side. Found in a chest

title: Warmaster's Shack
notes: Return to Stormhill Shack and head East. You'll mostly go along a path and a small hut with Knight Bernahl inside

title: Knight Bernahl
notes: Sells Ash of War. Exhaust Dialogue. Choose "My Faith Holds True" option

title: Ash of War: Stamp Upward Cut
notes: Sold by Knight Bernahl

title: Ash of War: Kick
notes: Sold by Knight Bernahl

title: Ash of War: Endure
notes: Sold by Knight Bernahl

title: Ash of War: War Cry
notes: Sold by Knight Bernahl

title: Ash of War: Spinning Slash
notes: Sold by Knight Bernahl

title: Ash of War: Impaling Thrust
notes: Sold by Knight Bernahl

title: Ash of War: Quickstep
notes: Sold by Knight Bernahl

title: Ash of War: Storm Blade
notes: Sold by Knight Bernahl

title: Ash of War: Parry
notes: Sold by Knight Bernahl

title: Ash of War: No Skill
notes: Sold by Knight Bernahl

title: Bell Bearing Hunter
notes: Will invade at night. Drops the Bone Peddler's Bell Bearing. HARD FIGHT. You can come back later

title: Bone Peddler's Bell Bearing
notes: Dropped by the Bell Bearing Hunter at Warmaster's Shack

title: Beast Crest Heater Shield
notes: Northeast of Warmaster's Shack SoG in a chest in an enemy camp

title: Iron Fist Alexander
notes: East of camp leading from Warmaster's Shack. Speak to him, then knock him out of the hole, then exhaust dialogue. NOTE: You can kill him here to receive the Warrior Jar Shard, but you will not be able to complete his questline. Recommended to do this at the start of your second playthrough

title: Warrior Jar Shard
notes: Kill Alexander here for this talisman. This does end his questline

title: Triumphant Delight
notes: Received from Iron Fist Alexander after freeing him

title: Saintsbridge
notes: Backtrack down to the path leading back to the camp, then head East along the path. Should be just below where you first met Iron Fist Alexander

title: Rear Gael Tunnel Entrance
notes: Return to the Third Church of Marika SoG, head North and continue up the spirit springs until you pass a pack of wolves, go up that spirit spring and the tunnel should be to the right of the final spirit spring leading to Caelid. You can find Iron Fist Alexander here

title: Nomadic Merchant
notes: From Saintsbridge SoG, head across the bridge past the pumpkin head enemy and you'll find him just to the right after the bridge. Kill for Nomadic Merchant's Bell Bearing 1

title: Nomadic Merchant's Bell Bearing 1
notes: Received from killing Nomadic Merchant near Saintsbridge

title: Nomadic Warrior's Cookbook 3
notes: Sold by merchant, across the bridge and to the right

title: Halberd
notes: Sold by merchant, across the bridge and to the right

title: Short Sword
notes: Sold by merchant, across the bridge and to the right

title: Bandit Mask
notes: Sold by merchant, across the bridge and to the right. Part of the Bandit Set

title: Cracked Pot
notes: Sold by merchant

title: D, Hunter of the Dead
notes: From the merchant near Saintsbridge, head East down toward Summonwater Village, speak to D and exhaust dialogue

title: Summonwater Village Outskirts
notes: After speaking to D, head East toward the Summonwater Village

title: Tibia Mariner
notes: Tibia Mariner in Summonwater Village. Drops the Skeletan Militiaman Ashes and a Deahtroot

title: Deathroot
notes: Dropped by Tibia Mariner in Summonwater Village. Second one found

title: Skeletal Militiaman Ashes
notes: Dropped by Tibia Mariner in Summonwater Village

title: Green Turtle Talisman
notes: In an underground area beneath Summonwater Village, on the East side, need Stonesword Key

title: Strength-Knot Crystal Tear
notes: Return to the Warmaster's Shack SoG, then head Northwest. Youll find some giant pillars with an elevated area to your left. Go to the elevated area and hug the cliff edge, will be found near the giant enemy in a stone bowl

title: Recusant Henricus
notes: North of Warmaster's Shack SoG or North/Northeast of the Strength-Knot Crystal Tear, near colosseum structure. This is an invader. Drops Hammer Talisman

title: Hammer Talisman
notes: Dropped by Recusant Henricus

title: Small Red Effigy
notes: Sitting outside Colosseum door

title: Duelist's Furled Finger
notes: Sitting outside Colosseum door

title: Ash of War: Golden Vow
notes: Southeast from the Coloseum, kill mounted enemy along the cliff

title: Deathbird
notes: At night, you can go Southeast from Warmaster's Shack SoG to encounter on top of a ruin in a plateau with the giant trolls. Drops the Blue-Feathered Branchsword

title: Blue-Feathered Branchsword
notes: Dropped by Deathbird found near Warmaster's shack

title: Lance
notes: Near Ash of War: Golden Vow along the cliff. Look for the large square ruins building and jump down to find this on a corpse

title: Deathtouched Catacombs
notes: From Saintsbridge SoG, head West back toward the camp. Hug the right cliff face and there will be a spot just before the camp that you can jump up to on torrent. Look for the door on the left. Contains Grave Glovewort 1

title: Uchigatana
notes: Up on the ledge with the archer skeletons

title: Black knife Assassin
notes: Drops the Assassin's Crimson Dagger

title: Assassin's Crimson Dagger
notes: Dropped by the Black Knife Assassin

title: Deathroot
notes: Found in chest after defeating the Black Knife Assassin. First one found

title: Ghost
notes: Found kneeling just outside of the Deathtouched Catacombs. Exhaust dialogue for lore

title: Lance Talisman
notes: North/Northeast of the Deathtouched Catacombs past the bridge's pillars

title: Highroad Cave
notes: Jump down from Saintsbridge SoG using Spirit Spring, then follow the canyon North past the land octopus enemies, on the left. Contains Smithing Stone 1,2

title: Shamshir
notes: Continue through the cave and down a hole near the wolves. Continue through until you find the waterfall area with the large bat enemies. Sitting on the circular platform

title: Guardian Golem
notes: Boss is found behind a waterfall near the end of the area, after defeating the giant land octopus enemy. Drops the Blue Dancer Charm

title: Blue Dancer Charm
notes: Dropped by the Guardian Golem boss

title: Murkwater Coast
notes: Take the road Southeast from Agheel Lake North SoG. At the bridge, turn left (North) then follow the cliff to the right. Will be down a small cliff on the right side, near the ruin structures

title: Armorer's Cookbook 1
notes: Southwest from Murkwater Coast SoG in an unnamed enemy camp

title: Artist's Shack
notes: From Murkwater Coast SoG, climb on top of the ruin buildings and to the other side of the canyon, then continue East

title: Homing Instinct Painting
notes: In Artists Shack

title: Finger Reader Crone
notes: Return to Stormhill Shack SoG, then follow road leading North/Northwest and continue between the large pillars. You will come across a broken bridge with a Finger Reader Crone. Exhaust dialogue for lore by choosing "Show Hands" option

title: Nomadic Warrior's Cookbook 7
notes: Continue to end of bridge near Finger Reader Crone, located North/Northwest from Stormhill Shack SoG along the road and through the giant stone pillars

title: Ash of War: Storm Wall
notes: Drop to cliff from the broken end of the bridge where you found the Nomadic Warrior's Cookbook 7 and kill the scarab

title: Fringefolk Hero's Grave
notes: Warp back to Stranded Graveyard and use two stonesword keys to unlock

title: Erdtree's Favor
notes: Continue through the area and past the chariot, until you reach a narrow bridge. Drop directly to the left or right of that bridge, then progress past the fire pillar until you find another bridge, at the end of it you will find this item

title: Erdtree Greatbow
notes: Received by destroying the chariot with the giant hanging pots. To reach this area, from the two scion enemies near the Erdtree's Favor talisman, head back to the entryway you came from but drop down near the end of the bridge, and again into the water. Use lift to go up to a platform where you can fight an enemy and then shoot at the three hanging pots. Wait for the chariot to be underneath to destroy it. YOU HAVE TO HIT THE ROPE, NOT THE POT

title: Stonesword Key
notes: Found on the ledge where you can shoot the hanging pots to destroy the chariot

title: Dragon Communion Seal
notes: Return to beginning of area or drop down from ledge if you destroyed the chariot, then continue down. When you can go up to the right, do so. Continue up and defeat the lone enemy in the room

title: Ulcerated Tree Spirit
notes: Continue back down the area. Drops Golden Seed and the Banished Knight Oleg Ashes

title: Golden Seed
notes: Dropped by Ulcerated Tree Spirit in Fringefolk Hero's Grave

title: Banished Knight Oleg Ashes
notes: Dropped by Ulcerated Tree Spirit in Fringefolk Hero's Grave

title: Ash of War: Wild Strikes
notes: Return to Stormhill Shack SoG and head along the road toward the castle. Kill the scarab

title: Castleward Tunnel
notes: Continue along the road from Stormhill Shack SoG, past the enemies and into the tunnel leading to the castle

title: Sorceror Rogier
notes: Summon sign found just before a gate leading to the Margit, the Fell Omen boss fight

title: Margit, the Fell Omen
notes: Drops the Talisman Pouch. You can summon Rogier for this fight if you'd like

title: Talisman Pouch
notes: Received by defeating Margit

title: Margit, the Fell Omen (Grace)
notes: SoG after beating Margit

title: Roundtable Hold
notes: Once here, speak to all NPCs

title: Corhyn
notes: Exhaust dialogue and select "I See It", sells Incantations. DO NOT GIVE PRAYER BOOKS

title: Prayer
notes: Received by Corhyn

title: Flame Sling
notes: Sold by Corhyn. NOTE: This was called Feast Upon Flame in the network test and had been renamed to Flame Sling upon release of the game

title: Urgent Heal
notes: Sold by Corhyn

title: Heal
notes: Sold by Corhyn

title: Cure Poison
notes: Sold by Corhyn

title: Magic Fortification
notes: Sold by Corhyn

title: Flame Fortification
notes: Sold by Corhyn

title: Rejection
notes: Sold by Corhyn

title: Catch Flame
notes: Sold by Corhyn

title: Diallos
notes: Exhaust Dialogue

title: Gideon Offnir
notes: Exhaust Dialogue

title: Hewg
notes: Exhaust Dialogue, Does weapon enhancement

title: Fia
notes: Exhaust Dialogue and choose "Let Her Hold You" option

title: Ensha
notes: Speak to him to get the What do you want? gesture

title: What Do You Want?
notes: Speak to Ensha to receive this

title: Twin Maiden Husks
notes: Sells various things, and you can turn in your bell bearings here to increase their wares

title: Memory Stone
notes: Sold by Twin Maiden Husks

title: Stonesword Key
notes: Sold by Twin Maiden Husks. Three are sold

title: Knight Set
notes: Sold by Twin Maiden Husks

title: Heater Shield
notes: Sold by Twin Maiden Husks

title: Battle Axe
notes: Sold by Twin Maiden Husks

title: Dagger
notes: Sold by Twin Maiden Husks

title: Finger Seal
notes: Sold by Twin Maiden Husks

title: Longbow
notes: Sold by Twin Maiden Husks

title: Longsword
notes: Sold by Twin Maiden Husks

title: Mace
notes: Sold by Twin Maiden Husks

title: Rapier
notes: Sold by Twin Maiden Husks

title: Scimitar
notes: Sold by Twin Maiden Husks

title: Short Spear
notes: Sold by Twin Maiden Husks

title: White Cipher Ring
notes: Sold by Twin Maiden Husks

title: Blue Cipher Ring
notes: Sold by Twin Maiden Husks

title: Host's Trick-Mirror
notes: Sold by Twin Maiden Husks

title: Furled Finger's Trick Mirror
notes: Sold by Twin Maiden Husks

title: Mad Tongue Alberich
notes: Drop down balcony. Will drop the Taunter's Tongue. Note, let him complete the bow to get the Reverential Bow gesture

title: Taunter's Tongue
notes: Dropped by Mad Tongue Alberich in the Roundtable Hold

title: Reverential Bow
notes: Received after letting Mad Tongue Alberich complete his bow

title: Cipher Pata
notes: Lower area of Roundtable Hold

title: Crepus's Black-Key Crossbow
notes: Use one Stonesword Key down the stairs just past Hewg

title: Stormveil Castle
notes: Warp to the Margit, the Fell Omen SoG. Contains Smithing Stone 1, 2, 3, Somber Smithing Stone 1, 2

title: Stormveil Main Gate
notes: From the Margit, the Fell Omen SoG, head up the path leading to the castle. This will be outside the main gate

title: Gostoc
notes: Go through entryway to the left of the main gate, and speak to Gostoc. Do not have him open the gate, take the shortcut. ONCE YOU OPEN THE MAIN GATE, come back to Gostoc before killing Godrick, and he will be a merchant

title: Stormveil Cliffside
notes: Continue through the hole in the wall near Gostoc and follow along the cliff past the bird enemies

title: Marred Leather shield
notes: Found as you go up the stairs, on a corpse

title: Hookclaws
notes: Found in the cellar after reaching the top of the stairs from Stormveil Cliffside SoG

title: Curved Sword Talisman
notes: Continue up the stairs and rafters and enter the dark room with banished knight

title: Rusty Key
notes: Continue up the stairs and rafters and enter the dark room with banished knight

title: Brick Hammer
notes: Once you receive the Rusty Key, exit the room and drop down the platform on the right. Unlock the door and head up the ladder. Turn right at the top and jump up to the platform on the right. Follow scaffolding past enemies and into a circular room. Found on corpse

title: Rampart Tower
notes: Follow stairs up past second banished knight, slight right into room with the doorway, go through the doorway to find the SoG

title: Stonesword Key
notes: Follow path up stairs from Rampart Tower SoG. Head outside to the rooftops. Look for broken tower and jump across to it, jump in broken tower, drop down to find Stonesword Key

title: Dozing Cross-Legged
notes: Near Bladded Talon Eagle enemy on rooftops. Leave from Rampart Tower SoG, turn right, jump to rooftop. OR, drop down from where you found the Stonesword Key

title: Claw Talisman
notes: From the rooftop where you found the Dozing Cross-Legged gesture, look for a lower section with a broken pillar leading up, follow around to area with enemis, climb up ladder

title: Hawk Crest Wooden Shield
notes: Return to broken pillar and jump down near the tree, you can see a fog gate down below. Use Stonesword Key to open the room

title: Misericorde
notes: Return to broken pillar and jump down near the tree, you can see a fog gate down below. Use Stonesword Key to open the room

title: Iron Whetblade
notes: Return to broken pillar and jump down near the tree, you can see a fog gate down below. Use Stonesword Key to open the room

title: Nomadic Warrior's Cookbook 10
notes: Return to the Rampart Tower SoG and head out the doorway to the North, then immediately turn to your right. Jump across to the rooftops to the East. Continue East along the left side of the tower and drop down where you will see a Banished Knight and another enemy facing away from you. Continue past them across the plank bridge and up the rubble onto the platform. On a corpse

title: Arbalest
notes: From the Nomadic Warrior's Cookbook 10, head East and drop down to the left of the rampart (through some crates and barrels). You will see a broken wall to your right, jump down there. Look East, then jump over the edge of the wall. Head South along the left wall, passing the enemies until you are at a castle section you can jump to, with an enemy at a ballista. Just past him on that same platform you will find this on a corpse.

title: Gateside Chamber
notes: Jump down from where you found the Arbalest and continue down the path South through the gate. Follow the path past all of the enemies until you see a doorway to the right of the main gate. Go through the doorway to find the SoG

title: Bandit Set
notes: Sold by Gostoc. The Bandit Mask is found earlier in the guide. The Manchette's and the Boots are both part of the Raptor's Set as well

title: Buckler
notes: Sold by Gostoc

title: Caestus
notes: Sold by Gostoc

title: Marred Wooden Shield
notes: Warp to Rampart Tower. Kill Warhawks outside, then drop down from West tower/rampart onto ledges. and to broken tower

title: Ash of War: Storm Assault
notes: Continue from the West tower/rampart you dropped to for the Marred Wooden Shield and down to a grass covered rock area. This will break. Kill the scarab once you are at the bottom

title: Aspects of the Crucible: Horns
notes: Kill the Crucible Knight. You can cheese this fight by leading him to the lift back to Rampart Tower SoG, and sending him up in it while you wait at the bottom, or waiting on the other side of the gap after the lift goes up

title: Sorcerer Rogier
notes: Go to Rampart Tower, then follow path with warhawks to the rooftops on the right, then go down the ladder with a banished knight at the bottom. Go to the left from the ladder and exhaust dialogue. Tell him you are here to Kill Godrick

title: Mimic's Veil
notes: Leave the church where you found Rogier and head back toward the ladder. Continue into the next building, go through three doorways and into the room with the banished knight. Found inside the chest

title: Grafted Scion
notes: Cheese this boss from the room

title: Highland Axe
notes: Found in Kitchen with Grafted Scion

title: Chrysalid's Memento
notes: Head to the Southwest corner of the room where you fought the Grafted Scion. On top of pile of corpses. Can be given to Roderika

title: Godslayer's Seal
notes: From the room with the Grafted Scion, head to the Northwest through a door into another room, then out to the courtyard. Turn left to go down stairs to room with rats, then use Stonesword key

title: Godskin Prayerbook
notes: From the room with the Grafted Scion, head to the Northeast through a door into another room, then out to the courtyard. Turn left to go down stairs to room with rats, then use Stonesword key. DO NOT GIVE TO CHORYN

title: Pike
notes: Return to the courtyard. Found on a corpse in the courtyard

title: Wooden Greatshield
notes: Found on a balcony in the courtyard

title: Prophecy Painting
notes: Room to the left of the Omen enemy

title: Liftside Chamber
notes: Go past the Omen enemy in the courtyard to find

title: Ash of War: Stormcaller
notes: Warp back to Liftside Chamber SoG and use the lift. Follow the path to find a scarab that drops the ash

title: Cracked Pot
notes: In the area with the Warrior Jar Enemies, look for these laying on the ground near the large Warrior Jar. Two can be found here

title: Manor Towershield
notes: In the area with the Warrior Jar enemies, walk along scaffolding, jump to ledge, go into the room and back out to more scaffolding. Go to the room and you'll find a bunch of enemies, shield is under the stairs in this room

title: Shortcut
notes: From the room with the enemies and Manor Towershield, head outside where you'll see writing on the ground from Rogier. Look for rock ledges leading down to a door and go through, then turn left and head to the door to open it, this leads back to the Liftside Chamber SoG

title: Rancorcall
notes: From the Liftside Chamber SoG, make your way back through the shortcut door and down along the rafters and beams. Once to the bottom, this will be near the giant rat in the ruined building area

title: Ulcerated Tree Spirit
notes: Found in the lower area of the castle near Rancorcall sorcery. NOTE: Required for advancing Rogier and Fia's questline

title: Golden Seed
notes: Dropped by Ulcerated Tree Spirit found in the area below Stormveil Castle

title: Bloodstain
notes: Touch Bloodstain near face near Ulcerated Tree Spirit to see a memory. NOTE: Required for Rogier and Fia's quest progression

title: Prince of Death's Pustule
notes: Found near giant face just past the Ulcerated Tree Spirit at the bottom of Stormveil Castle

title: Nepheli Loux
notes: Return to the Liftside Chamber SoG, then head out toward the courtyard and go to the left. Found in one of the houses on the right before huge troll. Exhaust her dialogue

title: Secluded Cell
notes: Past the troll

title: Godrick, the Grafted
notes: Drops Rememberance of the Grafted and Godrick's Great Rune

title: Remembrance of the Grafted
notes: Received for defeating Godrick. Used with Enia at the Roundtable Hold to receive Axe of Godrick or Grafted Dragon

title: Godrick the Grafted (SoG)
notes: Found after defeating Godrick the Grafted

title: Godrick's Great Rune
notes: Received for defeating Godrick

title: Commoner's Simple Garb
notes: Go to the Gateside Chamber SoG. Just outside the doorway on the balcony. Variant of the Commoner's Set

title: Roderika
notes: Warp back to Roundtable Hold, and speak to Roderika for a Golden Seed

title: Golden Seed
notes: Received from Roderika after giving her the Chrysilids Memento and moving to the Roundtable Hold

title: Master Hewg and Roderika
notes: Speak to them and continue to exhaust dialogue and reload until Roderika becomes spirit tuner

title: Enia
notes: Speak to Enia in the room with the Two Fingers. She will give you armaments and spells for your remembrances and will let you purchase equipment worn by remembrance bosses

title: Rapture
notes: Interact with the Two Fingers

title: Nepheli Loux
notes: Speak to her and exhaust dialogue for Arsenal Charm. She can be found near the Twin Maiden Husks and outside Gideon's room

title: Arsenal Charm
notes: Speak to Nepheli for this charm

title: Sir Gideon Ofnir
notes: Speak to him about Nepheli. You may need to reload to open his study

title: Sorcerer Rogier
notes: Speak to him to receive Rogier's Rapier. Speak to him about the creature down below, and about D. Near balcony

title: Rogier's Rapier
notes: Received from Rogier during his questline

title: Ash of War: Glintblade Phalanx
notes: This can be obtained by obtaining Rogier's Rapier during Rogier's questline. This Ash is attached to Rogier's Rapier

title: Ash of War: Glintstone Pebble
notes: Sold by Rogier, wait until you go back to Roundtable Hold

title: Ash of War: Carian Greatsword
notes: Sold by Rogier, wait until you go back to Roundtable Hold

title: Ash of War: Spinning Weapon
notes: Sold by Rogier, wait until you go back to Roundtable Hold

title: Knifeprint Clue
notes: Received from Fia after talking about the knifeprint

title: Crimson Hood
notes: Go back to Stormveil near the pile of corpses where you got the Crhysalid's Memento. Part of the Noble Set, along with the Navy Hood

title: Stormhill Evergaol
notes: South of Stormhill Shack on the right side of the cliff. Contains the Crucible Knight boss (HARD FIGHT EARLY ON)

title: Crucible Knight
notes: Located in the Stormhill Evergaol (HARD FIGHT EARLY ON). Drops Aspects of the Crucible: Tail

title: Aspects of the Crucible: Tail
notes: Received from beating Crucible Knight in the Stormhill Evergaol

title: Limgrave Tower Bridge
notes: From the Gateside Chamber SoG, head out the door and up the slopes until you see a Lion Guardian enemy and stairs to the right. Go up the stairs and through the chamber

title: Boltdrake Talisman
notes: Up the stairs from the Limgrave Tower Bridge SoG

title: Ash-of-War Scarab
notes: At the end of the crumbled bridge leading to the Divine Tower of Limgrave. Continue past the portal and carefully down the edge of the broken bridge

title: Divine Tower of Limgrave
notes: Use waygate to get here then go into the tower and up the lift

title: Bravo!
notes: Return to the First Step SoG and interact with the message on the ground where Varre was. THIS IS MISSABLE IF YOU CONTINUE HIS QUESTLINE BEFORE RETURNING HERE

title: Weeping Peninsula
notes: Return to the Bridge of Sacrifice SoG to start this section. Contains Grave Glovewort 1, 2, 3, Smithing Stone 1, 2, Somber Smithing Stone 1, 2

title: Morning Star
notes: South down the road back of destroyed convoy

title: Ash of War: Mighty Shot
notes: Further South from Morning Star. Kill the Scarab

title: Castle Morne Rampart
notes: Directly South from the Bridge of Sacrifice SoG and past the morning star and Scarab, continue on to find near some trees and a merchant

title: Night's Cavalry
notes: Night boss near the Castle Morne Rampart SoG. Drops the Nightrider Flail and Ash of War: Barricade Shield

title: Ash of War: Barricade Shield
notes: Dropped by Night's Cavalry in the Weeping Peninsula

title: Nightrider Flail
notes: Dropped by Night's Cavalry in the Weeping Peninsula

title: Nomadic Merchant
notes: Sells items, kill for Nomadic Merchant's Bell Bearing 4

title: Nomadic Merchant's Bell Bearing 4
notes: Dropped by Nomadic Merchant near Castle Morne Rampart SoG

title: Bastard Sword
notes: Sold by Merchant near opening in the wall

title: Light Crossbow
notes: Sold by Merchant near opening in the wall

title: Red Thorn Roundshield
notes: Sold by Merchant near opening in the wall

title: Round Shield
notes: Sold by Merchant near opening in the wall

title: Iron Set
notes: Sold by Merchant near opening in the wall.

title: Leather Trousers
notes: Nomadic Merchant, Castle Morne Rampart. Part of the Iron Set

title: Scaled Armor
notes: Nomadic Merchant, Castle Morne Rampart. Part of the Iron Set

title: Stonesword Key
notes: Sold by Merchant near opening in the wall

title: Crimson Amber Medallion
notes: Sold by Merchant near opening in the wall

title: Cracked Pot
notes: Sold by merchant near opening in the wall

title: South of the Lookout Tower
notes: From the Castle Morne Rampart SoG, head North/Northwest making sure to go to the left of the path leading into the canyon. Follow the cliff on your left and double back to find on top of the cliff

title: Map: Weeping Peninsula
notes: Return to the Castle Morne Rampart SoG and head South through the break in the wall. Will be along the road

title: Golden Seed
notes: Continue toward Castle Morne from where you found the map and keep an eye on the right. You should see a golden tree containing the seed on top of a cliff

title: Castle Morne Lift
notes: Ride down South past map and rest here. Then warp back to Castle Morne Rampart SoG

title: Great Turtle Shell
notes: Use the spirit spring near the Castle Morne Rampart SoG. Jump to bastion to the South near the broken wall

title: Oridys's Rise
notes: Spiritspring, then head East. Hit the three turtle spirits, one across the entrance, one hidden in the bushes, the last in the middle of the pond near the tower (invisible)

title: Memory Stone
notes: Found at the top of Oridys's Rise in a chest

title: Starlight Shard
notes: East of Oridys's Rise

title: Beside the Crater-Pocked Glade
notes: North of Oridys's Rise near a crater with enemies

title: Impaler's Catacombs
notes: From the Beside the Crater-Pocked Glade SoG, head Northeast and then North along the bottom path near the giant tombstones and spirit jellyfish. Has Grave Glovewort 1 and 2, and Ghost Glovewort 2

title: Prattling Pate (Please Help)
notes: Continue through the catacombs until you find a lift with spikes overhead. Step on the platform and then back off quickly to make it go up, then drop down below into the water. Found in the water area prior to going up the ladder

title: Erdtree Guardian Watchdog
notes: Drops the Demi-Human Ashes

title: Demi-Human Ashes
notes: Dropped by Erdtree Guardian Watchdog

title: Callu Baptismal Church
notes: From the Castle Morne Rampart SoG, head West and then hug the right rock face, looping around to find the church. Has rat enemies and does not contain a SoG

title: The Flame of Frenzy
notes: Found in Callu Baptismal Church

title: Sacred Tear
notes: Found in Callu Baptismal Church

title: Ailing Village Outskirts
notes: North of Callu Baptismal Church

title: Flame Crest Wooden Shield
notes: Found in Ailing Village

title: Lightning Strike
notes: Head South/Southwest from the Ailing Village Outskirts SoG and look for tombstones coming out of the cliff face when looking over the side of the cliff. Jump down to the bottom. Found on scarab protected by lightning strikes near Giant Bats

title: Morne Tunnel
notes: West from the Ailing Village Outskirts SoG, head West, then drop down to ledge where the wooden bridge is. Cross the bridge then turn South and drop down to the ravine, continue heading South. Contains Smithing Stone 1, Somber Smithing Stone 1

title: Scaly Misbegotten
notes: Drops the Rusted Anchor

title: Rusted Anchor
notes: Dropped by Scaly Misbegotten Boss

title: Forest Lookout Tower
notes: Returrn to the South of the Lookout Tower SoG and head North. Not a SoG

title: Hand Ballista
notes: Top of Forest Lookout Tower

title: Earthbore Cave
notes: West of the Forest Lookout Tower. When on the tower, you can look to the West and see a path leading near the water on the right. Make your way down and around to this area and follow that path

title: Runebear
notes: Drops the Spelldrake Talisman

title: Spelldrake Talisman
notes: Dropped by Runebear

title: Demi-Human Forest Ruins
notes: West of the Earthbore Cave

title: Demi-Human Queen
notes: Drops the Demi-Human Queen's Staff and the Crystal Burst sorcery

title: Demi-Human Queen's Staff
notes: Dropped by Demi-Human Queen

title: Crystal Burst
notes: Dropped by Demi-Human Queen

title: Shield of the Guilty
notes: In underground area of the Demi-Human Forest Ruins. Southern part of the ruins underground in a chest

title: Faith-Knot Crystal Tear
notes: North of the Demi-Human Forest Ruins. Look for a stone bowl with plant enemies surrounding it

title: Church of Pilgrimage
notes: Northwest of the Demi-Human Forest Ruins, North part of the peninsula. Climb up the cliff side

title: Ghost
notes: Found just outside the Church of Pilgrimage, near the archway. Talk to the ghost for lore

title: Melina
notes: Rest at the Church of Pilgrimage SoG and talk to Melina

title: Gilded Iron Shield
notes: In graveyard just outside the Church of Pilgrimage

title: Warhawk Ashes
notes: From church of pilgrimage, go North toward the cliffs. Go near ghost after getting the Prophecy Painting in Stormveil Castle to receive the Ashes

title: Tombsward Catacombs
notes: South of the Church of Pilgrimage, look for the spirit jellyfish. Can be found behind a ruined structure through a door. Has Grave Glovewort 1,2 and Ghost Glovewort 1

title: Nomadic Warrior's Cookbook 9
notes: Accessed by using a stonesword key

title: Prattling Pate (Thank You)
notes: Continue along path and into room near fire pillar

title: Cemetary Shade
notes: Drops the Lhutel the Headless Ashes

title: Lhutel the Headless
notes: Dropped by defeating the Cemetary Shade

title: Minor Erdtree
notes: South of the Tombsward Catacombs

title: Erdtree Avatar
notes: Drops the Opaline Bubbletear and the Crimsonburst Crystal Tear

title: Opaline Bubbletear
notes: Dropped by the Erdtree Avatar

title: Crimsonburst Crystal Tear
notes: Dropped by the Erdtree Avatar

title: Eclipse Crest Heater Shield
notes: Southwest from Tombsward Catacombs or Northwest from the Minor Erdtree, on a rock platform on a corpse. You need to be on that plateau above the Tombsward Catacombs, and look over the edge of the cliff to the East. You'll see a corpse on a stone platform that you need to drop to

title: Tombsward Ruins
notes: Head North from the Tombsward Catacombs unti you have a safe way down, then go West

title: Winged Scythe
notes: Underground in a chest

title: Divine Fortification
notes: Scarab on top of ruin building just Southwest of Tombsward Ruins

title: Tombsward
notes: SoG found South/Southeast of the Tombsward Ruins location. Will be near the cliff face, and up on a ledge

title: Weeping Evergaol
notes: West of the Tombsward Ruins. Contains the Ancient Hero of Zamor boss. Need Stonesword Key to access

title: Ancient Hero of Zamor
notes: Found in the Weeping Evergaol. Drops the Radagon's Scarseal

title: Radagon's Scarseal
notes: Dropped by Ancient Hero of Zamor

title: Fourth Church of Marika
notes: West of the Weeping Evergaol

title: Tombsward Cave
notes: Southeast from the Fourth Church of Marika. You need to drop to lower ledge

title: Nomadic Warrior's Cookbook 8
notes: Look for a small ledge in the poison water to drop down and kill two rats. Then look for the next cave along the way to kill more rats and find on a corpse

title: Miranda the Blighted Bloom
notes: Drops the Viridian Amber Talisman

title: Viridian Amber Medallion
notes: Dropped by Miranda the Blighted Bloom

title: Witchbane Ruins
notes: South of the Fourth Church of Marika

title: Ambush Shard
notes: Found underground beneath the Witchbane Ruins

title: Sellen
notes: Below Witchbane Ruins. Talk to her

title: Isolated Merchant's Shack
notes: Southwest of Witchbane Ruins

title: Isolated Merchant
notes: Found at Isolated Merchant's Shack. Kill for Isolated Merchant's Bell Bearing 1

title: Isolated Merchant's Bell Bearing 1
notes: Dropped by Isolated Merchant at the Isolated Merchant's Shack

title: Lantern
notes: Sold by Merchant at Isolated Merchant's Shack

title: Zweihander
notes: Sold by Merchant at Isolated Merchant's Shack

title: Sacrificial Twig
notes: Sold by Merchant at Isolated Merchant's Shack. Three are sold

title: Tower of Return
notes: Southeast from the shack. Teleport chest that takes you to Leyndell, Royal Capital

title: Divine Bridge
notes: Accessed after teleport trap at Tower of Return

title: Blessed Dew Talisman
notes: Near golem enemy past the Divine Bridge SoG, in a chest

title: Poison Mist
notes: From Castle Morne Rampart SoG, head South along road, through broken wall, then head left toward forested area with swamp. Use range

title: Deathbird
notes: North of Castle Morne, up on the ledge where you had found the Golden Seed, near the ruins building

title: Sacrificial Axe
notes: Dropped by Weeping Peninsula Deathbird

title: Castle Morne
notes: Return to the Castle Morne Lift SoG. Can find several Smithing Stone 1, 2 here

title: Claymore
notes: After taking the lift from the Castle Morne Lift SoG, continue past the corpse pile to the right and find in a room in a chest

title: Steelwire Torch
notes: From the chest with the Claymore, head out and find the ladder leading up. Once at the top, hug the wall left until you see a corpse with an item near two enemies

title: Edgar
notes: Return to where you came up the ladder, then climb the next ladder. Follow the path around the top of the castle, until you reach the Northeast corner of the castle and climb the stairs. Give him the letter, exhaust dialogue, and you'll receive a Sacrificial Twig

title: Sacrificial Twig
notes: Received from Edgar

title: Behind the Castle
notes: From Edgar, backtrack toward broken wall in the South corner of the castle, and fall down to find SoG

title: Stonesword Key
notes: Drop to platform by the cliffs and look for scaffolding over the side with a corpse

title: Twinblade Talisman
notes: Top of tower past the bridge, in a chest

title: Whip
notes: Drop down to circular building from near the bridge, then drop down again until you reach the top of another building. Inside this building with the rat enemies

title: Beside the Rampart Gaol
notes: South corner of the castle after dropping down. Just outside rat room, to the left

title: Leonine Misbegotten
notes: Drops the Grafted Blade Greatsword

title: Grafted Blade Greatsword
notes: Dropped by Leonine Misbegotten

title: Morne Moangrave
notes: Appears after defeating Leonine Misbegotten

title: Irina
notes: Warp to Bridge of Scarifice. Irina will be dead

title: Edgar
notes: Speak to Edgar near Bridge of Sacrifice and exhaust dialogue

title: East Limgrave
notes: Return to the Rear Gael Tunnel Entrance SoG. Contains Smithing Stone 1, 2, Somber Smithing Stone 1, Grave Glovewort 1

title: Smoldering Church
notes: From the Rear Gael Tunnel Entrance SoG, head out and then head West, taking the Spirit Spring. Then head North. Once you get near the Smoldering Church, you'll be invaded by Anastasia, Tarnished-Eater

title: Anastasia, Tarnished-Eater
notes: Invaded outside the Smoldering Church

title: Sacred Scorpion Charm
notes: Dropped by Anastasia, Tarnished-Eater invader

title: Nomadic Warrior's Cookbook 14
notes: Found in Smoldering Church

title: Missionary's Cookbook 3
notes: Found in Smoldering Church

title: Incantation Scarab
notes: Warp to the Dragon-Burnt Ruins in Lake Agheel after receiving the Homing Instinct Painting and head Southwest. Ghost will appear near tombstones and drops this item

title: Nomadic Merchant's Bell Bearing 2
notes: Dropped by Nomadic Merchant South of Minor Erdtree

title: Nomadic Warrior's Cookbook 5
notes: Sold by Nomadic Merchant

title: Armorer's Cookbook 3
notes: Sold by Nomadic Merchant

title: Hand Axe
notes: Sold by Nomadic Merchant

title: Riveted Wooden Shield
notes: Sold by Nomadic Merchant

title: Blue-Gold Kite Shield
notes: Sold by Nomadic Merchant

title: Ghost
notes: Speak to ghost along the road to Fort Haight for lore

title: Fort Haight West
notes: From the Nomadic Merchant or from Siofra River Well, continue South along the road, you'll find this SoG to the right of the path leading up to Fort Haight

title: Golden Seed
notes: Just outside the Fort Haight near Golden Tree

title: Nomadic Warrior's Cookbook 6
notes: In a chest in the room when you first enter Fort Haight

title: Ash of War: Bloody Slash
notes: Dropped by knight at the top of the fort

title: Dectus Medallion (Left)
notes: In a chest

title: Erdsteel Dagger
notes: Given by Kenneth Haight after clearing Fort Haight

title: Kenneth Haight
notes: Go back to Fort Haight and speak to Kenneth Haight and exhaust dialogue

title: D, Hunter of the Dead
notes: Go back to Roundtable Hold and speak to D. Show him the Deathroot (Only necessary if you did not speak to him after Tibia Mariner fight in Summonwater Village

title: Beast Sanctum
notes: Return to the Third Church of Marika and go to the mark that D made to use the portal. Go inside the sanctum and rest at this SoG

title: Beast Clergyman
notes: Speak to Beast Clergyman  in the Beast Sanctum and offer two deathroots (one at a time). You'll receive the Beast Eye, Clawmark Seal, and Bestial Sling

title: Beast Eye
notes: Received from Beast Clergyman for offering first Deathroot

title: Clawmark Seal
notes: Received from Beast Clergyman for offering first Deathroot

title: Bestial Sling
notes: Received from Beast Clergyman for offering second Deathroot

title: Litany of Proper Death
notes: Sold by D

title: Order's Blade
notes: Sold by D

title: East Liurnia
notes: Return to Stormveil Castle and leave through the North exits to start this area. Grave Glovewort 2, 3, 4, Smithing Stone 1- 9, Somber Smithing Stone 2, 3, 4

title: Shabriri Grape
notes: Go past Gostoc and continue along path, look for corpse that has this item before heading back outside

title: Ghost
notes: Found in the rooms past Godrick. Speak to it for lore

title: Lake-Facing Cliffs
notes: Just outside the back of Stormveil Castle

title: Hyetta
notes: Speak to her and give a Shabriri Grape. She will give you the As You Wish Gesture

title: As You Wish
notes: Given by Hyetta after giving a Shabriri Grape

title: Boc
notes: Speak to Boc at the Lake-Facing Cliffs SoG

title: Church of Irith
notes: Southwest of Lake-Facing Cliffs SoG

title: Sacred Tear
notes: In the Church of Irith

title: Thops
notes: In the Church of Irith. Sells sorceries. Exhaust all options and dialogue, and donate 10 runes

title: Glintstone Pebble
notes: Sold by Thops

title: Glintstone Arc
notes: Sold by Thops

title: Starlight
notes: Sold by Thops

title: Academy Scroll
notes: Northwest from Church of Irith, in the graveyard. ONLY GIVE TO MIRIEL LATER

title: Glintstone Craftsman's Cookbook 1
notes: From the Church of Irith, follow the path Northwest leading into the canyon and find in an enemy camp

title: Liurnia Lake Shore
notes: From the unnamed enemy camp, continue Northwest toward the lake shore

title: Nomadic Merchant
notes: Found near Liurnia Lake Shore SoG. Kill for Nomadic Merchant's Bell Bearing 5

title: Nomadic Merchant's Bell Bearing 5
notes: Received after defeating Nomadic Merchant at Liurnia Lake Shore SoG

title: Nomadic Warrior's Cookbook 11
notes: Sold by merchant near Liurnia Lake Shore SoG

title: Estoc
notes: Sold by merchant near Liurnia Lake Shore SoG

title: Astrologer's Staff
notes: Sold by merchant near Liurnia Lake Shore SoG

title: Kite Shield
notes: Sold by merchant near Liurnia Lake Shore SoG

title: Astrologer Set
notes: Sold by merchant near Liurnia Lake Shore SoG

title: Sacrificial Twig
notes: From the Liurnia Lake Shore SoG, look to the cliff face to the Northwest and you'll see an item on a corpse on the tombstone jutting out from the cliff face. You can use Torrent to get to this from below by jumping across

title: Map: East Liurnia
notes: North from Liurnia Lake Shore SoG

title: Stillwater Cave
notes: From the Liurnia Lake Shore SoG, head Southeast on the water level, look for the spirit jellyfish to find this cave

notes: From the entrance, continue through past the large plant enemy, jumping across to where you see a tunnel. Follow that down to where you find the harpy enemy, found in the poison water. Does not contain gloves in set

title: Cleanrot Knight
notes: Drops the Winged Sword Insignia

title: Winged Sword Insignia
notes: Dropped by Cleanrot Knight Boss in Stillwater Cave
