notes: North of Liurnia Lake Shore SoG hugging the rock face to the left. Use the spiritspring and go Southeast a bit. Contains the Adan, Thief of Fire boss

title: Adan, Thief of Fire
notes: Located in the Malefactor's Evergaol. Drops the Flame of the Fell God Incantation

title: Flame of the Fell God
notes: Dropped by Adan, Thief of Fire in the Malefactor's Evergaol

title: Fire Spur Me
notes: West from the Malefactor's Evergaol in an enemy camp

title: Fire Monk's Prayerbook
notes: West from the Malefactor's Evergaol in an enemy camp. Give to Miriel

title: Lakeside Crystal Cave
notes: Return to the Liurnia Lake Shore SoG. Follow cliff past spiritspring used to get to Malefactor's Evergaol, on water level, near crystals. Has Smithing Stone 2 and 4

title: Spear Talisman
notes: Found in chest through a tunnel leading to larger demi-human enemy

title: Bloodhound Knight
notes: Drops the Cerulean Amber Medallion

title: Cerulean Amber Medallion
notes: Dropped by Bloodhound Knight

title: Slumbering Wolf's Shack
notes: Found just outside the Lakeside Crystal Cave after completing the boss fight. Rest at SoG

title: Laskyar Ruins
notes: Return to Liurnia Lake Shore SoG, then head Northwest past the map location

title: Glintstone Craftsman's Cookbook 2
notes: Found near Laskyar Ruins SoG

title: Wraith Calling Bell
notes: Northwest in the cellar found in Laskyar Ruins

title: Ritual Pot
notes: North section of the Laskyar Ruins near a set of pillars

title: Scenic Isle
notes: Northwest from Laskyar Ruins

title: Patches
notes: Found at the Scenic Isle SoG. Buy stuff from him if needed. Speak to him about Rya using the "Speaking Of" dialogue option

title: Purified Ruins
notes: East from the Laskyar Ruins SoG

title: Shabriri Grape
notes: Found at Purified Ruins. In the upper section with all of the soldiers. Break wood platform to find stairs leading down

title: Two Fingers Heirloom
notes: Found at Purified Ruins. In the upper section with all of the soldiers. Break wood platform to find stairs leading down. In the chest

title: Ghost
notes: Found just outside the upper section of the Purified Ruins. Speak to it for lore

title: Liurnia Highway North
notes: North/Northeast of the Purified Ruins, staying along the path

title: Starlight Shard
notes: From Liurnia Highway North SoG, then head North along the top of the cliffside. Find in large stone bowl

title: Cliffbottom Catacombs
notes: From the Liurnia Highway North SoG, head East toward the cliff edge and look South to find a path leading down along the cliff edge. Will be on the right side through a doorway. Contains Grave Glovewort 2, 3, Ghost Glovewort 3

title: Nox Mirrorhelm
notes: Requires Stonesword Key

title: Scythe
notes: Continue through upper area of catacombs, found in room with imp enemies and arrow trap

title: Prattling Pate (Wonderful)
notes: Found after dropping down to bottom of catacombs, near the large misbegotten enemies

title: Page Ashes
notes: Follow path after dropping down, and find a ladder. Will be on an alter near the large misbegotten enemy

title: Erdtree Burial Watchdog
notes: Drops the Kaiden Sellsword Ashes

title: Kaiden Sellsword Ashes
notes: Dropped by Erdtree Burial Watchdog

title: Liurnia Highway South
notes: Follow road South from Liurnia Highway North SoG

title: Treespear
notes: From Liurnia Highway South SoG, continue South/Southeast along the road and past the giant enemy to a caravan. Found in the chest

title: Lucerne
notes: North from Liurnia Highway North SoG near the enemies that appear

title: Highway Lookout Tower
notes: North/Northeast of Liurnia Highway North SoG. Look to the left of the canyon and head in that direction, up past more spawning enemies

title: Glintstone Craftsman's Cookbook 3
notes: In a chest in the Highway Lookout Tower

title: Carian Glintblade Staff
notes: At the top of the Highway Lookout Tower

title: Gate Town Bridge
notes: Follow the road North from the Liurnia Highway North SoG, past the Lucerne you found and the ghost until you reach a broken bridge

title: Night's Cavalry
notes: Southeast from the Gate Town Bridge SoG, in the forested area. Drops Ash of War: Ice Spear

title: Ash of War: Ice Spear
notes: Dropped by Night's Cavalry in East Liurnia

title: Tibia Mariner
notes: From the Gate Town Bridge SoG, follow the cliff edge Northwest and then turn East toward the lake. Drops Skeletal Bandit Ashes and Deathroot

title: Skeletal Bandit Ashes
notes: Dropped by Tibia Mariner in East Liurnia

title: Deathroot
notes: Dropped by Tibia Mariner in East Liurnia. Third one found

title: Jarburg
notes: East of the Tibia Mariner fight or Northwest up the cliffes from the Gate Town Bridge SoG and then East, down the cliffs carefully using the tombstones in the cliff face

title: Jar-Bairn
notes: Speak to him, agree to be potentate, and keep reloading the area until you've exhausted all dialogue

title: Cracked Pot
notes: Three are found around Jarburg

title: Ritual Pot
notes: Two are found around Jarburg. One you get on the roof as you jump down from the cliffs

title: Dragon Cult Prayerbook
notes: Return to Gate Town Bridge SoG, then head Northwest and up along the cliff face. Continue past where you fought the Tibia Mariner and look for a knight patroling the area

title: Artist's Shack
notes: North of the patroling knight enemy, contains Resurrection Painting

title: Resurrection Painting
notes: In the Artist's Shack in East Liurnia

title: Flame, Cleanse Me
notes: North of Artist's Shack in unnamed Flame Monk camp

title: Briars of Sin
notes: Just South from the Fire Monk camp. Dropped by Thorn Sorcerer near slugs

title: Eastern Tableland
notes: Northeast from the Fire Monk camp

title: Bestial Vitality
notes: Given by Beast Clergyman once you give him a third deathroot

title: Stonesword Key
notes: From Eastern Tableland SoG, head Northeast, down the cliffside toward building and Giant Golem. Go past the building and toward the North, found near some trees near the cliff

title: Ainsel River Well Depths
notes: From Eastern Tableland SoG, head Northeast, down the cliffside toward building and Giant Golem. You can also back track from the Stonesword Key found in the previous step to the building. Head down on platform and rest at SoG to get this location for later

title: Church of Vows
notes: Return to the Eastern Tableland SoG, then head West along path, then North, then West again. You'll find the SoG outside the church near the graveyard. You can find Miriel here

title: Assassin's Prayerbook
notes: Use two Stonesword Keys down past the blacksmith. DO NOT GIVE TO CORHYN. Give this to the turtle. Allows you to purchase Darkness and Assassin's Approach

title: Miriel
notes: Speak to him and exhaust dialogue. Give him all of your scrolls and prayerbooks. YOU WANT TO GIVE HIM ALL SCROLLS AND PRAYERBOOKS. Miriel will be available here throughout the playthrough and will make it easier to obtain these spells and incantations

title: Glintblade Phalanx
notes: Give Royal House Scroll to Miriel at Church of Vows

title: Carian Slicer
notes: Give Royal House Scroll to Miriel at Church of Vows

title: Black Flame
notes: Give Godskin Prayerbook to Miriel in the Church of Vows

title: Black Flame Blade
notes: Give Godskin Prayerbook to Miriel in the Church of Vows

title: Great Glintstone Shard
notes: Give Academy Scroll to Miriel at Church of Vows

title: Swift Glintstone Shard
notes: Give Academy Scroll to Miriel at Church of Vows

title: O, Flame!
notes: Give Fire Monk's Prayerbook to Miriel at Church of Vows

title: Surge, O Flame!
notes: Give Fire Monk's Prayerbook to Miriel at Church of Vows

title: Lightning Spear
notes: Give Dragon Cult Prayerbook to Miriel at the Church of Vows

title: Honed Bolt
notes: Give Dragon Cult Prayerbook to Miriel at the Church of Vows

title: Electrify Armament
notes: Give Dragon Cult Prayerbook to Miriel at the Church of Vows

title: Assassin's Approach
notes: Give the Assassin's Prayer Book to Miriel at the Church of Vows

title: Darkness
notes: Give the Assassin's Prayer Book to Miriel at the Church of Vows

title: Carian Greatsword
notes: Purchase from Miriel

title: Magic Glintblade
notes: Purchase from Miriel

title: Blessing's Boon
notes: Purchase from Miriel

title: Gold Sewing Needle
notes: Found in Chest

title: Golden Tailoring Tools
notes: Found in Chest

title: Bell Bearing Hunter
notes: Night boss. Must activate SoG, change to night, then rest at the SoG. Drops the Meat Peddler's Bell Bearing

title: Meat Peddler's Bell Bearing
notes: Dropped by Bell Bearing Hunter at Church of Vows

title: Land Squirt Ashes
notes: From the Gate Town Bridge SoG, head North on the lower level following the cliffs. Near Poisonous blobs on a corpse

title: Eastern Liurnia Lake Shore
notes: From the Gate Town Bridge SoG, head down the broken bridge and to the water, then head North. Or continue going North from the Land Squirt Ashes

title: Raya Lucaria Crystal Tunnel
notes: From the Eastern Liurnia Lake Shore SoG, head Northwest hugging the rock face, then North. Near the Bell Bearing Mosoleum. Lots of Smithing Stone 1, 2,3, Somber Smithing Stone 1, 2, 3

title: Crystal Knife
notes: Found in the chest after progressing past two lifts, guarded by mannequin enemies

title: Shatter Earth
notes: Found past the mannequin enemies and in a short tunnel near the stone digger enemies

title: Crystalian Ring Blade
notes: Drops the Smithing-Stone Miner's Bell Bearing 1. Recommended to use a heavy weapon, two hand to break their "armor" quickly. Then they stagger easily and take more damage

title: Smithing Stone Miner's Bell Bearing 1
notes: Dropped by Crystalian Ring Blade. Can be given to Twin Maiden Husks in Roundtable Hold.

title: Uld Palace Ruins
notes: North of Eastern Tablelands SoG

title: Ruined Labrynth
notes: Navigate Labyrinth with enemies. Find the path leading up to a small group of enemies and a statue you can walk across. Will be just past the two archers

title: Spiralhorn Shield
notes: Head Northwest from Ruined Labyrinth SoG, toward the Mosoleum. The shield is Southwest on a corpse

title: Mausoleum Compound
notes: North of Spiralhorn Shield or North/Northwest from the Ruined Labrynth SoG. Continue past the first wandering mausoleum and you'll find this SoG just before the second one

title: Stalwart Horn Charm
notes: From the Mausoleum Compound SoG. Go Northwest just a bit and turn West, hugging the cliff to your left and find a hole in the wall. Go through and to the left on a corpse

title: Minor Erdtree
notes: From the Mausoleum Compound SoG, head North toward the second wandering mausoleum, then head East

title: Erdtree Avatar
notes: Near East Liurnia Minor Erdtree. Drops Magic-Shrouding Cracked Tear, Lightning-Shrouding Cracked Tear, and Holy-Shrouding Cracked Tear

title: Magic-Shrouding Cracked Tear
notes: Dropped by Erdtree Avatar in East Liurnia

title: Lightning-Shrouding Cracked Tear
notes: Dropped by Erdtree Avatar in East Liurnia

title: Holy-Shrouding Cracked Tear
notes: Dropped by Erdtree Avatar in East Liurnia

title: Black Knife Catacombs
notes: From the Ruined Labyrinth SoG, head East toward the cliff edge, then continue North. Will be in a canyon guarded by a headless spirit enemy. Contains Grave Glovewort 2, 3, 4 NOTE: Some skeleton enemies will keep coming back unless you kill the enemy with the black flame torch

title: Rosus' Axe
notes: Stonesword key is needed

title: Black Knife Assassin
notes: Found up on the higher level by standing on one of the guillotine traps and riding it up to a platform. Attack illusory wall at the end of this path. Drops the Assassin's Cerulean Dagger and the Black Knifeprint which is required for Rogier's questline

title: Assassin's Cerulean Dagger
notes: Dropped by Black Knife Assassin

title: Black Knifeprint
notes: Dropped by Black Knife Assassin

title: Cemetary Shade
notes: Drops Twinsage Sorcerer Ashes

title: Twinsage Sorcerer Ashes
notes: Dropped by Cemetary Shade boss

title: Deathroot
notes: In chest in boss room. Fourth one found

title: Ash of War: Beast's Roar
notes: Given by Beast Clergyman for giving him a fourth deathroot

title: East Raya Lucaria Gate
notes: West of Raya Lucaria Crystal Tunnel, find the spiritspring along the cliff side and take it up, then head Northwest near the gate to find SoG

title: Melina
notes: Rest at the East Raya Lucaria Gate SoG and exhaust dialogue. Will appear here if you are following Boc's questline

title: Finger Reader Crone
notes: Near the East Raya Lucaria Gate SoG. Speak to it for lore

title: Bellum Church
notes: Northeast from East Raya Lucaria Gate SoG by a forest

title: Ash of War: Giant Hunt
notes: Dropped by Night's Cavalry boss near Bellum Church

title: Nightrider Glaive
notes: Dropped by Night's Cavalry boss near Bellum Church

title: Nomadic Merchant's Bell Bearing 6
notes: Kill Nomadic Merchant near Bellum Church

title: Nomadic Warrior's Cookbook 13
notes: Sold by merchant, path through church to lower level

title: Composite Bow
notes: Sold by merchant, path through church to lower level

title: Rift Shield
notes: Sold by merchant, path through church to lower level

title: Blue Crest Heater Shield
notes: Sold by merchant, path through church to lower level

title: Great Mace
notes: Northeast from the Bellum Church in unnamed enemy camp with catapults. In a chest on the right side at higher level

title: Grand Lift of Dectus
notes: Northeast along the main road from the Bellum Church or continue on from where you found the great mace heading Northeast

title: Frenzy-Flaming Tower
notes: South from the Grand Lift of Dectus SoG. Be quick and hide to avoid Madness. Contains Howl of Shabriri in a chest

title: Howl of Shabriri
notes: In the Frenzy-Flaming Tower

title: Frenzied Flame Village Outskirts
notes: Southeast from Frenzy-Flaming Tower

title: Frenzied Flame Village
notes: Near Frenzied Flame Village Outskirts SoG

title: Frenzied's Cookbook 1
notes: In the Frenzied Flame VIllage

title: Shabriri's Woe
notes: Found on Corpse near knights in Frenzied Flame Village

title: Church of Inhibition
notes: West from the Frenzy-Flaming Tower, after passing through the village. NOTE: As you approach, you will be invaded by Festering Fingerprint Vyke

title: Festering Fingerprint Vyke
notes: Invaded near Church of Inhibition. Drops Fingerprint Grape and Vyke's War Spear

title: Fingerprint Grape
notes: Received from defeating Festering Fingerprint Vyke. Given to Hyetta later in her questline

title: Vyke's War Spear
notes: Received from defeating Festering Fingerprint Vyke

title: Finger Maiden Set
notes: Located in Church of Inhibition. Does not contain gloves

title: Frenzied Burst
notes: Southeat from the Church of Inhibition in a clearing guarded by rats. Kill the scarab

title: Converted Fringe Tower
notes: Near the troll knight, note the location as we cannot access yet

title: Siofra River
notes: Return to Siofra River Well Depths SoG, underground. Siofra River Contains Ghost Glovewort 1-5, Smithings Stone 2-4, Somber Smithing Stone 2, 5

title: Oracle Bubbles
notes: Parkour up to the higher levels. Find platform with two clayman. Jump down with torrent to pillar to find this sorcery, kill the scarab

title: Siofra River Bank
notes: Access elevator, move upstream past the crab. In this region, you need to find 8 obelisks that you can light up to access the boss. The first will be on your way to get the map

title: Obelisk 1
notes: Head East from the Siofra River Bank SoG, found in the water

title: Map: Siofra River
notes: Head East from the Siofra River Bank. On pillar at base of stairs

title: Inverted Hawk Heater Shield
notes: West from the map location, up the cliff and past the enemies

title: Horn Bow
notes: Under the stairs near the map. Jump to platform with pillars

title: Stonesword Key
notes: Follow cliff from stairs to spiritspring. Ride to East to broken bridge

title: Obelisk 2
notes: From Siofra River Bank SoG, continue North past the first Obelisk you lit, and past the large stone pillars. You'll find another obelisk in the water before hitting the scaffolding

title: Abandoned Merchant
notes: Continue North until you find some scafolding with spirit horned guardians. Follow that up and around a pillar, into a cave, then drop into the room. Kill for Abandoned Merchant's Bell Bearing

title: Abandoned Merchant's Bell Bearing
notes: Dropped by Abandoned Merchant in Siofra River

title: Larval Tear
notes: Sold by merchant

title: Nomadic Warrior's Cookbook 17
notes: Sold by merchant

title: Nomadic Warrior's Cookbook 18
notes: Sold by merchant

title: Shotel
notes: Sold by merchant

title: Armorer's Cookbook 6
notes: West of the Siofra River Bank SoG, follow the rock face to the left, find near horned spirit guardians

title: Obelisk 3
notes: From the Siofra River Bank SoG, head West to the rock face and then follow it to the right and up to find the 3rd Obelisk

title: Obelisk 4
notes: Return to the scaffolding that lead to the merchant, and go past it, on the other side of the large stone pillars

title: Worshipper's Woods
notes: East of the scaffolding and obelisk 4, beneath the bridge

title: Obelisk 5
notes: Directly South of the Worshipper's Woods SoG

title: Obelisk 6
notes: Continue South from Obelisk 5, near the cliff edge

title: Ash of War: Square Off
notes: Northwest of the Worshipper's Woods SoG at the edge of a cliff. Kill the scarab

title: Obelisk 7
notes: Directly North of Worshipper's Woods or the Ash of War: Square Off scarab. Up on a small cliff with horned spirit enemies and rats

title: Obelisk 8
notes: East of obelisk 6, just down from the cliff edge near more rats and horned spirit enemies

title: Golden Seed
notes: North of Obelisk 6 and 7

title: Below the Well
notes: Head North from Obelisk 6 and 7, near the stairs leading to the lift to Deep Siofra Well SoG, on the small plateau

title: Clarifying Horn Charm
notes: At the top of the stairs near the Below the Well SoG, just before the lift

title: Deep Siofra Well
notes: Take the lift up from the Below the Well SoG. Requires two Stonesword Keys to unlock

title: Waygate
notes: Return to the Worshipper's Woods SoG and head South, look for a fallen pillar you can climb onto leading up to a waygate. Take this to the highest area in this region

title: Great Oracular Bubble
notes: In the new elevated area, head to the Southwest part and find this in a building with a lot of clayman enemies. Kill the scarab

title: Dragonkin Soldier
notes: In the top area after taking the waygate, head to the North section to find this boss in the water. Drops the Dragon Halberd

title: Dragon Halberd
notes: Dropped by the Dragonkin Soldier boss

title: Marika's Scarseal
notes: Hidden under waterfall past the Dragonkin Soldier boss

title: Ancestor Spirit
notes: Return to Siofra River Bank SoG. Head up the stairs from where you found the map and touch the corpse to access this boss after you've activated the 8 obelisks. Drops the Ancestral Follower Ashes

title: Ancestral Follower Ashes
notes: Dropped by Ancestor Spirit

title: Ainsel River Part 1
notes: Return to the Ainsel River Well Depths SoG. Ainsel River Contains Ghost Glovewort 1, 2, 6, 7, 8, Smithing Stone 1-4, 6, Somber Smithing Stone 6, 7

title: Ainsel River Well Depths
notes: Area contains Ghost Glovewort 1, 3

title: Ainsel River Sluice Gate
notes: Follow the river past the ants' nests to the elevator and go past it to find the SoG

title: Map: Ainsel River
notes: Take the lift and then head through the first building. Found below giant bug enemy in the second building

title: Nomadic Merchant
notes: Found in building under giant bug enemy with map. Kill for Hermit Merchant's Bell Bearing 3

title: Hermit Merchant's Bell Bearing 3
notes: Dropped by Nomadic Merchant

title: Nomadic Warrior's Cookbook 16
notes: Sold by merchant in building beneath giant bug enemy

title: Perfumer's Cookbook 4
notes: Sold by merchant in building beneath giant bug enemy

title: Prisoner Set
notes: Sold by merchant in building beneath giant bug enemy. Does not contain gloves

title: Ainsel River Downstream
notes: Head Southwest to caves from where giant bug enemy is

title: Immunizing Horn Charm
notes: Follow the river West to enter more tunnels with more ants' nests

title: Dragonkin Soldier of Nokstella
notes: Drops Frozen Lightning Spear

title: Frozen Lightning Spear
notes: Dropped by Dragonkin Soldier of Nokstella

title: Dragonkin Soldier of Nokstella (SoG)
notes: Appears after defeating boss

title: Great Ghost Glovewort
notes: Find room below huge statue in the Dragonkin Soldier of Nokstella boss arena. In a chest

title: Northern Liurnia
notes: Return to the Scenic Isle SoG in Liurnia. Liurnia has Grave Glovewort 2, 3, 4, Smithing Stone 1- 9, Somber Smithing Stone 2, 3, 4

title: Boilprawn Shack
notes: Head North/Northwest from Scenic Isle SoG

title: Academy Gate Town
notes: Head Northeast from the Boilprawn Shack SoG

title: Map: North Liurnia
notes: Look for pillar near the Academy Gate Town SoG

title: Rya
notes: Head East from Scenic Isle SoG and find Rya in a small building with a statue in it. Exhaust dialogue and agree to help find her necklace

title: Deathbird
notes: Found North of Scenic Isle. Drops Red-Feathered Branchsword

title: Red-Feathered Branchsword
notes: Dropped by Deathbird in Northern Liurnia

title: Blackguard Big Boggart
notes: Found at Boilprawn Shack. Buy Rya's Necklace. Also buy Boiled Prawn to advance quest. Talk to him after to get the Spread Out Gesture

title: Rya's Necklace
notes: Bought from Blackguard Big Boggart. Needed for Rya's questline

title: Spread Out
notes: Received by buying Boiled Prawn from Blackguard and exhausting dialogue

title: Volcano Manor Invitation
notes: Received from Rya after giving her the necklace

title: Dexterity-Knot Crystal Tear
notes: Southwest from the Boilprawn Shack SoG on a small island

title: Folly On The Lake
notes: West from the Dexterity-Knot Crystal Tear or the Boilprawn Shack SoG, found in another small building with a statue in it

title: Rose Church
notes: Northwest from the Folly On The Lake SoG

title: Nomadic Warrior's Cookbook 12
notes: Found at Rose Church along Southern Walls

title: Varre
notes: Near Rose Church. Speak to him and say they didn't seem right, to receive multiplayer items and continue his quest

title: Festering Bloody Finger
notes: Given by Varre for continuing his quest. Used in the next part of Varre's questline which has the player doing invasions

title: Lord of Blood's Favor
notes: Given by Varre at the Rose Church in Liurnia after invading three times. Additionally, you can come back to this point after defeating the invasion sign in the Altus Plateau and progress Varre's questline

title: Fallen Ruins of the Lake
notes: From the Rose Church, head directly East to find a small ruins location. SoG on top of the ruins building

title: Larval Tear
notes: Head South from the Fallen Ruins of the Lake SoG and look for the patroling crayfish. There will be several sleeping and one patroling. That one is a disguised Grafted Scion and will drop a larval tear when defeated

title: Bloody Finger
notes: Used to invade an unlimited number of times. Given by Varre during his questline

title: Pureblood Knight's Title
notes: Given by Varre after bringing him the Lord of Blood's Favor with the blood of a hand maiden on it. Use to get to Mohgwyn's Palace any time. NOT RECOMMENDED THIS EARLY IN THE GAME

title: Bloodflame Blade
notes: Return to the Rose Church. Head Northwest from the Rose Church and kill the scarab

title: Temple Quarter
notes: Northwest from the Rose Church. You will discover the location, continue through to the other side to find the SoG

title: Icerind Hatchet
notes: In the Temple Quarter, Southeast portion of the area. In a chest in a broken building

title: Glintstone Dragon Smarag
notes: North from the Temple Quarter. Drops a Dragon Heart

title: Dragon Heart
notes: Dropped by Glintstone Dragon Smarag

title: Academy Glintstone Key
notes: Guarded by Glintstone Dragon Smarag found on the corpse near the rock. Used to get into Raya Lucaria Royal Academy

title: Academy Crystal Cave
notes: Northeast from Glintstone Dragon Smarag or North/Northeast from the Temple Quarter SoG, along the rockface. Need 2 Stonesword Keys to enter

title: Stonesword Key
notes: In a room just past the area with the mages and the crystals, on a corpse in a cage

title: Crystal Staff
notes: Continue into next room through a doorway and attack illusory wall on the left. Found in the chest up the ledge

title: Crystalian Staff and Crystalian Spear
notes: Use a blunt weapon or something heavy to stagger and break through their "armor". Drops Crystal Release sorcery

title: Crystal Release
notes: Dropped by Crystalian Staff and Spear boss

title: Terra Magica
notes: Enter elevator after bosses and follow to the top

title: Crystalline Woods
notes: Northwest from the Academy Crystal Cave SoG, just on the other side of the large rocks

title: Sorcerer's Isle
notes: Northeast from the Crystalline Woods SoG

title: Testu's Rise
notes: North from the Crystalline Woods SoG on an Island. Hit three spirit turtles. First North of tower near cliffs, secon is South below cliffs, third East of tower in a tree

title: Memory Stone
notes: Found in Testu's Rise in Liurnia

title: Diallos
notes: North from Academy Gate Town. Speak to him to exhaust his dialogue

title: Gate Town North
notes: Northwest from where you found Diallos

title: Stonesword Key
notes: From the Gate Town North SoG, head West toward the bridge and look for a rock pillar pointing Southwest leading up to a higher section, still underneath the bridge. Turn right once on this section and head North past two trestle openings. You should see a corpse sitting in a chair overlooking the lake

title: East Gate Bridge Trestle
notes: North/Northwest from Gate Town North SoG or Southeast of Sorcerer's Isle, head toward the middle of the tall pillars/bridge

title: Ash of War: Shield Bash
notes: Next to East Gate Bridge Trestle on other side of pillar. Near bottom right corner of the middle segment, dropped by scarab. Sneak up and use ranged to attack it

title: Death Rite Bird
notes: South of the Gate Town North SoG. Drops the Ancient Death Rancor sorcery

title: Ancient Death Rancor
notes: Dropped by Death Rite Bird in Northern Liurnia

title: Glintstone Craftsman's Cookbook 4
notes: Near a bunch of forg enemies in a tower in a chest. It will be located to the left of the Academy Gate Town symbol on the map

title: Golden Seed
notes: West/Northwest from the Academy Gate Town SoG or West from the Glintstone Craftsman's Cookbook 4 near a Golden Tree

title: Ash of War: Charge Forth
notes: From the Golden Tree, head Southwest and toward the bridge, will be underneath and hanging from the trestle above the poison bloat enemies

title: Blue-White Wooden Shield
notes: Head North from where you found the Golden Seed and look for barricades and stairs leading up to higher level, West part near patrolling enemy

title: Finger Reader Crone
notes: After finding the Blue-White Wooden Shield in the upper section of the Academy Gate Town, head to the most Eastern part along the broken bridge. Speak to them for lore

title: South Raya Lucaria Gate
notes: Rest at the SoG past all of the enemies on the upper level, near where you got the Blue-White Wooden Shield, Southeastern section of the upper area

title: Meeting Place Map
notes: Found near the gate into Raya Lucaria

title: Main Academy Gate
notes: From the South Raya Lucaria Gate SoG, Use the Academy Glintstone Key to go through the barrier and rest at the SoG

title: Raya Lucaria Academy
notes: Start at the Main Academy Gate SoG. Contains Smithing Stone 2-5, Somber Smithing Stone 3, 4

title: Isolated Merchant
notes: Southeast from the Main Academy Gate SoG, kill for Isolated Merchant's Bell Bearing 2

title: Isolated Merchant's Bell Bearing 2
notes: Dropped by Isolated Merchant

title: Fanged Imp Ashes
notes: Southeast down the road from the Main Academy Gate SoG, find a merchant who sells this. NOTE: You will need this for a puzzle later

title: Fevor's Cookbook 2
notes: Southeast down the road from the Main Academy Gate SoG, find a merchant who sells this

title: Stonesword Key
notes: Southeast down the road from the Main Academy Gate SoG, find a merchant who sells this. Three of them are sold by this merchant

title: Warrior Set
notes: Southeast down the road from the Main Academy Gate SoG, find a merchant who sells this. This includes the Blue Cloth Cowl and Blue Cloth Vest

title: Sacrificial Twig
notes: Southeast down the road from the Main Academy Gate SoG, find a merchant who sells this. Sells three

title: Golden Seed
notes: Return to Main Academy Gate SoG. Northeast toward the broken bridge from the Main Academy Gate SoG

title: Yura
notes: From the Main Academy Gate SoG, head Northeast toward where you found the Golden Seed. Touch the red summon sign on the ground. You'll join Yura against Bloody Finger Ravenmount Assassin

title: Bloody Finger Ravenmount Assassin
notes: Defeat him with Yura to receive Ash of War: Raptor of the Mists

title: Ash of War: Raptor of the Mists
notes: Received from defeating Bloody Finger Ravenmount Assassin with Yura during his questline

title: Church of the Cuckoo
notes: Return to the Main Academy Gate SoG. Take lift up, go up the stairs past the enemies and into the room. SoG will be around the wall on the left

title: Marionette Soldier Ashes
notes: From the Church of the Cuckoo SoG, head down the hall and down the stairs to the left. Go across the wood bridge and immediately go to the left and onto the lower cliff. Follow through cave to find these

title: Carian Knight Set
notes: Make your way through the graveyard and up a hill, then turn right. The set will be near a tombstone with a larger enemy kneeling in front of it

title: Ash of War: Spectral Lance
notes: Continue up the hill and look for a path on the cliff edge leading down to the left. There will be a scarab to kill for this

title: Gravity Well
notes: Continue from the graveyard through a room and past a conveyor lift. Fight the giant pale enemy

title: Schoolhouse Classroom
notes: Take the conveyor lift up and go into the building to find this SoG

title: Avionette Soldier Ashes
notes: Use conveyor lift again to reach a lower cliff where you can get these

title: Longtail Cat Talisman
notes: Use Conveyor again to ride to the bottom of this area

title: Conspectus Scroll
notes: Return to the Schoolhouse Classroom SoG. Left in the hallway

title: Glintstone Craftsman's Cookbook 5
notes: Return to the Schoolhouse Classroom SoG. Head out and turn left in the hallway. In the chest

title: Olivinus Glintstone Crown
notes: Behind Illusory Wall near Conspectus Scroll. Need to drop to ledge, follow around to cliff, then jump up

title: Ritual Pot
notes: Return to the Schoolhouse Classroom SoG, continue right through the hall. Near the Large Warrior Jar in a chest

title: Comet
notes: Left of boss room behind illusory bookshelf

title: Graven-School Talisman
notes: From the illusory room behind the bookshelf, continue up the ladder and look for a spot where you can drop into another corridor. Drop down and follow this down a hole

title: Red Wolf of Radagan
notes: Drops a Memory Stone

title: Memory Stone
notes: Dropped by Red Wolf of Radagan in Raya Lucaria Academy

title: Debate Parlor
notes: Appears after Red Wolf of Radagon Fight

title: Cracked Pot
notes: Past the Debate Parlor SoG, head out and take a sharp left up some stairs. Near the Warrior Jars

title: Radagon Icon
notes: Past Debate Parlor SoG, courtyard, sharp right turn to corner of balcony, fall to balcony ledge below, go up ladder and in broken window. To the right in a chest

title: Glintstone Whetblade
notes: Rubble to left in a room

title: Karolos Glintstone Crown
notes: From Golden Tree, go to corner further to the left along the cliff edge and kill the crystal crab hidden in the bushes

title: Shortcut
notes: From room with whetblade, go to higher level and jump off ledge, open a door to create shortcut to courtyard

title: Full Moon Crossbow
notes: Head to the rooftops by heading from the shortcut door to the Southwest railing, head Southwest, climb ladder. On rooftops to West and past marrionettes jump to roof, follow this around to the South, go in room and climb big ladder to reach top of bell tower. Open chest

title: Lazuli Glintstone Crown
notes: From the Full Moon Crossbow or from the shortcut door, drop down to where you had to jump across before, and instead go West and then North into next tower. A few levels down there will be a crystal crab. Kill it for this crown

title: Imbued Sword Key
notes: Continue dropping down from crystal crab enemy from before, then look for a ladder up. Climb this and walk across to smaller tower, on a corpse

title: Academy Glintstone Key
notes: Near end of rooftops and from the Imbued Glintstone Key, look for another rooftop that curves around open windows. Jump through windows to beams and to chandelier with a corpse and item on it

title: Shattering Crystal
notes: Drop from the chandelier, look for corpse

title: Twinsage Glintstone Crown
notes: Exit to balcony corner, kill Crystal Crab which drops this

title: Azur's Glintstone Staff
notes: Another room from the church's higher level leads to a room full of crystals, just past a page enemy in a long corridor

title: Moongrum Carian Knight
notes: Return to the Debate Parlor SoG and head back to the courtyard, go to Academy's final building by jumping the beams on the right. Run past boulder. Drops Carian Knight's Shield. If you time it right, you can go up the lift just past this enemy and have them fall below

title: Carian Knight's Shield
notes: Dropped by Moongrum Carian Knight

title: Glintstone Scarab
notes: In gate and to the left, jump to another building and take ladder. In a chest

title: Renalla, Queen of the Full Moon
notes: Lift past Moongrum. Drops Remembrance of the Full Moon Queen and Great Rune of the Unborn

title: Remembrance of the Full Moon Queen
notes: Dropped by Renalla. Given to Enia at the Roundtable Hold to get the Carian Regal Scepter or Rennala's Full Moon

title: Raya Lucaria Grand Library
notes: Found after boss fight with Renalla

title: Renalla
notes: Speak to her to go through rebirth with larvel tear. Receive the Balled Up Gesture

title: Balled Up
notes: Received by Renalla for doing rebirth the first time

title: Glintstone Cometshard
notes: Give Conspectus Scroll to Miriel at Chruch of Vows

title: Star Shower
notes: Give Conspectus Scroll to Miriel at Church of Vows

title: Erudition
notes: Given by Thops once you give him the Academy Glintstone Key

title: Ash of War: Thops' Barrier
notes: Reload the area once you've given Thops the spare Academy Glintstone Key, kill the scarab

title: Thops' Bell Bearing
notes: Go outside the building with the Schoolhouse Classroom SoG to get this

title: Thops' Barrier
notes: Go outside the building with the Schoolhouse Classroom SoG to get this

title: Academy Glintstone Staff
notes: Go outside the building with the Schoolhouse Classroom SoG to get this

title: Talisman Pouch
notes: Given by Enia for defeating Renalla

title: Cannon of Haima
notes: In Converted Fringe Tower

title: Gavel of Haima
notes: In Converted Fringe Tower

title: Western Liurnia Part 1
notes: Return to Sorcerer's Isle SoG.Liurnia has Grave Glovewort 2, 3, 4, Smithing Stone 1- 9, Somber Smithing Stone 2, 3, 4

title: Map: West Liurnia
notes: From Sorcerer's Isle SoG, head North/Northwest to find the map

title: Northern Liurnia Lake Shore
notes: Just Southwest of the map location

title: Carian Knight's Sword
notes: South from Northern Liurnia Lake Shore SoG, follow road. In chest in a convoy

title: Jellyfish Shield
notes: South from convoy surrounded by Jellyfish spirits

title: Foot of the Four Belfries
notes: South from the Jellyfish Shield and Convoy

title: The Four Belfries
notes: From the Foot of the Four Belfries SoG, head up the path to the elevated area nearby. The SoG is at the top

title: Imbued Sword Key
notes: Found in chest at the top of the Four Belfries

title: Chapel of Anticipation
notes: One of the Four Belfries. Access via the tower with the words saying "Precipice of Anticipation"

title: Grafted Scion
notes: Drops Ornamental Straight Sword and Golden Beast Crest Shield

title: Ornamental Straight Sword
notes: Dropped by Grafted Scion boss in Chapel of Anticipation

title: Golden Beast Crest Shield
notes: Dropped by Grafted Scion boss in Chapel of Anticipation

title: The Stormhawk King
notes: In room to right of starting area. These will be given to Nepheli Loux later

title: Stormhawk Deenh
notes: In room to right of starting area

title: Nokron City Tower
notes: Next tower at Four Belfries from the Chapel of Anticipation. Message says "Night Sky Unceasing"

title: Mottled Necklace
notes: Found after taking teleport labeled "Night Sky Unceasing" from the Four Belfries. Drop down rocks and to ruin area, on corpse near edge

title: Cuckoo's Evergaol
notes: South from Foot of the Four Belfries SoG. Contains Bols, Carian Knight boss

title: Bols, Carian Knight
notes: Drops the Greatblade Phalanx

title: Greatblade Phalanx
notes: Dropped by Bols, Carian Knight boss in the Cuckoo's Evergaol

title: Revenger's Shack
notes: South from Cuckoo's Evergaol

title: Edgar the Revenger
notes: Near Revenger's Shack. Drops Shabriri Grape and Banished Knight's Halberd +8. NOTE: This invasion can still be bugged. Recommended to not warp out of the area or rest at SoG. Kill as soon as you are invaded

title: Shabriri Grape
notes: Dropped by Edgar the Revenger invader. Needed for Hyetta's questline

title: Banished Knight's Halberd +8
notes: Dropped by Edgar the Revenger invader

title: Ash of War: Spinning Strikes
notes: Attached to the Banished Knight's Halberd +8 that is dropped by Edgar

title: Minor Erdtree
notes: Head South from the Revenger's Shack

title: Erdtree Avatar
notes: Located at the Western Liurnia Minor Erdtree. Drops Cerulean Crystal Tear and Ruptured Crystal Tear

title: Cerulean Crystal Tear
notes: Dropped by Erdtree Avatar in Western Liurnia

title: Ruptured Crystal Tear
notes: Dropped by Erdtree Avatar in Western Liurnia

title: Ash of War: Sword Dance
notes: South of the Revenger's Shack SoG. Follow the cliff face along the right, down from the Minor Erdtree. Kill the scarab

title: Road's End Catacombs
notes: South from the Ash of War: Sword Dance location, continue through rocky pass. Contains Grave Glovewort 2,3 and Ghost Glovewort 2

title: Watchdog's Staff
notes: Bottom of stairs hit an illusory wall

title: Raya Lucaria Soldier Ashes
notes: End of catacomb behind an illusory wall

title: Spirit-Caller Snail
notes: Climb stairs, base of second set, right and attack second archway, at the end hit wall again, then again for boss. Find and kill snail first, it is invisible and makes the fight with the crucible knight spirit unnecessary

title: Glintstone Sorcerer Ashes
notes: Dropped by Spirit-Caller Snail boss in Road's End Catacombs

title: Converted Tower
notes: Southeast from Minor Erdtree. Stand in front of statue and use Erudition gesture until ladder appears. NOTE: you can climb up the broken wall to the right of the tower and enter the room without unlocking the gate

title: Memory Stone
notes: Found in Converted Tower in Western Liurnia

title: Kingsrealm Ruins
notes: Northeast from Northern Liurnia Lake Shore SoG

title: Royal Revenant
notes: Underground area of Kingsrealm Ruins. Hidden underneath illusory floor

title: Frozen Needle
notes: Found in chest after Royal Revenant in Kingsrealm Ruins

title: Ghost
notes: Found in the Kingsrealm Ruins. Speak to it for lore

title: Road to the Manor
notes: Go through the illusory wall at the North part of the Kingsrealm Ruins to find the SoG

title: Iji
notes: Past the ruins. Speak to Iji about Blaidd. This unlocks the Carian Fligreed Crest in his inventory for purchase

title: Carian Filigreed Crest
notes: Bought from Iji after starting his questline and speaking to him about Blaidd

title: Main Caria Manor Gate
notes: Countinue toward the Manor in the North and activate the grace

title: Ash of War: Hoarfrost Stomp
notes: East of Main Caria Manor Gate SoG. Kill invisible scarab roaming the water

title: Intelligence-Knot Crystal Tear
notes: South from the Caria Manor at the bottom of the cliffs on a huge plate. Follow path nestled between some rock until you start seeing small hand enemies. Easiest to go from Sorcerer's Isle SoG at water level and head North

title: Caria Manor
notes: Return to the Main Caria Manor Gate SoG. Contains Smithing Stone 3, 4, Somber Smithing Stone 3

title: Glintstone Craftsman's Cookbook 6
notes: From the Main Caria Manor Gate SoG, head through gate and immediately go right. Look for a small room with a single enemy

title: Ice Crest Shield
notes: From the small room in the East, continue North past the sorcerers and jump down when you see the large hand enemy and several smaller enemies. Found on a corpse

title: Carian Piercer
notes: Near the large hand enemy where you found the Ice Crest Shield, look for scarab

title: Manor Lower Level
notes: Higher level, follow road from Caria Manor Gate SoG

title: Ghost
notes: Found just below the Manor Lower Level SoG. Speak to it for lore

title: Sword of Night and Flame
notes: Walkways, turn left at first tower after second one, look left at bridge, drop to platform, drop again to building. Take ladder into hole and find chest

title: Manor Upper Level
notes: Return to the Manor Lower Level if you went to retrieve the Sword of Night and Flame, and continue along the path to the stairs leading to a lift. Take the lift up

title: Urumi
notes: From Manor Upper Level, take elveator back down, head down the stairs and turn left and jump to other building with blue torch. Follow the path and find on corpse near hand enemies

title: Golden Seed
notes: Return to Manor Upper Level SoG, then continue through the doorway. Found near Golden Tree

title: Troll Knight's Sword
notes: Kill the Giant Troll on the stairs

title: Cracked Pot
notes: After defeating Royal Knight Loretta, head back into the manor and take the doorway to the South/Southwest. Jump down platforms and look for one of these guarded by Warrior Jars

title: Ash of War: Carian Grandeur
notes: Head through hole at top of stairs, descend cliffs past all of the jar enemies and jump to building near the bottom

title: Royal Knight Loretta
notes: Return to Manor Upper Level and continue to where the giant was if you went for the Ash of War. In large opening with chairs. Drops Loretta's Greatbow and Ash of War: Loretta's Slash

title: Loretta's Greatbow
notes: Dropped by Royal Knight Loretta

title: Ash of War: Loretta's Slash
notes: Dropped by Royal Knight Loretta

title: Royal Moongazing Grounds
notes: Appears after defeating Royal Knight Loretta

title: Western Lucaria/Three Sisters
notes: Continue through doorway from Royal Moongazing Grounds

title: Ash of War: Chilling Mist
notes: Head West after going through the archway from Royal Moongazing Grounds, find in small ruin building, kill scarab

title: Glintstone Dragon Adula (1st Encounter)
notes: South from Renna's Rise. You will activate them but only need to do half health before she flies away

title: Renna's Rise
notes: North of ruins with scarab. Locked for now, we'll come back

title: Frozen Armament
notes: Follow road heading East from Three Sisters. Kill scarab

title: Behind Caria Manor
notes: Found along road with scarab, East road from the Three Sisters location

title: Albinauric Ashes
notes: Southeast from Behind Caria Manor SoG near unnamed graveyard. Near the Forg enemies

title: Juvenile Scholar Set
notes: Ghost near Albinauric Ashes if you found "Resurrection" Painting. You will also obtain a Larval Tear which may be your first for respecing your character. Does not contain leg armor or gloves

title: Larval Tear
notes: Received from interacting with Ghost near the Albinauric Ashes if you found the "Resurrection" painting

title: Royal Grave Evergaol
notes: Contains the Onyx Lord boss. Northeast from the graveyard

title: Onyx Lord
notes: Drops Meteorite sorcery

title: Meteorite
notes: Dropped by Onyx Lord boss in Royal Grave Evergaol, Western Liurnia

title: Pidia, Carian Servant
notes: Return to the Royal Moongazing Grounds, and go East from Dragon Adula, fall towards Caria Manor and find him after descending ladder. Sells stuff

title: Glintstone Craftsman's Cookbook 7
notes: Sold by Pidia, Carian Servant

title: Ash of War: Carian Retaliation
notes: Sold by Pidia, Carian Servant

title: Ripple Blade
notes: Sold by Pidia, Carian Servant

title: Black Leather Shield
notes: Sold by Pidia, Carian Servant

title: Weathered Map
notes: Sold by Pidia, Carian Servant

title: Ritual Pot
notes: Sold by Pidia, Carian Servant

title: Stonesword Key
notes: Go back up the ladder from Pidia, then drop to next landing, follow rooftops and scaffolding to giant crab enemy

title: Caelid Part 1 (Castle Redmane)
notes: We are going to make this run and do Castle Redmane prior to starting Ranni's questline. But this can be done later. Do not grab anything but sites of grace. Return to the Smoldering Church

title: Rotview Balcony
notes: From Smoldering Church, head Southeast

title: Caelem Ruins
notes: From Rotview Balcony SoG, head East

title: Smoldering Wall
notes: From Caelem Ruins SoG, head South

title: Astray from Caelid Highway North
notes: From Smoldering Wall SoG, head South

title: Aeonia Swamp Shore
notes: From the Astray from Caelid Highway North SoG, head East toward the swamp

title: Ghost
notes: Speak to ghost near Aeonia Swamp Shore SoG for lore

title: Nomadic Merchant
notes: East from Astray form Caelid Highway North SoG. Doesn't sell anything significant. Kill for Nomadic Merchant's Bell Bearing 9

title: Nomadic Merchant's Bell Bearing 9
notes: Dropped by Nomadic Merchant near Astray from Caelid Highway North SoG

title: Caelid Highway South
notes: From Astray from Caelid Highway North SoG, Head South

title: Larval Tear
notes: South of the Caelid Highway South SoG along the cliff, find a Troll disguised as a Wandering Noble near the stone coffins. Drops the Larval Tear when defeated

title: Map: Caelid
notes: Found along the road from Caelid Highway South SoG

title: Nomadic Merchant's Bell Bearing 10
notes: Dropped by Nomadic Merchant down the road from Caelid Highway South SoG

title: Nomadic Warrior's Cookbook 15
notes: Sold by nomadic merchant East from Map: Caelid location

title: Champion Set
notes: Sold by nomadic merchant East from Map: Caelid location

title: Greathelm
notes: Sold by nomadic merchant East from Map: Caelid location. Does not belong to an armor set

title: Stonesword Key
notes: Sold by Nomadic Merchant near Caelid Highway South SoG

title: Cracked Pot
notes: Sold by Nomadic Merchant near Caelid Highway South SoG

title: Southern Aeonia Swamp Bank
notes: Continue on the road from the merchant and look to the left. Should be before the giant gate

title: Impassable Great Bridge
notes: From Caelid Highway South and Map/Nomadic Merchant found along the way, cut to the right and follow path down near giant dog enemies and toward the tower

title: Ash of War: Flaming Strike
notes: Head along cliffs to the side of the closed gate of Redmane Castle. At graveyard, kill scarab

title: Chamber Outside the Plaza
notes: From the Impassable Great Bridge SoG, run across the bridge, and up and to the right (South side of the castle wall). Follow the cliffside up and around to the East side of the castle wall and look for a ladder leading up. Continue to head to the North part of the castle and past the enemies shooting fire at you, SoG is in the room on the right just before the boss gate

title: Red-Hot Whetblade
notes: From the Chamber Outside the Plaza SoG, head out to the right, past the fire cannons, stairs, and Iron Virgin, and into the room straight ahead. Should be sitting on a corpse

title: Flamberge
notes: Go back to the Chamber Outside the Plaza SoG, and head South past the other fire cannons, go up steps to the left and enter building. Climb ladder, found on corpse near pumpkin head enemy

title: Armorer's Cookbook 5
notes: From the Flamberge or the Chamber Outside the Plaza SoG, follow steps leading down past the stakes. You'll see the two lion enemies in the courtyard. Follow the wall to the left to sneak around them, and hug the wall around the corner to go into the building with the page enemy. Climb stairs, go out door and enter room to the right

title: Armorer's Cookbook 4
notes: From the Armorer's Cookbook 5, make your way back through the building, to the courtyard with the lions. The cookbook should be in the cask room across the way

title: Misbegotten Warrior and Crucible Knight
notes: Return to the Chamber Outside the Plaza SoG and continue through the boss gate. Drops Ruins Greatsword. If this fight is too difficult right now, come back to this section and fight them later. There will be details on how to do this after the Radahn fight

title: Ruins Greatsword
notes: Dropped by Misbegotten Warrior and Crucible Knight in Castle Redmane

title: Redmane Castle Plaza
notes: Found after defeating the Misbegotten Warrior and Crucible Knight

title: Three Sisters/Western Liurnia
notes: Return to the Royal Moongazing Grounds. Liurnia has Grave Glovewort 2, 3, 4, Smithing Stone 1- 9, Somber Smithing Stone 2, 3, 4

title: Ranni's Rise
notes: From the Royal Moongazing Grounds SoG, Past the dragon on the West part of the elevated area. Go into the tower and follow the steps up. Rest at SoG

title: Ranni the Witch
notes: At the top of Ranni's Rise. She will tell you to go away if you are working through Sorcerer Rogier's questline

title: Iji, Blaidd, and Seluvis
notes: Speak to each of these spirits in Ranni's tower. Make sure to exhaust all of their dialogue. NOTE: If you still need to get te Carian Filigreed Crest, you can return to Iji near the Kingsrealm Ruins and purchase it now

title: Blaidd
notes: Go back to the Siofra River Bank SoG and follow the cliff from where you fought the Ancestral Spirit. Blaidd should be near the spiritspring. Exhaust his dialogue

title: Seluvis' Rise
notes: Warp back to Ranni's Rise and head Southeast

title: Seluvis
notes: Speak to Seluvis and exhaust his dialogue, accept his quest and he will give you Seluvis's Potion. Ask about Nokron and he will give you Seluvis's Introduction

title: Seluvis' Potion
notes: Given to us by Seluvis as part of questline. This can be given to Nepheli Loux, Sir Gideon Ofnir, or Dung Eater, detailed later. NOTE: You will see options for giving this potion to Nepheli, Gideon, and Dung Eater this potion later on. Be VERY careful with selecting dialogue options later.

title: Seluvis' Introduction
notes: Given to us by Seluvis as part of questline

title: Black Wolf Mask
notes: Outside Seluvis' Tower on the elevated parts. Part of Blaidd's Set

title: Sorceress Sellen
notes: Go to Waypoint Ruins and talk to Sellen, exhaust her dialogue

title: Ash of War: Vow of the Indomitable
notes: Head South from Folly on the Lake SoG to the swamp area. South part you can find scarab to kill

title: Village of the Albinaurics
notes: West from Ash of War: Vow of the Indomitable Scarab and South of Folly on the Lake SoG

title: Nepheli Loux
notes: Speak to her and exhaust her dialogue

title: Larval Tear
notes: Found in the graveyard before hitting the SoG

title: Village of the Albinaurics (SoG)
notes: Just past Nepheli in abandoned shack

title: Ghost
notes: Speak to the ghost just outside of the Village of the Albinaurics SoG for lore

title: Crystal Sword
notes: From SoG, cross bridge

title: Albus
notes: From SoG, climb slope and past enemy. Attack the pot to find Albus and exhaust dialogue. He gives you Haligtree Secret Medallion (Right)

title: Haligtree Secret Medallion (Right)
notes: Given to you buy Albus

title: Ivory Sickle
notes: Found near Albus in Sarcophagus

title: Omenkiller
notes: Drops Crucible Knot Talisman. You can summon Nepheli Loux here if you've followed her questline

title: Crucible Knot Talisman
notes: Dropped by Omenkiller

title: Ensha of the Royal Remains
notes: Warp back to Roundtable Hold and you will be invaded if you have the Haligtree Secret Medallion (Right). Drops Clinging Bone

title: Clinging Bone
notes: Dropped by Ensha after he invades at Roundtable Hold

title: Royal Remains Set
notes: Found near where Ensha was after you defeat him during invasion

title: Sorcerer Rogier's Bell Bearing
notes: Found after Sorcerer Rogier dies

title: Spellblade's Traveling Set
notes: Found after Sorcerer Rogier dies

title: Rogier's Letter
notes: Found after Sorcerer Rogier dies

title: Seluvis' Questline - Option 1 - Give Potion to Nepheli Loux
notes: Giving Seluvis' Potion to Nepheli allows you to Get Nepheli Puppet Ashes and Delores' Puppet Ashes later, but makes Dung Eater Puppet Ashes unobtainable

title: Seluvis' Questline - Option 2 - Give Potion to Dung Eater
notes: Giving Seluvis' Potion Allows you to get Dung Eater Puppet Ashes later, but makes Nepheli Loux Puppet Ashes unobtainable. NOTE: You haven't encountered Dung Eater here yet, so mark this option now and the option to give Dung Eater the potion will appear later in the guide

title: Latenna
notes: Warp to Slumbering Wolf's Shack SoG and speak to Latenna. She will now give you the Latenna the Albinauric Ashes

title: Latenna the Albinauric Ashes
notes: Given to you upon speaking to Latenna with the Haligtree Secret Medallion (Right)

title: PUPPET CHECKPOINT
notes: Skip this section if you chose to give Dung Eater Seluvis's Potion. We will return to this spot later

title: Carian Phalanx
notes: Bought from Seluvis

title: Carian Retaliation
notes: Bought from Seluvis

title: Glintstone Icecrag
notes: Bought from Seluvis

title: Freezing Mist
notes: Bought from Seluvis

title: Puppet Room
notes: Go back to Ranni's Rise, find secret chamber behind an illusory wall on the floor in the ruins North of the tower.

title: Finger Maiden Therolina Puppet
notes: Chosen speaking to Seluvis. The Jarwight puppet will be available after obtaining another Starlight Shard. Will cost 3 Starlight Shards after first freebie

title: Jarwight Puppet
notes: Chosen speaking to Seluvis. The Finger Maiden Therolina Puppet will be available after obtaining another Starlight shard. Will cost 3 Starlight Shards after first freebie

title: Dolores the Sleeping Arrow Puppet
notes: Available from Seluvis after giving Nepheli Loux the potion from earlier. Not available for purchase if you give Dung Eater Seluvis' Potion

title: Dung Eater Puppet
notes: Sold by Seluvis after giving Dung Eater Seluvis' Potion. Not available if you've given Gideon or Nepheli Seluvis' Potion. Will cost 5 Starlight Shards

title: Seluvis
notes: If you have obtained two puppets from Seluvis, speak to him again about a "scheme" against Ranni. We will progress the quest to that point but DO NOT give Ranni the Amber Starlight. This will not do anything for you aside from upset her and lock you out of her quest unless you request absolution

title: END OF PUPPET SECTION
notes: Continue past this step

title: The Ravine
notes: From Sorcerer's Isle SoG, follow the river to the Northeast inside the canyon

title: Golden Seed
notes: From The Ravine SoG, continue into the canyon

title: Ravine-Veiled Village
notes: Continue along the river to find this SoG

title: Ash of War: Barbaric Roar
notes: Found in alcove near Ravine-Veiled Village, protected by bats

title: Ruin-Strewn Precipice
notes: Follow ladder up from Ravine-Veiled Village SoG, through the caves and up the lift, then through more caves. You can find lots of upgrade mats in this area. Contains Smithing Stone 3, 4, 5, Somber Smithing Stone 4

title: Serpent-God's Curved Sword
notes: Continue up ladders and you'll see a lift with another siren enemy. Cut right and you'll see another ladder leading up to a rooftop with octopus enemies

title: Ruin-Strewn Precipice Overlook
notes: Past the two siren enemies, up the lift

title: Great Horned Tragoth
notes: Found before boss gate

title: Casual Greeting
notes: Received after summoning Great Horned Tragoth

title: Blackguard
notes: Found before boss gate

title: Magma Wyrm Makar
notes: Take Lift to Boss. Drops Magma Wyrm's Scalesword and Dragon Heart. Rest at SoG

title: Magma Wyrm's Scalesword
notes: Dropped by Magma Wyrm Makar

title: Dragon Heart
notes: Dropped by Magma Wyrm Makar

title: Dragonfire
notes: Received by trading in a Dragon Heart at the Church of Dragon Communion

title: Dragonclaw
notes: Received by trading in a Dragon Heart at the Church of Dragon Communion

title: Dragonmaw
notes: Received by trading in a Dragon Heart at the Church of Dragon Communion

title: Magma Wyrm Makar (SoG)
notes: Appears after defeating Magma Wyrm Makar

title: Altus Plateau Part 1
notes: Head past Magma Wyrm Makar boss area to access first SoG. Altus Plateau contains Smithing Stone 4, 5, Somber Smithing Stone 5, 6, Ghost Glovewort 4

title: Altus Plateau
notes: Rest at SoG for easy access later

title: Ruler's Mask
notes: Coffin in this area has this set. Part of Ruler's Set. Only has Helmet and Chest Armor

title: Ruler's Robe
notes: Coffin in this area has this set. Part of Ruler's Set. Only has Helmet and Chest Armor

title: Ancient Dragon Lansseax (Event)
notes: You will activate him moving up the slope, but doing 25% of his health in damage will make him disappear

title: Map: Altus Plateau
notes: Head Northeast out of the area, past the enemy camp, and then North along the road until you find the pillar. Ignore everything else

title: Amber Starlight
notes: Northeast from the map, you can drop in a hole with torrent and find this, guarded by small octopus. Needed for Seluvis questline

title: Magic Scorpion Charm
notes: Received from Seluvis for giving him the Amber Starlight. NOTE: Return to this later if you are going for the Dung Eater Puppet

title: Curtsy
notes: Given to you by Roderika with a +4 or higher spirit ash

title: Dung Eater
notes: Near Twin Maiden Husks. Speak to him and exhaust his dialogue. NOTE: This will need to be done again on another playthrough if you went for Dung Eater Puppet

title: Caelid Part 2
notes: To start this section, warp back to the the Smoldering Church SoG. Contains Grave Glovewort 3-5, Smithing Stone 4-7, Somber Smithing Stone 2, 4, 5, 6

title: Minor Erdtree
notes: North end of Caelid. Follow cliff East from Smolding Church

title: Putrid Avatar
notes: Found near Caelid Minor Erdtree. Drops the Greenburst Crystal Tear and the Flame-Shrouding Cracked Tear

title: Greenburst Crystal Tear
notes: Dropped by Putrid Avatar near Minor Erdtree in Caelid

title: Flame-Shrouding Cracked Tear
notes: Dropped by Putrid Avatar near Minor Erdtree in Caelid

title: Minor Erdtree Catacombs
notes: Near the Minor Erdtree. Contains Grave Glovewort 3, 4, 5, Ghost Glovewort 4. NOTE: You'll want to go under the elevator after activating the lever

title: Imp Head (Wolf)
notes: nan

title: Duo Erdtree Burial Watchdogs
notes: Drops Mad Pumpkin Head Ashes

title: Mad Pumpkin Head Ashes
notes: Dropped by Duo Erdtree Burial Watchdogs

title: Shack of the Rotting
notes: Return to the Rotview Balcony and enter one of the huts

title: Whirl, O Flame
notes: Scarab guarded by T-Rex Dogs

title: Greatsword
notes: Chest behind destroyed convoy

title: Two Mad Pumpkin Head
notes: Beneath Caelem Ruins. Drops Visage Shield

title: Visage Shield
notes: In chest after defeating Two Mad Pumpkin Head boss

title: Sword of St. Trina
notes: West of Caelem Ruins in the Forsaken Ruins. Found underground with Stonesword Key

title: Gael Tunnel
notes: West part of region, Southwest of Forsaken Ruins. Contains Somber Smithing Stone 2, 4, Smithing Stone 4

title: Cross-Naginata
notes: In the room with the large land octopus

title: Rear Gael Tunnel Entrance
notes: Found near boss door

title: Magma Wyrm
notes: Drops Moonveil and Dragon Heart

notes: Dropped by Magma Wyrm in Gael Tunnel

notes: South from the Gael Tunnel

notes: East of the Fort Gael North SoG, you can find invisible scarab

title: Ghost

title: Starscourge Heirloom
notes: In a chest in the upper area of Fort Gael

title: Katar
notes: Drop down to a platform near the Lion Guardian and enter the room

notes: Drops Ash of War: Lion's Claw. NOTE: From the platform you dropped to, you can cheese this enemy by using your summon to attack and then pelting it with arrows

notes: Dropped by Lion Guardian in Fort Gael

title: Flame, Grant Me Strength
notes: Guarded outside of the fort by two fire-spitting tanks

notes: East of the fort in the poisonous river. Need two Stonesword Keys to access. Continue through until you find a room with a false floor and you'll fall through to the main area. Work your way through until the militia men in the building and pull the lever to open all of the cells. Contains Somber Smithing Stone 5

title: Stonesword Key
notes: In a cell

title: Pillory Shield
notes: In a cell

title: Wakizashi
notes: In a cell

title: Frenzied Duelist
notes: Drops Putrid Corpse Ashes

title: Putrid Corpse Ashes
notes: Dropped by Frenzied Duelist

title: Regalia of Eochaid
notes: After boss room in the Gaol Cave

notes: South of Gaol Cave

notes: In a chest underneath Caelid Waypoint Ruins

notes: Near Astray from Caelid Highway North SoG. Scarab

notes: Northeast from Astray from Caelid Highway North SoG

title: Meteorite Staff
notes: In the Street of Sages Ruins, first building when dropping from the SoG

title: Perfumer's Traveling Set
notes: In the corner of a building in the Street of Sages Ruins

title: Perfume Bottle
notes: Found in the Street of Sages Ruins, near some rot flower enemies

title: Rock Sling
notes: Underground beneath the Street of Sages Ruins

title: Millicent

title: Inner Aeonia
notes: East from Street of Sage Ruins

notes: Summon sign found near the SoG for Commander O'Neil boss fight

notes: South of Inner Aeonia SoG. Drops Commander's Standard and Unalloyed Gold Needle

notes: Found after defeating Commander O'Neil

notes: East from Commander O'Neil boss. Kill the scarab

notes: South end of swamp, find scarab on island

notes: Northeast end of swamp on invisible scarab

notes: East from Astray from Caelid Highway South. Drops Dragon Heart

notes: Dropped by Decaying Ekzykes

notes: Southeast from Decaying Ekzykes. You can buy new Dragon incantations. Any you haven't bought from the Church can also be bought here

notes: Found at the Cathedral of Dragon Communion

title: Caelid Catacombs
notes: East from the Cathedral of Dragon Communion. You'll hit a cliff edge, follow that cliff edge continuing East untily you can turn around at the bottom and head West. Contains Grave Glovewort 3, 4, 5 Ghost Glovewort 3, 4

title: Miranda Sprout Ashes
notes: Hidden behind illusory wall right of the straircase in the swamp

title: Cemetary Shade
notes: Drops Kindred of Rot Ashes. Lever to boss is behind illusory wall opposite from the boss door

title: Kindred of Rot Ashes
notes: Dropped by Cemetary Shade boss

title: Night's Cavalry
notes: West of Southern Aeonia Swamp Bank at night. Drops Ash of War: Poison Moth Flight

title: Ash of War: Poison Moth Flight
notes: Dropped by Night's Cavalry in Caelid

title: Golden Seed
notes: South of the merchant

title: Windy Crystal Tear
notes: Northeast of the Golden Seed, in the pit near two giant bird enemies

title: Death Rite Bird
notes: Northeast of the Windy Crystal Tear at night. Or Southeast from the Southern Aeonia Swamp Bank SoG. Drops Death's Poker

title: Death's Poker
notes: Dropped by Death Rite Bird in Caelid

title: Arrow's Sting Talisman
notes: Top of tower next to Impassable Greatbridge SoG

title: Ash of War: Cragblade
notes: West from the Impassable Greatbridge SoG, up near the sword shrine

title: Sellia Gateway
notes: North on the road from the Death Rite Bird. Not a SoG

title: Gowry's Shack
notes: Past the Sellia Gateway, slightly East and guarded by a large dog. Not a SoG

title: Gowry
notes: Talk to Gowry and exhaust dialogue. Give him the Unalloyed Gold Needle from earlier, then reload. Talk to him again. He will ask you to find Millicent

title: Sellia Under-Stair
notes: From Gowry's Shack, head North toward the Sellia Town of Sorcery and to the left around the outside of it. You'll find this at the base of the stairs

title: Rotten Stray Ashes
notes: North from the Sellia Under-Stair SoG. Past it in ruined building

title: Sellia, Town of Sorcery
notes: Head up the stairs from the Sellia Under-Stair SoG. You will need to solve the puzzle in this town which requires lighting three flames at the top of the town's towers. NOTE: You can grab some of the items mentioned below on the rooftops as you do the puzzle

title: Light the Flames
notes: Light the flames on top of the towers

title: Golden Seed
notes: End of town, climb stairs on right to find Golden Seed

title: Stonesword Key
notes: Found on Rooftops

title: Ash of War: Double Slash
notes: Found on Rooftops. Kill teleporting scarab

title: Cerulean Tear Scarab
notes: Found on Rooftops

title: Staff of Loss
notes: Found on Rooftops. Drop from building to balcony

title: Redmane Painting
notes: Found in the streets

title: Night Comet
notes: On the street in a chest after lighting the fires in the towers

title: Imbued Sword Key
notes: On the street in a chest after lighting the fires in the towers

title: Spelldrake Talisman +1
notes: On the street in a chest after lighting the fires in the towers

title: Sellia Backstreets
notes: Past the now opened magic gate near the Golden Seed

title: Nox Swordstress and Nox Priest
notes: At the left gate at the end of the area, down from where the Golden Seed is. Drops the Nox Flowing Sword

title: Nox Flowing Sword
notes: Dropped by Nox Swordstress and Nox Priest boss

title: Chair-Crypt of Sellia
notes: Found after defeating the Nox Swordstress and Priest

title: Lusat's Glintstone Staff
notes: Found in chest in the back of the boss room

title: Pearldrake Talisman
notes: Warp to Four Belfries. Use Imbued Sword Key on last warp gate. Go to Farum Azula, hop down platforms, grab Talisman

title: Church of Plague
notes: Warp back to Sellia Backstreets SoG and follow path up

title: Sacred Tear
notes: Found in Church of Plague

title: Millicent
notes: Found in Church of Plague. Speak to her and then give her the needle you got from Gowry. Reload the area, exhaust her dialogue to get the Prosthesis-Wearer Heirloom. Rest again and she will disappear

title: Prosthesis-Wearer Heirloom
notes: Given by Millicent during her questline after giving her the needle at the Church of Plague

title: Selia Hideaway
notes: From the Church of Plague. Northeast toward higher level, then Northeast. Behind mage, hit rocks and find this dungeon

title: Crystalian Ashes
notes: Attack two illusory walls, drop down first pit, past stake of marika, follow crystal path then fall down another hole. In a chest near three mage enemies

title: Crystal Spear
notes: Back to crystal room, on a ledge with a corpse, attack wall, find in chest

title: Trio Putrid Crystallians
notes: Drops Crystsal Torrent

title: Crystal Torrent
notes: Dropped by Trio Putrid Crystallians

title: Gowry
notes: Gowry will be back. You can now buy sorceries including Glintstone Stars, Night Shard, and NIght Maiden's Mist

title: Glintstone Stars
notes: Sold by Gowry

title: Night Shard
notes: Sold by Gowry

title: Night Maiden's Mist
notes: Sold by Gowry

title: Swamp Lookout Tower
notes: South along road from the Church of Plague

title: Eternal Darkness
notes: Near Swamp Lookout Tower, guarded by Bloodhound Knight

notes: Warp to Redmane Castle Plaza SoG and exhaust dialogue

title: Iron Fist Alexander
notes: Exhaust Dialogue

title: Finger Maiden
notes: Exhaust Dialogue to receive Polite Bow gesture

notes: Speak to Finger Maiden to receive

notes: Speak to him to start the Radahn Festival and receive the Heartening Cry Gesture

title: Heartening Cry
notes: Received by speaking to Witch-Hunter Jerren

title: Starscourge Radahn
notes: After taking the lift to the waygate, enter the fight. Make sure to summon Great Horned Tragoth to get the Casual Greeting Gesture and anyone else you'd like to use.

notes: Received by summoning Great Horned Tragoth during Radahn fight. NOTE: You may have already received this from summoning this NPC in another fight

title: Radahn's Great Rune
notes: Dropped by Starscourge Radahn

title: Starscourge Radahn (SoG)
notes: Appears after defeating Radahn

notes: Go back to the Starscourge Radahn SoG. North part of the area behind a door. Contains Ghost Glovewort 4, Grave Glovewort 6

title: Collapsing Stars
notes: Found in chest on the lowest level

title: Radahn Soldier Ashes
notes: In smaller swamp near Cleanrot Knight ghost

notes: Dropped by Putrid Tree Spirit

title: Redmane Knight Ogha Ashes
notes: Dropped by Putrid Tree Spirit

notes: To start this section, warp over to Caelem Ruins in Caelid. Contains Somber Smithing Stone 8, 9. NOTE: THIS AREA IS SKIPPABLE AND SHOULD HAVE NO CONSEQUENCE TO QUEST PROGRESSION IF YOU COME BACK LATER. VERY DIFFICULT AREA UNLESS YOU ARE ALREADY ON NG+

title: Dragonbarrow West
notes: From Caelem Ruins, East across canyon, then more East

title: Ghost
notes: Just North of the Dragonbarrow West SoG

title: Map: Dragonbarrow
notes: East from Dragonbarrow West SoG

notes: Warp back to Deep Siofra Well SoG (above ground). Continue through canyon to find under a giant

title: Great-Jar
notes: At the end of the canyon. Talk to him and then defeat the three invader enemies. Upon defeating them, you will receive the Great-Jar's Arsenal talisman. You can cheese the NPC ones off of the ledge by standing on the tree branch overhanging the cliff

title: Great-Jar's Arsenal
notes: Received from Great-Jar after defeating the three invaders

notes: Return to the Sellia Under-Stair SoG and find this Location. Go to the North near the cliffs to find the entrance. Has Smithing Stone 5, 7, Somber Smithing Stone 4, 6

notes: Found once you've jumped over a small wall and continue through, look for the ladder leading to a pest enemy, will be below that in the small room

notes: Continue through area until you find two pest enemies worshipping on a wooden platform

title: Fallingstar Beast
notes: Drops the Somberstone Miner's Bell Bearing

notes: Dropped by Fallingstar Beast in Sellia Crystal Tunnel. Given to Twin Maiden Husks at Roundtable Hold to purchase Somber 1 and 2

notes: Warp to Smoldering Wall SoG and head East. Use tree log to cross canyon

title: Serpent Bow
notes: Found after jumping down, near the iron maiden corpse and the poison shooting enemy

title: Venomous Fang
notes: Look for large plant enemy, up on a ledge. Use iron maiden corpses to jump up

title: Cleanrot Knights
notes: Drops the Gold Scarab

notes: Dropped by Cleanrot Knights

notes: Northwest from the Dragonbarrow West SoG, head North up road a bit then head West

title: Spiked Caestus

notes: Bought from merchant at Isolated Shack

notes: Bought from merchant at Isolated Shack

notes: Bought from merchant at Isolated Shack. Three are sold

title: Ritual Pot
notes: Bought from merchant at Isolated Shack

notes: Northwest from the shack. Kill scarab

notes: Dropped by Bell-Bearing Hunter at Isolated Merchant's Shack

title: Sellia Evergaol
notes: South from the Dragonbarrow West SoG, on the cliff above the Abandoned Cave. Contains Battlemage Hugues

notes: Located in the Sellia Evergaol. Drops the Battlemage Hugues Ashes

title: Battlemage Hugues Ashes
notes: Dropped by Battlemage Hugues in the Sellia Evergaol

notes: Northeast from the Dragonbarrow West SoG. Use careful platforming up the side of the tower

notes: Along the platforms on the outside of the tower

title: Divine Tower of Caelid: Basement
notes: Found at the bottom of the inner Caelid Tower

notes: Platform jump to the bottom of the tower to find him. Drops Godskin Apostle Set

notes: Go to the top of the tower to activate this rune

title: Dectus Medallion (Right)
notes: In a chest on the roof

title: Radagon's Soreseal
notes: Through the hole with the rats

title: Elder Dragon Greyoll
notes: West from the fort. Go behind the drgon, near the Smoldering Wall, and strike it from behind. This will take ages but will drop 5 Dragon Hearts. NOTE: There is an exploit where you can kill Greyoll, then rush back to the SoG on Torrent and rest, then kill him again. This appears to be indefinite

title: Dragon Hearts
notes: 5 are dropped by Elder Dragon Greyoll

title: Stonesword Key
notes: Southwest from Greyoll, on top of the giant white coral looking rock. You'll also find some Smithing Stone 7 and 8 here

title: Minor Erdtree
notes: Northeast from Fort Faroth, drop down spirit spring

title: Putrid Avatar
notes: Drops Stonebarb Cracked  Tear and Opaline Hardtear

notes: Dropped by Putrid Avatar near Dragonbarrow Minor Erdtree

title: Opaline Hardtear
notes: Dropped by Putrid Avatar near Dragonbarrow Minor Erdtree

title: Ash of War: Rain of Arrows
notes: You'll need to descend the cliff from the Minor Erdtree carefully down. You'll see a platform at the bottom with a Golem. Found by ghost after picking up the Redmane Painting in Sellia Town

title: Bestial Constitution
notes: North of Minor Erdtree if you follow the road. On scarab to the left down the cliff

title: Dragonbarrow Fork
notes: West of the Minor Erdtree, down the road along the cliff

title: Dragonbarrow Cave
notes: East from the Dragonbarrow Fork SoG, near the bear

notes: Past the rune bear in the small alcove with the animals

notes: Dropped by Beastmen of Farum Azula

title: Farum Greatbridge

notes: Bridge leading to North area of region. Drops Dragon Heart

title: Dragon Heart
notes: Dropped by Flying Dragon Greyll in Dragonbarrow

title: Golden Seed
notes: Toward Bestial Sanctum from Lenne's Rise

title: Starlight Shard
notes: East from the Golden Tree. NOTE: Return to Seluvis to receive another puppet if you gave the potion to Napheli

title: Gargoyle's Black Blade

title: Dragoncrest Shield Talisman
notes: Descend the cliffs on the West side of the Bestial Sanctum. May be glitches in 1.03

title: Cinquedea
notes: Descend the cliffs on the West side of the Bestial Sanctum. May be glitches in 1.03

title: Nokron
notes: If you wish to get the Dung Eater Puppet Ashes, skip this section until after the Leyndell Royal Capital section and complete that to the point you give the potion to Dung Eater. Contains Ghost Glovewort 3-5, Great Ghost Glovewort, Smithing Stone 2, 3, 5, Somber Smithing Stone 4-6

title: Nokron, Eternal City
notes: Go to Fort Haight West SoG in East Limgrave after defeating Radahn, then go a little West. Go down the huge crater. This should be marked on your map with a red symbol and you should see a bunch of floating rocks from the SoG

title: Ghostflame Torch
notes: Jump from beam to a tower to the right, then to a nearby roof. On a corpse

title: Nokron, Eternal City (SoG)
notes: Found after jumping down from mimic tear enemies, past pale ghoul enemies

title: Ghost-Glovewort Picker's Bell
notes: In gazebo at the bottom level of Nokron. Give to Twin Maiden Husks to be able to purchase Renowned Ashes upgrade mats up to +3

title: Larval Tear
notes: Found on a corpse inside the stone building Southeast of the Nokron, Eternal City SoG

title: Greatshield Soldier Ashes
notes: In the graveyard guarded by enemies

title: Mimic Tear
notes: Move forward to fight this boss. Drops Silver Tear Mask and a Larval Tear. NOTE: You can unequip armor and weapons, then re-equip after boss changes form to make this fight trivial

title: Silver Tear Mask
notes: Dropped by Mimic Tear

title: Mimic Tear (SoG)
notes: Found after defeating Mimic Tear

title: Ghost
notes: Follow bridge to the end and jump to lower level, you'll see ghost on the right. Speak to it for lore

title: Clarifying Horn Charm +1
notes: Follow bridge to very end and jump to lower levels. Look for ghost to your right and jump down near there first

title: Hallowhorn Grounds
notes: Return to the Mimic Tear SoG. In the area after the bridge, find and light 6 obelisks to access another boss fight later

title: Obelisk 1
notes: Found immediately after entering the Hallowhorn Grounds from the bridge

title: Obelisk 2
notes: From Obelisk 1, head West along the road. Will find on top of small cliff with singing enemy

title: Ancestral Woods
notes: Found West of the bridge you crossed, after entering the Hallowhorn Grounds. Will be tucked away in the rock

title: Obelisk 3
notes: Head West from the Ancestral Woods SoG, found near large pillar with red wolf wandering near

title: Obelisk 4
notes: Northeast from Obelisk 3, near the rats

title: Ash of War: Enchanted Shot
notes: Near an obelisk with rats. Kill scarab

title: Ancestral Infant's Head
notes: Past Obelisk 4, you can use Torrent to access a ruined building to the North. In a chest guarded by enemy

title: Obelisk 5

title: Obelisk 6
notes: From Obelisk 5, head Sountheast until you can see the end of the bridge from when you first entered the area

title: Regal Ancestor Spirit
notes: Touch the deer carcass after you light all 6 obelisks in the area. Drops Remembrance of the Regal Ancestor

title: Remembrance of the Regal Ancestor
notes: Dropped by Regal Ancestor Spirit. Take to Enia to get either the Winged Greathorn or the Ancestral Spirit's Horn

title: Mottled Necklace +1
notes: Climb cliffs near deer carcass. It is above on the structure

title: Stonesword Key
notes: From beams at top of building, move past the spirit Jellyfish and drop to lower level

notes: From the deer caracss building, follow the cliffs up toward the spirit jellyfish, and then drop down. Or continue from where you had found the stonesword key previously. Found in a small cave

title: Missionary's Cookbook 5
notes: Drop down to the rampart where you can see the crucible knight patroling. Head to the circular building in the West

title: Crucible Hornshield
notes: Dropped by Crucible Knight patroling circular buildings

title: Order Healing
notes: Another circular building, kill scarab

title: D's Twin Brother
notes: On balcony past second crucible knight. interact with him and hand over the Twinned Armor to receive Inner Order gesture

title: Inner Order
notes: Speak to D's Twin Brother in Nokron on balcony

title: Valiant Gargoyle
notes: At the end of the area. Drops Gargoyle's Greatsword and Gargoyle's Twinblade

title: Gargoyle's Greatsword
notes: Dropped by Valiant Gargoyle

title: Gargoyle's Twinblade
notes: Dropped by Valiant Gargoyle

title: Great Waterfall Basin
notes: Found after defeating Valiant Gargoyle

title: Black Whetblade
notes: Progress from Ancestral woods and across rooftops. Enter a building through a window and find at the altar

title: Mimic Tear Ashes
notes: Hallway unlocked by Stonesword Key. In the chest

title: Night's Sacred Ground
notes: Exit to street

title: Fingerslayer Blade

title: Great Ghost Glovewort
notes: End of road under huge statue

title: Ranni the Witch
notes: Give Ranni the Amber Draught if you want to complete Seluvis ending with ending Ranni. Does not offer any reward. You can use a celestial dew to fix this

title: Carian Inverted Statue
notes: Given by Ranni after giving her the Fingerslayer Blade

title: Preceptor's Set

title: Seluvis' Bell Bearing
notes: Found in Seluvis' Rise after giving Ranni the Fingerslayer Blade

title: Pidia
