notes: Go to Pidia to find Pidia's Bell Bearing and either the Dolores the Sleeping Arrow Puppet Ash or the Nepheli Loux Puppet Ash if you had Nepheli Loux drink the potion

title: Dolores the Sleeping Arrow Puppet
notes: Dropped by Pidia after completing Seluvis' Questline

title: Nepheli Loux Puppet
notes: Dropped by Pidia after completing Seluvis' Questline and giving the potion to Nepheli

title: Pidia's Bell Bearing
notes: Dropped by Pidia after completing Seluvis' Questline

title: Carian Study Hall
notes: Path North of the Artist's shack in East Liurnia. Curve right and then head South toward the building. Go through once and grab all items before using the Carian Inverted Statue

title: Ghost
notes: Found as soon as you enter the Carian Study Hall

title: Carian Glintstone Staff
notes: Found in the Carian Study Hall, along the path

title: Preceptor Mariam
notes: Will appear throughout your journey through the Carian Study Hall, until defeated

title: Magic Downpour
notes: Dropped by Preceptor Miriam

title: Cerulean Seed Talisman
notes: On the wooden beams above the circular room with all of the spirits

title: Place the Carian Inverted Statue
notes: Place the statue given to you by Ranni on the alter in front of the SoG. It will alter the area and allow you to get the other items

title: Mask of Confidence
notes: Drop down once where the lift is, then go out and follow to the left until you can drop again. Doubleback to find on a corpse. Does not belong to an armor set

title: Lucidity
notes: Fight Preceptor Miriam again after placing the Carian Inverted Statue to receive this

title: Liurnia Tower Bridge
notes: Found after inverting the Carian Study Hall and exiting via lift and door

title: Godskin Noble
notes: Exit tower onto a bridge and you will find him. Drops the Godskin Noble set

title: Godskin Noble Set
notes: Dropped by Godskin Noble enemy near Liurnia Tower Bridge

title: Divine Tower of Liurnia
notes: Cross the bridge from the Carian Study Hall

title: Stargazer Heirloom
notes: At the top of the Divine Tower of Liurnia

title: Cursemark of Death
notes: At the top of the Divine Tower of Liurnia

title: Snow Witch Set
notes: Go to Renna's Rise to find in chest at the top of the ladder. Does not contain gloves

title: Ainsel River Part 2
notes: Accessed after advancing Ranni's quest and using the waygate at the top of Renna's Rise. Come back to this after Leyndel, Royal Capital if you are trying to get the Dung Eater Puppet ashes this playthrough. Ghost Glovewort 6, 7, 8, and 9

title: Miniature Ranni
notes: In a coffin at the beginning of the region

title: Ainsel River Main
notes: Rest at SoG in the beginning of this region

title: Ranni the Witch
notes: You'll see the option to talk to Miniature Ranni at the Ainsel River Main SoG. Continue to select this and eventually she will speak to you and ask a request

title: Stonesword Key
notes: Found on corpse next to a giant poison flower

title: Clayman Ashes
notes: Found near waterfall

title: Wing of Astel
notes: Head toward the large bug hanging from the roof. Through the tunnels with the ants, take a left at intersection. Huge open area with bug enemy on cceiling. Found on ledge in a chest nearby

title: Nokstella, Eternal City
notes: Warp back to Ainsel River Main, then head toward Uhl Palace Ruins and back into tunnel. Once you rest here, exhaust dialogue with Ranni. NOTE: Near this SoG, you can find Ghost Glovewort 7, 8 along the shallow river. Also Contains Somber Smithing Stone 6, 7, Smithing Stone 6

title: Ranni the Witch
notes: Available talk option at the SoG

title: Ant's Skull Plate
notes: Small room up the stairs to the West of the Nokstella, Eternal City SoG

title: Ghost-Glovewort Picker's Bell Bearing 2
notes: Next building from Ant's Skull Plate in a chest after continuing up the stairs. Give to Twin Maiden Husks to acces upgrade mats for Renowned Ashes up to +6

title: Archer Ashes
notes: Back of building after going up the stairs and getting the Ghost-Glovewort Picker's Bell Bearing 2

title: Nightmaiden & Swordstress Puppets
notes: Next building via Stonesword Key

title: Larval Tear
notes: Dropped by Silver Sphere near the bridge

title: Great Ghost Glovewort
notes: Building to right after bridge has chest

title: Moon of Nokstella
notes: After next bridge, enter building and kill tears and Nox warrior. In chest behind them

title: Golden Seed
notes: Exit building and take elevator to water level, find on Golden Tree

title: Stonesword Key
notes: North of Golden Tree, on corpse near edge of cliff after jumping down

title: Nokstella Waterfall Basin
notes: Found after jumping down from Golden Seed and Stonesword Key, heading straight back and into building with lift. Head down and rest to talk to Ranni again

title: Baleful Shadow
notes: From Nokstella Waterfall Basin SoG, head through cave with death blight geckos. He will appear as a red phantom

title: Discarded Palace Key
notes: Dropped by Baleful Shadow. Needed to complete Ranni's questline

title: Lake of Rot
notes: Return to the Nokstella Waterfall Basin SoG in Ainsel River and continue past where you fought the Baleful Shadow. Use elevator to access. Come back to this area after the Leyndell, Royal Capital section if you are trying to get the Dung Eater Puppet ashes this playthrough. Contains Smithing Stone 6, 7, Somber Smithing Stone 6-9

title: Lake of Rot Shoreside
notes: Exit from the lift

title: Dark Moon Ring
notes: Warp to Raya Lucaria Grand Library SoG. Go to where Rennala is and use Discarded Palace Key on chest to obtain the ring. Used to complete Ranni's questline

title: Map: Lake of Rot
notes: Return to the Lake of Rot Shoreside. Found on a corpse after lift and SoG, near the edge of the lake

title: Boss Setup
notes: Run around the area and activate all of the pressure plates. This will make the boss and exploring the area easier

title: Immunizing Horn Charm +1
notes: Southeast into the lake, find Ancestral Follower enemy and kill it to find this talisman

title: Dragonkin Soldier
notes: South from the Immunizing Horn Charm +1. Drops Dragonscale Blade

title: Dragonscale Blade
notes: Dropped by Dragonkin Soldier

title: Mushroom Crown
notes: Southeast part of the lake, on top of a column, climb the ruins. Part of the Mushroom Set

title: Nomadic Warrior's Cookbook 22
notes: Southwest part of the lake, in a chest in a building

title: Alabaster Lord
notes: On top of one of the platforms when it raises. Drops Alabaster Lord's Sword

title: Alabaster Lord's Sword
notes: Dropped by Alabaster Lord in the Lake of Rot

title: Grand Cloister
notes: Cross the lake to the ruins and rest at the SoG

title: Ulcerated Tree Spirit
notes: Near the waterfall. Drops a Golden Seed

title: Golden Seed
notes: Dropped by Ulcerated Tree Spirit near watefall in Grand Cloister

title: Scorpion's Stinger
notes: Past the praying pest enemies in a chest

title: Coffin to Astel, Naturalborn
notes: At the edge of a cliff, nestle in coffin to be transported to a new area

title: Astel, Naturalborn
notes: Drops Remembrance of the Naturalborn

title: Remembrance of the Naturalborn
notes: Dropped by Astel, Naturalborn. Can be given to Enia to obtain Ash of War: Waves of Darkness or Bastard's Stars

title: Astel, Naturalborn of the Void (SoG)
notes: Appears after defeating Astel

title: Western Liurnia Part 4
notes: After beating Astel, you can access the Southwest part of Liurnia by taking the elevator after the boss. Exiting the Deep Ainsel Well will put you at the Moonlight Altar. Come back to this area later if you are trying to get the Dung Eater Puppet ashes this playthrough. Liurnia has Grave Glovewort 2, 3, 4, Smithing Stone 1- 9, Somber Smithing Stone 2, 3, 4

title: Moonlight Alter
notes: Found after getting off the elevator

title: Alter South
notes: Southwest part of the area. Head past the glintstone dragons and continue making your way down

title: Chelona's Rise
notes: Near the Alter South SoG. The entrance is locked and you'll have to hit three spirit turtles found all over the elevated area. First turtle directly West of the tower hanging from cliff. Second is far Southeast down a plateau. Third is Southeast from RIngleader's Evergaol. High in the air, use spiritspring and jump on it. NOTE: Do not fast travel when completing this puzzle. You have to find all of the turtles without fast traveling or they will reset

title: Ranni's Dark Moon
notes: Found in Chelona's Rise

title: Ringleader's Evergaol
notes: Southeast Area

title: Alecto, Black Knife Ringleader
notes: Found in Ringleader's Evergaol. Drops Black Knife Tiche

title: Black Knife Tiche
notes: Dropped by Alecto, Black Knife Ringleader

title: Moonfolk Ruins
notes: North of Deep Ainsel Well

title: Glintstone Dragon Adula
notes: Weakened earlier in the guide. Drops Adula's Moonblade and 3 Dragon Hearts

title: Adula's Moonblade
notes: Dropped by Glintstone Dragon Adula

title: Dragon Heart
notes: 3 Dropped by Glintstone Dragon Adula

title: Starlight Shard
notes: 10 found in Cathedral of Manus Celes. This would get you all you need for Seluvis' Puppets, and you can return to Seluvis (or his corpse) to finish your purchases now

title: Cathedral of Manus Celes
notes: East from Dragon Adula encounter. You can find 10 Starlight Shards

title: Dark Moon Greatsword
notes: Received for completing Ranni's quest

title: Lunar Estate Ruins
notes: South of Cathedral of Manus Celes

title: Cerulean Amber Medallion +2
notes: Found underground beneath Lunar Estate Ruins. Underground area is hidden, must hit illusory ground and use Stonesword Key. Central part of the ruins

title: Blaidd
notes: Approach Ranni's Rise from the outside to fight. Drops Royal Greatsword and Blaidd's Set. This ends Blaidd's quest

title: Blaidd's Set
notes: Dropped by Blaidd at the end of his quest. The helmet is found earlier in this guide

title: Royal Greatsword
notes: Dropped by Blaidd at the end of his quest

title: Ranni's Chamber
notes: Go to the top of Ranni's Rise, rest at the SoG

title: Iji's Bell Bearing
notes: Found after completing Iji's quest and reloading area

title: Iji's Mirrorhelm
notes: Found after completing Iji's quest and reloading area. Not part of an armor set

title: Dung Eater Run - For Puppet
notes: This checkpoint is specific to getting the Dung Eater Puppet Ashes as quickly as possible. You'll end up doing a lot of running through areas without grabbing items so that it can be done quickly. If you are not going for the Dung Eater Puppet, skip this section

title: Abandoned Coffin
notes: Warp to Abandon Coffin SoG

title: Erdtree-Gazing Hill
notes: Head up the hill past the caravans until you find the Erdtree-Gazing Hill SoG

title: Melina
notes: Speak to her at the Erdtree-Gazing Hill SoG

title: Outer Wall Phantom Tree
notes: Head East past the camp, up the road/stairs, past the two tree sentinel bosses and through the door

title: Outer Wall Battleground
notes: Head North/Northeast along road. Hug cliff to the right to avoid Margitt fight for now

title: Draconic Tree Sentinel
notes: Head East up the stairs and through the graveyard. Follow road until you come across another gate and the Dragon Tree Sentinel, kill for access

title: Dragon Greatclaw
notes: Dropped by Draconic Tree Sentinel

title: Dragonclaw Shield
notes: Dropped by Draconic Tree Sentinel

title: Capital Rampart
notes: Found through entryway after defeating Draconic Tree Sentinel

title: East Capital Rampart
notes: Follow path. Speak to Melina here

title: Leyndell Skip
notes: Look up "New Leyndell Capital Skip" on YouTube and follow the directions. You basically go to first bubble guy from East Capital Rampart, walk against that pillar and drop down, then drop to the ledge to the right, then jump around the pillar on your left to the other side. Follow that to a window and drop to it, then down to ledge on right, and finally jump to the circular building behind you

title: Avenue Balcony
notes: From the top of the circular building, jump down to the street, run Southwest along road and past boss, through door to right

title: Underground Roadside
notes: From Avenue Balcony SoG, go down stairs and through door, turn left, then follow railing until rooftops and well over the edge to the left. Jump down well, follow path with rats until balcony, jump down and go to door on the left

title: Seedbed Curse
notes: From the East Capital Rampart SoG, follow path past fire breathing statue and down the lift. Go into gold dome building, climb ladder then stairs. On corpse in chair in middle of the room

title: Dung Eater
notes: Warp to Roundtable Hold and speak to Dung Eater now that you have a Seedbed Curse. Hey will give you the Sewer Gaol Key

title: Sewer Gaol Key
notes: Given to you by Dung Eater after speaking to him after obtaining a Seedbed Curse

title: Dung Eater
notes: From Underground Roadside, head out and turn left, follow along the left until you can drop into sewer, then follow past rats and poison flowers. Up ladder, past enemies, use key to unlock cell and speak to him

title: Blackguard Big Boggart
notes: From the Outer Wall Battleground SoG, head East to broken stairs, then Southeast from the fork nearing the golems. Carefully jump down cliff to right before making it to other side of moat and speak to Blackguard before finding Dung Eater. Exhaust dialogue and reload. Exhaust dialogue and reload again. Interact with him to get Seedbed Curse, Blackguard Bell Bearing, and Iron Ball

title: Blackguard's Bell Bearing
notes: Obtained off of Blackguard's body

title: Iron Ball
notes: Obtained off of Blackguard's body

title: Blackguard's Iron Mask
notes: Obtained off of Blackguard's body. Not part of an armor set

title: Sword of Milos
notes: Dropped by Dung Eater invasion

title: Omen Set
notes: Kill Dung Eater immediately after this step without reloading the area, or you'll need to get the armor on another playthrough

title: Altus Plateau Part 2
notes: Return to the Abandoned Coffin SoG in Altus Plateau. NOTE: Return to Seluvis and Nokron Sections if you went for the Dung Eater Puppet. Altus Plateau contains Smithing Stone 4, 5, Somber Smithing Stone 5, 6, Ghost Glovewort 4

title: Ash of War: Sacred Order
notes: Northwest of the Abandoned Coffin SoG. Kill the scarab along the path to the left of the small lake

title: Perfumer's Ruins
notes: Northwest from Abandoned Coffin SoG, West part of Altus Plateau

title: Omenkiller
notes: Need chest

title: Omenkiller Set
notes: Dropped by Omenkiller enemy in Perfumer's Ruins. The helmet is found later

title: Perfume Bottle
notes: Found on the table near the Omenkiller enemy

title: Perfumer's Cookbook 1
notes: Found in Perfumer's Ruins in a chest

title: Perfumer's Talisman
notes: Found underground beneath Perfumer's Ruins in a chest near giant poisonous flower

title: Unsightly Catacombs
notes: West of the Perfumer's Ruins, down the cliff side. Needs 2 Stonesword Keys to unlock. Grave Glovewort 4, 5, Ghost Glovewort 5

title: Winged Misbegotten Ashes
notes: Follow path until you see a safe spot to jump into the water with the corpses. Find here against the wall

title: Prattling Pate (Apologies)
notes: Continue from the water you dropped down to until you find the lever, then follow around to the other side, on a corpse

title: Misbegotten Warrior and Perfumer Tricia
notes: Drops Perfumer Tricia Ashes

title: Perfumer Tricia
notes: Dropped by Misbegotten Warrior and Perfumer Tricia boss

title: Sage's Cave
notes: Northeast part of small lake North of Abandoned Coffin

title: Black Hood
notes: Go down tunnel until dead end, then hit illusory rock wall. Follow path to waterfall, turn right and hit another wall. Go down small waterfall and past chests, turn left to see sconces near another illusory wall. Part of the Leather Set

title: Candletree Wooden Shield
notes: Go down tunnel until dead end, then hit illusory rock wall. Follow path to waterfall, turn right and hit another wall. Go down small waterfall and past chests, turn left to see sconces near another illusory wall

title: Stonesword Key
notes: Next room, wall with skeleton

title: Raptor Talons
notes: Next room from skeleton, in chest

title: Raptor's Black Feathers
notes: After next waterfall jump left, attack left wall to find two chests. Part of the Raptor's Set

title: Skeletal Mask
notes: After next waterfall jump left, attack left wall to find two chests. Part of the Raptor's Set

title: Necromancer Garris
notes: Otherside of room, attack another wall to find this boss. Drops Family Heads

title: Family Heads
notes: Dropped by Necromancer Garris

title: Black Knife Assassin
notes: Back to the waterfall, stay left side to find. Drops Concealing Veil. Watch water for footprints as she is invisible. Using summon is a must

title: Concealing Veil
notes: Dropped by Black Knife Assassin

title: Erdtree-Gazing Hill
notes: From the Abandoned Coffin SoG, head Northeast up the hill past where you fought the dragon

title: Millicent
notes: Return to the Erdtree-Gazing Hill SoG. North on the cliff side. Exhaust dialogue

title: Golden Seed
notes: Near Millicent, by Golden Tree

title: Wyndham Ruins
notes: North of Millicent

title: Tibia Mariner
notes: In the Wyndham Ruins. Drops Deathroot and Tibia's Summons

title: Deathroot
notes: Dropped by Tibia Mariner in Wyndham Ruins, Altus Plateau. Fifth one found

title: Tibia's Summons
notes: Dropped by Tibia Mariner in Wyndham Ruins, Altus Plateau

title: Pearldrake Talisman +1
notes: Found in North part of the Wyndham Ruins. In an underground room, requires Stonesword Key

title: Wyndham Catacombs
notes: Found at the top of the Wyndham Ruins by a cliff. Ghost Glovewort 6 Grave Glovewort 4, 5, Smithing Stone 5

title: Lightning Scorpion Charm
notes: Follow path and down the lift, to water area. Past knight and up the ladder. Requires Stonesword Key

title: Ancient Dragon Apostle's Cookbook 1
notes: Look for large elevator platform that would kill you with spikes on the roof. Activate it and backtrack, then immediately jump below it into the water

title: Erdtree Burial Watchdog
notes: Drops the Glovewort Picker's Bell Bearing 1

title: Glovewort Picker's Bell Bearing 1
notes: Dropped by Erdtree Burial Watchdog in Wyndham Catacombs. Allows you to upgrade normal Ashes to +3

title: Beast Claw
notes: Received from Beast Clergyman after giving him the fifth Deathroot

title: Ash of War: Blood Blade
notes: Return to the Erdtree-Gazing Hill SoG. North on road, lower level from Millicent. Kill scarab

title: Old Altus Tunnel
notes: Side of road, North past Millicent. Requires 2 Stonesword Keys. Smithing Stone 5, Somber Smithing Stone 4-6

title: Boltdrake Talisman +1
notes: Continue through, go up first ladder and find in shack with two dogs

title: Troll's Hammer
notes: Found in shack near dogs, on lower level of cave

title: Stonedigger Troll
notes: Drops Troll's Hammer and Great Club

title: Great Club
notes: Dropped by Stonedigger Troll in Old Altus Tunnel

title: The Shaded Castle
notes: North from the Old Altus Tunnel in the poisonous swamp. Contains Smithing Stone 4, 5, Ghost Glovewort 4

title: Shaded Castle Ramparts
notes: First SoG in this area. Jump up from poisonous swamp to outter wall

title: Champion's Song Painting
notes: North section of outer wall. From the Shaded Castle Ramparts SoG, head down the stairs and left. Follow that until you see a broken section of wall to your left, walk down the stone "ramp" and into the small building on your right

title: Valkyrie's Prothesis
notes: Head Northwest and then West after dropping down from the Shaded Castle Ramparts SoG. Go up the ladder. Stay on the wall and head North. In a building guarded by a cleanrot knight, found in a chest. Will be given to Millicent later in her quest

title: Shaded Castle Inner Gate
notes: Head South along the wall again until you can drop to some buildings. Walk along the rooftops to the broken part of the wall and go through the gate

title: Perfume Bottle
notes: Head to the East part of the courtyard from this SoG, climb ladder, head South along top of wall to another ladder (do not climb down). Go past this ladded and up the stairs, found on a corpse

title: Stonesword Key
notes: Head back to the ladder you passed then jump down to the stone pillars to the left of the ladder

title: Ghost
notes: Found just past the Shaded Castle Inner Gate SoG, to the right near the dog. Speak to it for lore

title: Perfumer's Cookbook 2
notes: Climb ladder near Shaded Castle Inner Gate SoG, then climb another ladder inside the building

title: Elmer of the Briar
notes: Found at the top of the lift near the cleanrot knight. Drops Briar Greatshield and Marais Executioner's Sword

title: Briar Greatshield
notes: Dropped by Elmer of the Briar

title: Marais Executioner's Sword
notes: Dropped by Elmer of the Briar

title: Castellan's Hall
notes: Appears after defeating Elmer of the Briar

title: Starlight Shard
notes: Return to outside the Shaded Castle and head North past the castle. You should find this in a large stone half-bowl

title: Maleigh Marais, Shaded Castle Castellan
notes: Found West of the Shaded Castle. Drops Marais Mask, Marais Robe, and Antspur Rapier

title: Marais Set
notes: Dropped by Maleigh Marais in Altus Plateau. This is just the Helmet and the Chest piece

title: Antspur Rapier
notes: Dropped by Maleigh Marais in Altus Plateau

title: Pest Threads
notes: Sold by Gowry after giving Millicent the Valkyrie's Prothesis

title: Desperate Prayer
notes: Given by Gowry after buying Pest Threads and exhausting dialogue

title: Golden Lineage Evergaol
notes: From the Erdtree-Gazing Hill SoG, you'll need to go South/Southeast along the cliff face, going through the small cave. Contains Godefroy the Grafted. Requires a Stonesword Key

title: Godefroy the Grafted
notes: In the Golden Lineage Evergaol. Drops the Godfrey Icon

title: Godfrey Icon
notes: Dropped by Godefroy the Grafted in the Golden Lineage Evergaol

title: Grand Lift of Dectus
notes: Head West from the Golden Lineage Evergaol, up the rocky area until you reach the top. Will be to your right and guarded by two golems

title: Rya
notes: If you had used the Grand Lift of Dectus to reach the Altus Plateau prior to arriving via the Ruin-Strewn Precipice, then Rya will be here and you can exhaust her dialogue. Otherwise, she will be at the Lux Ruins instead and you can exhaust her dialogue there. NOTE: Do not accept her invitation to go to the Volcano Manor

title: Lux Ruins
notes: Head North from the Altus Plateau SoG. This will be the upper section above the Erdtree-Gazing Hill SoG. NOTE: In this ruins, you may find Rya. Do not accept her invitation to go to Volcano Manor

title: Ash of War: Shield Crash
notes: Found by killing scarab in Lux Ruins on the higher level. You'll need to sneak up on it to kill it before it disappears

title: Demi-Human Queen Gilika
notes: Found underneat Lux Ruins. Drops Ritual Sword Talisman

title: Ritual Sword Talisman
notes: Found in the room with the chest after defeating the Demi-Human Queen Gilika

title: Troll's Golden Sword
notes: In the back of a wagon South of the Erdtree-Gazing Hill SoG

title: Greatshield Talisman
notes: In the back of a wagon South of the Erdtree-Gazing Hill SoG

title: Altus Highway Junction
notes: East from the Erdtree-Gazing Hill just off the road

title: Ash of War: Earthshaker
notes: Invisible scarab on the road near Altus Highway Junction SoG. Look for dust kicking up from the ground

title: Night's Cavalry
notes: Southwest from the Altus Highway Junction SoG at night

title: Ash of War: Shared Order
notes: Dropped by the Night's Cavalry boss Northeast from the Grand Lift of Dectus

title: Stonesword Key
notes: Head Southwest from the Altus Highway Junction near where you fought the Night's Calvary, look to the left to find encampment. Sitting on a corpse

title: Boc
notes: Rest at the Altus Highway Junction SoG and Boc will appear. Give him the Gold Sewing Needle. Select the "May I ask you a favor" dialogue option. and allow him to call you lord to get the My Lord Gesture. You will have needed to buy a piece of demigod boss armor from Enia at the Roundtable in order to have this option, and you'll need to wear the full set in front of him. NOTE: If you did the Dung Eater Puppet steps prior to this, you may need to go to the East Capital Rampart location again to speak to him there. DO NOT USE ANY OTHER DIALOGUE OPTIONS IF YOU NEEDED TO GO TO EAST CAPITAL RAMPARTS TO CONTINUE HIS QUEST

title: My Lord
notes: Received by speaking to Boc at the Altus Junction Highway SoG and allowing him to call you lord

title: Sacrificial Twig
notes: West from the Golden Seed, past the Omen camp to another camp with knights. In a chest

title: Corhyn
notes: North from the Golden Seed along the road. Ask about the Noble Goldmask

title: Great Heal
notes: Sold by Corhyn at the Altus Plateau

title: Lightning Fortification
notes: Sold by Corhyn at the Altus Plateau

title: Forest-Spanning Greatbridge
notes: Follow the road from Corhyn to the North until the very end to find this SoG

title: Nomadic Merchant
notes: Found near Forest-Spanning Greatbridge. Kill for Nomadic Merchant's Bell Bearing 7

title: Nomadic Merchant's Bell Bearing 7
notes: Found by killing the Nomadic Merchant near the Forest-Spanning Greatbridge SoG

title: Ancient Dragon Apostle's Cookbook 2
notes: Sold by merchant near Forest-Spanning Greatbridge

title: Red Crest Heater Shield
notes: Sold by merchant near Forest-Spanning Greatbridge

title: Scorpion Kite Shield
notes: Sold by merchant near Forest-Spanning Greatbridge

title: Crossed-Tree Towershield
notes: Sold by merchant near Forest-Spanning Greatbridge

title: Tree Surcoat
notes: Sold by merchant near Forest-Spanning Greatbridge. Not part of an armor set

title: Finger Reader Crone
notes: Found near the Forest-Spanning Greatbridge SoG. Speak to it for lore

title: Second Church of Marika
notes: Northwest from where you found Corhyn or North/Northwest from the Altus Highway Junction SoG. Contains a Sacred Tear

title: Sacred Tear
notes: Found in the Second Church of Marika

title: Yura
notes: Found in the Second Church of Marika. Talk to him to receive the Nagakiba

title: Ash of War: Piercing Fang
notes: Can be acquired by obtaining the Nagakiba from Yura during his questline

title: Nagakiba
notes: Received from Yura in the Second Church of Marika as part of his quest

title: Eleonora, Violet Bloody Finger
notes: Invades at the Second Church of Marika if you've been following the Yura questline. Drops the Purifying Crystal Tear and Eleonora's Poleblade

title: Purifying Crystal Tear
notes: Dropped by Eleonora, Violet Bloody Finger in the Second Church of Marika

title: Eleonora's Poleblade
notes: Dropped by Eleonora, Violet Bloody Finger in the Second Church of Marika

title: Mirage Rise
notes: Northeast from the Second Church of Marika. Carefully descend down the cliffs. Find three phantom crests to make it reappear. Interact with statue to get map. The first is right next to the statue. The second is Southwest of the Mirage Rise. One is disguised as a rock near the broken bridge, you'll want to head to the South side of it and find the cliff up, you'll be attacked by a phantom imp and you'll know you are close

title: Bower of Bounty
notes: East from the Mirage Rise location. You can grab this on your way to the third phantom crest

title: Unseen Form
notes: Found at the top of Mirage Rise in Altus Plateau

title: Unseen Blade
notes: Found at the top of Mirage Rise in Altus Plateau

title: Minor Erdtree
notes: East from Bower of Bounty SoG

title: Wormface
notes: Near Minor Erdtree, East from Bower of Bounty SoG. Drops Speckled Hardtear and Crimsonspill Crystal Tear

title: Speckled Hardtear
notes: Dropped by Wormface boss

title: Crimsonspill Crystal Tear
notes: Dropped by Wormface boss

title: Woodfolk Ruins
notes: East from Minor Erdtree in Altus Plateau. NOTE: These ruins have several buildings leading from Northeast of the minor erdtree to the South of the minor erdtree

title: Icon Shield
notes: Located in the North section of the Woodfolk Ruins, Northeast of the Minor Erdtree

title: Nomadic Warrior's Cookbook 19
notes: Just East of the Minor Erdtree in the Woodfolk Ruins

title: Ash of War: Golden Slam
notes: Just East of the Minor Erdtree in the Woodfolk Ruins, kill scarab

title: Wrath of Gold
notes: South section of the Woodfolk Ruins. Underground in a chest

title: Altus Tunnel
notes: South of the Woodfolk Ruins. Contains Smithing Stone 5, Somber Smithing Stone 5

title: Arsenal Charm +1
notes: Continue through until purple colored tunnel, take tunnel to the left. You'll see a large hanging bug enemy. Will be above you, take the tree branch up

title: Duo Crystallians
notes: Drops the Somberstone Miner's Bell Bearing 2

title: Somberstone Miner's Bell Bearing 2
notes: Dropped by Duo Crystallians. Allows for purchase of level 3 and level 4 Somber Smithing Stones

title: Road of Iniquity Side Path
notes: North from Minor Erdtree, up spirit spring and under the bridge

title: Goldmask
notes: On top of the bridge near Road of Iniquity Side Path SoG. Exhaust dialogue with him

title: Protection of the Erdtree
notes: East of Goldmask on top of a stone ruin. Kill the scarab

title: Radiant Gold Mask
notes: South from the Protection of the Erdtree incantation, accessed from the elevated platform to the Southwest. You can get there easily by using the spiritspring from before. Carefully drop to the next level of the broken bridge. Part of the Goldmask Set

title: Discus of Light
notes: Sold by Corhyn after speaking to him about Goldmask and after he moves

title: West Windmill Pasture
notes: Northwest from the Road of Iniquity Side Path

title: Giant Rat Ashes
notes: Found in the West Windmill Pasture location

title: Battlemage Set
notes: Dropped by Battlemage enemy East of the windmill, on a cliff

title: East Windmill Pasture
notes: Northeast from the West Windmill Pasture location

title: Twinned Knight Swords
notes: Found in East Windmill Pasture location

title: Noble's Set
notes: Found in East Windmill Pasture location. The Navy Hood is found with this set but the Crimson Hood found earlier is also a part of this set

title: Village Windmill Pasture
notes: Southeast from East Windmill Pasture. Nothing of note here

title: Dominula, Windmill Village
notes: Southeast from the Village Windmill Pasture

title: Windmill Village
notes: Southeast from the Village Windmill Pasture

title: Ghost
notes: Found near the Windmill Village SoG. Speak to it for lore

title: Celebrant's Skull
notes: On a corpse near the edge of a cliff Northeast from the Villages' SoG

title: Godskin Apostle
notes: Drops Godskin Peeler and Scouring Black Flame incantation

title: Godskin Peeler
notes: Dropped by Godskin Apostle

title: Scouring Black Flame
notes: Dropped by Godskin Apostle

title: Windmill Heights
notes: Appears after defeating the Godskin Apostle

title: Ash of War: Lightning Slash
notes: From the Golden Seed Southeast of the Windmill Village SoG, follow rockface and go left toward the camp. Kill the scarab

title: Highway Lookout Tower
notes: Northwest from the camp with the scarab, and Northeast from the Golden Seed

title: Greatbow
notes: Found in the Highway Lookout Tower

title: Rampartside Path
notes: Follow the path South from Windmill Village (NOT THE ROAD). If you are looking at your map, you'll see a path heading south in a curved shape. It will be past the ruins to the right of the path

title: Larval Tear
notes: From the Rampartside Path SoG, head North to find unnamed ruins with Lion Guardian disguised as a Wandering Noble cowering in a corner. Drops Larval Tear when defeated

title: Ancient Dragon Lansseax
notes: On a small cliff overlooking a SoG. Drops Lansseax's Glaive Incantation

title: Lansseax's Glaive
notes: Dropped by Ancient Dragon Lansseax

title: Harp Bow
notes: North from Ancient Dragon Lansseax. Ghost will drop if you've found the Champion's Song Painting in the Shaded Castle

title: Sainted Hero's Grave
notes: West on this elevated area with Ancient Dragon Lansseax. NOTE: The black shadow enemies need to be lured to light first, then you can damage them. Grave Glovewort 3, 4, 5, Ghost Glovewort 4, 5

title: Black Knife Assassin
notes: Found outside of the Sainted Hero's Grave. Drops Black Knife

title: Black Knife
notes: Dropped by Black Knife Assassin outside of the Sainted Hero's Grave

title: Crimson Seed Talisman
notes: Behind a mist gate needing a Stonesword Key

title: Leyndell Soldier Ashes
notes: In the room with the floor that collapses

title: Dragoncrest Shield Talisman +1
notes: Climb the first guillotine to access room. Behind another mist gate requiring a Stonesword key

title: Shade Duelist Enemy
notes: Look for the Shaded Duelist enemy and lure him to the light so that you can attack him. This will unlock this boss door

title: Prattling Pate (Let's Get To It)
notes: In the same room with the Shade Duelist Enemy

title: Ancient Hero of Zamor
notes: Drops Ancient Dragon Knight Kristoff Ashes

title: Ancient Dragon Knight Kristoff
notes: Dropped by Ancient Hero of Zamor boss in the Sainted Hero's Grave

title: Ash of War: Lightning Ram
notes: Southeast from the Sainted Hero's Grave. Kill the scarab

title: Stormcaller Church
notes: South from the Sainted Hero's Grave. Contains a Sacred Tear and Dragonbolt Blessing

title: Dragonbolt Blessing
notes: Found in the Stormcaller Church in Altus Plateau. Found in a chest

title: Great Stars
notes: Warp back to Road of Iniquity Side Path SoG. Take road heading West. Back of a convoy in a chest

title: Writheblood Ruins
notes: South from the Road of Iniquity Side Path SoG and past the Convoy

title: Magnus the Beast Claw
notes: If you are completing the Varre questline offline, you can use the invasion sign found at the Writheblood Ruins to complete the invasion portion of Varre's questline. Once defeated, return to the steps needed earlier in the walkthrough

title: Sanguine Noble
notes: Found in the Writheblood Ruins. Drops Bloody Helice

title: Bloody Helice
notes: Dropped by Sanguine Noble at the Writheblood Ruins

title: Mt. Gelmir
notes: Accessed by the bridge to the West. NOTE: You can grab things along the way leading to the map, and fight the falling star beast boss without consequence. These are things I will cover later in the guide and chose to get the map early. Contains Grave Glovewort 4, 6, 7, Ghost Glovewort 5, Smithing Stone 4-7, Somber Smithing Stone 2, 4-6

title: Bridge of Iniquity
notes: From Writheblood Ruins, cross the bridge to the West

title: First Mt. Gelmir Campsite
notes: From the Bridge of Iniquity SoG, take the road Northeast past the enemy camp with the iron maidens, climb the ladder on the cliff face to your left. SoG will be to the left when you reach the top

title: Ninth Mt. Gelmir Campsite
notes: From the First Mt. Gelmir Campsite SoG, follow path West, taking ladders up until you can cross a rope bridge

title: Map: Mt. Gelmir
notes: From the Ninth Mt. Gelmir Campsite SoG, use the spiritspring to jump up and to the right of the falling star beast, taking the stone "pillars" across to the West. Follow the path leading down to the right of Volcano Manor to find this on a pillar near another SoG

title: Road of Iniquity
notes: Found just past the Map: Mt. Gelmir location

title: Larval Tear
notes: From the Road of Iniquity SoG, head East to find a Wormface disguised as a Flaming Putrid Corpse. Drops Larval Tear when defeated

title: Seethewater
notes: Warp to Wyndham Catacombs SoG in Altus Plateau. Behind the Wyndham Ruins you'll find this grace

title: Ash of War: Barrage
notes: Follow river North from Seethewater SoG and find a scarab

title: Golden Seed
notes: Further North from Ash of War: Barrage

title: Seethewater Cave
notes: North from the Golden Seed found in the river. Requires 2 Stonesword Keys

title: Mushroom Set
notes: In area with huge poisonous flower. The Mushroom Crown is found earlier in this guide and is also part of this set

title: Kindreds of Rot
notes: Drops Kindred of Rot's Exultation Talisman

title: Kindred of Rot's Exultation
notes: Dropped by Kindreds of Rot Boss

title: Seethewater Terminus
notes: Continue along the path North/Northwest from the Seethewater Cave

title: Fort Laiedd
notes: West part of Mt. Gelmir, West of the Seethewater Terminus SoG

title: Prelate
notes: Drops Prelate's Inferno Crozier

title: Prelate's Inferno Crozier
notes: Dropped by Prelate enemy in Fort Laiedd

title: Armorer's Cookbook 7
notes: Inside building after Prelate enemy

title: Fire Scorpion Charm
notes: Top of building, near the ghost

title: Ghost
notes: Find Ghost near the Fire Scorpion Charm at the top of Fort Laiedd. Speak to it for lore

title: Stonesword Key
notes: Northeast from Fort Laiedd, surrounded by Jellyfish Spirits

title: Magma Wyrm
notes: South of Fort Laiedd. Drops Dragon Heart and unlocks Magma Breath at the Cathedral of Dragon Communion

title: Dragon Heart
notes: Dropped by Magma Wyrm in Mt. Gelmir

title: Iron Fist Alexander
notes: South from the Magma Wyrm boss, exhaust dialogue. He'll give you the Jar

title: Jar
notes: Received from Iron Fist Alexander for completing his questline up to this point. Part of the Let Me Solo Her set

title: Hermit's Shack
notes: Follow the path South of Fort Laiedd. Contains Roiling Magma sorcery

title: Roiling Magma
notes: Found in the Hermit's Shack

title: Craftsman's Shack
notes: East from the Hermit's Shack. Contains the Pulley Crossbow

title: Pulley Crossbow
notes: Found near the Craftman's Shack

title: Hermit Village
notes: Northeast from the Craftsman's Shack

title: Errant Sorcerer Set
notes: Found in a shack in the Hermit Village. The Heirodas Glintstone Crown is part of this set

title: Hierodas Glintstone Crown
notes: Found in the South of the village. Part of the Errant Sorcerer Set

title: Prattling Pate (You're Beautiful)
notes: Found near the Hierodas Glintstone Crown. Needed for Boc questline

title: Starlight Shard
notes: Found in the Northeast section in a large stone shrine

title: Demi-Human Queen Maggie
notes: End of Hermit Village. Drops a Memory Stone

title: Memory Stone
notes: Dropped by Demi-Human Queen Maggie

title: Primeval Sorcerer Azur (SoG)
notes: Just past the Demi-Human Queen Maggie boss

title: Primeval Sorcerer Azur
notes: Just past the Demi-Human Queen Maggie boss. Interact with him to get the Comet Azur sorcery. This is needed for Sellen's questline

title: Comet Azur
notes: Received from Primeval Sorcerer Azur. Needed for Sellen's questline

title: Sellian Sealbreaker
notes: Received from Sellen after showing her the Comet Azur sorcery and exhausting her dialogue

title: Master Lusat
notes: Warp back to the Sellia Hideaway SoG in Caelid/Dragonbarrow. Found at bottom of hole near Stake of Marika, before boss room. Use the Sellian Sealbreaker to break the seal in this location and speak to Master Lusat. He will give you the Stars of Ruin sorcery

title: Stars of Ruin
notes: Received from Master Lusat in the Sellia Hideaway after obtaining the Sellian Sealbreaker from Sellen and breaking the seal

title: Sorceress Sellen
notes: Warp back to the Witchbane Ruins in the Weeping Peninsula. She will give you Sellen's Primal Glintstone

title: Sellen's Primal Glintstone
notes: Given by Sellen during her quest. Witchbane Ruins in the Weeping Peninsula

title: Witch-Hunter Jerren
notes: Reload this area and find Jerren. Exhaust his dialogue

title: Sorceress Sellen
notes: Go to Seluvis' Puppet Room near Ranni's Rise. In a hidden room near Seluvis message. Give Sellen the Sellen's Primal Glintstone. NOTE: This would be a good time to return to Seluvis with your newly acquired Starlight Shards to purchase the remaining puppet(s)

title: Sorceress Sellen
notes: Go to the Raya Lucaria Grand Library SoG and exit the building. You will see two summon signs, one for invading Sellen and one for summoning Sellen to invade Jerren. You miss out on an Ancient Dragon Smithing Stone for going against Jerren, but you get more for helping Sellen

title: Eccentric Set
notes: Received for helping Sellen defeat Jerren

title: Ancient Dragon Smithing Stone
notes: Received if you choose to help Jerren defeat Sellen. NOTE: If you choose to help Jerren, you will receive an Ancient Dragon Smithing Stone but will miss out on better rewards that you'll have to get on another playthrough

title: Glintstone Kris
notes: Received from Sorceress Sellen for helping her defeat Jerren

title: Shard Spiral
notes: Available for purchase from Sellen when you help her defeat Jerren

title: Azur's Set
notes: Received from Azur after advancing Sellen's questline, defeating Jerren, and buying her last sorcery at the Raya Lucaria Grand Library SoG. Found at the Primeval Sorcerer Azur SoG. The Old Sorcerer's Legwraps are also part of this set, and found near Lusat

title: Starlight Shard
notes: Received from Sellen after advancing her questline. Speak to her at Raya Lucaria Grand Library SoG and discuss Lusat's body retrieval

title: Lusat's Set
notes: Received from Master Lusat after advancing Sellen's questline, defeating Jerren, and buying her last sorcery at the Raya Lucaria Grand Library SoG.  Return to where you found him before at the Sellia Hideaway SoG

title: Witch's Glintstone Crown
notes: Found at the end of Sellen's quest, nearby in the Raya Lucaria Grand Library

title: Gelmir Hero's Grave
notes: Northeast from Primeval Sorcerer Azur SoG, across the canyon. This contains chariots that cannot be destroyed. Contains Grave Glovewort 6, 7, Ghost Glovewort 7

title: Ringed Finger
notes: Down the slope, very end past the magma instead of alcove, in a chest

title: Stonesword Key
notes: Drop down near the Grave Glovewort flower and wait for the second chariot. You can ride this to the top of the path by jumping on it

title: Cemetary Shade
notes: Found at bottom of the path from second chariot, past bridge in alcove. Drops the Mantis Blade

title: Mantis Blade
notes: Dropped by Cemetary Shade enemy

title: Bloodhound Knight
notes: Carefully fall down the side of the bridge you passed. Drops Bloodhound Knight Set

title: Bloodhound Knight Set
notes: Dropped by Bloodhound Knight enemy

title: Gelmir Knight Set
notes: Guarded by Bloodhound Knight enemy

title: Red Wolf of the Champion
notes: Climb ladder and jump through window onto beams. Jump on chariot and ride it to bottom of path. Drops Bloodhound Knight Floh Ashes

title: Bloodhound Knight Floh
notes: Dropped by Red Wolf of the Champion

title: Deathroot
notes: Found in chest in the Red Wolf of the Champion boss room. Sixth one found

title: Stone of Gurranq
notes: Received from Beast Clergyman after giving him a 6th Deathroot

title: Corpse-Stench Shack
notes: Return to Bridge of Iniquity SoG. Follow the road heading North to the end. Outside you will be invaded by Anastasia, Tarnished-Eater

title: Anastasia, Tarnished-Eater
notes: Invades at the Corpse-Stench Shack. Drops Sacred Butchering Knife (Listed as "Butchering Knife" in the next step)

title: Butchering Knife
notes: Dropped by Anastasia, Tarnished-Eater. This weapon comes pre-infused with the Sacred enhancement

title: Golden Vow
notes: Go inside the Corpse-Stench Shack to find this

title: Pulley Bow
notes: Northwest from First Mt. Gelmir Campsite SoG, at top of siege tower

title: Patches
notes: Northwest on the road to the left, before crossing the bridge, you'll see a message by Patches. Follow the stones until a cutscene triggers. He'll push you off the ledge

title: Scavenger's Curved Sword
notes: From the First Mt Gelmir Campsite SoG, follow rock bridge across from tower. Found near grafted scion at the base of ladder

title: Nomadic Merchant
notes: Found up one of the ladders from the Grafted Scion. Kill for Nomadic Merchant's Bell Bearing 8

title: Nomadic Merchant's Bell Bearing 8
notes: Dropped by Nomadic Merchant at Mt. Gelmir

title: Nomadic Warrior's Cookbook 20
notes: Up the mountain, sold by merchant

title: Guilty Hood
notes: Up the mountain, sold by merchant. This is part of the Guilty Set

title: Confessor Set
notes: Up the mountain, sold by merchant

title: Volcano Cave
notes: From the Nomadic Merchant and grafted scion enemy, head up the ladder and then North until you find the cave near some demi-human enemies

title: Coil Shield
notes: In a small cave toward the bottom with two larger demi-human enemies

title: Demi-Human Queen Margot
notes: Drops Jar Cannon

title: Jar Cannon
notes: Dropped by Demi-Human Queen Margot

title: Full-Grown Fallingstar Beast
notes: Return to the Ninth Gelmir Campsite SoG and take spiritspring up. Drops the Fallingstar Beast Jaw

title: Fallingstar Beast Jaw
notes: Dropped by Full-Grown Fallingstar Beast

title: Starlight Shard
notes: Found in stone shrine where the Fallingstar Beast boss is

title: Ash of War: Through and Through
notes: South of the Golden Seed near Volcano Manor

title: Minor Erdtree
notes: Path East from Road of Iniquity

title: Ulcerated Tree Spirit
notes: Near the Minor Erdtree in Mt. Gelmir. Drops the Leaden Hardtear and the Cerulean Hidden Tear

title: Leaden Hardtear
notes: Dropped by Ulcerated Tree Spirit in Mt. Gelmir

title: Cerulean Hidden Tear
notes: Dropped by Ulcerated Tree Spirit in Mt. Gelmir

title: Volcano Manor
notes: Return to the Road of Iniquity SoG to start this section. Contains Smithing Stone 4, 6, 7, Somber Smithing Stone 5-7

title: Volcano Manor (SoG)
notes: Found up the hill from the Road of Iniquity SoG

title: Inquisitor Ghiza
notes: Head upstairs in the manor to be invaded. Drops Ghiza's Wheel

title: Ghiza's Wheel
notes: Dropped by Inquisitor Ghiza invader on the second floor of the Volcano Manor

title: Tanith
notes: Speak to Tanish and accept becoming part of the manor. You'll receive the Drawing-Room Key

title: Drawing-Room Key
notes: Used to enter various rooms in Volcano Manor

title: Perfume Bottle
notes: Found in a room on a corpse using the Drawing-Room Key

title: Patches
notes: Exhaust Dialogue. You may need to rest at the SoG, and he'll be in the hallway before the SoG

title: Bernahl
notes: Exhaust Dialogue

title: Diallos
notes: Exhaust Dialogue

title: Rya
notes: Exhaust Dialogue

title: Recusant Finger
notes: In the big room with the NPCs

title: Letter from Volcano Manor #1
notes: Found in the room with the NPCs. Will mark on the map

title: Old Knight Istvan
notes: Head to Warmaster's Shack SoG in West Limgrave and head North toward the marker on the map and defeat this invader. Drops Scaled Set

title: Scaled Set
notes: Received by defeating Old Knight Istvan in West Limgrave during Volcano Manor questline

title: Magma Shot
notes: Received from Tanith for completing first letter

title: Ash of War: Eruption
notes: Purchase from Bernahl after advancing Volcano Manor questline

title: Ash of War: Assassin's Gambit
notes: Purchase from Bernahl after advancing Volcano Manor questline

title: Ghost
notes: Only seen at night. Change to night, wait a few minutes, then rest at SoG and exhaust dialogue. You'll return to this spot later to receive an item for defeating Rykard

title: Letter to Patches
notes: Received from Patches during Volcano Manor questline

title: Great Horned Tragoth
notes: After receiving Letter to Patches quest item, warp to the Magma Wyrm Makar SoG and defeat Great Horned Tragoth. Drops Bull-Goat Set

title: Bull-Goat Set
notes: Dropped by Great Horned Tragoth

title: Magma Whip Candlestick
notes: Received from Patches after defeating Great Horned Tragoth

title: Letter from Volcano Manor #2
notes: Return to the dining room and find another letter. Reading will reveal a mark on the map in the Altus Plateau

title: Rileigh the Idle
notes: Go to the marker on the map from after getting the second Volcano Manor letter. Easiest to ride from Shaded Castle Rampart SoG and head South. Defeat Rileigh the Idle who will drop the Crepus' Vial talisman

title: Crepus' Vial
notes: Dropped by Rileigh the Idle as part of the Volcano Manor questline

title: Serpentbone Blade
notes: Received from Tanith after completing the second assassination letter

title: Letter to Bernahl
notes: Received from Bernahl as part of the Volcano Manor questline. Marks a target found in Leyndell, Royal Capital, will do this later in the guide

title: Diallos
notes: Find Diallos here and exhaust his dialogue. Reload the game

title: Diallos' Mask
notes: Found after advancing Jar-Bairn and Diallos' questlines and after Diallos dies

title: Hoslow's Petal Whip
notes: Found after advancing Jar-Bairn and Diallos' questlines and after Diallos dies

title: Red Letter
notes: Return to the dining room and find another letter. Reveals a mark on the map in the Mountaintops of Giants

title: Hidden Wall
notes: Go to the room next to Rya's room and roll at the wall behind the corpse

title: Nomadic Warrior's Cookbook 21
notes: Path with falling snails

title: Depraved Perfumer Carmaan Ashes
notes: End of path with snails, attack the wall to reveal another room

title: Bloodhound Knight
notes: Back to first room after secret door, go down stairs. Drops the Bloodhound Claws

title: Bloodhound Claws
notes: Dropped by Bloodhound Knight enemy in the coridors

title: Prison Town Church
notes: Continue from Bloodhound Knight enemy

title: Crimson Amber Medallion +1
notes: Found through the streets, through a mist gate requiring a Stonesword Key

title: Erdtree Seal
notes: Found on the lower level past an Omenkiller enemy in a cell

title: Stonesword Key
notes: Same level as Erdtree Seal, in a small alley with dogs

title: Smoldering Shield
notes: Lower level near the lava, in a graveyard

title: Albinauric Mask
notes: Return to imp statue leading to the Crimson Amber Medallion +1 and progress to next building. Before left side, climb ladder to right. Fall to right side to enter room

title: Albinauric Staff
notes: Return to imp statue leading to the Crimson Amber Medallion +1 and progress to next building. Before left side, climb ladder to right. Fall to right side to enter room

title: Guest Hall
notes: From room with Omenkiller and Albinauric items, jump over railing and follow rooms

title: Magma Wyrm
notes: From Guest Hall, head outside the door, find ladder and climb down. Then head to the stairs and take the elevator on the right (going down)

title: Dragon Heart
notes: Dropped by Magma Wyrm in the Volcano Manor

title: Bridge Shortcut
notes: Take elevator up on the left from Guest Hall SoG and pull lever to create shortcut back to the Prison Town Church SoG

title: Godskin Noble
notes: Inside the church near the Prison Town Church SoG shortcut. Drops the Noble Presence Incantation and Godskin Stitcher

title: Noble Presence
notes: Dropped by Godskin Noble at the church inside Volcano Manor area

title: Godskin Stitcher
notes: Dropped by Godskin Noble at the church inside Volcano Manor area

title: Temple of Eiglay
notes: Found after defeating the Godskin Noble

title: Serpent's Amnion
notes: Found in the altar at Temple of Eiglay in Volcano Manor. Give this to Rya

title: Tonic of Forgetfulness
notes: Given by Tanith for giving Rya the Serpent's Amnion

title: Subterranean Inquisition Chamber
notes: From Temple of Eiglay SoG, back outside past enemy. Left side where corpse is hanging by edge. Drop to the ledge below and follow path to magma and bats. Follow path at the end

title: Abductor Virgins
notes: From the Subterranean Inquisition Chamber SoG, drop to lava with pillars and find cave. Floor will break from underneath you, then follow cave to boss. Drops Inquisitor's Girandole

title: Inquisitor's Girandole
notes: Dropped by Abductor Virgins in the Volcano Manor area

title: Abductor Virgin (SoG)
notes: Found after defeating the Abductor Virgins boss

title: Missionay's Cookbook 6
notes: From the Temple of Eiglay SoG, go to upper floor using lift and off balcony. Follow lava flow near Abductor Virgin, enter room to left and climb down ladder to left of doorway. At bottom, follow stairs down, in a cell

title: Crimson Tear Scarab
notes: Return up the stairs and up the ladder and go out the door, look left over the ledge and find corpse. Jump down to it

title: Shortcut to Temple of Eiglay
notes: Return to the iron maiden enemy and the first building, go through doorway and past snake enemy. Next building, stand on elevator to create shortcut to SoG.

title: Commoner's Headband
notes: Next balcony near snake statues overlooking magma

title: Man-Serpent Ashes
notes: Back in balcony and into next building after you open the door. On an altar

title: Dagger Talisman
notes: From the altar, go to top floor requiring 2 Stonesword keys. Jump to ledge right below entrance of dark room. Up stairs on a ledge

title: Seedbed Curse
notes: Fall to bottom of the dark room. WIll be past the weird bulb enemies on a chair

title: Ash of War: Royal Knight's Resolve
notes: Fall to bottom of the dark room. Will be in the next room in front of the fireplace

title: Shorcut to Entrance of Volcano Manor
notes: Path past the Ash of War in the dark room opens this shortcut

title: Waygate to Rykard boss fight
notes: From Temple of Eiglay, go up the shortcut from before, run back to where you found the bloated serpent in the room, and head out to find a waygate. Use this to get to Rykard

title: Audience Pathway
notes: Found after using waygate in Volcano Manor. This will be right before the Rykard boss fight, but do not fight him yet. We'll return here later

title: Sewer-Gaol Key
notes: Received from Dung Eater after speaking to him with a Seedbed Curse

title: Altus Plateau Part 3
notes: Warp back to Altus Highway Junction SoG to start this section. Altus Plateau contains Smithing Stone 4, 5, Somber Smithing Stone 5, 6, Ghost Glovewort 4

title: Outer Wall Phantom Tree
notes: From the Altus Highway Junction SoG, head East up the stairs. Follow path past the Tree Sentinels and through the door. Note: If you did the Dung Eater Puppet run section, you can simply warp back to this SoG

title: Map: Leyndell, Royal Capital
notes: On pillar near Outer Wall Phantom Tree SoG

title: Perfumer's Grotto
notes: Return to Altus Highway Junction SoG. Follow allong the stairs East, to the left side of the stairs, not on them

title: Perfume Bottle
notes: Found in a chest near the second large flower enemy

title: Omenkiller & Miranda the Blighted Bloom
notes: Found in Perfumer's Grotto. Drops the Great Omenkiller Cleaver

title: Great Omenkiller Cleaver
notes: Dropped by Omenkiller & Miranda the Blighted Bloom boss

title: Fallingstar Beast
notes: East from the Altus Highway Junction SoG, South of the stairs. Does not drop anything aside from smithing stones

title: Tree Sentinels
notes: From the Altus Highway Junction, head back up the stairs to fight the two Tree Sentinels. Drops the Erdtree Greatshield

title: Edrtree Greatshield
notes: Dropped by Tree Sentinels boss in Leyndell, Royal Capital

title: Ulcerated Tree Spirit
notes: South from the Outer Wall Phantom Tree SoG. Drops Golden Seed

title: Giant-Crusher
notes: Found in chest near Ulcerated Tree Spirit

title: Ash of War: Prayerful Strike
notes: East of the Outer Wall Phantom Tree SoG. Invisible Scarab to kill down in the lake with the poison bloat enemies

title: Sealed Tunnel
notes: Low level of the lake, Southeast of the Outer Wall Phantom Tree SoG. Contains Smithing Stone 5, 6, Somber Smithing Stone 5

title: Smithing-Stone Miner's Bell Bearing 2
notes: Found in the Sealed Tunnel in Leyndell, Royal Capital in a chest. This allows you to buy level 3 & 4 upgrade materials for normal armaments from the Twin Maiden Husks

title: Secret Area
notes: Behind the chest with the Smithing-Stone Miner's Bell Bearing 2, illusory wall. This lets you proceed through the area

title: Stonesword Key
notes: In the area with the Iron Maiden enemy

title: Onyx Lord
notes: Drops Onyx Lord's Greatsword

title: Onyx Lord's Greatsword
notes: Dropped by Onyx Lord

title: Divine Tower of West Altus: Gate
notes: Past the boss arena for the Sealed Tunnel. Come back here later after you've defeated Rykard

title: Divine Tower of West Altus
notes: At the end of the Sealed Tunnel location. Cannot be unlocked until you defeat Rykard

title: Minor Erdtree Church
notes: Return to the Outer Wall Phantom Tree SoG and head Southeast

title: Missionary's Cookbook 4
notes: Found in the Minor Erdtree Church

title: Golden Order Seal
notes: Found in the Minor Erdtree Church

title: Valiant Gargoyle
notes: Northeast from the Outer Wall Phantom Tree SoG. Drops the Gargoyle's Great Axe

title: Gargoyle's Great Axe
notes: Dropped by Valient Gargoyle near Minor Erdtree Church SoG

title: Ash of War: Golden Parry
notes: On the stairs heading East, kill the scarab

title: Margit
notes: North from the Golden Seeds and Valiant Gargoyle. Appears as a normal enemy. Drops Viridian AMber Medallion +1

title: Viridian Amber Medallion +1
notes: Dropped by Margit (Norma Enemy)

title: Outer Wall Battleground
notes: Near Margit Fight

title: Hermit's Shack
notes: Northeast of Outer Wall Battleground SoG. Go up the stairs, then double back to the left through the graveyard

title: Hermit Merchant
notes: Near Hermit's Shack in Altus. Kill for Hermit Merchant's Bell Bearing 1

title: Hermit Merchant's Bell Bearing 1
notes: Dropped by Hermit Merchant in Altus

title: Sentry's Torch
notes: Sold by merchant at Hermit's Shack in Leyndell, Royal Capital

title: Distinguished Greatshield
notes: Sold by merchant at Hermit's Shack in Leyndell, Royal Capital

title: Prophet Set
notes: Sold by merchant at Hermit's Shack in Leyndell, Royal Capital. Does not have gloves

title: Upper-Class Robe
notes: Sold by merchant at Hermit's Shack in Leyndell, Royal Capital. Not part of a set

title: Consort's Trousers
notes: Sold by merchant at Hermit's Shack in Leyndell, Royal Capital. This is part of the Consort's Set

title: Bell-Bearing Hunter
notes: Found at night near the Hermit's Shack. Drops the Medicine Peddler's Bell Bearing

title: Medicine Peddler's Bell Bearing
notes: Dropped by Bell-Bearing Hunter in Hermit's Shack

title: Deathbird
notes: East from the Hermit's Shack. Drops Twinbird Kite Shield

title: Twinbird Kite Shield
notes: Dropped by Deathbird in Leyndell, Royal Capital

title: Winged Crystal Tear
notes: Northeast from Deathbird boss, surrounded by skull enemies

title: Twiggy Cracked Tear
notes: Near Minor Erdtree in Leyndell, Royal Capital

title: Crimson Crystal Tear
notes: Near Minor Erdtree in Leyndell, Royal Capital

title: Blackguard Big Boggart
notes: South from the Minor Erdtree by the lake. Exhaust dialogue. NOTE: This will need to be done again on another playthrough if you went for Dung Eater Puppet

title: Auriza Side Tomb
notes: Northeast end of the path East from Boggart. Below Leyndell's East gate. Traverse this dungeon via trick chests. You'll need to find invisible wall in one of the rooms. Contains Grave Glovewort 6, Ghost Glovewort 6

title: Cracked Pot
notes: Four of these can be found traversing the dungeon

title: Ritual Pot
notes: Two of these can be found traversing the dungeon

title: Perfumer's Cookbook 3
notes: Jump out window to left. Go down stairs and through doorway to left. Enter room with chest and use it. Found in the water with giant pots

title: Grave Warden Duelist
notes: From the Perfumer's Cookbook, go back through chest to other room. Look for illusory wall to the right and go through next chest. Go past the imps, and up the stairs to ledge, drop down. Continue through to the cathedral looking area again. Use chest, then go through water area to ladder. Climb ladder and continue to lever. Drops Soldier's of Fortune ashes

title: Soldjars of Fortune Ashes
notes: Dropped by Grave Warden Duelist boss

title: Auriza's Hero's Grave
notes: South of the Auriza Side Tomb. Contains Grave Glovewort 5, 6, Ghost Glovewort 5, 6

title: Golden Epitaph
notes: In room near SoG, need Stonesword Key to access. Note: Has deathblight geckos in room

title: Stonesword Key
notes: Head down path with chariots, reach path with two lanes. In a small alcove

title: Vulgar Militia Ashes
notes: Bottom of area, stopping between pillars, carefully jump down beams. You can do this by dropping down right where the corpse is near the third chariot. Room with Death Toads

title: Destroying the Chariots
notes: Return to wooden beams, fall to cement ones. End of path reach another chariot. Climb to top of path and hit fire-breathing pillar. Go to dungeon's entrance by dying. Descend from two chariots and a third will appear. This will make them crash and get destroyed. Drops Ash of war: Holy Ground and Tree Sentinal Set

title: Tree Sentinel Set
notes: Dropped after chariots are destroyed

title: Ash of War: Holy Ground
notes: Dropped after chariots are destroyed

title: Crucible Feather Talisman
notes: Return to hallway with fire-breathing pillar, go to very bottom. Near misbegotten enemy

title: Crucible Knight & Crucible Knight Ordovis
notes: End of dungeon. Drops Ordovis' Greatsword and Crucible Axe Set

title: Ordovis' Greatsword
notes: Dropped by Crucible Knight and Crucible Knight Ordovis

title: Crucible Axe Set
notes: Dropped by Crucible Knight and Crucible Knight Ordovis

title: Draconic Tree Sentinel
notes: Northeast of Boggart, at Leyndell's East Gate. Drops Dragon Greatclaw and Dragonclaw Shield. NOTE: You will have already killed him if you ran through the area to get the Dung Eater Puppet

title: Dragon Greatclaw
notes: Dropped by Draconic Tree Sentinel near Leyndell's East Gate

title: Dragonclaw Shield
notes: Dropped by Draconic Tree Sentinel near Leyndell's East Gate

title: Leyndell, Royal Capital Part 1
notes: If you had done the Dung Eater run section, return to the East Capital Rampart SoG. Leyndell, Royal Capital Contains Smithing Stone 4-6, Somber Smithing Stone 5

title: Capital Rampart
notes: First SoG within the city

title: East Capital Rampart
notes: Past the Capital Rampart SoG

title: Melina
notes: Rest at the East Capital Rampart SoG in order to exhaust Melina's dialogue. NOTE: May not be an option if you had done the Dung Eater run. You will speak to her again later

title: Boc
notes: Exhaust his dialogue, then use Prattline Pate (You're Beautiful) in front of him and then exhaust his dialogue again

title: Perfume Bottle
notes: Only path available, enter a building past fire-breathing statue, use lift to lower area. Next room, climb ladder. Found in the chest

title: Seedbed Curse
notes: Go to the next floor from the Perfume Bottles and find on a corpse. NOTE: You would have already gotten this if you were going for the Dung Eater Puppet, and will need to do this again in the next playthrough

title: Upper-Class Robe
notes: Exit to balcony from the room below the Seedbed Curse, reach end of balcony, near Page enemy

title: Erdtree Avatar
notes: Return to bottom, keep moving through buildings fighting enemies to capital main street. Drops Lord's Rune. NOTE: You can easily return to the Avenue Balcony SoG to reach this enemy if you had done the Dung Eater run

title: Imp Head (Corpse)
notes: On the main street, head East along the road and find an alley to the right of the large door that has a knight and other enemies

title: Stonesword Key
notes: Return to the East Capital Rampart SoG. Go back out the doorway and follow the path. Jump down to the right from where the fire breathing statue is, then again to the right onto the yellow rooftops below. Follow the rooftops West, then Northwest. You will see a section of rooftops you can jump across to the Northeast, do this twice. Then head North again and you'll find this on a corpse on the rooftop

title: East Capital Rampart Shortcut
notes: Opposite the alley from Imp Head, clearing with a fountain. Building to right has Crucible Knight, and after him has a shortcut to this SoG

title: Avenue Balcony
notes: Return to where you fought the Erdtree Avatar enemy. Found in a billing to the right off of the main street. NOTE: You can return here if you had done the Dung Eater run

title: Lion Guardian
notes: Area to the West. Has lots of high-grade runes in this area near this enemy

title: Ash of War: Thunderbolt
notes: From Avenue Balcony SoG, head downstairs and Northwest along path, then jump off to the left before the stairs leading to the left. Kill scarab

title: Black Bow
notes: Go to roofs from where you exited the elevator in the graveyard area, after jumping on a few roofs heading Southwest

title: Ulcerated Tree Spirit
notes: Head West of the graveyard area, in a clearing past a small bridge. Drops a Golden Seed

title: Golden Seed
notes: Dropped by Ulcerated Tree Spirit in Leyndell, Royal Capital, in the clearing

title: Lower Capital Church
notes: Building to South of the Ulcerated Tree Spirit, go through first building with knight, then move up small ladder outside and into another building

title: Cracked Pot
notes: North of the Lower Capital Church SoG, climb down the small ladders, take a right and go straight to find the pot on a corpse next to the door

title: Lionel's Set
notes: In building with Lower Capital Church SoG

title: Deathbed Dress
notes: In building with Lower Capital Church SoG. Does not belong to a set

title: Omenkiller
notes: Just outside the Lower Capital Church SoG. Drops the Omensmirk Mask

title: Omensmirk Mask
notes: Dropped by Omenkiller just outside the Lower Capital Church SoG. Part of the Omenkiller Set

title: Guilty Hood
notes: Down ladder to sewers, take North path to Northeast end past rats

title: Erdsteel Dagger
notes: Return to where you took the ladder to get to the sewer, and take the other path. Take a right and follow down to where the fire breathing statue is, then jump off small ledge

title: Subterranean Shunning-Grounds
notes: From Avenue Balcony SoG, head towards dragon statue, jump down left rail. Head toward dragon statue wing. Find well with ladder and take that down. NOTE: You will have already found this if you had done the Dung Eater Puppet run and can warp back to the Undergound Roadside SoG. Contains Somber Smithing Stone 6-8, Smithing Stone 5, 7, 8, Ghost Glovewort 6

title: Underground Roadside
notes: From getting out of the well, follow the only path until you climb down a ladder and go to room to left

title: Bloodsoaked Set
notes: Found in hall with Omenkiller enemies. Will only be gloves and a helmet. The Official's Attire is also part of this set, found later

title: Shadow Bait
notes: Take ladder down from the hall, navigate on top of pipes with imps. At the end of area, go up stairs to enter area with Omen enemy, found on corpse

title: Mohg's Shackle
notes: Return to area with pipes, instead of going up stairs, carefully fall down pipes below. On a corpse

title: Leyndell Catacombs
notes: We aren't doing this area yet, but touch the SoG, near the Crayfish enemies. Contains Ghost Glovewort 6, Grave Glovewort 8, 9

title: Spirit-Caller Snail
notes: Head up lift from Leyndell Catacombs SoG, in the other path. In area with Ghost Archers, Illusory wall hiiding Ghost Archer. Another illusory wall that hides snail. Kill that

title: Haligdrake Talisman +1
notes: Found near Spirit-Caller Snail

title: Dung Eater
notes: Warp back to Underground Roadside SoG. Go to end of hall with hole. Drop down hole. In sewer past rats, continue to end of path past poison flowers and up ladder. Release him by using the Sewer-Gaol Key you received earlier. NOTE: This will need to be done again on another playthrough if you went for Dung Eater Puppet

title: Shortcut to Underground Roadside SoG
notes: Back in sewer with rats, take right turn. Sewer full of slugs, jump over two holes until end of path. Go right through open iron gate. Follow tunnel to open area with ladder that leads to hallway. Use lever to create shortcut

title: Stonesword Key
notes: Return to tunnel with slugs, fall down first hole you saw, fight some enemies

title: Nomad Ashes
notes: Return to where you opened the shortcut gate, and go through the doorway to the spiral staircase. Carefully fall down to lower level. Follow path and descend stairs. Go down ladder past poisonous flower and death frogs

title: Omen Bairn
notes: Go back up the ladder from the giant poison flower, find tunnel and go past death frogs. Defeat Omen enemy

title: Directional Step
notes: From the new shortcut, climb nearest pipe and reach end and jump to left platform. Past doorway, jump onto next pipe then through hole into pipe

title: Ritual Pot
notes: Found in the room with the Warrior Jars near the elevator

title: Forsaken Depths
notes: Found after navigating pipes and taking elevator down

title: Mohg, the Omen
notes: Drops Bloodflame Talons incantation

title: Bloodflame Talons
notes: Dropped by Mohg, the Omen

title: Cathedral of the Forsaken
notes: Found after defeating Mohg, the Omen

title: Melina
notes: Rest at this new SoG and choose the speak with Melina option for additional lore

title: Erdtree's Favor +1
notes: Found in chest after Mohg, the Omen boss

title: Secret Path
notes: Attack altar behind the chest with the Erdtree's Favor +1. Reveals secret path. Accesible after defeating Leyndell's main boss

title: Crucible Scale Talisman
notes: Progress through, hit fire-breathing column, attack again to ride it up. Kill Omenkiller enemy that guards this

title: Directional Step
notes: Go back to fire breathing column and continue to next room up stairs and fall down ledge with grave. Trick dungeon. You have to reach top ledge past omen enemy once again and fall again to area with grave. Progress until you drop through a small window. Move back to the hallway with fire-breathing column. Ride column to room with talisman but it isn't. Follow extra path to reach the lever (DO NOT FALL)

title: Esgar, Priest of Blood
notes: Drops Lord of Blood's Exultation

title: Lord of Blood's Exultation
notes: Dropped by Esgar, Priest of Blood

title: Leyndell, Royal Capital Part 2
notes: Warp back to Avenue Balcony

title: West Capital Rampart
notes: From the Avenue Balcony SoG, head to the base of the dragon's wing and climb it to reach the higher levels. Past the first rooms

title: Cane Sword
notes: Descend the stairs from the West Capital Rampart SoG, in a corner

title: Lever near West Capital Rampart SoG
notes: Same level is a lever to create a connection back to the bottom area

title: Valiant Gargoyle
notes: From the SoG, move forward. Drops Gargoyle's Halberd

title: Gargoyle's Halberd
notes: Dropped by Valiant Gargoyle in Leyndell, Royal Capital

title: Fortified Manor
notes: Fall to the area to the right of the huge tree root. Climb on top of the stables and into a doorway

title: Sanctified Whetblade
notes: Go to blacksmith's area inside the Fortified Manor

title: Hammer
notes: Go to blacksmith's area inside the Fortified Manor

title: By My Sword
notes: Inside Fia's room in the Fortified Manor

title: Coded Sword
notes: In the Two Finger's room in the Fortified Manor

title: Two Fingers' Prayerbook
notes: Descend the stairs near the blacksmith's location. Grants access to Lord's Aid and Lord's Heal when given to Miriel

title: Alberich's Set
notes: Exit hallway and go to where Alberich invaded you

title: Flightless Bird Painting
notes: Another room by the hallway, find SoG near this painting

title: Fortified Manor, First Floor
notes: Found near painting in the Fortified Manor

title: Fire's Deadly Sin
notes: Warp to Windmill Heights SoG. Go South end of the elevated area past a house to find a ghost. He drops it after getting the Flightless Bird Painting

title: Lord's Heal
notes: Give the Two Fingers' Prayerbook to Miriel at the Church of Vows

title: Lord's Aid
notes: Give the Two Fingers' Prayerbook to Miriel at the Church of Vows

title: Miriel, Pastor of Vows
notes: By this time, you probably have a Celestial Dew found along your journey. Show it to Miriel to unlock optional dialogue

title: Vangram the Raging Wolf
notes: Go back to the Fortified Manor, First Floor SoG and exit to hallway to find the invasion sign for Bernahl's assassination quest. This will have two invaders and you will be accompanied by Bernahl

title: Errant Sorcerer Wilhelm
notes: Go back to the Fortified Manor's hallway to find the invasion sign for Bernahl's assassination quest. This will have two invaders and you will be accompanied by Bernahl

title: Raging Wolf Set
notes: Received from completing the assassination quest from Bernahl in the Fortified Manor

title: Gelmir's Fury
notes: Received from Bernahl after completing his assassination quest

title: Stormhawk Axe
notes: Back in the Fortified Manor, go to the hallway and open the door next to the one leading to the SOG. Guarded by two Iron Maiden enemies

title: Elevator to Isolated Divine Tower
notes: Find the elevator near the two Iron Maiden enemies in the courtyard. This activates the portal for the tower that activates Malenia's great rune later

title: Gravel Stone Seal
notes: Return to the Fortified Manor, First Floor SoG and exit through main doors from the hallway and kill the knight to the left who will drop this seal

title: Ritual Shield Talisman
notes: Return to the West Capital Rampart SoG and go back to the root you used to get to this area, and climb stairs and pathway near the duelist enemies

title: Goldmask
notes: Follow path from second duelist enemy along the coloseum. Exhaust dialgoue

title: Corhyn
notes: Follow path from second duelist enemy along the coloseum. Exhaust dialgoue

title: Star Fist
notes: Found in alcove behind Goldmask and Corhyn

title: Godfrey, the First Lord
notes: Climb the giant tree root to the top. Drops a Talisman Pouch

title: Talisman Pouch
notes: Dropped by Godfrey, the First Lord

title: Erdtree Sanctuary
notes: Found after defeating Godfrey, the First Lord

title: Barrier of Gold
notes: Use West exit from Erdtree Sanctuary SoG, take nearby elevator. Next path has invisible scarab

title: Bolt of Gransax
notes: Carefully fall onto the giant bolt statue from a ledge and climb to the top

title: Erdtree Bow
notes: From the Erdtree Sanctuary SoG, take tree branch from East balcony, jump to the roof on the left, go through small window, find in a chest

title: Shortcut
notes: Near the Erdtree Bow there is a ladder you can kick down to create a shortcut (not necessary but listed for completion sake)

title: Golden Order Principia
notes: Climb tree branch from Erdtree Bow chest. Grants access to Law of Regression and Radagon's Rings of Light. Give the book to Miriel at the Church of Vows

title: Law of Regression
notes: Sold by Miriel at the Church of Vows after giving him the Golden Order Principia

title: Radagon's Rings of Light
notes: Sold by Miriel at the Church of Vows after giving him the Golden Order Principia

title: Radagon's Statue
notes: With 37 points to intelligence by items or respecing, go past the giant bolt statue after the Erdtree Sanctuary SoG. Stand on top of the message and cast Law of Regression incantation, then read the new message

title: Golden Order Totality
notes: Received from using the Law of Regression incantation on the Radagon's statue and exhausting Goldmask and Corhyn's dialogue after

title: Immutable Shield
notes: Corhyn sells this incantation after changing Radagon's statue and receiving the Golden Order Totality gesture

title: Queen's Bedchamber
notes: From the Erdtree Sanctuary SoG, take branch from the East balcony again, then exit the doorway to the North. Continue to next SoG

title: Blessing of the Erdtree
notes: Found near the Queen's Bedchamber SoG

title: Morgott, The Omen King
notes: Found past the Queen's Bedchamber SoG. Drops Morgott's Great Rune and Remembrance of the Omen King

title: Morgott's Great Rune
notes: Dropped by Morgott, The Omen King

title: Remembrance of the Omen King
notes: Dropped by Morgott, The Omen King. Can be traded in to Enia at the Roundtable Hold for the Regal Omen Bairn or Morgott's Cursed Sword

title: Wall of Thorns
notes: After defeating Morgott, head up the stairs and touch the wall of thorns, then the next SoG will appear

title: Elden Throne
notes: Found after defeating Morgott

title: Rold Medallion
notes: Received from Melina after defeating Morgott, The Omen King and trying to enter the Giant Erdtree

title: Melina
notes: Return to the Minor Erdtree Church SoG and speak to Melina here to receive the Outer Order gesture

title: Outer Order
notes: Received from Melina after speaking to her at the Minor Erdtree Church SoG

title: Beyond Mohg
notes: Return to Cathedral of the Forsaken SoG. Go through hidden path behind the altar. Platform down

title: Nomadic Merchant's Set
notes: Accessed by jumping to wooden beam, and having an enemy break the tent like structure. Does not have gloves

title: Frenzied's Cookbook 2
notes: Found accessing another wooden beam

title: Inescapable Frenzy
notes: Found on a corpse. You need to drop down along the tombstones coming out of the wall carefully and land on the one with the corpse

title: Fingerprint Stone Shield
notes: Guarded by a sitting enemy. From the corpse with Inescapable Frenzy

title: Frenzied Flame Proscription
notes: At the bottom of the pit past Mohg, The Omen alter

title: Deeproot Depths
notes: To the right of Hyetta, reveal a secret path. Past the chest, another secret area. Follow the path, rest at this SoG

title: Blackguard Big Boggart
notes: Near Leyndell's East gate. Exhaust his dialogue. Reload the area to receive a Seedbed Curse, Blackguard's Iron Mask, Iron Ball, and Blackguard's Bell Bearing. NOTE: This will need to be done again on another playthrough if you went for Dung Eater Puppet. NOTE: This will need to be done again on another playthrough if you went for Dung Eater Puppet

title: Blackguard's Iron Mask
notes: Found on Boggart's corpse in Leyndell, Royal capital. NOTE: If you followed the early steps of getting the Dung Eater Puppet, you should already have this item

title: Iron Ball
notes: Found on Boggart's corpse in Leyndell, Royal capital. NOTE: If you followed the early steps of getting the Dung Eater Puppet, you should already have this item NOTE: Carries the Ash of War: Braggart's Roar

title: Ash of War: Braggart's Roar
notes: This can be obtained by obtaining the Iron Ball weapon following Blackguard Big Boggart's questline

title: Blackguard's Bell Bearing
notes: Found on Boggart's corpse in Leyndell, Royal capital. NOTE: If you followed the early steps of getting the Dung Eater Puppet, you should already have this item NOTE: Carries the Ash of War: Braggart's Roar

title: Dung Eater
notes: Will invade near where Blackguard Big Boggart died in Leyndell, near the East gate. Drops Sword of Milos. Note: This will need to be done again on another playthrough if you went for Dung Eater Puppet

title: Sword of Milos
notes: Dropped by Dung Eater during invasion in Leyndell, Royal Capital. NOTE: You will already have this if you completed the steps to get the Dung Eater Puppet Ashes

title: Perfume Bottle
notes: From the Avenue Balcony SoG, head East along main road. Open door at the end (where the mistgate was). Instead of taking the stairs up, continue past them to the right. Found near a misbegotten enemy

title: Flamedrake Talisman +1
notes: Return to the base of the stairs. Continue up stairs past enemies and up the first elevator. Found just before the bridge

title: Fell Twins
notes: When you reach second elevator, head towards the other exit and fight this duo boss. Drops Omenkiller Rollo Ashes

title: Omenkiller Rollo
notes: Dropped by Fell Twins near Divine Tower of East Altus

title: Divine Tower of East Altus: Gate
