notes: Across the bridge from the elevator after defeating the Fell Twins. Go to the top of this tower to activate Morgott's Great Rune

title: Divine Tower of East Altus
notes: Found at the top of the elevator from the Divine Tower of East Altus: Gate

title: Morgott's Great Rune
notes: Activate at the top of Divine Tower of East Altus

title: Blade of Calling
notes: Return to room you passed with the elevator, before the Fell Twins. Follow down and jump off elevator into opening near bottom

title: Official's Attire
notes: Return to room you passed with the elevator, before the Fell Twins. Follow down and jump off elevator into opening near bottom. This is part of the Bloodsoaked Set

title: Forbidden Lands
notes: Take the elevator to the bottom, run out and rest at this SoG. We will come back here later

title: Deeproot Depths
notes: Return to the Great Waterfall Basin in the Siofra Aqueduct and use the coffin noted before to access this area. NOTE: If you have followed the guide and obtained the Dung Eater Puppet ashes, you should return to Nokstella before continuing and carry on with Ranni's questline if you have not done so already. Contains Ghost Glovewort 4-7, Smithing Stone 4, 6, Somber Smithing Stone 6, 7

title: Great Waterfall Crest
notes: Found after exiting the coffin from the Great Waterfall Basin SoG

title: Erdtree Avatar
notes: After exiting the coffin, touch SoG, and in front of that is this boss. Drops Staff of the Avatar

title: Staff of the Avatar
notes: Dropped by Erdtree Avatar found after first arriving in this area

title: Ash of War: Golden Land
notes: Past Erdtree Avatar, scarab guarded by giant ants

title: Elden Stars
notes: Jump on giant tree roots. One looks to lead to a cave to the right. Go there. At the other exit

title: Finger Reader Crone
notes: Found near the Deeproot Depths SoG. Talk to her for lore

title: Map: Deeproot Depths
notes: North toward the water, in a gazebo on a corpse

title: Ash of War: Vacuum Slice
notes: North from the Deeproot Depths SoG then Northeast from the map and the gazebo into the ruined temple with the fire breathing enemies

title: The Nameless Eternal City
notes: West from the map

title: Prince of Death's Cyst
notes: Dropped by Runebear enemy in a cave behind a waterfall directly to the East

title: Stonesword Key
notes: Northwest from The Nameless Eternal City SoG. Use spiritspring to get to top of building

title: Crucible Knight Siluria
notes: Northwest from the building where you found the Stonesword Key, near giant tree. Drops Siluria's Tree

title: Siluria's Tree
notes: Dropped by Crucible Knight Siluria

title: Crucible Tree Set
notes: Found in chest behind Crucible Knight Siluria, inside of the tree

title: Mausoleum Soldier Ashes
notes: North of the Mausoleum, near petrified tree that can be destroyed. Near the cliff edge

title: Prince of Death's Staff
notes: From the Nameless Eternal City SoG, head East to find a giant tree root, climb to higher areas. Northwest tower

title: Across the Roots
notes: Top of root path, East of where you found the Prince of Death's Staff

title: Sacrificial Twig
notes: Given by Fia after talking to her about Rogier

title: Weathered Dagger
notes: Received from Fia during her questline

title: Twinned Set
notes: Found after Fia disappears

title: D's Bell Bearing
notes: Found after Fia disappears

title: Fia's Champions
notes: From the Across the Roots SoG, move on to the big open area. You will be invaded. You will get the Fia's Mist sorcery after the fight

title: Fia's Mist
notes: Dropped by Fia's Champions boss fight

title: Prince of Death's Throne
notes: Found after defeating Fia's Champions

title: Fia
notes: Talk to Fia, choose "No, I want to be held" option, then exhaust dialogue and you can give her the Cursemark of Death. Rest at the SoG and then speak to her again, "be held" option. Repeat until she sleeps. Interact with her body to access the Lichdragon Fortissax boss fight

title: Lichdragon Fortissax
notes: Accessed by continuing Fia's questline and giving her the Cursemark of Death quest item. Then interacting with her after she goes to sleep. Drops the Remembrance of the Lichdragon and the Mending Rune of the Death-Prince

title: Remembrance of the Lichdragon
notes: Dropped by Lichdragon Fortissax. Can be given to Enia at the Roundtable Hold for the Fortissax's Lightning Spear or Death Lightning Incantationsa

title: Mending Rune of the Death-Prince
notes: After leaving Lichdragon Fortissax boss arena, return to Fia's body and find this

title: Fia's Set
notes: Found on Fia's corpse afte defeating Lichdragon Fortissax and reloading the area. This is just the Helmet and the Chest Armor

title: D, Hunter of the Dead
notes: Return to the Great Waterfall Basin SoG where you faught the Valiant Gargoyles, then head back out to give D's Twin Brother the Twinned Set

title: D, Hunter of the Dead
notes: Return to the Prince of Death's Throne SoG in the Deeproot Depths and find D over Fia's corpse. Exhaust dialogue then find the Twinned Set where he was standing and Inseparable Sword where D was standing

title: Twinned Set
notes: Found after completing Fia and D's questlines, near the Prince of Death's Throne SoG in the Deeproot Depths

title: Inseparable Sword
notes: Found after completing Fia and D's questlines, near the Prince of Death's Throne SoG in the Deeproot Depths

title: Melina
notes: Speak to Melina at the Forbidden Lands SoG

title: Night's Cavalry
notes: East from the SoG at night. Drops Ash of War: Phantom Slash

title: Ash of War: Phantom Slash
notes: Dropped by Night's Cavalry East of the SoG at night

title: Golden Seed
notes: Follow the path and you should find this on a Golden Tree

title: Millicent
notes: Continue North/Northeast from the Golden Seed and you should find Millicent's summon sign prior to encountering the Black Blade Kindred boss

title: Black Blade Kindred
notes: North from the Golden Seed. Drops Gargoyle's Black Axe and Gargoyle's Black Blades

title: Gargoyle's Black Axe
notes: Dropped by Black Blade Kindred

title: Gargoyle's Black Blades
notes: Dropped by Black Blade Kindred

title: Grand Lift of Rold
notes: Found at the end of the icy path before the Grand Lift of Rold

title: Finger Reader Crone
notes: Found near the Grand Lift of Rold SoG. Speak to her for lore

title: Using the Rold Medallion
notes: Use the Rold Medallion at the Grand Lift of Rold to access the next area

title: Mountaintops of Giants Part 1
notes: Found after taking the Grand Lift of Rold. Contains Ghost Glovewort 9, Great Grave Glovewort, Grave Glovewort 1, 3, 7, 8, Smithing Stone 5-7, Somber Smithing Stone 7, 8

title: Map: West Mountaintops of the Giants
notes: Follow path from top of grand lift. Found on pillar

title: Zamor Ruins
notes: East after map

title: Yura
notes: Found near SoG. Speak to him to finish the quest. You can attack him now or wait until you've inherited the Frenzied Flame to get the Ronin's Set

title: Ronin's Set
notes: Dropped by Yura if you defeat him in this location

title: Zamor Ice Storm
notes: Found in South section of Zamor Ruins

title: Smithing-Stone Miner's Bell Bearing 3
notes: Found beneath Zamor Ruins near the Zamor Ice Storm spell. Grants access to level 5 and 6 upgrade mats when given to Twin Maiden Husks

title: Briars of Punishment
notes: From Zamor Ruins, exit to the East and follow path Northwest then Northeast through an opening in the cliff face. Near Fire Monks by a tree to the West of the long bridge

title: Giant's Mountaintop Catacombs
notes: Southeast from the beginning of the long bridge. Contains Grave Glovewort 7,8, 9, Ghost Glovewort 7

title: Melina
notes: Speak to Melina at the Giant's Mountaintop Catacombs SoG

title: Fire Monk Ashes
notes: Found in a chest after going below the dungeon's first elevator. Once you take it the first time, activate it so it goes back up, then take new platform down below

title: Ritual Pot
notes: Go past the dungeons second elevator, continue through past the Warrior Jars, Land Squirts, and guillotine room. Will be in the room with the Large Warrior Jar

title: Ulcerated Tree Spirit
notes: Drops the Glovewort Picker's Bell Bearing 2 and a Golden Seed

title: Glovewort Picker's Bell Bearing 2
notes: Dropped by Ulcerated Tree Spirit boss. Grants access to level 4, 5, and 6 upgrade mats of normal ashes when given to the Twin Maiden Husks

title: Golden Seed
notes: Dropped by Ulcerated Tree Spirit boss

title: Deathroot
notes: Found in chest after boss. Seventh one found. Take this back to Beast Clergyman for Beastclaw Greathammer

title: Ancient Snow Valley Ruins
notes: Northeast after crossing the long bridge, up aways from the golem archer

title: Millicent
notes: Found near Ancient Snow Valley Ruins SoG. Exhaust her dialogue

title: Beastclaw Greathammer
notes: Received from Beast Clergyman after giving him a seventh Deathroot

title: Shack of the Lofty
notes: North from Ancient Snow Valley Ruins SoG until you reach a frozen river, then turn West. Shack is near end of river

title: Traveling Maiden Set
notes: Found in the SHack of the Lofty at the end of the river

title: Juno Hoslow, Knight of Blood
notes: A bit East from the Shack of the Lofty. Assassination quest for the Volcano Manor. Drops Hoslow's Set and Hoslow's Petal Whip. NOTE: Wait for him to complete his bow when he appears to receive the Hoslow's Oath Gesture

title: Hoslow's Oath
notes: Given by Juno Hoslow, Knight of Blood if you allow him to complete his bow when he invades

title: Hoslow's Set
notes: Dropped by Juno Hoslow, Knight of Blood invader during Volcano Manor quest

title: Hoslow's Petal Whip
notes: Dropped by Juno Hoslow, Knight of Blood invader during Volcano Manor quest

title: Volcano Manor and Other Cleanup
notes: We will be going to Volcano Manor, Altus, and other places before coninuing the Mountaintops of Giants

title: Taker's Cameo
notes: Received from Tanith after completing the third assassination

title: Serpent-Hunter
notes: Found just inside the Rykard, Lord of Blasphemy boss fight. Used to help with boss. You can grab this and warp to Roundtable Hold to upgrade before activating Rykard

title: Rykard, Lord of Blasphemy
notes: Make sure to pick up the Serpent-Hunter weapon and summon a spirit. This weapon makes the fight incredibly easy. Drops Rykard's Great Rune and Remembrance of the Blasphemous

title: Rykard's Great Rune
notes: Dropped by Rykard, Lord of Blasphemy

title: Remembrance of the Blasphemous
notes: Dropped by Rykard, Lord of Blasphemy. Can be given to Enia at the Roundtable Hold to receive Rykard's Rancor Sorcery or Blasphemous Blade weapon

title: Eye Surcoat
notes: Found in the boss arena of Rykard. This is not part of a set

title: Rykard, Lord of Blasphemy (SoG)
notes: Found in the boss arena of Rykard after defeating him

title: Rykards Great Rune
notes: Activate at the top of Divine Tower of West Altus

title: My Thanks
notes: Found near ghost at end of hallway after defeating Rykard

title: Daedicar's Woe
notes: Found after speaking to Rya in her last location

title: Zorayas' Letter
notes: Found after speaking to Rya in her last location

title: Patches
notes: Return to the Castellan's Hall SoG in the Shaded Castle, speak to Patches right before the boss room to receive Dancer's Castanets. Reload the area and make sure he has left the Shaded Castle prior to moving to his next step

title: Dancer's Castanets
notes: Received from Patches at Shaded Castle during his questline

title: Patches' Crouch
notes: Received from Patches after he tries to attack you a second time and realizes it is you

title: Extreme Repentance
notes: Received after attacking Patches again and then letting him get you to low health

title: Patches' Bell Bearing
notes: Received after killing Patches in Murkwater Cave

title: Spear +7
notes: Received after killing Patches in Murkwater Cave

title: Leather Set
notes: Received after killing Patches in Murkwater Cave. The Black Hood is part of this set and found earlier in the guide

title: Consort's Set
notes: Received by killing Tanith in the Rykard boss room. The Consort's Trousers is part of this set and found earlier in the guide

title: Tanith's Knight
notes: Invades if you kill Tanith in the Rykard boss room. Drops Aspects of the Crucible: Breath

title: Aspects of the Crucible: Breath
notes: Dropped by Tanith's Knight during invasion

title: Mountaintops of Giants Part 2
notes: Return to the Ancient Snow Valley Ruins SoG. Contains Ghost Glovewort 9, Great Grave Glovewort, Grave Glovewort 1, 3, 7, 8, Smithing Stone 5-7, Somber Smithing Stone 7, 8

title: Golden Seed
notes: Head North until frozen river, then turn East. Look to the right of the wandering golem enemy

title: Freezing Lake
notes: Northeast from the Golden Seed and the frozen river, up a hill and just before the frozen lake

title: Heretical Rise
notes: Facing East, head up the cliff to your left. Across from broken bridge near skeletal enemies. Invisible path. Use rainbow stones to find path up to window or watch the faint snow texture appear and follow that. Contains Founding Rain of Stars sorcery

title: Founding Rain of Stars
notes: Found in Heretical Rise

title: Snow Valley Ruins Overlook
notes: Warp back to the Freezing Lake SoG, and head back up. Go past the Heretical Rise bridge and you'll find this SoG. Easy access to Minor Erdtree later

title: Tibia Mariner
notes: From the Snow Valley Ruins Overlook SoG, head West and look over the cliff to the right to find. Kill to stop giant skeletons spawning. Drops Helphen's Steeple and Deathroot

title: Deathroot
notes: Eighth one dropped by Tibia Mariner in elevated area. Return to Beast Clergyman to obtain Gurranq's Beast Claw Incantation

title: Helphen's Steeple
notes: Dropped by Tibia Mariner in the elevated area of the Mountaintops of Giants

title: Stargazer's Ruins
notes: West from Snow Valley Ruins Overlook SoG. Cross the bridge

title: Summon Spirit Jellyfish
notes: Find a Spirit Jellyfish in the Stargazer's Ruins, and summon your own spirit jellyfish to unlock the underground area. They will give you the Fancy Spin Gesture

title: Fancy Spin
notes: Given by spirit jellyfish in the Stargazer's Ruins if you summon your own jellyfish

title: Primal Glintstone Blade
notes: Found beneath the Stargazer's Ruins after summoning the Spirit Jellyfish

title: Hermit Merchant
notes: Found after finding the Stargazer's Ruins. Find path down cliff to the South. Kill for Hermit Merchant's Bell Bearing 2

title: Hermit Merchant's Bell Bearing 2
notes: Found after killing the hermit merchant

title: Stonesword Key
notes: Three are sold by Hermit Merchant

title: Vagabond Set
notes: Sold by Hermit Merchant

title: Missonary's Cookbook 7
notes: Follow low path to West side of area to find merchant who sells this

title: Corhyn
notes: Middle of bridge near where you followed the path down to the merchant, South of the Stargazer's Ruins. Exhaust dialogue. You can choose to give Corhyn the Tonic of Forgetfullness, but it does not change the rewards you receive

title: Goldmask
notes: Middle of bridge near where you followed the path down to the merchant, South of the Stargazer's Ruins. Exhaust dialogue.

title: Minor Erdtree
notes: North part of the area after crossing the bridge

title: Erdtree Avatar
notes: Found near Minor Erdtree. Drops Cerulean Crystal Tear and Crimson Bubbletear. NOTE: This one will duplicate itself, help is advised

title: Crimson Bubbletear
notes: Dropped by Erdtree Avatard. Found in North part of elevated area in the Mountaintops of Giants

title: Cerulean Crystal Tear
notes: Dropped by Erdtree Avatard. Found in North part of elevated area in the Mountaintops of Giants

title: Death Rite Bird
notes: Descend cliffs to North of bridge you took from Stargazer's ruins at night. Drops Death Ritual Spear

title: Death's Ritual Spear
notes: Dropped by Death Rite Bird in Mountaintops of Giants

title: Starlight Shard
notes: Found near where you fought the Death Rite Bird, in the stone bowl

title: Castle Sol
notes: North part of region. Descend cliffs further from Death Rite Bird. Contains Smithing Stone 5-7, Somber Smithing Stone 8

title: Castle Sol Main Gate
notes: Found just outside Castle Sol. Take down bell bearing mausoleum to make this dungeon easier

title: Sorcerer Painting
notes: Find building on ground level, Northwest part of castle. Climb ladder near slugs. Follow path to end, find ladder to descend into room

title: Stormhawk Axe
notes: Return up ladder to the roof, jump on tents, jump to platform on side of building

title: Church of the Eclipse
notes: Drop down from the Stormhawk Axe to the North, go into room and up the stairs, make your away across the open area, up more stairs and into the church, immediately turn left to find in a small room

title: Eclipse Shotel
notes: Inside the church

title: Ghost
notes: Inside the church. Talk to it for lore

title: Cerulean Amber Medallion +1
notes: Go out door to the left near spirit. Head South, then up the ladder. Stay on the elevated area, using wooden platform to go around the tower, then down the ladder to dual wielding banished knight spirit. Nearby on a wooden platform

title: Stonesword Key
notes: Return to the Church of the Eclipse. Head outside the church through door near ghost and into next building, drop to roof near mist gate. Go to end of area near two dog enemies. Up stairs

title: Commander Niall
notes: Drops Veteran's Prosthesis

title: Veteran's Prosthesis
notes: Dropped by Commander Niall

title: Castle Sol Rooftop
notes: Found in the Commander Niall boss arena after defeating him

title: Haligtree Secret Medallion (Left)
notes: Found past the Commander Niall boss fight on top of the tower

title: Greathood
notes: With the Sorcerer Painting, go back to the bridge that leads to Stargazer's Ruins and find a ghost. This is not part of a set

title: Veteran's Set
notes: Sold by Enia after defeating Commander Niall in Castle Sol

title: Gurranq's Beast Claw
notes: Obtained by trading in the eighth Deathroot

title: Consecrated Snowfield
notes: Only accessible if you obtain both halves of the Haligtree Secret Medallion. This requires that you speak to Albus in the Village of Albinaurics earlier in the checklist and defeat Commander Niall in Castle Sol. Go to Grand Lift of Rold SoG and choose "Hoist Secret Medallion" option. Contains Ghost Glovewort 9, Great Grave Glovewort, Grave Glovewort 7-9, Smithing Stone 6-8, Somber Smithing Stone 8, 9

title: Hidden Path to the Haligtree
notes: First SoG in the area, you'll need to progress through this dungeon and up some stairs past a large octopus. Contains Grave Glovewort 9

title: Directional Step
notes: From the Hidden Path to the Haligtree SoG, go back toward the giant octopus, down the first set of stairs, and walk off where the broken railing is. Walk on invisible platform directly South and turn right

title: Silver Scarab
notes: Behind invisible wall in a chest

title: Spelldrake Talisman +2
notes: Right of the enemy boss room, follow path to elevator

title: Stray Mimic Tear
notes: Drops Blackflame Monk Amon Ashes

title: Blackflame Monk Amon Ashes
notes: Dropped by Stray Mimic Tear boss

title: Deathroot
notes: Found in chest in the Stray Mimic Tear boss room. Ninth one. Give to Beast Clergyman to receive Ancient Dragon Smithing Stone, final Deathroot

title: Ancient Dragon Smithing Stone
notes: Reward for giving the Beast Clergyman the final Deathroot

title: Ghost
notes: Head up the stairs and out the door from the Hidden Path to the Haligtree SoG. Once out the door, head straight North

title: Inner Consecrated Snowfield
notes: Straight North from Consecrated Snowfield SoG. You'll know you are close when you have to jump down a small cliff. Make sure you look for a safe way down, if you jump directly down you could take fall damage

title: Larval Tear
notes: Found Southeast of the Inner Consecrated Snowfield SoG, look for three Wandering Nobles with one burried in the snow. This one is actually a Runebear and will drop it once defeated. NOTE: VERY TOUGH TO KILL

title: Map: Consecrated Snowfield
notes: Further North from the Inner Consecrated Snowfield SoG and past the frozen river

title: Rotten Duelist
notes: West of Consecrated Snowfield SoG. Drops Rotten Duelist Helm and Rotten Battle Hammer. NOTE: Make sure you loot the body, this is not automatically given to you

title: Rotten Duelist Helm
notes: Dropped by Rotten Duelist in Consecrated Snowfield. Part of the Rotten Duelist's Set

title: Rotten Battle Hammer
notes: Dropped by Rotten Duelist in Consecrated Snowfield

title: Nomadic Warrior's Cookbook 23
notes: North and a bit East from Consecrated Snowfield SoG

title: Golden Seed
notes: Northeast from the Nomadic Warrior's Cookbook or from the Consecrated Snowfield SoG, near Golden Tree. Southeast side of big tree. If you look at your map, it is the bigger circular area, just Southeast of that

title: St. Trina's Torch
notes: Northeast from Consecrated Snowfield SoG or just Southeast of the Golden Seed, find convoy. In the chest

title: Consecrated Snowfield Catacombs
notes: East part of the region, East of convoy and Golden Seed location. Contains Grave Glovewort 8, 9, Ghost Glovewort 9

title: Imp Head (Elder)
notes: In front of watchdog enemy on second floor

title: Activate Lever
notes: To find the lever, you will need to get on top of the second frost breathing pillar and hit it so it goes up to the third floor

title: Putrid Grave Warden Duelist
notes: Drops 2 Great Grave Gloveworts and Rotten Gravekeeper Cloak

title: Rotten Gravekeeper Cloak
notes: Dropped by Putrid Grave Warden Duelist boss in Consecrated Snowfield Catacombs. Part of the Rotten Duelist's Set

title: Great Grave Gloveworts
notes: Dropped by Putrid Grave Warden Duelist boss in Consecrated Snowfield Catacombs. Note a type, this boss drops two. Listing both to make it easier to keep track of how many you have

title: Duo Boss Night's Cavalry
notes: Found Southwest of the Inner Consecrated Snowfield SoG at night. Very difficult to do together, you can carefully kite one of them toward you to defeat first. Drops Night's Cavalry Set and Ancient Dragon Smithing Stone

title: Night's Cavalry Set
notes: Dropped by Duo Night's Cavalry near Inner Consecrated Snowfield SoG

title: Ancient Dragon Smithing Stone
notes: Dropped by Duo Night's Cavalry near Inner Consecrated Snowfield SoG

title: Flowing Curved Sword
notes: Found in chest on the back of the Night's Cavalry convoy, Southwest of Inner Consecrated Snowfield SoG

title: Stalwart Horn Charm +1
notes: Southwest from the Duo Night's Cavalry boss. Near fallen tree log

title: Yelough Anix Ruins
notes: Southwest part of the region

title: Stonesword Key
notes: Northwest part in a small tower in the Yelough Anix Ruins

title: Unendurable Frenzy
notes: In a chest underground beneath the Yelough Anix Ruins. Only accessible if you double jump with Torrent

title: Yelough Anix Tunnel
notes: South from Yelough Anix Ruins. Contains Ancient Dragon Smithing Stone, Smithing Stone 8, Somber Smithing Stone 8, 9

title: Ancient Dragon Smithing Stone
notes: Found in the room just past the Onyx Lord miniboss

title: Astel, Stars of Darkness
notes: Drops Meteorite of Astel Sorcery

title: Meteorite of Astel
notes: Dropped by Astel, Stars of Darkness

title: Albinauric Rise
notes: East from Inner Consecrated Snowfield. Summon Fanged Imps and kill one of the imps outside the tower. Contains Graven-Mass Talisman

title: Graven-Mass Talisman
notes: Found in Albinauric Rise

title: Glintstone Craftsman's Cookbook 8
notes: West from the Albinauric Rise tower, near the floating magic ball enemies

title: Cave of the Forlorn
notes: From the Inner Consecrated Snowfield SoG, head North to the frozen river, then head East. Will be on the lefthand side near the land octopus enemy. Needs two stonesword keys to access

title: Misbegotten Crusader
notes: Drops Golden Order Greatsword

title: Golden Order Greatsword
notes: Dropped by Misbegotten Crusader Boss

title: Great Wyrm Theodorix
notes: East of the Cave of the Forlorn. Drops thee Dragon Hearts and unlocks Theodorix's Magma at the Cathedral of Dragon Communion

title: Dragon Heart
notes: Three are dropped by Great Wyrm Theodorix in the Consecrated Snowfield

title: Minor Erdtree
notes: North of Cave of the Forlorn. You need to follow the river West until you can turn North and head up the mountain side

title: Putrid Avatar
notes: Near Minor Erdtree. Drops Ruptured Crystal Tear and Thorny Cracked Tear

title: Ruptured Crystal Tear
notes: Dropped by Putrid Avatar

title: Thorny Cracked Tear
notes: Dropped by Putrid Avatar

title: Ash of War: White Shadow's Lure
notes: Northwest of Inner Consecrated Snow Fields SoG. Invisible scarab. Followed by pack of wolves

title: Anastasia, Tarnished-Eater
notes: Northwest on the river. Drops Somber Ancient Dragon Smithing Stone. NOTE: This can be buggy

title: Somber Ancient Dragon Smithing Stone
notes: Dropped by Anastasia, Tarnished Eater if this is your third time beating her

title: Sanguine Noble
notes: West in the middle of the frozen trees. Drops Sanguine Noble Set. NOTE: This can be buggy

title: Sanguine Noble Set
notes: Dropped by Sanguine Noble invader. Does not have gloves

title: Consecrated Snowfield Bell-Bearing Mausoleum
notes: Northwest part of the region, outside a church. Advised to make this one sit down now as it shoots magic beams and is annoying

title: Apostate Derelict
notes: North of the mausoleum in this area

title: Silver Mirrorshield
notes: Found in Apostate Derelict

title: Summon Latenna
notes: In the Apostate Derelict, summon Latenna in front of the large woman. NOTE: This is a button prompt, not a typical summon. This will complete her quest and give you a Somber Ancient Dragon Smithing Stone

title: Death Rite Bird
notes: Southeast from Apostate Derelict, end of frozen river during the night. Drops Explosive Ghostflame Sorcery

title: Explosive Ghostflame
notes: Dropped by Death Rite Bird on the river

title: Ordina, Liturgical Town
notes: North end of the snowfield, look for the city, behind a ruined building just outside the city

title: Golden Seed
notes: Directly West of the Ordina, Liturgical Town SoG, down over a small cliff

title: Rotten Duelist Greaves
notes: Dropped by second Rotten Duelist. Part of the Rotten Duelist Set

title: Rotten Greataxe
notes: Dropped by second Rotten Duelist

title: Black Knife Set
notes: Under stairs at North end

title: Ordina Puzzle
notes: Enter Evergaol nearby and light 4 candles held by statues. Equip the Sentry Torch to reveal invisible Black Knife Assassins or make suicide runs to each candle. Activates Waygate which we will use later. NOTE: Killing the Black Knifes in the puzzle gives you Ghost Glovewort 9 per Black Knife

title: Mohgwyn Palace
notes: Access by using the Pureblood Knight's Medal if you progressed Varre's questline, or use the waygate Northwest of the Yelough Anex Tunnel, covered in blood in the Consecrated Snowfield area. Can find Ghost Glovewort 8, 9, Somber Smithing Stone 9, Smithing Stone 6-8

title: Map: Mohgwyn Palace
notes: Found right next to where you teleport if you use the Pureblood Knight's Medal. Pick this up, then use the waygate in the Consecrated Snowfield

title: Palace Approach Ledge-Road
notes: Use waygate in the Consecrated Snowfield to get close to this. From the Yelough Anex Tunnel, go back up the lift and outside. Head left along the cliff face and then turn toward the Northwest. Head past the Yelough Anix Ruins and continue looking to the left for a slope to walk down. Waygate is covered in blood and near an albanuric enemy. Once you warp, follow tunnel and then path toward the West

title: Fevor's Cookbook 3
notes: Received from Gideon after discovering Mohgwyn Palace

title: Ash of War: Blood Tax
notes: From Palace Approach Ledge-Road SoG, follow path North. To right, go through bloody river, find cave with scarab

title: Swarm of Flies
notes: North inside another cave

title: 3 Nameless White Mask
notes: Various areas in the bloody lake. Recommended to take out other enemies first before fighting them. Defeat them one at a time and the last will drop the War Surgeon Set

title: War Surgeon Set
notes: Dropped after defeating the thee Nameless White Mask invaders

title: Golden Seed
notes: Island in the middle of the bloody lake

title: Nomadic Warrior's Cookbook 24
notes: Southeast part of bloody lake on edge of cliff

title: Haligdrake Talisman +2
notes: Southwest part of bloody lake in graveyard area

title: Stonesword Key
notes: Found in the graveyard with the Haligtree Talisman +2, in the Southwest part of the blood lake

title: Dynasty Mausoleum Entrance
notes: Head to the North side of the blood lake and follow the path Northwest, then turn left and look for the stairs leading up

title: Imprisoned Merchant
notes: Found after entering building past rot people. Once in the building, keep to the left and go through a small cave. Kill for Imprisoned Merchant Bell Bearing

title: Imprisoned Merchant Bell Bearing
notes: Found after defeating Imprisoned Merchant

title: Great Ghost Glovewort
notes: Continue through the cave. Before heading into the hallway that leads to the exit, look to your right and you'll see the Great Ghost Glovewort down a ledge and near some zombie enemies

title: Dyanasty Mausoleum Midpoint
notes: Continue through the cave and eventually up some stairs to find your way out to this SoG

title: Varre
notes: Head back toward tunnels from Dynasty Mausoleum Midpoint SoG. Find invasion sign. Invade and defeat Varre. Once you are back in your world, speak to him twice and he will drop the Varre's Bouquet weapon

title: Varre's Bouquet
notes: Dropped by Varre after finishing his invasion and exhausting his dialogue

title: Somber Ancient Dragon Smithing Stone
notes: Continue around. When you see the lift to your right, instead look to your left and find several enemies near a chest. Find in the chest

title: Mohg, Lord of Blood
notes: Continue up the lift. Drops Mohg's Great Rune and Remembrance of the Blood Lord. NOTE: This boss fight is NOT optional if you purchase the DLC and intend to go through the DLC on two playthroughs. Going through the DLC on two playthroughs is required if you want all items and gear

title: Mohg's Great Rune
notes: Dropped by Mohg, Lord of Blood

title: Remembrance of the Blood Lord
notes: Dropped by Mohg, Lord of Blood. Can be traded in to Enia at the Roundtable Hold for the Bloodboon Incantation or Mohgwyn's Sacred Spear

title: Cocoon of the Empyrean
notes: Found after defeating Mohg, Lord of Blood

title: DLC CHECKPOINT
notes: If you have purchase the DLC and are ready to go through it, please switch to the Shadow of the Erdtree tab and follow that section. If you do not have the DLC, you can continue through the base game like normal. You can also come back to the DLC later if you'd prefer. NOTE: Going through the DLC on two playthroughs is required if you want all items and gear

title: Lord of Blood's Robe
notes: Sold by Enia after defeating Mohg, Lord of Blood

title: Law of Causality
notes: Received from Gideon after defeating Mohg, Lord of Blood and asking about the cocoon

title: Divine Tower of East Altus
notes: Go to the top of this tower to activate Mohg's Great Rune

title: Mohg's Great Rune
notes: Activated at the top of Divine Tower of East Altus

title: Miquella's Haligtree
notes: To reach this next area, use the waygate we unlocked before in the Ordina area to reach this location. Contains Smithing Stone 6-8, Somber Smithing Stone 8,9

title: Haligtree Canapoy
notes: Found after reaching Miquella's Haligtree for the first time, just down the branch a bit

title: Black Flame's Protection
notes: Received from Gideon after discovering Miquella's Haligtree

title: Stonesword Key
notes: Return to the Haligtree Canopy SoG, and head back up a bit to find this, near where you first teleported to

title: Envoy Crown
notes: Past giant ants on the main branch, heading back up the branch to the South. Near Giant Envoy enemy. Not part of an armor set

title: Prattling Pate (My Beloved)
notes: Toward giant tree, on left with two enemies using horns. End of branch past three more enemies

title: Oracle Envoy Ashes
notes: Fall to a branch past Oracle Envoy enemies and poison flowers. End of branch guarded by Giant Oracle Envoy

title: Haligtree Town
notes: Found just past the tree branches and down the ladder

title: Pearldrake Talisman +2
notes: Climb ladder, run and jump to next platform. Guarded by Misbegotten enemy

title: Haligtree Town Plaza
notes: Move on through the town, past some enemies and after finding an Ancient Dragon Smithing Stone

title: Ancient Dragon Smithing Stone
notes: Head North across bridge, through the next room, on statue behind misbegotten enemy

title: Viridian Amber Medallion +2
notes: Jump through roofs, then in building beneath three spirit caller snails and Crystallian enemies, in a chest

title: Shortcut to Haligtree Town SoG
notes: There is a shortcut near the larger mage enemies, a lift you can take up to the Haligtree Town SoG which may be easier than running through the rooftops if you die

title: Loretta, Knight of the Haligtree
notes: At the end of the Haligtree. Drops Loretta's War Sickle and Loretta's Mastery

title: Loretta's Mastery
notes: Dropped by Loretta, Knight of the Haligtree

title: Loretta's War Sickle
notes: Dropped by Loretta, Knight of the Haligtree

title: Haligtree Promenade
notes: Found after defeating Loretta, Knight of the Haligtree

title: Royal Knight Set
notes: Sold by Enia after defeating Loretta, Knight of the Haligtree

title: Elphael, Brace of the Haligtree
notes: Right after Miquella's Haligtree. Very difficult area

title: Prayer Room
notes: First SoG in this section

title: Millicent
notes: Exhaust dialogue

title: Miquellan Knight's Sword
notes: Next pathway, two doors. Second room, climb stairs, then jump to tree branch. Near tower at the end

title: Putrid Avatar
notes: Descend ladder from the tower and jump on next pathway. Drops Rotten Staff

title: Rotten Staff
notes: Dropped by Putrid Avatar

title: Somber Ancient Dragon Smithing Stone
notes: Found near the Putrid Avatar enemy

title: Elphael Inner Wall
notes: Jump down from Haligtree Helm (near the second Putrid Avatar) and grab this SoG

title: Haligtree Knight Helm
notes: Go up the ladder near the SoG, found on a corpse

title: Triple Rings of Light
notes: Return to pathway after Prayer Room SoG. Move forward, take stairs going down, then next stairs. Turn back and go past ledge to find door, use Stonesword Key

title: Seedbed Curse
notes: Go back outside room with two Cleanrot Knights. Jump over railing to right of room on to support beam. Carefully fall to lower level, enter dark building. NOTE: Not necessary to retrieve this if you had given Dung Eater Seluvis' Potion and received the Dunge Eater Puppet Ashes. Do not mark this until your next playthrough

title: Cleanrot Knight Finlay Ashes
notes: Go back to Prayer Room SoG. Go down stairs until you see the flying scarab in the gazebo, jump to support beam and go to that scarab and gazebo, small room with Cleanrot Knight and chest

title: Haligtree Soldier Ashes
notes: Jump to tree branch, go to lower level. Jump to next support beam, cross it to area with rotten flowers and another flying scarab. Fall to staircase below and go to top near enemies on ballistas

title: Marika's Soreseal
notes: Exit to the ledge of this room, find ladder to lowest level. Long pathway. Continue to end of pathway for mist gate. Behind mist gate locked by two Stonesword Keys

title: Rotten Crystal Sword
notes: Return to the Elphael Inner Wall SoG and look for a room behind big root, in a chest past the 3 Crystallian enemies

title: Drainage Channel
notes: Past room and past rotten lake. Enter tunnel and continue

title: Ulcerated Tree Spirit
notes: Climb nearest hill from entrance to tunnel, cross gap onto another branch. In the small rotten lake. Drops a Golden Seed. Note: You'll need to defeat this enemy again on another playthrough if you want everything from Millicent's questline. You can cheese this boss from the branch above once you activate it using arrows

title: Golden Seed
notes: Dropped by Ulcerated Tree Spirit

title: Great Grave Glovewort
notes: Found in the rotten lake near where the Ulcerated Tree Spirit appears

title: Millicent Invasion
notes: You will have to complete this in two different playthroughs if you want everything. You can choose to invade Millicent and defeat her, or aid her. The summon signs can be found near the Ulcerated Tree Spirit in the Drainage Channel

title: Defeating Millicent
notes: Invade Millicent and defeat her to receive the Millicent's Prosthesis Talisman

title: Defeating Millicent's Sisters
notes: Assist Millicent in defeating her four sisters. Receive the Rotten Winged Sword Insignia Talisman. NOTE: Easier to do this on the first playthrough

title: Millicent's Prosthesis
notes: Received by defeating Millicent here during her questline. Not obtainable if you choose to help Millicent

title: Rotten Winged Sword Insignia
notes: Received by defeating Millicent's Four Sisters during Millicent's questline. Not obtainable if you choose to invade Millicent

title: Unalloyed Gold Needle
notes: Received from Millicent after helping defeat the Four Sisters. Not obtainable if you chose to fight her instead. This can be used at the flower in Malenia's area to receive Miquella's Needle

title: Dragoncrest Greatshield Talisman
notes: Go back to Drainage Channel SoG. Climb tree root, move North along the beams and roots until you can reach the roof of a building using a tree root. Fall through hole to beams on high level. Find chest

title: Ghost-Glovewort Picker's Bell Bearing 3
notes: Exit building and turn left, at end of path guarded by enemies. This allows you to purchase level 7, 8, and 9 upgrade mats from Twin Maiden Husks

title: Haligtree Roots
notes: Go back in building where you found the Dragoncrest Greatshield Talisman, take elevator

title: Traveler's Set
notes: In room in same hallway as boss room. Does not have a helmet

title: Malenia, Blade of Miquella
notes: Once defeated, drops Malenia's Great Rune and Remembrance of the Rot Goddess

title: Malenia's Great Rune
notes: Dropped by Malenia, Blade of Miquella

title: Remembrance of the Rot Goddess
notes: Dropped by Malenia, Blade of Miquella. This can be turned in to Enia for the Hand of Malenia or Scarlet Aeonia incantation

title: Malenia, Goddess of Rot (SoG)
notes: Found after beating Malenia

title: Scarlett Aeonia
notes: After resting at the Malenia, Goddess of Rot SoG, approach the Scarlett Aeonia in the arena and return the Unalloyed Gold Needle to receive the Miquella's Needle

title: Miquella's Needle
notes: Received after defeating Malenia, returning to her boss arena, and giving the Unalloyed Gold Needle to the Scarlet Aeonia

title: Malenia's Set
notes: Sold by Enia after defeating Malenia, Blade of Miquella

title: Lord's Divine Fortification
notes: Talk to Gideon after defeating Malenia, Blade of Miquella to receive this

title: Mending Rune of the Fell Curse
notes: Given by Dung Eater after giving him all Seedbed Curses. NOTE: Not available if you've given him the Seluvis' Potion and received the Dung Eater Puppet ashes

title: Omen Set
notes: Reload the area to find this armor set. NOTE: Not available if you've given him the Selvuis' Potion and received the Dung Eater Puppet ashes

title: Isolated Divine Tower
notes: Travel to the Divine Bridge SoG and use the teleporter near the Giant Golem enemy. Activate Malenia's Great Rune

title: Malenia's Great Rune
notes: Activate at the top of the Isolated Divine Tower

title: Flock's Canvas Talisman
notes: Available from Gowry after completing Millicent's questline

title: Gowry's Bell Bearing
notes: Available from Gowry after completing Millicent's questline

title: Mountaintops of Giants Part 3
notes: Continue from Freezing Lake SoG in the Mountaintops of Giants. Contains Ghost Glovewort 9, Great Grave Glovewort, Grave Glovewort 1, 3, 7, 8, Smithing Stone 5-7, Somber Smithing Stone 7, 8

title: Borealis the Freezing Fog
notes: Middle of the frozen lake. Drops Dragon Heart and unlocks Borealis' Mist in the Cathedral of Dragon Communion. This makes it easier to traverse the lake

title: Dragon Heart
notes: Dropped by Borealis the Freezing Fog

title: Whiteridge Road
notes: Found navigating the frozen lake, hugging the West side and heading South, eventually finding a path leading past some giant dogs. This is outside of an encampment and near the map, right before a fortress

title: Melina
notes: Speak to Melina at Whiteridge Road SoG

title: Giant's Gravepost
notes: Continue South from Whiteridge Road SoG or the Stonesword Key, crossing huge chain across canyon

title: Map: East Mountaintops of the Giants
notes: On a pillar near the Giant's Gravepost SoG

title: Ash of War: Seppuku
notes: East of Freezing Lake SoG. Kill invisible scarab circling a tree

title: Spirtcaller Cave
notes: Head South from the Freezing Lake SoG and hug the West cliff face. Requires 2 Stonesword Keys to access

title: White Reed Set
notes: Does not include head piece. Found near dual spirit caller snail enemeies

title: Godskin Apostle, Godskin Noble, and Spirit-Caller Snail
notes: Fought successively. Drops Black Flame Ritual Incantation and Godskin Swaddling Cloth talisman

title: Black Flame Ritual
notes: Dropped by Trio Godskin boss

title: Godskin Swaddling Cloth
notes: Dropped by Trio Godskin boss

title: First Church of Marika
notes: Southeast part of frozen lake. Contains Sacred Tear and Somberstone Miner's Bell Bearing 3

title: Sacred Tear
notes: Found in First Church of Marika

title: Somberstone Miner's Bell Bearing 3
notes: Found outside First Church of Marika. Unlocks ability to purchase level 5 and 6 Somber upgrade mats from Twin Maiden Husks

title: Lord Contender's Evergaol
notes: From First Church of Marika, head West past the giant dog enemies. Up on plateau. Contains Roundtable Knight Vyke boss

title: Roundtable Knight Vyke
notes: Found in Lord Contender's Evergaol. Drops Vyke's Dragonbolt Incantation and Fingerprint Set

title: Vyke's Dragonbolt
notes: Dropped by Roundtable Knight Vyke

title: Fingerprint Set
notes: Dropped by Roundtable Knight Vyke

title: Guardians' Garrison
notes: Warp back to the Whiteridge Road SoG and head West

title: Chief Guardian Arghanthy
notes: Named enemy at the top of the Guardians' Garrison. Drops One-Eyed Shield

title: One-Eyed Shield
notes: Dropped by Chief Guardian Arghanthy

title: Giant's Prayerbook
notes: Found in chest at the top of the tower near the Chief Guardian Arghanthy enemy. Give to Miriel in the Church of Vows to unlock Giantsflame Take Thee and Flame, Fall Upon Them Incantations

title: Ash of War: Prelate's Charge
notes: South from Guardians' Garrison. Find scarab hanging from a tree

title: Giant-Conquering Hero's Grave
notes: West from Giant's Gravepost SoG, jump over canyon to Mountaintops of Giants West region. Entrance is on top of cliff. Ghost Glovewort 9, Grave Glovewort 7, 8

title: Flame, Protect Me
notes: Found using a Stonesword Key in beginning of area

title: Cranial Vessel Candlestand
notes: Climb stairs after first fire-breathing pillar and use Stonesword Key

title: Giant Troll Enemy
notes: Killing the Giant Troll enemy by luring it to a ring of light will unlock the boss door. You need to send the lift back up after you get to this area

title: Giant's Seal
notes: Fall off bridge that had Giant Troll

title: Great Grave Glovewort
notes: Found near where you kill the Prelate for the Giant's Seal

title: Ancient Hero of Zamor
notes: Drops Zamor Set and Zamor Curved Sword

title: Zamor Set
notes: Dropped by Ancient Hero of Zamor

title: Zamor Curved Sword
notes: Dropped by Ancient Hero of Zamor

title: Bloody Finger Okina
notes: Warp back to Giant's Gravepost, then head South/Southwest, heading toward the Southwest part of the region until you find the Church of Repose. You'll be invaded by this NPC here. Drops Rivers of Blood and Okina Mask

title: Rivers of Blood
notes: Dropped by Bloody Finger Okina

title: Okina Mask
notes: Dropped by Bloody Finger Okina

title: Church of Repose
notes: West from the invasion point. Contains a Sacred Tear

title: Ancient Dragon Smithing Stone
notes: Just Southeast of the Church of Repose in the mouth of the giant skull

title: Ash of War: Troll's Roar
notes: Southeast from the Church of Repose, on top of the giant skull where you found the Ancient Dragon Smithing Stone (accessed by spiritspring)

title: Foot of the Forge
notes: East from the Church of Repose. You'll see the chain leading across to the next area, go just past that and over the small cliff

title: Crimsonwhorl Bubbletear
notes: Return to the Foot of the Forge SoG, then head Northeast until you reach a spot where you can go West down a narrow path along the cliff edge. End of path with hand enemies

title: Iron Fist Alexander
notes: If you have followed Alexander's questline to this point, you can summon him for this boss. His sign is just inside the boss arean

title: Fire Giant
notes: East from the Foot of the Forge SoG. Drops Remembrance of the Fire Giant

title: Remembrance of the Fire Giant
notes: Dropped by Fire Giant. Can be given to Enia for the Giant's Red Braid or Burn O Flame! Incantation

title: Fire Giant (SoG)
notes: Found after defeating the Fire Giant

title: Giantsflame Take Thee
notes: Received from Miriel after giving him the Giant's Prayerbook

title: Flame, Fall Upon Them
notes: Received from Miriel after giving him the Giant's Prayerbook

title: Forge of the Giants
notes: Found on top of the forge after crossing the chain

title: Erdtree Aflame
notes: Received after speaking to Melina at the Forge of the Fire Giants

title: Crumbling Farum Azula
notes: Sent here after talking to Melina at the Forge of the Giants SoG. NOTE: There is no map of this region. Everything is unlocked as soon as you arrive. Also, everything will be lost in Leyndell, Royal Capital if you finish this area. Make sure you complete that section first. Contains Somber Smithing Stone 7-9, Smithing Stone 6-8

title: Crumbling Beast Grave
notes: Progress until you find this first SoG

title: Ancient Dragon Smithing Stone
notes: Received from Nepheli Loux after completing her quest and finding her in the throne room

title: Kenneth Height
notes: Speak to Kenneth Height in the throne room to get additional dialogue and wrap up his quest. No additional rewards are given

title: Dragon
notes: Just past the Crumbing Beast Grave. Drops an Ancient Dragon Smithing Stone

title: Ancient Dragon Smithing Stone
notes: Dropped by the unnamed dragon in the first part of this area

title: Crumbling Beast Grave Depths
notes: Just past the first Dragon fight

title: Great Grave Glovewort
notes: Head into the next room, to the three windows. Turn right and hop on the roof, then go up and through the window on the right. Continue around, hugging the right wall. Found in an archway against the wall

title: Ancient Dragon Prayerbook
notes: From SoG, go to next room, then through doorway and downstairs, then go to bottom floor. Give this to Miriel to obtain Ancient Dragons' Lightning Spear and Ancient Dragons' Lightning Strike

title: Tempest-Facing Balcony
notes: From the room with the Ancient Dragon Prayerbook, exit to a balcony to find this SoG

title: Glovewort Picker's Bell Bearing 3
notes: Return to the building, then exit through the Southwest doorway, use elevator to get to lower level. Follow path past Tentacle Giant enemies until you find a platform with water near a gazebo.  Allows for purchase of Ghost Glovewort 7,8,9

title: Somberstone Miner's Bell Bearing 4
notes: Found on the corpse near the Tempest Facing Balcony. Allows for purchase of level 7 and 8 upgrade mats from Twin Maiden Husks

title: Dragon Temple
notes: Jump across platforms heading to the Northeast to a building with this SoG just outside of it

title: Stonesword Key
notes: From the Dragon Temple SoG, head through doorway, right, then down the stairs. East through hallway. Near dual sword enemy

title: Azula Beastmen Ashes
notes: Return to where you jumped down to the stairs from the Dragon Temple SoG, then jump down again to the next platform. Continue past enemies to room with graves

title: Dragon Temple Transept
notes: Continue from Azula Beastmen Ashes, you'll see a small ledge to drop down heading East

title: Recusant Bernahl
notes: Found just outside the boss gate for the Godskin Duo when coming from the Dragon Temple Transept SoG

title: Godskin Duo
notes: Just past the Dragon Temple Transept SoG. Drops Ash of War: Black Flame Tornado and Smithing-Stone Bell Bearing 4

title: Ash of War: Black Flame Tornado
notes: Dropped by Godskin Duo

title: Smithing-Stone Bell Bearing 4
notes: Dropped by Godskin Duo. Allows for purchase of level 7 and 8 upgrade mats at Twin Maiden Husks

title: Dragon Temple Alter
notes: Appears after defeating the Godskin Duo

title: Dragon Temple Lift
notes: Head back across the pillar from the Ancient Dragon Smithing Stone, then turn left and you should see a mistgate. Needs two stonesword keys to open. Head down lift to SoG. We'll return to this later

title: Golden Seed
notes: Return to the Dragon Temple Alter Lift SoG, then head out. Found past the fountain on the Golden Tree

title: Golden Lightning Fortification
notes: Past the tree, fall to bottom to find scarab

title: Iron Fist Alexander
notes: Cross cliff from Dragon enemy, follow path. He will ask you to fight him. Do so to receive Shard of Alexander and Alexander's Innards

title: Shard of Alexander
notes: Dropped by Alexander in Crumbling Farum Azula during his quest

title: Alexander's Innards
notes: Dropped by Alexander in Crumbling Farum Azula during his quest

title: Ancient Dragon Apostle's Cookbook 4
notes: After defeating Iron Fist Alexander, continue West/Southwest across floating platforms and fallen pillars. You will eventually reach a pillar you have to drop to where you can see a gazebo on the other side and to the left. The cookbook is in that gazebo

title: Companion Jar
notes: Dropped by Jar-Bairn after giving him Alexander's Innards

title: Ancient Dragons' Lighting Spear
notes: Received from Miriel after giving him the Ancient Dragon Prayerbook

title: Ancient Dragons' Lighting Strike
notes: Receive from Miriel after giving him the Ancient Dragon Prayerbook

title: Dragoncrest Shield Talisman +2
notes: Return to bottom floor from Dragon Temple Lift SoG. Continue through door and go back down the stairs. Jump over broken platforms, look for corpse

title: Dragon Temple Rooftop
notes: Move through destroyed buildings to area with Crucible Knight. Just past him, jump on some roofs

title: Drake Knight Set
notes: From Dragon Temple Rooftop SoG, head down to rooftops and past birds. Climb down ladder, then pivot left. Jump to floating platform and then to balcony. Around the other side in the chest

title: Somber Ancient Dragon Smithing Stone
notes: Found in Gazebo near unnamed Dragon

title: Dragon Towershield
notes: From the Dragon, look at the edge of cliff, go to floating rocks, past enemies, in a chest

title: Boltdrake Talisman +2
notes: Take lift and continue past Crucible Knight and Misbegotten Fight. Climb ladder

title: Somberstone Miner's Bell Bearing 5
notes: Return to the Dragon Temple Rooftop SoG and head toward where the dragon was. From the Dragon, move forward up slope, past enemies. Enter building with beastmen. Item in front of altar. Unlocks level 9 upgrade mats at Twin Maiden Husks

title: Beside the Great Bridge
notes: Take elevator in building with Bell Bearing

title: Getting to the Dragonlord Placidusax Boss Fight
notes: Take elevator from SoG back to beastmen building. Exit, head toward edge of cliff. Look below cliff to find floating rocks that lead to platform. Once there, lie down and you will be transported to the area with Dragonlord Placidusax

title: Dragonlord Placidusax
notes: Drops Remembrance of the Dragonlord. Be sure to rest at the SoG after defeating him

title: Remembrance of the Dragon Lord
notes: Dropped by Dragonlord Placidusax. Can be given to Enia for the Dragon King's Cragblade or Placidusax's Ruin Incantation

title: Dragonlord Placidusax (SoG)
notes: Found after defeating Dragonlord Placidusax

title: Beast Champion Set
notes: Dropped by Recusant Bernahl

title: Blasphemous Claw
notes: Dropped by Recusant Bernahl

title: Devourer's Scepter
notes: Dropped by Recusant Bernahl

title: Old Lord's Talisman
notes: In tower past the invasion event, in a chest

title: Draconic Tree Sentinel
notes: Return to the Beside the Great Bridge SoG, go back to the bridge, and head up. Drops the Malformed Dragon Set

title: Malformed Dragon Set
notes: Dropped by Draconic Tree Sentinel on the bridge leading to main boss in this area

title: Maliketh the Black Blade
notes: Drops Remembrance of the Black Blade. NOTE: FINISH FARMING ITEMS IN LEYNDELL, ROYAL CAPITAL PRIOR TO DEFEATING MALIKETH

title: Remembrance of the Black Blade
notes: Dropped by Maliketh the Black Blade. Can be turned in to Enia to receive Maliketh's Black Blade or Black Blade Incantation

title: Leyndell, Capital of Ash
notes: Once you are transported to this area, rest at the Leyndell, Capital of Ash SoG

title: Erdtree's Favor +2
notes: Return to the Forbidden Lands SoG, then take elevator back up. Follow path that leads back to Leyndell and ignore the enemies. Found in courtyard with Ulcerated Tree Spirit, on broken tree log. There is an ulcerated tree spirit roaming the area and another that will popup when you get close. If you swing around the stairs and hug the wall to the left, you can sneak past both

title: Somber Ancient Dragon Smithing Stone
notes: From Leyndell, Capital of Ash SoG, move West keeping dragon statue/corpse to left. Enter destroyed building, climb ladder. Found on corpse near wandering Valient Gargoyle

title: Crimson Amber Medallion +2
notes: From Leyndell, Capital of Ash SoG, head South toward buildings and you'll see a hole on the ground, with a manhole cover near it. Jump down to wooden beam below and find on a corpse

title: Goldmask
notes: From Leyndell, Capital of Ash SoG, head Southwest to curved staircase. Right of staircase and down a slope. Cross broken bridge, then go left to find him. Interact to receive the Mending Rune of Perfect Order. NOTE: Do not speak to Choryn yet, you'll pass by him on the way to Goldmask, but do not speak to him

title: Mending Rune of Perfect Order
notes: Received from Goldmask if you've followed his questline. Needed for an ending

title: Goldmask's Set
notes: Reload area where you last found Goldmask and his armor will be there. The mask is found earlier in the guide

title: Corhyn
notes: Southwest from Leyndell, Capital of Ash SoG, base of giant spear. Exhaust dialogue then reload area to receive Corhyn's Robe, flail, and Corhyn's Bell Bearing

title: Corhyn's Robe
notes: Received after exhausting the last of Corhyn's dialogue and reloading the area. Not part of an armor set

title: Corhyn's Bell Bearing
notes: Received after exhausting the last of Corhyn's dialogue and reloading the area

title: Flail
notes: Received after exhausting the last of Corhyn's dialogue and reloading the area

title: Sir Gideon Ofnir, the All-Knowing
notes: Go to curved staircase and climb them into the building. Drops the All-Knowing Set and the Scepter of All-Knowing

title: All-Knowing Set
notes: Dropped by Sir Gideon Ofnir, the All-Knowing

title: Scepter of the All-Knowing
notes: Dropped by Sir Gideon Ofnir, the All-Knowing

title: Erdtree Sanctuary
notes: Found after defeating Gideon Ofnir

title: Ghost
notes: From the Erdtree Sanctuary SoG, continue out to balcony and look near the giant branch you can climb up. Gives additional lore

title: Queen's Bedchamber
notes: Continue up the giant root, continuing like you did to fight Morgott

title: Erdtree Heal
notes: Found near Queen's Bedchamber

title: Hoarah Loux, the Warrior
notes: At the end of the area where you fought Morgott. Drops Remembrance of Hoarah Loux

title: Remembrance of Hoarah Loux
notes: Dropped by Hoarah Loux, the Warrior. Can be traded to Enia at the Roundtable Hold for the Axe of Godfrey or Ash of War: Hoarah Loux's Earthshaker

title: Elden Lord Armor
notes: Sold by Enia after defeating Hoarah Loux

title: Elden Throne
notes: Found after defeating Hoarah Loux

title: Radagon of the Golden Order and Elden Beast
notes: Final boss in the game. Drops Elden Remembrance

title: Elden Remembrance
notes: Dropped by Radagon of the Golden Order and Elden Beast boss. Can be traded to Enia at the Roundtable Hold to get the Sacred Relics Sword or Marika's Hammer

title: Fractured Marika
notes: Found after defeating Elden Beast. NOTE: DO NOT do anything else except rest at the SoG. You can create a copy of your save file and reload to earn the ending achievements easier

title: Ending Prep
notes: This marker is used to remind you to do everything you need to with remembrances, farm for any items prior to the next playthrough, determine which ending you want, buy everything you can from all of the merchants if you haven't already

title: Weeping Peninsula Bell-Bearing Mausoleum
notes: Found South of the Fourth Church of Marika. Duplicate Remembrance of the Starscourge. This makes Radahn optional on Journey 2

title: East Liurnia Bell-Bearing Mausoleum
notes: Found East of the East Gate Bridge Trestle SoG. To get on top of this, you need to use the spirit spring nearby and then from above, drop down the large tombstone platforms in the cliff face. Wait for the Mausoleum to be close enough to jump to it. Duplicate Remembrance of the Blasphemous. This makes Rykard optional on Journey 2

title: Mausoleum Compound Mausoleum 1
notes: Non-Bell Bearing. Northwest from the Ruined Labyrinth SoG. Duplicate the Remembrance of the Regal Ancestor. This makes the Regal Ancestor optional on Journey 2

title: Mausoleum Compound Mausoleum 2
notes: Non-Bell Bearing. Near Mausoleum Compound SoG. Duplicate the Rememberance of the Naturalborn. This makes Astel optional on Journey 2

title: Deeproot Depths Bell-Bearing Mausoleum
notes: Northof the Nameless Eternal City SoG. To access this one, you need to climb to the giant tree roots and then jump on top of it. Duplicate the Remembrance of the Blood Lord. This makes Mohg optional on Journey 2

title: Mountaintops of Giants Bell-Bearing Mausoleum
notes: East of Castle Sol Main Gate. Duplicate Rememberance of the Rot Goddess. This makes Malenia optional on Journey 2

title: Journey 2 Boss Information
notes: For Journey 2, you will fight Godrick and Rennala which will give you easy access to Leyndell and the extra copies of their remembrance. You will also kill Morgott, Fire Giant, Maliketh, Hoarah Loux, and the Elden Beast again to get their remembrance. You will also need to kill Placidusax

title: Axe of Godrick
notes: Give Remembrance of the Grafted to Enia

title: Grafted Dragon
notes: Give Remembrance of the Grafted to Enia

title: Carian Regal Scepter
notes: Give Remembrance of the Full Moon to Enia

title: Rennala's Full Moon
notes: Give Remembrance of the Full Moon to Enia

title: Starscourge Greatsword
notes: Give Remembrance of the Starscourge to Enia

title: Lion Greatbow
notes: Give Remembrance of the Starscourge to Enia

title: Winged Greathorn
notes: Give Remembrance of the Regal Ancestor to Enia

title: Ancestral Spirit's Horn
notes: Give Remembrance of the Regal Ancestor to Enia

title: Ash of War: Waves of Darkness
notes: Give Remembrance of the Naturalborn to Enia

title: Bastard's Stars
notes: Give Remembrance of the Naturalborn to Enia

title: Morgott's Cursed Sword
notes: Give Enia Remembrance of the Omen King to get this

title: Regal Omen Bairn
notes: Give Enia Remembrance of the Omen King to get this

title: Fortissax's Lightning Spear
notes: Give Remembrance of the Lichdragon to Enia

title: Death Lightning
notes: Give Remembrance of the Lichdragon to Enia

title: Rykard's Rancor
notes: Give Remembrance of the Blasphemous to Enia

title: Blasphemous Blade
notes: Give Remembrance of the Blasphemous to Enia

title: Mohgwyn's Sacred Spear
notes: Give Remembrance of the Blood Lord to Enia

title: Bloodboon
notes: Give Remembrance of the Blood Lord to Enia

title: Hand of Malenia
notes: Give Remembrance of the Rot Goddess to Enia

title: Scarlet Aeonia
notes: Give Remembrance of the Rot Goddess to Enia

title: Placidusax's Ruin
notes: Give Remembrance of the Dragon Lord to Enia

title: Dragon King's Cragblade
notes: Give Remembrance of the Dragon Lord to Enia

title: Maliketh's Black Blade
notes: Give Remembrance of the Black Blade to Enia

title: Black Blade
notes: Give Remembrance of the Black Blade to Enia

title: Axe of Godfrey
notes: Give Remembrance of Hoarah Loux to Enia

title: Ash of War: Hoarah Loux's Earthshaker
notes: Give Remembrance of Hoarah Loux to Enia

title: Marika's Hammer
notes: Give Elden Remembrance to Enia

title: Sacred Relic Sword
notes: Give Elden Remembrance to Enia

title: Burn, O Flame!
notes: Give Remembrance of the Fire Giant to Enia

title: Giant's Red Braid
notes: Give Remembrance of the Fire Giant to Enia

title: Queen's Set
notes: Buy from Enia after defeating Renalla

title: Radahn's Set
notes: Purchase from Enia after defeating Starscourge Radahn

title: Briar Set
notes: Sold by Enia after defeating Elmer of the Briar boss in The Shaded Castle

title: Fell Omen Cloak
notes: Bought from Enia after defeating Morgott the final time

title: Maliketh's Set
notes: Can be purchased from Enia once you've defeated Maliketh the Black Blade in Crumbling Farum Azula

title: Elden Lord Set
notes: Sold by Enia after defeating Hoarah Loux

title: Dragonice
notes: Received by trading in Dragon Hearts at Cathedral of Dragon Communion

title: Rotten Breath
notes: Received by trading in Dragon Hearts at Cathedral of Dragon Communion

title: Glintstone Breath
notes: Received by trading in Dragon Hearts at Cathedral of Dragon Communion

title: Ekzykes's Decay
notes: Received by trading in Dragon Hearts at Cathedral of Dragon Communion

title: Agheel's Flame
notes: Received by trading in Dragon Hearts at Cathedral of Dragon Communion

title: Smarag's Glintstone Breath
notes: Received by trading in Dragon Hearts at Cathedral of Dragon Communion

title: Greyoll's Roar
notes: Unlocked at the Cathedral of Dragon Communion by defeating Elder Dragon Greyoll

title: Magma Breath
notes: Available at the Cathedral of Dragon Communion after defeating the Magma Wyrm in Mt. Gelmir

title: Theodorix's Magma
notes: Unlocked after defeating Great Wyrm Theodorix in the Consecrated Snowfield

title: Borealis' Mist
notes: Unlocked by defeating Borealis the Freezing Fog

title: Hugh
notes: Speak to Hugh and he will have forgotten everything

title: Endings
notes: Used as a marker for selecting your ending. If you need the achievements, make sure to make a copy of your save file and reload for each ending (PC Only)

title: Elden Lord - Age of Fracture
notes: Touch statue after Elden Beast and choose Mend the Elden Ring

title: Elden Lord - Age of Duskborn
notes: Requires Mending Rune of the Death-Prince by completing Fia's questline. Touch statue at end of Elden Beast boss and choose Use the Mending Rune of the Death-Prince

title: Elden Lord - Blessing of Despair
notes: Requires Mending Rune of the Fell Curse by completing Dung Eater's questline. Touch statue after Elden Beast boss and choose Use the Mending Rune of the Fell Curse

title: Elden Lord - Age of Order
notes: Requires Mending Rune of the Perfect Order by completing Corhyn's and Goldmask's quest. Touch statues after Elden Beast and choose Use the Mending Rune of Perfect Order

title: Age of the Stars
notes: Must have completed Ranni's questline. Summon her using blue summon sign near statue at end of Elden Beast. Best ending

title: Lord of Frenzied Flame Ending
notes: This is the games bad ending. To get this ending, you need to remove all equipment, and go through the door near Hyetta at the Frenzied Flame Proscription SoG. NOTE: Do this after you've selected an ending above and credits roll, then you can get the Frenzied Flame Seal without getting the Lord of Frenzied Flame Ending

title: Hyetta
notes: If you speak to Hyetta after speaking to the Three Fingers and use Touch Her option, then exhaust dialogue, she will drop the Frenzied Flame Seal. At this point, you are locked into the Lord of Frenzied Flame Ending unless you use Miquella's Needle in the Placidusax arena

title: Frenzied Flame Seal
notes: Only obtainable by completing Hyetta's questline and by speaking to the Three Fingers and Hyetta in the Subterranean Shunning-Grounds

title: Curing the Frenzied Flame
notes: If you received the Frenzied Flame Seal and want to reverse the Frenzied Flame to get a different ending, warp to the Dragonlord Placidusax SoG in Crumbling Farum Azula and use the Miquella's Needle consumable. This will allow you to get a different ending

title: Farming Section
notes: Used for anything not otherwise noted, and farming. Farm whatever you need now, as on journey 2 things will be much stronger

notes: Demi-Humans

title: Celebrant's Cleaver
notes: Celebrants

notes: Soldiers

notes: Crystallian

notes: Man-Serpent holding this weapon

notes: Soldiers, Fort Gael

notes: Skeletons that wield a scimitar

title: Aristocrat Set
notes: Undead Enemies. Does not contain gloves. Need to look for the Aristocrat Garb (Altered) and Asitocrat Headband, easiest to farm at the Kingsrealm Ruins in Liurnia

title: Banished Knight Set
notes: Banished Knights. Two near Cathedral of Dragon Communion in Caelid which drop the helm with the red hood and the altered chest armor. The unaltered chest armor can be farmed from the Banished Knight in Castle Sol, near the Church of the Eclipse SoG. Head up the ladder outside and around the tower to find the dual wielding knight. The altered helm (no hood) can be farmed with the banished knights in Stormveil Castle

title: Blackflame Monk Set
notes: Blackflame Monk, Divine Tower of Caelid: Basement SoG

title: Blue Silver Set
notes: Farm the Albinauric Archers near Ordina, or kill Latenna in the Slumbering Wolfshack on your second playthrough and she drops the set

title: Cleanrot Set
notes: Cleanrot Knights, Shaded Castle

title: Cuckoo Knight Set
notes: Cuckoo Knights, Liurnia of the Lakes, four found Northeast of the East Raya Lucaria Gate SoG

title: Depraved Perfumer Set
notes: Depraved Perfumer, Shaded Castle Ramparts

title: Duelist Set
notes: Duelist, Leyndell, Royal Capital. Does not contain Gloves. NOTE: Cannot be farmed after defeating Maliketh

title: Exile Set
notes: Soldiers with Red Sashes, Stormveil Castle

title: Festive Set
notes: Dancing Enemies, Windmill Village. Only contains Helmet and Chest Armor. The armor has an "altered" variant

title: Blue Festive Set
notes: Dancing Enemies, Windmill Village. Only contains Helmet and Chest Armor

title: Fire Monk Set
notes: Fire Monks, Mountaintops of the Giants

title: Fire Prelate Set
notes: Fire Prelate, near Giants' Mountaintop Catacombs and Fort Laidd in Mt. Gelmir for the Altered variant of the chest

title: Fur Set
notes: Horned Soldiers, Liurnia of the Lakes. Does not contain gloves

title: Leyndell Foot Soldier Set
notes: Foot Soldiers, Altus Plateau. Only drops the Helmet and the Chest Armor. Drops the Gilded Foot Soldier Cap

title: Mausoleum Foot Soldier Set
notes: Mausoleum Foot Soldiers South of the Apostate Derelict in the Consecrated Snowfields, near the Wandering Mausoleum. Need the Bloodsoaked Tabard with normal foot soldier legs and gloves

title: Godrick Knight Set
notes: Armored Soldier, Gatefront Ruins

title: Godrick Soldier Set
notes: Soldiers, Limgrave, Gatefront Ruins

title: Godrick Foot Soldier Set
notes: Limgrave, three can be found South of the Agheel Lake South SoG. This is the only foot soldier that can drop the gauntlets and leg armor, both of which are part of other sets. Also drops the Foot Soldier Cap

title: Guardian Set
notes: Guardian Soldiers, Dragonbarrow Fork. An alternate Chest Piece can be found from the Guardians with blossoming flowers. NOTE: Full Bloom variant of the chest piece is not available after defeating Maliketh

title: Highwayman Set
notes: Enemies in Murkwater Cave. The footsoldier grieves are also part of this set

title: Kaiden Set
notes: Soldiers on Horseback, Gatefront Ruins

title: Leyndell Knight Set
notes: Armored Knights, Altus Plateau on the road from the Grand Lift of Dectus

title: Leyndell Soldier Set
notes: Armored Soldiers, Mt Gelmir heading West from the First Mt. Gelmir Campsite SoG

title: Marionette Soldier Set
notes: Marionette Enemies, Raya Lucaria Academy. Only Helmet and Chest Armor

title: Mausoleum Knight Set
notes: Headless enemy outside of the Black Knife Catacombs in Liurnia

title: Mausoleum Soldier Set
notes: Headless Enemies near the East Gate Bridge Trestle SoG in Liurnia, head toward the wandering mausoleum

title: Night Maiden Set
notes: Robed Night Maiden, Nokstella near the Night's Sacred Ground in the church has two

title: Nox Monk Set
notes: Robed Enemies, Nokstella, Eternal City, can be found just up the stairs in the Stonesword Key room just before the bridge. The Leg Armor and Gloves are the same as the Nox Swordstress Set

title: Nox Swordstress Set
notes: Robed, Sword-Wielding Enemies riding Ants, Nokstella, Eternal City. The Leg Armor and Gloves are the same as the Nox Monk Set

title: Page Set
notes: Page Enemies, Leyndell. Does not contain Gloves

title: High Page Set
notes: High Page Enemies, Leyndell, Royal Capital. Only contains the hood and the chest, the legs are the normal Page legs. NOTE: Cannot be farmed here after defeating Maliketh, one can be found in Raya Lucaria

title: Perfumer Set
notes: Perfumer, Altus, four can be found in the Perfumer's Grotto

title: Radahn Soldier Set
notes: Soldiers, Fort Gael

title: Redmane Knight Set
notes: Redmane Knight, one is found Southwest of the Smoldering Wall SoG

title: Vulgar Militia Set
notes: Small Soldier Dudes, Farum Great Bridge, Caelid

title: Commoner's Set
notes: Firepot throwing guards, Stormveil Castle. Typically drops Chest Armor and Leg Armor, but can sometimes drop the Commoner's Headband if the variant is wearing it

title: Raya Lucarian Soldier Set
notes: Phantom soldiers in Caria Manor. NOTE: The surcoat is labeled as "Cuckoo Surcoat"

title: Raya Lucarian Foot Soldier Set
notes: Helmeted Undead Foot Soldiers, Raya Lucaria Academy. Several found near Purified Ruins. Can drop the Foot Soldier Helmet

title: Imp Head (Cat)
notes: Jade Goblins in catacombs

title: Imp Head (Fanged)
notes: Imp enemies, Wyndham catacombs. Four are found in the first two rooms after taking the elevator down

title: Imp Head (Long-Tongued)
notes: Imp enemies, Subterranean-Shunning Grounds, easiest through South shortcut door from the Underground Roadside SoG, plenty around the pipes

title: Octopus Head
notes: Smaller Land Octopus, 12 found South of the Saintsbridge SoG in a small lake

title: Haligtree Foot Soldier Set
notes: Foot Soldiers, Elphael, Brace of the Haligtree. Start at the Prayer Room SoG and continue through the area. Drops the Sacred Crown Helm

title: Haligtree Soldier Set
notes: Soldiers, Elphael, Brace of the Haligtree. Start at the Prayer Room SoG and continue through the area

title: Marionette Soldier Birdhelm
notes: Marionette Bird. Not part of an armor set

title: Old Aristocrat Set
notes: Aristocrats holding a banner. Three can be found North and East of the Church of Vows in Liurnia. Does not contain gloves

title: Soldier Noble Set
notes: Soldier Nobles found near Waypoint Ruins, near the Troll=pulled Carriage. Includes the Aristocrat Coat and Aristocrat Hat

title: Pumpkin Head
notes: Pumpkin Head, Saintsbridge

title: Radahn Foot Soldier Set
notes: Standard Foot Soldier, Caelid. Most of the set is the basic foot soldier armor, you are looking for the Scarlet Tabard (chest). Can find the Foot Soldier Helm

title: Shaman Set
notes: Horned Shaman, Nokron, Eternal City. Set includes the Shining Horned Headband which is a guarenteed drop from the shaman singing in the small ruin area West of the Hallowhorn Grounds

title: Battle Hammer
notes: Hammer Wielding Duelists, Near Colloseum in Leyndel. NOTE: Cannot be farmed after beating Maliketh

title: Raya Lucarian Sorcerer Set
notes: Raya Lucarian Sorcerer, Raya Lucaria. Shared Leg Armor and Gloves with Lazuli Sorcerer Set

title: Lazuli Sorcerer Set
notes: Glintstone Sorcerer, Raya Lucaria

title: Haligtree Knight Set
notes: From the Drainage Channel SoG in the Haligtree, head out on the roots, follow until rampart/bridge to your right, then drop down again. NOTE: The helmet cannot be farmed but is found on a corpse earlier in the guide

title: Sacrificial Twig
notes: Can be farmed by killing Lesser Wormface in Altus Plateau around the Minor Erdtree and in Southern Crumbling Farum Azula

title: Smithing Stone 6, 7, 8
notes: The Haligtree Soldiers found when leaving from the Prayer Room SoG drop these, and a decent amount of runes

title: Erdtree Flower
notes: You can find this all over in Limgrave and other areas. Early game you can find three near the Agheel Lake North SoG, near the swords in the ground

title: Needle Knight Leda
notes: Found at the Cocoon of the Empyrean SoG after defeating Mohg. Speak to her for lore regarding Miquella and the Land of Shadow

title: Gravesite Plain
notes: First area after interacting with the arm coming out of the cocoon in the Mohg boss arena. Upon reaching the new area, exit the cave to reach the new region

title: Gravesite Plain (SoG)
notes: First SoG after exiting the cave in the new region

title: Map: Gravesite Plain
notes: Head Northeast from the Gravesite Plain SoG, toward the Belurat legacy dungeon

title: Ghost
notes: Found just past the Gravesite Map location

title: Scorched Ruins
notes: Found just North of the Gravesite Map location

title: Hefty Cracked Pot
notes: Found up on a ledge on a corpse to the right after entering the ruins

title: Greater Potentate's Cookbook 1
notes: Found on a corpse on the ruined steps, continuing up from the Hefty Cracked Pot

title: Blade of Mercy
notes: Continue through the ruins and make your way to the highest tower. Will be in that tower behind a door, in a chest

title: Scorched Ruins (SoG)
notes: Continue North through the Scorched Ruins to find its SoG

title: Pot-Wielding Shadow Undead
notes: From the Scorched Ruins SoG, head East and look for a Shadow Undead holding a pot above its head. Kill this for a Scadutree Fragment

title: Scadutree Fragment
notes: Dropped by the Pot-Wielding Shadow Undead near the cemetary to the East of the Scorched Ruins

title: Revered Spirit Ashes
notes: Continue South and then Southeast from the Pot-Wielding Shadow enemy, and up a small cliff to find a headless corpse statue. Interact with it to receive this item

title: Larval Tear
notes: Continue South/Southwest from the Revered Spirit Ashes item and find this surrounded by spirit gravestones.NOTE: Need to do this at night to see the spirit gravestones

title: Logur, the Beast Claw
notes: From the Scorched Ruins or from the Larval Tear in the previous step, head South along the road and then into the woods. Enemy walks around the woods. Drops the Beast Claw

title: Beast Claw
notes: Dropped by Logur, the Beast Claw

title: Church of Consolation
notes: Found by continuing along the road from the Scorched Ruins, leading South and then curving back North/Northeast

title: Black Steel Knight
notes: Found in the Church of Consolation, drops the Black Steel Greathammer

title: Black Steel Greathammer
notes: Dropped by the Black Steel knight in the Church of Consolation

title: Scadutree Fragment
notes: Two are found in the Church of Consolation

title: Western Nameless Mausoleum
notes: Return to the Scorched Ruins SoG, then head directly West until you find the decaying trees and a building, surrounded by giant bird creatures

title: Blackgaol Knight
notes: Found inside the Western Nameless Mausoleum. Drops Greatsword of Solitude and the Solitude Set

title: Greatsword of Solitude
notes: Dropped by the Blackgaol Knight

title: Solitude Set
notes: Dropped by the Blackgaol Knight

title: Furnace Golem
notes: Found North along the path from the Scorched Ruins SoG. NOTE: Difficult enemy early on, you can come back to this later. Drops the Deflecting Hardtear

title: Deflecting Hardtear
notes: Dropped by the Furnace Golem enemy North of the Scorched Ruins SoG

title: Three Path Cross
notes: Return to the Scorched Ruins SoG and head North/Northeast. Try and avoid the large fire giant for now. Continue until you see a large doorway and you will find this SoG nearby

title: Miquella's Cross
notes: Found near the Three Path Cross SoG. Interact with this

title: Redmane Freyja
notes: Found near the Three Path Cross SoG. Interact with this. Speak to them for dialogue and to advance their quest

title: Hornsent
notes: Found near the Three Path Cross SoG. Interact with this. Speak to them for dialogue and to advance their quest. They will give you the Cross Map

title: Cross Map
notes: Given to you by Hornsent near the Three Path Cross SoG

title: Backhand Blade
notes: From the Three Path Cross SoG, head East past the fire giant until you find a small mausoleum with this weapon

title: The Sacred Tower Painting
notes: Continue South/Southeast from the Backhand Blade location along the cliff face to find this painting in a small alcove

title: Ash of War: Savage Lion's Claw
notes: Return to the Three Path Cross SoG and head Northwest, following the cliff face (not through the large door). Continue along and you will find a small camp with this at the small fire

title: Main Gate Cross
notes: Return to the Three Path Cross SoG and head West through the large doorway and follow the road until just before the large stairwell. You will find two more NPCs here as well as another Miquella Cross

title: Sir Ansbach
notes: Found near the Main Gate Cross SoG. Exhaust dialogue

title: Moore
notes: Found near the Main Gate Cross SoG. Exhaust dialogue. Is a merchant. Purchase one item from them to unlock dialogue. NOTE: DO NOT KILL FOR BELL-BEARING YET

title: Hidden Passage
notes: Look to the South of the Main Gate Cross SoG for a hidden path. Take this to a hidden area and the Cliffroad Terminus SoG

title: Cliffroad Terminus
notes: Found by following the secret path South from the Main Gate Cross SoG

title: Prospect Town
notes: Found South of the Cliffroad Terminus SoG

title: Bloodfiend's
notes: Continue through the town and you will find a group of Bloodfiend enemies. Kill them and they will drop the Bloodfiend's Arm

title: Bloodfiend's Arm
notes: Found by defeating the Bloodfiend enemies in Prospect Town NOTE: Not farmable

title: String-Seller's Bell Bearing
notes: Found in the Western part of the town, hanging from a cliff in a pot. Use ranged to destroy the pot and it will drop

title: Outer God Heirloom
notes: Found in the tower in the Southern part of the Prospect Town, behind the door in a chest

title: Forager Brood
notes: Near where you found the Larval Tear, or South from the Revered Spirit Ashes. Speak to Forager Brood (pest creature) for the Forager Brood Cookbook 2

title: Forager Brood Cookbook 2
notes: Found by speaking to Forager Brood (pest creature) East of the Prospect Town or South of the Revered Spirit Ashes

title: Greater Potentate's Cookbook 5
