notes: Continue Southeast until you find some large lightning ram enemies. Found on a corpse near some rocks

title: Church of Benediction
notes: From the large lightning ram enemies, continue South by hugging the cliffs to the West and you'll find a small cave that leads to this

title: Blessed Blue Dew Talisman
notes: Found inside the Church of Benediction

title: Oathseeker Knight Armor
notes: Found in the Northern part of the Church of Benediction, by looking over the ledge

title: Pata
notes: Found in the Northern part of the Church of Benediction, by looking over the ledge

title: Artist's Shack
notes: Head back through the hidden cave where you came from, then make your way onto the plateau above you to the East. Contains the Incursion Painting

title: Incursion Painting
notes: Found in the Artist's Shack above the Church of Benediction

title: Greatbridge, North
notes: Return to the Three Path Cross SoG, then head North along the road until you find this SoG, just outside the Abandoned Ailing Village

title: Abandoned Ailing Village
notes: Just past the Greatbridge, North SoG

title: Ghost
notes: Found just inside the Abandoned Ailing Village

title: Revered Spirit Ashes
notes: On the altar near the cliff edge to the East

title: Ailment Talisman
notes: Head Northeast and look for this on a wooden platform on the cliff edge

title: Run-Down Traveler's Rest
notes: Found South/Southeast from the Abandoned Ailing Village, follow the cliff edge down

title: Greater Potentate's Cookbook 2
notes: Found in the Run-Down Traveler's Rest location near the Abandoned Ailing Village

title: Greater Potentate's Cookbook 10
notes: Return to the Greatbridge, North SoG and head North. Find this in another ruined building near the cliff edge

title: Great Katana
notes: Found in the lake to the West of the Greatbridge, North SoG. Near the Ghostflame Dragon

title: Ghostflame Dragon
notes: Found in the lake to the West of the Greatbridge, North SoG. NOTE: Can be a difficult fight. Drops Dragon Heart and Somber Ancient Dragon Smithing Stone

title: Dragon Heart
notes: Dropped by the Ghostflame Dragon near the Greatbridge, North SoG

title: Somber Ancient Dragon Smithing Stone
notes: Dropped by the Ghostflame Dragon near the Greatbridge, North SoG

title: Belurat Gaol
notes: Head West from the lake with the Ghostflame Dragon and head past the broken cages on the ground. You will find the entrance to this. Follow the tunnel to find the SoG

title: Ghost
notes: Head through the next tunnel and out the door. Turn left and head down the stairs/path. At the end the stairs will break from under you. Take the narrow path to the right. Head through the Northeast door. Look for a small hole to the right and jump through. Continue through the next room and out the Southwest door. Head through the next door and speak to this ghost for lore

title: Hefty Cracked Pot
notes: Continue out the next door in the room with the hanging jars. Head to the other side and look for a jar you can jump onto. Descend the jars to the wooden platform near the bottom and find this in the chest

title: Greater Potentate's Cookbook 11
notes: Drop down from the wooden platform. Head through the door in the West of this large room. Drop to the stone bridge and go across. On the other side, drop down to some pots below. head to the Southwest and curve around the path to the right, then the left, weaving in between the pots. You will come across some more buried in the ground to the right. Jump over those and head to the West. Curve around the pot to the right and find this

title: Greatjar
notes: Jump down to the Southeast and continue through the jars to the Southeast to find a door. Take the stairs leading down. Go across the stone bridge and immediately head right Look over the ledge for a hanging jar you can jump down to and it will begin to rise.  Once it reaches the top, look to the Northwest for another jar to jump to and continue to the stone pillar. Then jump across two more jars and head up the stairs and into the room. Jump up to the altar to find this

title: Demi-Human Swordmaster Onze
notes: Head Southeast and look for a pot over the ledge to jump down to. Do this again and get to the stone bridge you were at before. Jump to the Jar to the Southeast, then to the stone pillars coming up from the ground. Drop down to the next ledge to find this boss gate in the cavern. Drops the Demi-Human Swordsman Yosh Spirit Ash

title: Demi-Human Swordsman Yosh
notes: Dropped by Demi-Human Swordmaster Onze in the Belurat Gaol

title: Gravebird Armor
notes: Leave the Belurat Gaol and head North. It is near a small mausoleum and some bird enemies

title: Serpent Crest Shield
notes: Found Southwest of the lake with the Ghostflame Dragon, must interact with a ghost that is found here after obtaining the Incursion Painting in a previous step

title: Belurat, Tower Settlement
notes: Return to the Main Gate Cross SoG to begin this legacy dungeon. From here, continue up the stairs and enter the large door

title: Revered Spirit Ashes
notes: Continue up the next set of stairs. Found on the altar in the room with the first giant scorpion

title: Belurat, Tower Settlement (SoG)
notes: Continue through another door and up the stairs, then through another door to get outside. Continue along the path to find this SoG

title: Small Private altar
notes: From the Belurat, Tower Settlement SoG, head Southeast. Continue past the fountain and up the stairs slightly to the right. Continue Southeast, under the bridge with the ranged enemies,  up the ramp and through the doorway on the left. Continue up the stairs in the room to find this SoG

title: Fire Knight Queelign
notes: Head into the next room, outside, and up the stairs to the North. Turn right and continue through a rubble area heading Northeast until you pass under an archway leading to a large fountain. He will invade here. Killing him will drop the Crusade Insignia Talisman

title: Crusade Insignia
notes: Dropped by Fire Knight Queelign near the large fountain in Belurat

title: Ash of War: Shriek of Sorrow
notes: Found on the other side of the large fountain near where Fire Knight Queelign invaded

title: Storeroom Key
notes: Return to the Small Private altar SoG, then head out the same door as before, but head up the stairs to the Northwest then immediately cut right. Continue along this route, turn left, then look for a doorway on the right. Go in this room and up the ladder, found on a corpse

title: Well Depths Key
notes: Continue outside from the Storeroom Key, then look for a red roof you can jump to next to some stairs. Hop onto this and then the bridge connecting the two buildings. Go into the building on the other end of the bridge to find this key

title: Shortcut
notes: Return to the stairs near the room with the Storeroom Key, then head up the stairs. Take the left stairs down, then left and down again and you will find an elevator. Ride this down to create a shortcut from the first grace

title: Bone Bow
notes: Take the elevator shortcut back up. Continue back up the stairs, then left toward the open room. Found in the back of this room. NOTE: Be wary of the two scorpions that will drop down in this room

title: Scadutree Fragment
notes: Return to the alley then climb over the rubble to find another door. Continue up the stairs and through the door in the back left. Found near the MIquella Cross

title: Dried Bouquet
notes: Exit the door on the right and continue to the altar on the ledge

title: Pot-Wielding Shadow Undead
notes: Return to the first SoG, take the elevator up, then return to the split path, then go right. Continue along the rooftops, then hop onto the streets above. Drops a Revered Spirit Ash

title: Stagefront
notes: Continue up the stairs and into the tower and continue up the stairs until you exit. This SoG will be right before the boss door

title: Hornsent Grandam
notes: Return to the Small Private Altar SoG, then head out the left doorway and across the bridge. Use the Storeroom Key obtained earlier to open this door and speak to this NPC

title: Directional Step
notes: Return to the Belurat, Tower Settlement SoG, then head Southeast, up the stairs to the right just past the first fountain, then cut right again and head to a second fountain. A well will be on the left which you can go down. Use the Well Depths Key on the door and continue through

title: Lesser Ulcerated Tree Spirit
notes: Continue from the Well Depths door you opened before, and look for a large open area. The Ulcerated Tree Spirit will appear here. Drops the Immunizing Horn Charm +2

title: Immunizing Horn Charm +2
notes: Dropped by the Lesser Ulcerated Tree Spirit in the Well Depths in Belurat

title: Horned Warrior
notes: Return to the start of this area and take the other direction heading toward the underside of the bridge. Drops the Horned Warrior's Sword

title: Horned Warrior's Sword
notes: Dropped by the Horned Warrior in the Well Depths Moat

title: Poisoned Hand
notes: Continue on to a submerged tower to find this on a corpse

title: Redmane Freyja
notes: Return to the Stagefront SoG. Near the boss door, you can summon this NPC to help with the fight

title: Divine Beast Dancing Lion
notes: Drops the Remembrance of the Dancing Lion and the Divine Beast Head Helm

title: Divine Beast Head
notes: Dropped by the Divine Beast Dancing Lion in Belurat

title: Remembrance of the Dancing Lion
notes: Dropped by the Divine Beast Dancing Lion in Belurat

title: Theatre of the Divine Beast
notes: Found in the boss arena after defeating the Divine Beast Dancing Lion boss

title: Ghost
notes: Found kneeling on the staircase leading from the Theatre of the Divine Beast lift

title: Tower of Shadow Message
notes: Continue up the staircase to the top and find this on the right

title: Watchful Spirit
notes: Received by speaking to Hornsent Grandam while wearing the Divine Beast Head

title: Scorpion Stew
notes: Received by speaking to Hornsent Grandam while wearing the Divine Beast Head

title: Ellac Greatbridge
notes: Head Northeast from the Three Path Cross SoG

title: Firespark Perfume Bottle
notes: Found in the section of camp to the right after crossing the Ellac Greatbridge

title: Fire Knight's Cookbook 2
notes: Head to the Northern part of the camp and find this near the Black Steel Knight enemy

title: Castle Front
notes: Continue Northeast past the camp to find this before another bridge

title: Spelldrake Talisman +3
notes: Follow sloping path to the left of the bridge, then leap over the chasm to a room at the base of the castle

title: Fog Rift Catacombs
notes: Return to the Castle Front SoG, then head North beyond the camp and into the canyon. You will eventually begin going down a slope, and will find the door to this location embedded in the side of the rockface

title: Ancient Dragon Knight's Cookbook 1
notes: Continue through the catacombs, heading into the next room and then left. Be wary of the spike ceiling trap in the big room. Make your way across the room to the hall to the West. Continue into the next room then turn right, follow this path down some stairs, and then right again into a smaller room

title: Great Ghost Glovewort
notes: Return to the previous room and continue through the hall to the West, heading down some stairs. You will notice the spike ceiling trap go down, then jump on top of it. Make your way to the South hallway quickly then turn left at the enemy. Continue East and find this near a Black Steel Knight enemy

title: Black Knight Commander Andreas
notes: Return to the previous room and turn left. Wait for the spike ceiling trap to fall and jump onto it, then quickly make your way to the East into a narrow hallway. Follow the path, turn left, then head North until you find this in a coffin

title: Electrocharge
notes: Return to the previous room and then go right and out a window. Continue West, down some stairs, and across a bridge. Turn right, go through a hallway. Jump onto the spike ceiling trap, head to the hallway in the East, then quickly turn around and drop below the spike ceiling trap as it is going up. Head to the Western stairs and take the lift down. Continue West, then South into a hallway. Continue into the next room with the two spike ceiling traps, jump into the hole in the second alcove on the left. Head North, and then West and you will find this in a bigger room with an enemy and water on the ground

title: Ash of War: Blinkbolt
notes: Return to the previous room, then go up the ladder on the left. Head through the hallway, then jump down and turn left, then left again and head into the next hallway. Continue through the large room with two spike ceiling traps. Climb on top of the platform at the other side of the room, then wait for the ceiling trap to lower and jump in the small notch on the ceiling trap. Quickly turn around at the top and jump into the room to find this in a chest

title: Stone-Sheathed Sword
notes: Return to the spike ceiling trap, then wait for it to come up again and jump on top. Run to the other side and look for a large opening on the right. Jump through and find this on an altar. NOTE: Later you will be able to convert this weapon to the Sword of Light or the Sword of Dark. Unless you come back to this location and grab this item on NG+, you will only be able to have one or the other at any given time. You can also switch between the two versions freely by going back to the Altars

title: Death Knight
notes: From the Stone-Sheathed Sword, look to the left when facing away from the altar and go down the ladder on the left. Turn right in the next room and drop down the hole. Head through the archway in the West and take the lift down. Continue West and down some stairs to find this boss. Drops the Death Knight Twin Axes

title: Death Knight's Twin Axes
notes: Dropped by the Death Knight boss

title: Crimson Amber Medallion +3
notes: Dropped by the Death Knight boss

title: Swift Spear
notes: Return to Castle Front SoG, then head East and follow the path which will eventually curve South. Found in the small soldier camp

title: Pillar Path Cross
notes: Continue past the camp in the previous step until you see a path leading to the left. Follow this South to find this SoG

title: Thiollier
notes: Found near the Pillar Path Cross SoG. Sells the Deadly Poison Perfume Bottle

title: Deadly Poison Perfume Bottle
notes: Sold by Thiollier at the Pillar Path Cross SoG

title: Black Syrup
notes: Given to you by Moore. Speak to him after meeting Thiollier

title: Thiollier's Concoction
notes: Received from Thiollier after giving him the Deadly Black Syrup

title: Pillar Path Waypoint
notes: Return to the fork and take the other path South to find this SoG

title: Igon
notes: Found on the road to the West of the Pillar Path Waypoint SoG. Exhaust his dialogue

title: Gravebird Bracelets
notes: Found by heading further South from the Pillar Path Waypoint SoG, on a stone platform surrounded by Gravebird enemies

title: Suppressing Pillar
notes: Head back East, then continue South up the hill to find this monument

title: Ancient Dragon Smithing Stone
notes: Found at the Suppressing Pillar Monument

title: Ancient Dragon-Man
notes: Return to the Pillar Path Waypoint SoG, then continue South/Southwest. You will find this NPC invader along the path

title: Herbalist's Bell Bearing
notes: Continue past the encounter with the Ancient Dragon-Man, and keep an eye up above along the right rock face for a pot that is hanging by a rope. Shoot it down to get this bell bearing

title: Dragon's Pit
notes: Continue along the path and you will eventually find a cave entrance to the left in the cliff face

title: Magma Wyrm
notes: Continue through the tunnel and turn right. Follow this path toward the Northeast. Follow this next Tunnel until you reach a cliff edge, turn left. Run past the shrine and jump down. Head up the stairs and into the next tunnel. Drops an Ancient Dragon Smithing Stone and Dragon Heart

title: Ancient Dragon Smithing Stone
notes: Dropped by the Magma Wyrm inside the Dragon's Pit

title: Dragon Heart
notes: Dropped by the Magma Wyrm inside the Dragon's Pit

title: Ancient Dragon-Man
notes: Drop down hole to the West of this room and make your way to the bottom of this room. Continue through the South tunnel and into the large room. Drop down into the dark abyss below to find the boss room. Drops Dragon-Hunter's Great Katana

title: Dragon-Hunter's Great Katana
notes: Dropped by Ancient Dragon-Man boss in the Dragon's Pit

title: Dragon's Pit Terminus
notes: Continue through the door in this boss room to find this SoG. We will return to this path later on

title: Spread Crossbow
notes: Return to the Castle Front SoG, then head toward the path taken before and instead head down the slope heading South. Follow the cliff face and jump down to a lower section with enemies

title: Ruined Forge Lava Intake
notes: Continue South from where you found the Spread Crossbow and you'll find the ruins opening. There are a lot of upgrade materials in this location

title: Ghost
notes: Found just past the SoG in the Ruined Forge Lava Intake mini-dungeon

title: Greater Potentate's Cookbook 13
notes: Continue along the path past the ghost, until you see a ladder on your left. Jump down to this platform, then continue and turn right.Continue into another room and turn left. Jump down to a ledge on your right, then turn around and look for the cookbook in the middle of some hot coals

title: Smithscript Dagger
notes: Go down the stairs and go to the West/Northwest part of the large room and through the hallway. On a corpse on the other end of this new room

title: Pull the Lever
notes: Return to the larger staircase at the beginning of the large room, go up, and then turn left and climb the path of rubble. Go through the hallway to the right and take the ladder down. Pull the lever

title: Anvil Hammer
notes: Drop down from the lever, then run and jump to the nearly descended large pipe coming out of the lava. Jump off to the right, then go up the stairs. Interact with the fire altar to receive this item

title: Ancient Dragon Smithing Stone
notes: Drop down from the lever, then run and jump to the nearly descended large pipe coming out of the lava. Jump off to the right, then go up the stairs. Interact with the fire altar to receive this item

title: Greater Potentate's Cookbook 7
notes: Leave the Ruined Forge Lava Intake dungeon and head North. Keep an eye on your right for another path leading down underneath a large stone "bridge". Look to the East for a path through some poison swamp area. Find this on a corpse near the big poison flower enemy

title: Elder's Hovel
notes: Continue Southeast along the cliff face until you see a rundown structure

title: Talisman of the Dread
notes: Found at the Elder's Hovel in the poison swamp below Castle Ensis

title: Sealed Spirit Spring
notes: Head Northwest/West from the Elder's Hovel and look for a higher ledge to the right that you can climb up to. There is a sealed spirit spring here that can let you skip Castle Ensis and move on to Scadu Altus

title: Ellac River Cave Entrance
notes: Continue back to the main swamp area from before and head to the North, looking for a cave entrance. This leads to Ellac River

title: Ellac River Cave
notes: Continue from the Revered Spirit Ash in the previous step and into the cave

title: Ulcerated Tree Spirit
notes: Continue North along the river and fight this to receive the Horned Bairn

title: Horned Bairn
notes: Dropped by the Ulcerated Tree Spirit in the Ellac River

title: Rivermouth Cave
notes: Continue North along the river, then look for a cave entrance in the Northern portion of the more open river area

title: Chief Bloodfiend
notes: Progress through the cave until you find the boss room. Defeat this boss for the Bloodfiend Hexer's Ashes

title: Bloodfiend Hexer's Ashes
notes: Dropped by Chief Bloodfiend in the Rivermouth Cave

title: Mushroom-Seller's Bell Bearing 1
notes: Head South from the Rivermouth Cave until you can pass under two rock pillars. Hug the right side around and you will see a hanging pot you need to shoot down

title: Two-Headed Turtle Talisman
notes: Exit the Rivermouth Cave and head Northeast, then North through the waterfall. You'll find this talisman in a secret cave room with hostile worm-like spirits

title: Castle Ensis
notes: Return to the Castle Front SoG and head across the bridge leading Northeast. This will take you into the castle

title: Milady
notes: Head up the large stairwell to the North/Northeast. Continue along the path until you find a set of stairs on your left leading up to a platform. At the top you will find a ladder leading to the top of a tower. Found in the chest at the top

title: Loyal Knight's Cookbook
notes: Head back down the tower, off the platform and in the cave to the East. Follow the path to an open area with a Black Steel Knight enemy. Go into the room to the left to find the cookbook in a chest

title: Castle Ensis Checkpoint
notes: Return to the open area, then head up the hill toward the gate. You'll see this to the left of the gate

title: Castle Cross Message
notes: Found near the Castle Ensis Checkpoint SoG

title: Miquella's Cross
notes: Found near the Castle Ensis Checkpoint SoG

title: Scadutree Fragment
notes: Found near the Castle Ensis Checkpoint SoG

title: Gate Shortcut
notes: Go to the right of the gate where an enemy is standing on a ledge. Drop down, then drop through the hole. Leave the cave and jump along the rocks to the waterfall. Go up the ladder. Continue through the room, outside, and to another room with a lever. Use this to open the gate

title: Moonrithyll, Carian Knight
notes: From the Castle Ensis Checkpoint SoG, continue through the newly open gate. Follow along the path until you reach a set of stairs leading up to a building. This enemy will be in the entryway. Drops the Moonrithyll's Knight Sword

title: Moonrithyll's Knight Sword
notes: Dropped by Moonrithyll, Carian Knight in Castle Ensis

title: Ghost
notes: Continue into the building and straight back to find this ghost kneeling at the altar

title: Rellana's Cameo
notes: Continue into the building and straight back to find this on an altar

title: Glintblade Trio
notes: Go through the open door on your left (facing away from the altar before). Continue down the hallway and up the stairs. Continue outside and up more stairs. Go just through the gate and jump down to your left. Follow this around to a ladder and then a second ladder. Go West along the rooftops until you see a spot you can jump down to with a corpse that contains this item

title: Wolf Crest Shield
notes: Drop down from the Glintblade Trio sorcery and head into the room. Find this in a chest in front of a fireplace

title: Imbued Sword Key
notes: Return to the building guarded by the Carian Knight from before, and through the gate you opened past this building. Continue along this path to the Northeast until you find some stairs spiraling up along a tower. Go into this tower at the top to find in a chest

title: Castle Lord's Chamber
notes: Continue North, up the lift, and into the next room. Go up the stairs and find this SoG

title: Ash of War: Wing Stance
notes: Head out the doorway to the East of this room, and jump down to the right. Continue down the rock ledges and into the tower. Continue to the top of the tower to find this in a chest

title: Rellana, Twin Moon Knight
notes: Return to the Castle Lord's Chamber, then head up the stairs to the West to find this boss gate. Drops the Remembrance of the Twin Moon Knight

title: Remembrance of the Twin Moon Knight
notes: Dropped by Rellana, Twin Moon Knight

title: Ensis Moongazing Grounds
notes: Found after defeating Rellana, Twin Moon Knight

title: Scadu Altus
notes: Leave the castle through the gateway to the North and you will be in Scadu Altus

title: Highroad Cross
notes: Leave the castle through the gateway to the North and follow the path to find this SoG

title: Scadutree Fragment
notes: Found near the Highroad Cross SoG

title: Miquella's Cross
notes: Found near the Highroad Cross SoG

title: Needle Knight Leda
notes: Found near the Highroad Cross SoG. Speak to them and exhaust dialogue

title: Hornsent
notes: Found near the Highroad Cross SoG. Speak to them and exhaust dialogue. They will give you a new Cross Map

title: New Cross Map
notes: Given to you by Hornsent near the Highroad Cross SoG

title: Monk's Missive
notes: Found near the Highroad Cross SoG.Used for a questline with a monk near Moorth Ruins

title: May the Best Win
notes: Found near the Highroad Cross SoG, a bit North

title: Carian Sorcery Sword
notes: Head Northwest a bit until you see a spot to the left to jump down near a spectral troll knight. Jump down and follow the water South. Look to the Southwest for a rooftop to jump to. Continue to the other side of the rooftop to find a chest with this in it

title: Map: Scadu Altus
notes: Found by following the path North from the Highroad Cross SoG

title: Church of the Crusade
notes: Head West to find the church up the hill

title: Fire Knight Queelign
notes: Found near the Church of Crusade. Drops the Ash of War: Flame Skewer and a Prayer Room Key

title: Ash of War: Flame Skewer
notes: Dropped by Fire Knight Queelign in the Church of Crusade

title: Prayer Room Key
notes: Dropped by Fire Knight Queelign in the Church of Crusade

title: Forager Brood Cookbook 4
notes: North of the Church of the Crusade. Use a Warming Stone on the Forager Brood to heal it, then it will give you this cookbook

title: Larval Tear
notes: Head South at night and you will see a circle of spectral graves with this in the center

title: Scadu Altus, West
notes: Head further South and down the hill from the Church of Crusade or the Larval Tear to find this overlooking a cliff

title: Moore
notes: Return to the Main Gate Cross SoG and speak to Moore. He will give you the Forager Brood Cookbook 7 for helping the Forager Brood from before

title: Forager Brood Cookbook 7
notes: Given to you by Moore after helping the Forager Brood using the Warming Stone

title: OPTIONAL: Kill the Forager Brood
notes: At this time, you can go back to kill any two of the Forager Brood you've encountered before and doing so will cause Moore to invade. He will drop his shield, armor, and bell bearing. NOTE: This is not recommended as you can encounter him much later and receive his items

title: Verdigris Greatshield
notes: Dropped by Moore if he invades you for killing the Forager Brood

title: Verdigris Set
notes: Dropped by Moore if he invades you for killing the Forager Brood

title: Moore's Bell Bearing
notes: Dropped by Moore if he invades you for killing the Forager Brood

title: Fog Rift Fort
notes: Look for a path down to the right of the Scadu Altus, West SoG, onto one of the towers

title: Greater Potentate's Cookbook 3
notes: Once on the tower of Fog Rift Fort, descend the ladder and continue South through the room, then immediately turn right and go down the stairs. Cross the wood bridge and find this on a corpse on the cliff edge

title: Serpent Flail
notes: Return across the bridge and up the stairs, then jump down on the other side of the tower (facing East) and look to the left to find a chest under a tent that contains this item

title: Black Knight Garrew
notes: Continue Southwest and up a ladder. Cut right and onto the bridge, and look for a Black Steel Knight in a tower. Kill him for the shield

title: Black Steel Greatshield
notes: Dropped by Black Knight Garrew in Fog Rift Fort

title: Arrow's Soaring Sting Talisman
notes: Jump down to the left of the building the Black Steel Knight was in, then continue up the stairs and up the ladders to find this in a chest

title: Portal to Ancient Ruins of Rauh
notes: Head Southeast from the Scadu Altus, West SoG, across the water, and up the hill to find a shrine where you can use the Imbued Sword Key from Castle Ensis. This will take you to a location in Ruah Ruins

title: Verdigris Discus
notes: Once you take the portal to the Ruah Ruins, continue Northeast, past an enemy, and under some archways to find this item near a small statue against the rock face

title: Fire Knight's Cookbook 1
notes: Return to the Highroad Cross SoG, head North to the map location, then follow the road South. Find this in a tent to the right of the road

title: Ash of War: Piercing Throw
notes: Continue directly South still staying near the road, look for the scarab that drops this between a couple of fallen pillars with some misbegotten enemies nearby

title: Ruined Forge of Starfall Past
notes: From the Ash of War: Piercing Throw, continue directly West and you will find the entrance to this forge. Or almost directly South from the Scadutree Fragment and Fire Knight's Cookbook from before. There are a lot of upgrade materials in this location

title: Smithscript Spear
notes: Continue into the forge, down the ladder, and past the SoG. Continue across the bridge in the large room and turn to the right to find this on a corpse

title: Pull the Lever
notes: Head to the left side of the bridge in the large room, then pull the lever to reveal a doorway

title: Smithing Talisman
notes: Continue through the doorway in the Northeast part of the room on the lower section. Continue into another room and look for another hallway on the right. Follow this Southeast, and go up the ladder on the right. Follow the hall until you find another large room. Continue up the rubble on the left, and into the next room. Go past the platform and into the room on the left to find this on a corpse

title: Smithscript Cirque
notes: Jump down from the lever and go through the newly opened doorway. Continue through the hallway and find this on a corpse in the next room near two large furnace enemies

title: Ancient Meteoric Ore Greatsword
notes: Begin heading back to the last room with the lever, but look for another lever on your left just before entering the room. Once pulled, the door will go up again, so step just outside of the corridor quickly and ride it up. Go through the doorway on the Southwest platform after riding the door up and interact with the furnace to receive this item

title: Ancient Dragon Smithing Stone
notes: Begin heading back to the last room with the lever, but look for another lever on your left just before entering the room. Once pulled, the door will go up again, so step just outside of the corridor quickly and ride it up. Go through the doorway on the Southwest platform after riding the door up and interact with the furnace to receive this item

title: Forager Brood Cookbook 1
notes: Once you complete the Ruined Forge of Starfall Past location, leave and go around it, then continue West and you will find this Forager Brood near the cliff edge. Interact with it to get the cookbook

title: Ghostflame Dragon
notes: Leave the Ruined Forge of Starfall Past and head East back toward the road. Will be fighting some other enemies. Kill it for a Dragon Heart and a Somber Ancient Dragon Smithing Stone

title: Dragon Heart
notes: Dropped by the Ghostflame Dragon found South along the road

title: Somber Ancient Dragon Smithing Stone
notes: Dropped by the Ghostflame Dragon found South along the road

title: Repeating Crossbow
notes: Found further South from the Ghostflame Dragon, near a broken barricade

title: Unlocking Cairn
notes: Head East from the Ghostflame Dragon and look around the cliff edge for the unlocking cairn, giving you access to a spiritspring. Then use the spiritspring to leap up to an area above Fort Reprimand

title: Scaduview Cross
notes: Head Southeast in this higher area to find the SoG

title: Moorth Highway South
notes: Continue along the road South from the Ghostflame Dragon and you'll come up to a cave. Continue through the cave and once outside again, climb up the small ledge to your right to find this SoG

title: Fort of Reprimand
notes: Found just Southeast of the Moorth Highway South SoG

title: Flamedrake Talisman +3
notes: Once inside the fort, continue to the Southeast side and to the right to find some stairs leading down into a room. take the doorway on the left, then the next doorway on the left, and continue around to the right until you see some cages in a pile on the far Southeast side of this room. Jump up and over those continuing Southwest until you find a chest up a small set of stairs

title: Fort of Reprimand (SoG)
notes: Jump over the railing just past the chest to return to the room you were in before. Take the doorway now on your right, then the one on the left again. Continue around and take the doorway on your left, then head up all three flights of stairs to reach this SoG

title: Black Knight Edredd
notes: Continue to the Southwest portion of this upper area and into the room on the left. Kill him for the Ash of War: Aspects of the Crucible: Wings

title: Ash of War: Aspects of the Crucible: Wings
notes: Dropped by Black Knight Edredd

title: Battlefield Priest's Cookbook 2
notes: Continue up the stairs and the ladder past Edredd. Continue up the next ladder. Found in a chest at the top of the tower

title: Messmer Soldier Ashes
notes: Return to the Moorth Highway South SoG, then continue back toward the fort around the outside on the left. There will be a spirit spring at the bottom of the cliff, directly Southwest behind the fort near the right hand corner. Jump down. Then use it again to jump toward the Northwest, to another section behind the fort.  Found near the gravestones

title: Behind the Fort of Reprimand
notes: Return to the spirit spring from before, then jump directly to the Northeast. You should be able to land near this SoG. NOTE: Optional, it doesn't lead to any items that haven't already been addressed

title: Iris of Occultation
notes: Return to the beginning of Fort of Reprimand, then go inside the fort and immediately go to the Northeast section of the wall and jump down into a square hole. Continue down and into the room, then kill the Omen Killer to receive this item

title: Moorth Ruins
notes: Return to the Moorth highway South SoG, then head North along the road. Continue until you see the ruins and the first SoG on your right

title: Dryleaf Dane
notes: Found at the Moorth Ruins SoG. Use the emote on the Monk's Missive key item and defeat him in combat to get the Dryleaf Arts and Dryleaf Hat

title: Dryleaf Arts
notes: Found by defeating Dryleaf Dane at the Moorth Ruins after using the emote found on the Monk's Missive key item

title: Dane's Hat
notes: Found by defeating Dryleaf Dane at the Moorth Ruins after using the emote found on the Monk's Missive key item

title: Pot-Wielding Shadow Undead
notes: Return to the Moorth Ruins SoG. Look for this enemy around the large sinkhole in Moorth Ruins, Southeast portion of the ruins, and kill them for a Scadutree Fragment

title: Revered Spirit Ashes
notes: Continue to the Eastern outskirts of the Moorth Ruins, look for a large headless body just past a building that is draped

title: Shattered Stone Talisman
notes: From the Moorth Ruins SoG, head through the archway and look for a building with stairs leading down. Go in, and look for this on a corpse near a ledge looking down on some ruins

title: Descending to Moorth Ruins
notes: From the Shattered Stone Talisman, carefully jump to a slight ledge in the rockface to the South (use torrent). Then carefully turn around and drop down to more ruined building. Alternatively, you can go back up and look for a hole in between buildings in the Eastern part of the ruins that will lead you through a tunnel to get down

title: Golden Arcs
notes: Found in the building at the bottom of Moorth Ruins, in the chest

title: Bonny Village
notes: Leave the room, then head to the right and look for a platform you can jump down to. Then jump down again and enter the cave in the East just past the building. Ascend the latter and you will be at the Bonny Village

title: Bonny Butchering Knife
notes: Found in the Bonny Village, near a burned down house East of the SoG

title: Hefty Cracked Pot
notes: Found in the Bonny village, near another house Southeast of the SoG

title: Bonny Gaol
notes: Head South of this first section of the Bonny Village and continue across the bridge. Continue South and you will find the entrance to this on the right

title: Hefty Cracked Pot
notes: Head through the tunnel. Head down the walkway. Look for the first pot on your left that you can drop down to. Continue dropping down until you get to the ledge and head to the right. Find this in the back of the room

title: Stalwart Horn Charm +2
notes: Head back out of the room and to the right. Use the circular button on the ground near the next door to make a jar descend. Jump on it and ride it up. Jump off and head Northwest to the last door on this ledge. Continue inside, and through the next door on the left. Jump in the square wooden hole. Continue East and to the left. Follow the tunnel. Keep following the tunnels East and they will lead you to a ladder. Continue up the ladder and find this at the top

title: Directional Step
notes: Head out the giant hole and out the door. Continue to the right and back into the room from before. Continue through the next door, and down the square hole again. Head through the West tunnel. You will see the next room and tunnel to the West, but inside you need to turn around and take the tunnel South (to the right of the tunnel you came out of). Follow this tunnel and take a right and jump through the hole and into the pit. Head down and further into this pit

title: Armor of Night Set
notes: Head to the Southeast part of this large pit/room. Continue through the hole and drop down. Head to the left and out the next door into another room. Then out the next door and to the left. Continue down the stairs and into the room straight ahead. Through the next door and to the right. Jump down to the pot below the ledge and ride it down, then hop off and on and ride it back up to the top. Find this on a corpse

title: Shield of Night
notes: Head up the stairs to the left. Head out the door on the right. Find this near the ledge

title: Curseblade Labirith
notes: Head back to the ledge with the pots and jump down the pots until one goes down to the stone bridge you saw before. Cross the bridge and jump down to the left. Follow the path and head down the stairs. Continue past the ledges to find this boss gate. Drops the Curseblade Meera Spirit Ash

title: Curseblade Meera
notes: Dropped by Curseblade Labirith in the Bonny Gaol

title: O Mother
notes: Head North of the Bonny Village and find this near an odd looking tree on a headless corpse

title: Whipping Hut
notes: Head to the East part of the Bonny Village and cross the long bridge. Find this to the right after getting across the bridge

title: Tooth Whip
notes: Found in the Whipping Hut East of the Bonny Village

title: Ghost
notes: Found near the Whipping Hut East of the Bonny Village

title: Bridge Leading to Village
notes: Continue along the next bridge to the Northeast and find this to the right once you get across

title: Ash of War: Raging Beast
notes: Continue along the path to the Northeast and look for a teleporting scarab on the right near some trees

title: Furnace Golem
notes: Return to the path and continue North. Kill this for the Cerulean-Sapping Cracked Tear. NOTE: You will need to climb to the cliffs above this Furnace Golem and use a Hefty Fire Pot or Hefty Furnace Pot to kill it

title: Cerulean-Sapping Cracked Tear
notes: Dropped by the Furnace Golem in Scadu Altus

title: Greasemonger's Bell Bearing
notes: Continue past this Furnace Golem and look for a way to make your way up some cliffs with several wolfs nearby. Continue to the top and head to the Southern section, you will see a hanging pot. Knock it down to get this bell bearing

title: Church District Highroad
notes: Continue North along the path as it winds up the hill and you will eventually find this SoG

title: Forager Brood Cookbook 6
notes: Head Northwest/West. Continue up some rocky ledges. Hug the cliff to your left and head straight back toward the Shadow Keep. Speak to the Forager Brood for this item

title: Rabbath's Rise
notes: Find this directly East of the Church District Highroad SoG

title: Illusory Wall and "Spirit"
notes: To unlock the Spirit Spring that lets you enter Rabbath's Rise, you need to go inside, and follow the stairs up. In one of the rooms, you'll see two archways to the right of a bookshelf with walls covering them. Hit these, then hit the "spirit" just outside on this balcony. This will unlock the spirit spring. Jump up to the stairs on the outside of the tower using the Spirit Spring. Descend down the stairs and into the room, then pull the lever

title: Rabbath's Cannon
notes: Found at the top of Rabbath's Rise in Scadu Altus East

title: Cathedral of Manus Metyr
notes: From the Larval Tear from before, continue directly South to find this SoG inside the cathedral

title: Count Ymir
notes: Continue through the doorway near the Cathedral of Manus Metyr SoG and speak to exhaust dialogue and receive the Hole-Laden Necklace and the Ruins Map

title: Hole-Laden Necklace
notes: Given to you by Count Ymir. Used to ring the bells at the two Finger Ruins

title: Ruins Map 1
notes: Given to you by Count Ymir. Used to locate the Finger Ruins of Rhia

title: Glintstone Pebble
notes: Sold by Count Ymir

title: Great Glintstone Shard
notes: Sold by Count Ymir

title: Glintblade Phalanx
notes: Sold by Count Ymir

title: Carian Phalanx
notes: Sold by Count Ymir

title: Carian Retaliation
notes: Sold by Count Ymir

title: Miriam's Vanishing
notes: Sold by Count Ymir

title: Glintstone Nail
notes: Sold by Count Ymir. Only after the 1st bell is rung

title: Glintstone Nails
notes: Sold by Count Ymir. Only after the 1st bell is rung

title: Fleeting Microcosm
notes: Sold by Count Ymir. Only after the 2nd bell is rung

title: Greater Potentate's Cookbook 4
notes: Head outside of the cathedral and head to the Eastern side of it. Find this just past the water on a corpse

title: Mausoleum Coffin
notes: Go out behind the Cathedral and look for this near the pond. Used to duplicate any remembrance

title: Ash of War: Carian Sovereignty
notes: Return to the Church District Highroad SoG. Head West toward where you found the Larval Tear before. Continue to the cliff edge, then follow that South and down a slope. Continue until you see a small cove in the left cliff face.  Shoot down the hanging scarab to get this

title: Leather (Highland) Set
notes: Return to where you found the Map: Scadu Altus pillar and continue East. Find this near some orange trees just before the lake

title: Ralva the Great Red Bear
notes: Continue East until you find a lake with this boss in it. Drops the Pelt of Ralva armor

title: Pelt of Ralva
notes: Dropped by Ralva the Great Red Bear

title: Crimsonburst Dried Tear
notes: Dropped by the Furnace Golem North of the Map: Scadu Altus location

title: Battlefield Priest's Cookbook 3
notes: Continue North from the Furnace Golem to find this on a corpse in a tent

title: Black Steel Twinblade
notes: Head West from the Furnace Golem or the Battlefield Priest's Cookbook 3 to find a Black Steel Knight near a campsite that drops this weapon

title: Ash of War: Rolling Sparks
notes: Return to where you encountered the Furnace Golem in the camp, then head East and up the hill/ledges through another camp area. You will see a scarab flying in the air. Kill it for this Ash of War

title: Furnace Keeper's Notes
notes: Head back down from where you obtained the Ash of War: Rolling Sparks and then North. You will find this in a hut near the wall

title: Miquella Breaking the Great Rune
notes: Continue to the Shadow Keep Gates and as you get near, a loud noise will happen and a message will pop up saying a Great Rune was broken

title: Cerulean Coast
notes: To start this section, return to the Ellac River Cave SoG

title: Greater Potentate's Cookbook 12
notes: Leave the cave and continue Southeast down some natural stone pillars. Found on a corpse

title: Ellac River Downstream
notes: Continue South across the stone pillars path and you will eventually find this SoG

title: Ghost
notes: Found South of the Ellac River Downstream SoG. Speak to it for lore

title: Mushroom-Seller's Bell Bearing 2
notes: Continue South and down the ledges, then jump to the East to a stone pillar. Continue down and look to the left to see this pot hanging from a rope near the waterfall. Shoot the rope then make your way down to the base of the waterfall to get this

title: Lightning Perfume Bottle
notes: Continue through the woods Southeast and look for a pond with lightning sheep nearby. This will be in the pond

title: Forager Brood Cookbook 3
notes: Continue Northeast from the Lightning Perfume Bottle and find a Forager Brood near the edge of the cliff. Speak to it to get this cookbook

title: Furnace Golem
notes: Found Southwest of the Lightning Perfume Bottle. Drops the Viridian Hidden Tear

title: Viridian Hidden Tear
notes: Dropped by the Furnace Golem in the Cerulean Coast

title: Cerulean Coast (SoG)
notes: Continue along the Ellac river, heading South until you find this SoG

title: Cerulean Coast West
notes: Head West and continue past a couple of larger structures to find this SoG

title: Spirit Sword
notes: Head Northeast past the Stone Coffin and into the ravine ahead. Continue East past the worm enemies and find this near some jagged rocks at the back of the ravine

title: Scadutree Fragment
notes: Return to the central part of this ravine with the Demi-Human enemies, and head North. There will be a cave you can go into with a Demi-Human chief enemy

title: Demi-Huma Queen Marriga
notes: Continue through the ravine until you exit onto a beach. You will find this boss near another stone structure. Defeat this boss to receive the Star-Lined Sword

title: Star-Lined Sword
notes: Dropped by Demi-Human Queen Marigga

title: Great Grave Glovewort
notes: Climb to the top of the large stone structure near the Demi-Human boss

title: Grave Keeper's Cookbook 1
notes: Return to the Cerulean Coast West SoG, then head Southeast and look for a giant white tree with an enemy near it. Found at the base of this tree

title: Perfumed Oil of Ranah
notes: Near the large white tree, look for a path that leads down to the South and jump into the fissure to your left. Take the Northwest tunnel. Once you exit, look around for a way to the top of the island above this cave and find this at the top

title: Southern Nameless Mausoleum
notes: Head Southeast from the Perfumed Oil of Ranah to find this location on the other island

title: Dancer of Ranah
notes: Found inside the Southern Nameless Mausoleum. Drops the Dancing Blade of Ranah and the Dancing Set

title: Dancing Blade of Ranah
notes: Dropped by Dancer of Ranah boss

title: Dancer Set
notes: Dropped by Dancer of Ranah boss

title: Ghostflame Dragon
notes: Return to the Cerulean Coast SoG and head directly South. This boss will fly in and attack you. Drops a Somber Ancient Dragon Smithing Stone and a Dragon Heart

title: Somber Ancient Dragon Smithing Stone
notes: Dropped by the Ghostflame Dragon found South of the Cerulean Coast SoG

title: Dragon Heart
notes: Dropped by the Ghostflame Dragon found South of the Cerulean Coast SoG

title: Map: Southern Shore
notes: Continue South past where you encountered the Ghostflame Dragon to find this on an altar

title: Cerulean Coast Cross
notes: Continue Southeast and you will find this SoG

title: MIquella's Cross
notes: Found just Northeast of the Cerulean Coast Cross SoG

title: St. Trina Disciple's Cookbook 1
notes: Make your way North, jump across the giant stone coffin and keeping to the elevated area. Eventually you will find this near the larger dying tree on a corpse

title: Finger Ruins of Rhia (SoG)
notes: Continue along the coast line to the East, then head North on top of and over a stone structure. Found on a cliff edge overlooking the ruins

title: Mausoleum Coffin
notes: From the Finger Ruins of Rhia SoG, head East along the path, passing the hill leading down. Eventually you'll have to turn North and look for this near the cliff edge

title: Finger Ruins of Rhia
notes: Head back toward the Finger Ruins of Rhia SoG, then turn North and head down the hill. Continue North until you find the fingers coming up from the ground and to a point

title: Ring the 1st Bell
notes: There will be a bell that you can interact with after obtaining the Hole-Laden Necklace. Doing so will reward you with the Crimson Seed Talisman +1. This will also advance Count Ymir's questline

title: Crimson Seed Talisman +1
notes: Received after ringing the bell in the Finger Ruins of Rhia

title: Finger-Weaver's Hovel
notes: Head to the Northwest portion of the ruins and look for a hill you can climb up. At the top head back South and you will eventually come across a small forest. Find this structure in the forest. Contains the Finger-Weaver's Cookbook 1

title: Finger-Weaver's Cookbook 1
notes: Found in the Finger-Weaver's Hovel in the Cerulean Coast, West of the Finger Ruins of Rhia

title: Hefty Cracked Pot
notes: Return to the Cerulean Coast Cross SoG. Continue up Northwest, and then head South/Southwest along a path to a plateau. You will find this near the Troll enemy that is hurling large pots at you

title: St Trina Disciple's Cookbook 2
notes: Continue South and once you find the large hole in the ground, head to the East of it. Continue to the edge of the cliff and look for a corpse to find this

title: The Fissure
notes: Head back to the large hole in the ground. Look for a safe way down and delve into this area to find this SoG

title: Stone Coffin Fissure
notes: Enter the cave near The Fissure SoG and you will this SoG

title: Fissure Cross
notes: Return to the Stone Coffin Fissure SoG. Continue dropping down ledges, making your way East to a ledge that will break from under you. At the bottom, continue Northeast/East and you will find this near a cliff edge

title: Scadutree Fragment
notes: Found near the Fissure Cross SoG

title: Miquella's Cross
notes: Found near the Fissure Cross SoG

title: Ghost
notes: Found near the Fissure Cross SoG. Speak to it for lore

title: Velvet Sword of St. Trina
notes: Head Northwest and carefully drop down the side of the cliff/stone coffin. On one of these ledges you drop down to, you will see a stone coffin leaning against the cliff face that you can walk under toward the East. Continue that direction to find this

title: Fissure Waypoint
notes: Return to the Fissure Cross SoG. Head directly North and begin jumping down the stone coffins. Continue Northeast and around the cliff edge, then head North up another stone coffin. Jump down, then jump down again to find this SoG

title: Mass of Putrescence
notes: Head Northeast, and jump down more ledges to a stone bridge. Found to the left after getting to the other side of the bridge

title: Gold Misbegotten Enemy
notes: Head Northeast and up the hill. Then up the ledges and hill past the archer skeletons. Continue South and drop down to the giant blob, then continue out of the cave to the Southeast. Kill it for Multilayered Ring of Light

title: Multilayered Ring of Light
notes: Dropped by the golden misbegotten enemy in the Stone Coffin Fissure

title: Fissure Depths
notes: Continue up the hill to the East, then head Southeast along this upper section to find this SoG

title: Leap off the head
notes: Go up to the head near the ghost, or Southwest of the Fissure Depths SoG up the stairs, and jump off

title: Thiollier
notes: Found inside the boss arena of the Putrescence Knight. You can summon him for this battle

title: Putrescent Knight
notes: Found at the bottom of the hole after jumping down near the Fissure Depths SoG. Drops the Remembrance of Putrescence

title: Remembrance of Putrescence
notes: Dropped by the Putrescence Knight in the Fissure

title: Garden of Deep Purple
notes: Found after defeating the Putrescence Knight

title: St. Trina Disciple's Cookbook 3
notes: Continue West into a cave to find this

title: Dying for St. Trina
notes: Return to St. Trina. You will need to Imbibe Nectar four times in order to have St. Trina speak to you

title: St. Trina
notes: Speak to her after drinking the Nectar four times and you will receive additional dialogue

title: St. Trina's Smile
notes: Dropped by Thiollier when he invades in the Garden of Deep Purple

title: Ruins Map 2
notes: Given to you by Count Ymir after ringing the first bell in the Finger Ruins of Rhia

title: Beloved Stardust
notes: Given to you by Count Ymir after ringing the first bell in the Finger Ruins of Rhia

title: Jolan
notes: Will only appear after ringing the first bell. Speak to them to exhaust dialogue

title: Interact with Ymir's Chair
notes: Reset the area at the SoG and Count Ymir will have left. Go to his chair and interact with it. Then descend the ladder to the finger Ruins of Miyr

title: Finger Ruins of Miyr
notes: Found by descending the secret ladder hidden under Count Ymir's chair

title: Swordhand of Night Anna
notes: Continue North and you will be invaded by this enemy. Defeat them to get the Claws of Night

title: Claws of Night
notes: Dropped by the Swordhand of Night Anna invader

title: Finger-Weaver's Cookbook 2
notes: Continue Northwest in the Ruins of Miyr and go to the ledge on the left. Find this on the corpse

title: Shadow Keep
notes: To begin this section, return to the Highroad Cross SoG and continue North along the road, past where you encountered the Furnace Golem, and through the main gate of the Shadow Keep

title: Shadow Keep Main Gate
notes: Head inside the Shadow Keep gate, then take the elevator up. Found at the top

title: Redmane Freyja
notes: Found outside the boss door near the Shadow Keep Main Gate SoG

title: Golden Hippopotamus
notes: Continue through the boss gate. Drops Aspects of the Crucible: Thorns incantation and two Scadutree Fragments

title: Aspects of the Crucible: Thorns
notes: Dropped by the Golden Hippopotamus boss

title: Scadutree Fragment
notes: Dropped by the Golden Hippopotamus boss

title: Main Gate Plaza
notes: Found in the boss arena after defeating the Golden Hippopotamus

title: Ghost
notes: Head through the doorway to the Northwest and speak to the ghost for lore

title: Main-gauche
notes: Continue up the stairs, out, and up more stairs. Then take the doorway on your right. Then the next doorway on your right. Find this on the platform near the Black Steel Night

title: Talisman of Lord's Bestowal
notes: Return to the stairs outside and continue up. Be mindful of the Black Steel Knight and archer in the next room at the top of the stairs. Continue out the doorway in the East of the room. Immediately jump down to the lower area, head South, down to another lower area, and find this at the base of a golden tree

title: Shortcut
notes: Continue into room in the North, then through the doorway in and up the ladder. This returns you to the room just before jumping down

title: Leda and Hornsent Fight
notes: Continue back up the long ramp and look to your right at the top. You will see a red summon sign to help Leda defeat Hornsent, and a gold summon sign to hep Hornsent defeat Leda. NOTE: You will need to do the steps leading to these two NPCs on a second playthrough of the DLC in order to get all items in the game

title: Help Leda (Kill Hornsent)
notes: Defeating Hornsent will reward you with the Falx, Caterpillar Mask, Braided Cord Robe, Braided Arm wraps, and Soiled Loincloth. NOTE: You will need to complete Hornsent's questline on a different playthrough. It is recommended to also choose to help Leda kill Ansbach on the same playthrough. Doing this will reward you with the Lacerating Crossed-Tree Talisman

title: Help Hornsent (Kill Leda)
notes: Defeating Leda will reward you with the Ash of War: Swift Slash. NOTE: You will need to complete Hornsent's questline on a different playthrough

title: Falx
notes: Received for defeating Hornsent in Shadow Keep

title: Hornsent Set
notes: Received for defeating Hornsent in Shadow Keep. This contains the Caterpillar Mask, Braided Cord robe, Braided Arm Wraps, and Soiled Loincloth

title: Ash of War: Swift Slash
notes: Received for defeating Leda in Shadow Keep

title: Domain of Dragons
notes: Continue Southeast from these invasion signs and past the the burning boats. Look for a ladder on the left that leads to the water and go down. Continue to the right and past the waterfall to find a ladder heading into a square hole. At the bottom, continue through the doorway to find the Domain of Dragon Painting

title: Illusory Wall
notes: Swipe at the wall on the Southwest side of this room to find an illusory wall

title: Coffin
notes: Continue through the new room and follow the path until you come to a coffin on a ledge. Interact with it to be taken to a new area

title: Castle Watering Hole
notes: After arriving in the new location, continue out the door East and you will find this SoG. Rest here and return to the Main Gate Plaza SoG

title: Storehouse, First Floor
notes: Go through the shortcut leading to the large ramp and continue up the ramp. Continue Northeast and past the enemy and through the doorway. Take the lift up to this SoG

title: Ash of War: Wall of Sparks
notes: Continue out the Northwest door, then the next door to find a lift. Take it down. Go into the large room and take the first door on the right, then the first on the left (Be wary of ambushing warrior jar). Find this on a corpse on the railing

title: Battlefield Priest's Cookbook 4
notes: Return to the hallway, then continue North and then West. Go up to the wall left of the doorway and slash it to find an illusory wall with this sitting on a corpse

title: Hefty Cracked Pot
notes: Continue back around and take the doorway with the stairs leading down. Continue West and into the room on the next left. Find this on a corpse to your right

title: Iris of Grace
notes: Continue to the Eastern side of the room to find this on a corpse

title: West Rampart
notes: Continue out the doorway in the Western part of the room. Turn left and go down the stairs and into the large room with pillars. Continue out onto the bridge to find this SOG

title: Boltdrake Talisman +3
notes: Return to the Storehouse, First Floor. Continue around to the back of the large structure, to the Northeast side of the building. Turn right, go up the stairs. Continue Northeast until you see some stacks of books in front of a doorway leading down some stairs. Head around to your left to find stairs leading up. Turn right and follow the path and jump over the railing to the Southeast. Find this next to a square platform

title: Pull the Lever
notes: On the Northwest section of this wall you'll find a lever, pull this to open a shortcut

title: Dueling Shield
notes: Follow the stairs up and around, then head Northwest until you find the stairs on your right that you took before. Continue up, then up the smaller staircase to your left. Head Southeast, then turn left to go up some more stairs. At the top, continue across the top to the South/Southeast across the bridge. Before you reach the end of this section of bridge, look to your left and you should see a platform with a small pillar leading to it. Jump to this

title: Revered Spirit Ashes
notes: Return to the bridge via the small pillar and look on the other side for the giant feet. Jump to these. Continue across and jump down to the "behemoth" statue below to find this

title: Storehouse, Fourth Floor
notes: Jump down, head up the stairs to the Southeast, then continue to the Northwest portion of the library again. Go up the stairs, then up the next flight of stairs, continue to the South again, back across the bridge and onto the feet. Climb up the back of the statue and jump across to the platform to find this SoG

title: Miquella's Cross
notes: Found near the Storehouse, Fourth Floor SoG

title: Storehouse Cross Message
notes: Found near the Storehouse, Fourth Floor SoG

title: Secret Rite Scroll
notes: Continue out the three windows and to the left. Continue up the stairs and then up the next stairs. Go down the stairs to your left. Go through the doorway on the right. Head toward the ledge then go right to find this on the table

title: Storehouse, Seventh Floor
notes: Return back outside, and up the stairs. Continue along to the Northeast and go through the doorway on the left. Follow the path to the right and then go up the flights of stairs until you see this SoG in a room nearby

title: Sir Ansbach
notes: Return to the Storehouse, First Floor and to his room in the library and speak to Ansbach about Freyja. Then give him the Secret Rite Scroll. NOTE: You must speak to him about Freyja BEFORE giving him the scroll

title: Letter for Freyja
notes: Given to you from Ansbach once you meet Freyja in the Shadow Keep

title: Golden Lion Shield
notes: Redmane Freyja gives this to you after advancing her and Sir Ansbach's questlines to the point where Ansbach gives you a Letter for Freyja

title: Leda and Ansbach Fight
notes: Return to the Storehouse, First Floor. Continue around to the back of the large structure, to the Northeast side of the building. Turn right, go up the stairs. Continue Northeast until you see some stacks of books in front of a doorway leading down some stairs. You will either find Ansbach here if you killed Leda previously, or two summon signs for both Leda and Ansbach respectively. NOTE: If you have already sided with Leda and killed the Hornsent, you should also kill Sir Ansbach in this playthrough

title: Help Leda (Kill Ansbach)
notes: Choosing to help Leda kill Ansbach will reward you with Ansbach's Set and Ansbach's Longbow. NOTE: You will need to complete the rest of Ansbach's questline on a different playthrough. It is recommended to help Leda kill Ansbach if you already helped her kill Hornsent this playthrough. Doing this will reward you with the Retaliatory Crossed-Tree Talisman

title: Help Ansbach (Kill Leda)
notes: Choosing to help Ansbach kill Leda will reward you with Ansbach's Longbow. NOTE: You will need to complete the rest of Leda's questline on a different playthrough

title: Ansbach Set
notes: Received once you help Leda defeat Ansbach. This set includes the Wise Man's Mask

title: Ansbach's Longbow
notes: Received once you help Leda or Ansbach (it does not matter which one you help)

title: Retaliatory Crossed-Tree
notes: Received from Needle Knight Leda after helping defeat Sir Ansbach as part of her questline

title: Lacerating Crossed-Tree
notes: Received from Needle Knight Leda after helping defeat Hornsent as part of her questline

title: Impenetrable Thorns
notes: Exit the room from the Storehouse, Seventh Floor SoG and head down the stairs. Go into the next room and cross the beams to the Southwest. Climb the beast to the West after this, jump across to the West, and head outside. Carefully drop down to the next ledge and find this on a corpse

title: Lever
notes: Return back across the stairs and bridge, then go down the stairs to your right. Go straight ahead and down more stairs, then go through the doorway to the Southeast. Continue along and pull this lever. Once this lever is pulled, the hanging statues will change their position. Return to the Storehouse, First Floor SoG

title: Pearldrake Talisman +3
notes: Continue North from this SoG and around the back, back up the stairs and progress Northwest. Then Northeast up some more stairs. Continue up MORE stairs, and turn right. One of the statues' heads should not be above the railing with this item on it

title: Winged Serpent Helm
notes: Return to the Storehouse, Seventh Floor SoG. From here, continue out the doorway, down the stairs, and through the next doorway. Jump to the newly accessible platform, then to the statue to the Southwest. Run up its back toward the West, and jump down to the doorway.  Continue out the next doorway and up the stairs to the right. Turn left and defeat the Fire Knight for this

title: Ash of War: Flame Spear
notes: Return to the Storehouse, Seventh Floor SoG. From here, continue out the doorway, down the stairs, and through the next doorway. Jump to the newly accessible platform, then to the statue to the Southwest. Run up its back toward the West, and jump down to the doorway.  Continue out the next doorway and up the stairs to the right. Turn left and defeat the Fire Knight for this

title: Dark Chamber Entrance
notes: Continue up the stairs from the fragment, and find this SoG

title: Church District Entrance
notes: Return to the Church District Highroad SoG and head Northwest along the road to re-enter the Shadow Keep area. Continue through the tunnel and find this at the end

title: Great Grave Glovewort
notes: Jump to the rooftops to the Northwest. Make your way to the Southwest section of this first rooftop and jump to the log in the water. Jump to the right then go across the logs, continuing Southwest. on the other side, go around the curved platform to the left

title: Directional Step
notes: Return the way you came and back to the first rooftop. Jump to the next rooftop area to the Northwest with the fallen in ceiling. Jump up the wall edge on the other side and head up and Northeast. Turn left and jump to the next rooftop area. Head Southwest, then look to a rampart to the left to jump to and head up. Look for a hole to jump through where you'll see an "X" shaped platform below. Jump to this

title: Prayer Room Door
notes: Jump through the hole in the floor in the Southwest, then go out the doorway in the Northeast and across the area to another door. NOTE: You will need the Prayer Room Key found at the Church of Crusade to enter this door

title: Queelign
notes: Found in the Prayer Room in the Shadow Keep. By this point, you should have the Iris of Occultation and the Iris of Grace. NOTE: You can only give him one of these, but he has two rewards. You will need to complete the invasions again and get the Prayer Room Key on another playthrough in order to get both items

title: Give Queelign the Iris of Occultation
notes: If you give Queelign the Iris of Occultation, you will receive Queelign's Greatsword

title: Give Queelign the Iris of Grace
notes: If you give Queelign the Iris of Grace, you will receive Fire Knight Queelign Spirit Ash

title: Queelign's Greatsword
notes: Given by Queelign for giving him the Iris of Occultation

title: Fire Knight Queelign
notes: Given by Queelign for giving him the Iris of Grace

title: Dam Lever
notes: Leave the room, continue back around and then head Northwest. Go into the doorway on the other side of this room. Take the doorway on the left, then go left across the bridge and head Southeast. Go up the ladder to the right of the doorway and use the large lever to drain the water

title: Sunken Chapel
notes: Go back down the ladder and through the doorway next to it. Drop down to the bottom of this tower. Go out the door and to the right to find this SoG

title: Lesser Ulcerated Spirit
notes: Return back out the archway and then cut around to the right, then head Northeast/East to encounter this enemy. Drops the Mantle of Thorns sorcery

title: Mantle of Thorns
notes: Dropped by the Lesser Ulcerated Spirit found after draining the water in the Shadow Keep

title: Shortcut to Church District Entrance
notes: Head East and look for stairs up, and continue into the tower across the stairs and take the lift up. This is a shortcut back to the Church District Entrance SoG

title: Iris of Occultation
notes: Dropped by the second Lesser Ulcerated Spirit found in Shadow Keep after draining the water

title: Fire Knight
notes: Head South, look for a circular structure with a ledge to its right and drop down, then go up the small staircase. Continue to the room on the right. Head to the Northwest part of this building and go left. To find this enemy. Drops the Death Mask Helm

title: Death Mask Helm
notes: Dropped by the Fire Knight enemy found after you drain the water in Shadow Keep

title: Fire Knight's Seal
notes: Drop down to the floor and find this down near the base of the statue

title: Battlefield Priest's Cookbook 1
notes: Head out the doorway and turn to the right, then out the next doorways. Continue up the stairs to the left or right and find this on a corpse hunched over the balcony

title: Tree-Worship Passage
notes: Go back down the stairs, and head to the door below this balcony and take the lift down. You'll find this grace at the bottom

title: Tree-Worship Sanctum
notes: Follow the stairs down to find this grace and the boss arena

title: Scadutree Avatar
notes: Found near the Tree-Worship Sanctum SoG. Drops the Remembrance of the Shadow Sunflower and Miquella's Great Rune

title: Remembrance of the Shadow Sunflower
notes: Dropped by the Scadutree Avatar boss near the Tree-Worship Sanctum SoG

title: Miquella's Great Rune
notes: Dropped by the Scadutree Avatar boss near the Tree-Worship Sanctum SoG

title: Scadutree Base
notes: Found after defeating the Scadutree Avatar. Continue to the center of the boss arena to find this SoG

title: Storehouse, Back Section
notes: Return to the Sunken Chapel. Head out Northwest and cut to the right, then proceed through the archway on the left. Continue Northwest and take the lift to your right. Continue through the doorway ahead and take the first right out to a bridge leading to another building. Take this lift up. Take the doorway on the left and you'll find this SoG

title: Carian Thrusting Shield
notes: Continue West and around to the spear section of the room to find this

title: Fire Serpent
notes: Head back toward the SoG, and look for a ladder on your left on the wooden platform. At the top, head East and up the stairs. Continue Northeast and through the doorway on the other side to find this on a corpse

title: Storehouse, Loft
notes: Return to the previous room and look for a hole in the wall on the Southeast side of this floor and go through it. Turn right. Continue up the ramps and stairs to find this SoG

title: Wrath from Afar
notes: Take the lift up. Move along the rafters Northwest and go up the ladder. Continue along the rafters Southeast, then turn left at the last rafter. Look to your right and there will be a giant gear you can jump to

title: Fire Knight Hilde
notes: Jump to the rafter to the North, then continue up the ladder. Turn left, then right along the rafters and activate the lift but DO NOT get in it. Instead, once the two lifts switch places, activate the one on the right and then jump on top of the one on the left as it is coming back up. Find this on the small ledge near the roof of this lift

title: Shadow Keep, Back Gate
notes: Jump back to the rafter. Head toward the Northwest and take the ladder on your left down. Head Northeast along this rafter and take the next ladder down. Head out the door to the North, turn right, and take the next lift toward the East. Follow the wood platforms down and take the next lift on the left. Find this SoG in the next room

title: Secret Door
notes: Perform the O Mother statue in front of the Marika statue and it will unlock and hidden door. This leads to the Hinterland SoG but we will return here later

title: Hornsent
notes: Found outside the boss arena. NOTE: This will not be available if you sided with Leda and killed Hornsent

title: Messmer the Impaler
notes: Return to Dark Chamber Entrance SoG and continue through the door to fight this boss. Drops the Remembrance of the Impaler and Messmer's Kindling

title: Swordhand of Night, Jolan
notes: Found inside the boss arena

title: Remembrance of the Impaler
notes: Dropped by Messmer the Impaler in Shadow Keep. NOTE: DO NOT DUPLICATE THIS REMEMBRANCE. The boss is required for the second playthrough, so there is no reason to duplicate this on your first playthrough unless you intend to fight every remembrance boss on both playthroughs

title: Messmer's Kindling
notes: Dropped by Messmer the Impaler in Shadow Keep

title: Messmer's Dark Chamber
notes: Found in Messmer's boss arena after defeating him

title: Message from Leda
notes: Return to the Highroad Cross SoG and find this letter

title: Recluses' River
notes: Begin this section by returning to the Castle Watering Hole SoG near Shadow Keep

title: Furnace Golem
notes: From the Castle Watering Hole SoG, head Southeast to find this Furnace Golem wandering. Kill it for the Oil Soaked Tear

title: Oil-Soaked Tear
notes: Dropped by the wandering Furnace Golem in the beginning of the Recluses' River

title: Awakening the Furnace Golem
notes: Crafter a Hefty Furnace Pot (you will have gotten the cookbook for this already if you followed the guide). Climb the top of the ruins near the Furnace Golem and throw the Hefty Furnace Pot into the "cage" of the Furnace Golem's head

title: Bloodsucking Cracked Tear
notes: Dropped by the Furnace Golem in the Recluses' River

title: Ruins of Unte
notes: Found to the East of the Castle Watering Hole SoG

title: Giant Golden Arc
notes: Found in the room in the Ruins of Unte

title: Altar of Darkness
notes: Found inside the Ruins of Unte. If you found the Stone-Sheathed Sword in Fog Rift Catacombs, you will have an option to "Raise the Sword" and create the Sword of Darkness. NOTE: Once you find the Altar of Light later in this guide, you can come back to either altar and convert the sword to Light or Dark. If you would like both swords at once, you will need to obtain another Stone-Sheathed Sword on NG+

title: Sword of Darkness
notes: Received from interacting with the Altar of Darkness in the Ruins of Unte

title: Revered Spirit Ashes
notes: Go back behind the Ruins of Unte and find this on an altar

title: Recluses' River Upstream
notes: Continue South along the rock face. You will find this next to a cliff ledge

title: Scadutree Fragment
notes: Head South along the ledges. Jump across to the ledge on your left and head Northwest. At the end of this path, look to the North and jump to the closest stone pillar. Carefully descend to the next highest point, and then jump down to the water. Head North and find this on a stone coffin near the base of the waterfall

title: Recluses' River Downstream
notes: Make your way back around the canyon, and head toward the South along a new path. Look to your left to find a ledge you can jump down to that has this SoG

title: Moldmonger's Bell Bearing
notes: Once at the Recluses' River Downstream SoG, look to the Northeast and find a pot hanging from a rope in the rock face. Shoot it down

title: Dryleaf Seal
notes: Head North through the gap in the rock face, then turn toward the Northeast. Head around the Canyon to the other side, and look for a ledge to drop to for this

title: Dryleaf Set
notes: Continue down the ledges and to the base of the second waterfall. Find this set underneath it

title: Village of Flies
notes: Return to the Recluses' River Downstream SoG. Head South and down some ledges. Keep an eye out on your right for a path you can take through the rock face. Continue up the hill through this path to find this location

title: Man-Fly Ashes
notes: Found on an altar in the VIllage of Flies

title: Revered Spirit Ashes
notes: Head to the furthest point West in the Village of Flies to find this on an altar

title: Eastern Nameless Mausoleum
notes: Head into the cave to the Northeast and follow this path. You will eventually find this Mausoleum to the left of another waterfall

title: Rakshasa
notes: Found inside the Eastern Nameless Mausoleum. Drops the Rakshasa Set and the Rakshasa's Great Katana

title: Rakshasa's Set
notes: Dropped by the Rakshasa boss in the Eastern Nameless Mausoleum

title: Rakshasa's Great Katana
notes: Dropped by the Rakshasa boss in the Eastern Nameless Mausoleum

title: Darklight Catacombs
notes: Head back toward the West, and then look for the ledges that lead further down to the South. Continue as the path curves Southeast and then East, and continue dropping down ledges. You will eventually drop to a graveyard in a forest. Continue Northeast to find this in the rockface through a set of doors. Continue in and down the lift to find the SoG

title: Lever 1
notes: Head North, then turn right, and then turn left. Follow the path into a new room. At the bottom of the stairs, turn around to your right and go through the next tunnel. Pull this lever

title: Viridian Amber Medallion +3
notes: Go back through the tunnel and through the door on your right. Jump down to your right to a narrow ledge. Follow this around to a broken portion of ledge and drop down again. Jump up to the room and find this in a chest

title: Lever 2
notes: Return out the doorway and drop down to the stone bridge below. Continue down the bridge and through the tunnel to the lift. At the bottom, continue North and down the stairs to your right. Follow toward the back of the room, and look for a ladder leading up between the two square stone pillars. Turn right at the top and drop down to find this lever in the room

title: Death Knight Set
notes: Drop down to the stairwell below. Go up the stairs and look for a broken portion of railing to your right just at the top. Drop down and turn around to go into another room. Find this set on the corpse near the ledge

title: Lever 3
notes: Go back through the doorway and down the ladder in the South of this room. Head through the doorway, then drop down the ledge to the bottom of this room. Head through the tunnel in the East of this room and head down the lift. Continue East and down the stairs. Continue to the East in this large room and turn left. Follow this through a larger doorway to find the third lever

title: Great Ghost Glovewort
notes: Upon pulling the third lever, the square platform you passed with the large big mouth imp will drop. Kill this to receive the Great Ghost Glovewort

title: Bigmouth Imp Ashes
notes: Drop to the South where the square platform was and head into the room. Found in a chest

title: Jori, Elder Inquisitor
notes: Head up the ladder in the room with the chest. Continue down the corridor and then drop down. Head South and down a lift. Continue South to find this boss. Drops the Barbed Staff-Spear

title: Barbed Staff-Spear
notes: Dropped by Jori, Elder Inquisitor

title: Forsaken Graveyard
notes: Found after defeating Jori, Elder Inquisitor

title: Abyssal Woods
notes: Begin this area by heading South from the Forsaken Graveyard SoG

title: Woodland Trail
notes: Continue South from the Forsaken Graveyard SoG and you will find this SoG along the path

title: Madding Hand
notes: Follow the path South/Southeast and you will find this enemy stalking the woods. Drops the Madding Hand

title: Map: Abyss
notes: Continue Southeast along the path and you will come up to this map on a pillar

title: Church Ruins
notes: Just beyond the Map: Abyssal Woods location

title: Scadutree Fragment
notes: Found in the Church Ruins in the Abyssal Woods. Two are found here

title: Frenzy Flame Perfume Bottle
notes: Found behind a pillar in the Church Ruins in the Abyssal Woods

title: Aged One
notes: From the Church Ruins, head West. Eventually, you will want to start making your way North and look for a branching path. Take the West path and you will find this in a pool of water. NOTE: There are several of these in the woods, but only this specific one drops the Aged One's Exultation Talisman. You have to parry these and then you can hurt them

title: Aged One's Exultation
notes: Dropped by the Aged One enemy specified above

title: Abyssal Woods (SoG)
