notes: Return to the Woodland Trail SoG, then head West until you find this SoG

title: Divided Falls
notes: Head West from the Abyssal Woods SoG. You will come to a body of water with two waterfalls to the West of it. Look for the SoG to the right

title: Mad Craftsman's Cookbook 1
notes: From the Divided Falls SoG, head South. Look for a hill on your right and head up. Eventually you will find this near the cliff edge on a corpse

title: Mad Craftsman's Cookbook 2
notes: Return to the Divided Falls SoG, and head Southeast. Continue under a large stone platform. And past that, curve to the Southwest. Turn left near the rock face and go up the hill East. Continue going and you will come up to a large tree with this to the right

title: Midra's Manse
notes: From the Mad Craftsman's Cookbook 2, head Northwest and find a way to drop down to your left. Once you do so, head South and continue dropping down small ledges. You will eventually see a structure in the distance. Continue to that and you will find a doorway leading in

title: Manse Hall
notes: Found just inside the doorway of Midra's Manse, found in the Southwest part of the Abyssal Woods

title: Ghost
notes: This ghost will speak to you upon entering Midra's Manse. You can speak to it for additional dialogue

title: Painting Illusory Wall
notes: To the East of the Manse Hall SoG, you will see a painting. Hit it and you will reveal a passageway

title: Torn Diary Page
notes: Head through the illusory wall and into the first room on the left to find this

title: Lever 1
notes: Continue through the hallway and into the next room, then take the first left. Go in this room, take a right and another right between the wall and the pillar. Continue to the back of the room and you will see a doorway on the left. Pull the lever

title: Mad Craftsman's Cookbook 3
notes: Continue out and hug the wall on the right. Head straight back and climb up the ladder. Head to the doorway across the room. Turn right and head up the ladder at the end of the room. Walk across the broken flooring/rafters until you find a room to jump to on the right. Found on a corpse in this room

title: Midra's Library
notes: Head out the doorway, back to the rafters, and turn right. Go straight into the next room to find this SoG

title: Shortcut to Manse Hall
notes: Head out the doorway and look for a ladder to the right. Climb down and turn around, go behind the shelf and into the room. Enter the doorway on the other side to open the shortcut

title: Large Painting Illusory Wall
notes: In the room leading to the shortcut, strike the large painting and reveal the illusory wall

title: Lever 2
notes: Continue through the new room and up the stairs, then up the ladder. Continue to the other side and pull the lever

title: Nanaya's Torch
notes: Jump to the platform to the North. Then again to the North. Turn left and head across the new path. Follow the rafters around the edges of the room to find this on a corpse

title: Revered Spirit Ashes
notes: Drop down to the North. Kill the giant enemy just below you to get this

title: Second Floor Chamber
notes: Go up the stairs to the East. Continue through the first room and into the next room to find this

title: Shortcut Ladder
notes: Continue to the North to find a ladder to kick down

title: Midra, Lord of Frenzied Flame
notes: Go through the doorway to the East from the Second Floor Chamber SoG to find the boss gate to the left. Go through to fight this boss. Drops remembrance of the Lord of Frenzied Flame

title: Remembrance of the Lord of Frenzied Flame
notes: Dropped by Midra, Lord of Frenzied Flame in Midra's Manse

title: Discussion Chamber
notes: Found after defeating Midra

title: Hinterlands
notes: To begin this section, return to the Shadow Keep, Back Gate SoG

title: Commander Gaius
notes: Go back up to the Shadow Keep, Back Gate SoG, then continue through the doorway to the Northeast to encounter this boss. Drops the Remembrance of the Wild Boar Rider

title: Remembrance of the Wild Boar Rider
notes: Dropped by Commander Gaius near the Shadow Keep, Back Gate SoG

title: Scaduview
notes: Head Northwest to find this SoG after defeating Commander Gaius

title: Albinauric's Shack
notes: Head Northwest from the SoG and through the archway. Continue up the hill directly Northwest to find this

title: Sharpshot Talisman
notes: Found in the Albinauric's Shack in the back part of Shadow Keep in Scadu Altus

title: Albinauric Wolf Rider
notes: Found near the Albinauric's Shack in the back part of Shadow Keep in Scadu Altus. Kill it for the Gaius's Greaves

title: Gaius's Greaves
notes: Dropped by the Albinauric Wolf Rider near the Albinauric's Shack

title: Scadutree Chalice
notes: Continue North up the hill to find a large structure

title: Hinterland (SoG)
notes: Return to the room with the Marika statue, near the Shadow Keep, Back Gate SoG. Continue through the shortcut (or open it using the O Mother emote if you haven't already). You will find this just down the hill

title: Tree Sentinel Duo
notes: These will be patrolling the area directly East of the Hinterlands SoG. You can fight them separately or together. You can also summon Swordhand of Night Jolan nearby if you have done the first task of Count Ymir and spoken to Jolan already. NOTE: You need to lure them both and then summon Jolan. If you only aggro one, Jolan will return home and not aid in fighting the second one

title: Shaman Village
notes: Return to the Hinterland SoG and head Southeast/East to find a path leading upward over a hill. This will take you to this location

title: Minor Erdtree (Incantation)
notes: Found in the field in the beginning of the Shaman Village location NOTE: This is an incantation, not a location

title: Golden Braid
notes: Continue up the hill South/Southwest and find this on a large tree

title: Spellmachinist's Bell Bearing
notes: Continue Southeast from the Golden Braid or from the Shaman Village and follow the path down to a lower cliff edge. Jump down the ledges until you are overlooking a balcony you can jump to. Jump to it, and inside on a corpse will be this bell bearing

title: Hinterland Bridge
notes: Return down the path you came, then head Northeast toward a bridge. Cross the bridge to find this SoG

title: Fingerstone Hill
notes: Continue from the Hinterland's Bridge SoG toward the East to find this grace

title: Fallingstar Beast
notes: From the Fingerstone Hill SoG, continue Northeast and to a crater to find this boss. Defeat it to get the Gravitational Missile sorcery

title: Gravitational Missile
notes: Dropped by the Fallingstar Beast Northeast of the Fingerstone Hill SoG

title: Two Fingers (Gesture)
notes: Return to the Fingerstone Hill SoG, then continue making your way Southeast down the hill. Look to your left as you go for a cliff/ledge you can jump down (this should be about when the greenish colored smoke starts to show). Once you jump down, head directly North. You will find this on a corpse with both arms sticking straight up

title: Mausoleum Coffin
notes: Head Southeast from the Two Fingers gesture to find this near the ledge

title: Very Large Fingers
notes: Head directly South and look for a hole in the ground that you can drop down to. This will contain the Very Large Fingers enemy. Drops the Finger Creeper Ashes

title: Fingercreeper Ashes
notes: Dropped by the Very Large Fingers enemy in the Hinterlands

title: Finger Ruins of Dheo
notes: Head South and follow the finger statues until you find the ruins

title: Ring the 2nd Bell
notes: In the center of the ruins you can ring another bell for Count Ymir. Do so now and receive the Cerulean Seed Talisman +1

title: Cerulean Seed Talisman +1
notes: Obtained by ringing the bell in the Finger Ruins of Dheo for Count Ymir

title: Ruins Map 3
notes: Given to you by Count Ymir after ringing the second bell. Purchase any remaining sorceries you may need from him as this will unlock another one for you

title: Ring the 3rd Bell
notes: Return to the Finger Ruins of Miyr below Count Ymir's chair (You may need to reload so he disappears). Ring this bell and you will be teleported to the boss arena

title: Metyr, Mother of Fingers
notes: Found in the new location after ringing the Miyr bell and being teleported. Drops the Remembrance of the Mother of Fingers

title: Remembrance of the Mother of Fingers
notes: Received for defeating Metyr, Mother of Fingers. NOTE: DO NOT DUPLICATE THIS REMEMBRANCE. The boss is required for the second playthrough, so there is no reason to duplicate this on your first playthrough unless you intend to fight every remembrance boss on both playthroughs

title: Finger Birthing Grounds
notes: Found in the boss arena after defeating Metyr, Mother of Fingers

title: Swordhand of Night, Jolan
notes: Return to the cathedral above and make your way to Count Ymir's chair. You will be invaded by Jolan

title: Count Ymir, Mother of Fingers
notes: Wait for Count Ymir to finish speaking after defeating Jolan, and he will begin attacking the player. Defeat him for the Maternal Staff and High Priest's Set.

title: Ymir's Bell Bearing
notes: Dropped by Count Ymir, Mother of Fingers

title: Maternal Staff
notes: Dropped by Count Ymir, Mother of Fingers

title: High Priest Set
notes: Dropped by Count Ymir, Mother of Fingers

title: Giving Jolan the Iris of Grace
notes: Give Jolan the Iris of Grace to receive the Swordhand of Night Jolan Spirit Ashes and continue her questline

title: Giving Jolan the Iris of Occultation
notes: Give Jolan the Iris of Occultation to get the Sword of Night katana and end her questline

title: Sword of Night
notes: Received from Jolan after giving her the Iris of Occultation

title: Cherishing Fingers
notes: Head outside the cathedral to the West, and find this on one of the gravestones in the graveyard. NOTE: Only available after completing Count Ymir's questline

title: Jolan and Anna
notes: Return to the Shaman Village location via the Hinterland SoG. Once back in the Shaman Village, head Southeast and to the cliff edge. Look to the Southwest and you will see some ledges you can carefully drop down. Then head Southeast again and look for more ledges to drop down. Keep doing so until you are near the top of Rabbath's Rise. Look for a balcony you can drop down to leading into the top of the tower. Interact with Anna's statue and select "YES". NOTE: Not obtainable if you gave Jolan the Iris of Occultation earlier

title: Rauh Base
notes: To begin this section, return to the Moorth Ruins SoG. We will be doing the Ancient Ruins Base and getting the map before proceeding with the rest of the ruins

title: Heal from Afar
notes: Continue through the tunnel to find this at the base of a golden tree, near some perfumer enemies

title: Forager Brood Cookbook 5
notes: Once you exit the tunnel on the other side and into the poison swamp, head to the Northeast section to find a forager brood that you can interact with to get this cookbook

title: Gravebird Anklets
notes: Continue to the Northwest section of it to find these near some deathbirds

title: Ancient Ruins Base
notes: Look for a cave nearby where you found the Gravebird Gauntlets. Continue through the tunnel and this should pop you out near the SoG

title: Ash of War: Scattershot Throw
notes: From the Ancient Ruins Base SoG, head North/Northeast until you pass some pillars. Once you are getting close to the large pillars supporting the bridge above, look to your right on a smaller pillar to find a scarab hanging from the pillar. Kill it to receive this Ash of War

title: Pearl Shield Talisman
notes: From the Ancient Ruins Base SoG, head Northwest and you will find this in a chest in the Messmer camp

title: Bloodfiend's Sacred Spear
notes: Continue Northeast and then North from the Pearl Shield Talisman, or directly North from the Ancient Ruins Base SoG. You will eventually come across a pool of water with several fiend enemies nearby. Find this in the pool of water

title: Taylew's Ruined Forge
notes: From the Bloodfiend's Sacred Spear location, head East and you will find some archways with the door to this location beneath them. Continue in to rest at the SoG. NOTE: Contains lots of upgrade materials

title: Smithscript Axe
notes: Head East into the tunnel and take a left once in the next room. Cross the bridge and drop down near the ladder. Continue through the doorway and down the stairs, and jump across the broken floor. Head into the room to find the Smithscript Axe

title: Smithscript Greathammer
notes: Return through the doorway and head Southwest, jumping to the pillar slanted in the lave. Jump to the other side and look for this to the left behind some rubble

title: Ancient Dragon Smithing Stone
notes: Jump back to the pillar and head up to the top of it. Jump down to the left. And head Northwest. Look out on the balcony to the left of this room to find this

title: Smithscript Shield
notes: From here, jump back to the pillar in the lava to the South. Continue running up and then jump to the right. Head South through the corridor. Look to your right for a broken pillar to climb up. Turn right and find this on the ground on a corpse

title: Lever
notes: Turn back and drop down to your left. Head Northeast through the corridor. Turn right and jump over the railing. Head through the corridor Southwest. Turn left and go up the ladder at the end of this hall. Head up the stairs and pull the lever

title: Taylew Altar
notes: Drop down to the Southwest of this room to the platform. Drop to the right. Wait for the pillar to be fully dropped into the alva. Head Northwest to the end of the path and you will see a broken wall on your right. Use this location to jump to the large pillar in the lava. Head up the pillar and jump off to the left. Use the ladder on the right. Then examine the altar

title: Taylew the Golem Smith
notes: Received from examining the Taylew Altar in Taylew Ruins

title: Larval Tear
notes: Return to the Ancient Ruins Base SoG and continue Southwest and past two large golem enemies. You will find this near the spectral gravestones. Near the ledge. NOTE: Need to do this at night

title: Stone Cairn
notes: Continue West from the Larval Tear and up onto the ledges to your left. Destroy this Stone Cairn

title: Northern Nameless Mausoleum
notes: Head North from the Stone Cairn and down the ledges, and use the spirit spring near the rubble to jump up and to the Southeast. Go up the ledge and use the next spirit spring to jump up to the South, then ride down the hill to find this

title: Red Bear
notes: Head inside the Northern Nameless Mausoleum to find this boss. Drops the Red Bear's Claw and the Iron Rivet Set

title: Red Bear's Claw
notes: Dropped by the Red Bear boss in the Northern Nameless Mausoleum

title: Iron Rivet Set
notes: Dropped by the Red Bear boss in the Northern Nameless Mausoleum. NOTE: This includes the Fang Helm

title: Map: Rauh Ruins
notes: Continue West from the Larval Tear. You will find this on a pillar

title: Temple Town Ruins
notes: Continue West from the map altar to find this location

title: Temple Town Ruins (SoG)
notes: If you take the right path after making your way into the ruins, you will eventually come across this grace

title: Revered Spirit Ashes
notes: Head to the Southern side of the Temple Town Ruins and then continue South to the cliff edge to find this on an altar

title: Scadutree Fragment
notes: Head back to the Temple Town Ruins and head in by going through a small hole in the wall. Head up the stairs to the right. Continue along the path to the roof and then drop down at the end. Turn around and jump up into the small room that you dropped down in front of and you will find this on a corpse

title: Two-Handed Sword Talisman
notes: Head outside the Temple Town Ruins to the Southwest. Look for a broken wall just outside the ruins that you can jump to. Re enter the ruins by jumping up to a higher section, and follow the path and stairs until you find this in a building in a chest

title: Divine Bird Warrior Ornis
notes: From the Temple Town Ruins SoG, head North and hug the rock face to your right. You will curve around and find a spirit spring. Jump up and to the Southeast, just over a ruins and into a small cave. Continue through to the other side, turn left and you will find a building with this in the chest

title: Antiquity Scholar's Cookbook 1
notes: Return to the spirit spring and jump back down. Head North along the water. Continue looking to the right for a small cave with a Pot-Wielding Shadow enemy. Kill it for this cookbook

title: Gravebird's Blackquill Armor
notes: Head back out of the cave and head directly East. You will find a hill with a path that has some bird statues. At the end of the path, this will be in front of a shrine

title: Ash of War: The Poison Flower Blooms Twice
notes: Head back to the edge of the water and continue North. Keep an eye out to the left for a scarab to kill. This will be near the Horned Warrior roaming the area

title: Ravine North
notes: Head North from the Ash of War from before and you will find this SoG

title: Scorpion River Catacombs
notes: Continue along the river West. Follow this until you find the gravestones in the water and follow the water to the South/Southwest. You will come across the door to this area. Take the lift down to the SoG

title: Directional Step
notes: Head through the tunnel. Take the first left and head down the stairs. Continue across to the Northeast. Head down more stairs and take a left. Take a right down more stairs and head through the next tunnel. Head down some more stairs and take a right, then down more stairs. Be careful of the spiked ceiling coming down above

title: Black Knight Captain Huw
notes: Head across this trapped room to the other side, then take a right and into another large room with a spike trap ceiling. Head to the Northwest part of the room and find this on the altar

title: Imp Head (Lion)
notes: Head Southeast across the room and to the left to find a ladder. Head up, and across to the East. Wait for the spike trap to come down, then jump over the railing and onto it. Head North and drop down to the small ledge/platform to find this

title: Knight's Lightning Spear
notes: Drop down onto the spike ceiling trap to the Southeast, then to the narrow ledge to your left with the small gecko statue. Follow the tunnel on the left to the Northeast. Find this in the room guarded by two Lion Imp enemies

title: Ancient Dragon Knight's Cookbook 2
notes: Turn left and head up the stairs. Drop down to the bridge below on the left and head into the next tunnel. Continue through the tunnel and up the stairs. Continue across the room and find this in a chest

title: Great Ghost Glovewort
notes: Head through the tunnel in the Southwest of this room. Drop down and take the Ladder to the left. Find this against the wall on the left

title: Death Knight
notes: Go back up the ladder. Head Southwest and take a left, then head into the tunnel to the Southeast. Continue up the stairs and into the next tunnel. Take the first right and head down the lift to find this boss gate. Drops the Death Knight's Longshaft Axe and the Cerulean Amber Medallion +3

title: Death Knight's Longshaft Axe
notes: Dropped by the Death Knight boss in the Scorpion River Catacombs

title: Cerulean Amber Medallion +3
notes: Dropped by the Death Knight boss in the Scorpion River Catacombs

title: Greater Potentate's Cookbook 8
notes: Leave the Scorpion River Catacombs and head North. Look for a slight incline leading to a giant pile of dirt. Will be at the top

title: Rugalea the Great Red Bear
notes: Continue North from the Larval Tear and you will find this boss roaming the area. Drops the Roar of Rugalea

title: Roar of Rugalia
notes: Dropped by Rugalea the Great Red Bear in the Northern section of Rauh Base

title: Leather (Gloried) Set
notes: Jump up to the "plateau" looking section near the Rugalea boss area and look for this on a corpse

title: Ancient Ruins of Rauh
notes: Return to the West Rampart SoG in the Shadow Keep

title: Salza, Fire Knight Sage
notes: Cross the long bridge to the West. Found just before entering the tower. Drops the Salza's Hood and Rain of Fire

title: Salza's Hood
notes: Dropped by Salza, Fire Knight Sage at the end of the bridge leading to the Ancient Ruins of Rauh

title: Rain of Fire
notes: Dropped by Salza, Fire Knight Sage at the end of the bridge leading to the Ancient Ruins of Rauh

title: Viaduct Minor Tower
notes: Take the doorway on the right and use the lift at the top of the stairs

title: Hippopotamus
notes: Continue Southeast once outside. You will find a large square hole with a lever. Pull it to activate a lift and take it down. At the bottom, continue Northwest and then turn right. Look for a small hole to the Southwest that is square shaped and ride through it. Continue Southeast and down the ruined stairs. Kill it for a Scadutree Fragment

title: Scadutree Fragment
notes: Dropped by the first Hippopotamus enemy in the Ancient Ruins of Rauh

title: Pot-Wielding Shadow Enemy
notes: Return to the Viaduct Minor Tower. Continue outside and head West. Continue along the path and it will slope down to another structure. Head down the stairs. Kill it to get a Revered Spirit Ash

title: Revered Spirit Ashes
notes: Dropped by the pot wielding shadow enemy when you first enter the structure to the Southwest

title: Large Painting Illusory Wall
notes: Head to the back of this room, and then take the hallway leading Northeast. Continue through the large door. Continue across the room to the other side and attack the large painting to discover this illusory wall

title: Antiquity Scholar's Cookbook 2
notes: Continue through the illusory wall to find this at the base of the statue

title: Bondstone
notes: Continue through the illusory wall to find this at the base of the statue

title: Spider Scorpion Ashes
notes: Continue to the Northeast side of the room and down the center hallway. Turn left and follow this to the next large room. You will find this in the center of the room

title: Fine Crucible Feather Talisman
notes: Head back to the large room with the three large openings, and head to the Northwest side looking for a square hole to run through. In the next room, go through the large door on the left. Follow the hallways to another large room. Use torrent to jump down the square hole and then head Northwest. Turn right and go up the ramp, and then the tree branches to find this

title: Rauh Ancient Ruins, East
notes: Jump back down and head Southwest. Continue under an archway and turn left. Continue under another two archways and you will be outside. Head Southeast  and you will find this

title: Ancient Ruins Cross Message
notes: Found near the Rauh Ancient Ruins, East SoG

title: Miquella's Cross
notes: Found near the Rauh Ancient Ruins, East SoG

title: Ash of War: Dryleaf Whirlwind
notes: Head Northeast and find this between two pillars near a ledge

title: Crucible Knight Devonia
notes: Head West and find this enemy on a rock in the water. Drops the Devonia's Hammer and Crucible Hammer-Helm

title: Devonia's Hammer
notes: Dropped by Crucible Knight Devonia

title: Crucible Hammer-Helm
notes: Dropped by Crucible Knight Devonia

title: Furnace Golem
notes: Head Southwest along the bridge. Jump off to the right when you see the platform below. Head under the archway. Found in the center of the area, kill it for the Crimson-Sapping Cracked Tear

title: Crimson-Sapping Cracked Tear
notes: Dropped by the Furnace Golem in the Ancient Ruins of Rauh

title: Rauh Ancient Ruins, West
notes: Continue South and over the hill to find this SoG

title: Talisman of All Crucibles
notes: Head through the Southwest hallway and turn right. Use the lift to go up. Head Southwest and look to the left for some stone rafters to jump down to.Continue southeast a bit until you can jump down to more rafters on your right. Continue Southwest, turn left and left again. then right to continue Southeast along the rafters. Jump to the East to a new area. Look for some stairs to your left, and square hole to go through. Then another square hole that leads to a room with a chest

title: Ancient Ruins, Grand Stairway
notes: Head through the square hole to the right of the chest. Take the lift on the right. Head East and find this SoG

title: Divine Beast Dancing Lion
notes: Head down the nearby stairs and continue until you have to drop down to another platform. Head Northeast and jump down to the right and head into the next building to find this boss. Drops the Divine Beast Tornado

title: Divine Beast Tornado
notes: Dropped by the Divine Beast Dancing Lion boss in the Ancient Ruins of Rauh

title: Verdigris Discus
notes: Head Northeast past the stone pillars and find this in front of a shrine in the under section

title: Aspects of the Crucible: Bloom
notes: Continue North and down some more stairs. Head North and into the under area, head outside and continue along until you can go West under some more ruins. Head into a small archway that has a ledge, and jump down to the rocks below. Continue to the bottom. Head Northeast then turn East and head into the structure. Find this in the center near the large flower enemy

title: Greater Potentate's Cookbook 9
notes: Continue past this enemy and Southeast, heading outside again. Head up some stairs. At the top turn around immediately and head into the building with the red pest enemies. Continue through the North tunnel  and then turn right at the end and go in the next room. Head out the Northeast side through the large openings. Find this up some rocks against the wall outside

title: Altar of Light
notes: Look to the tower to the Northeast and make sure you are lined up with the broken bridge on the other side. Ride across (this is an invisible bridge). Find this shrine in the center of the tower. If you found the Stone-Sheathed Sword in Fog Rift Catacombs, you will have an option to "Raise the Sword" and create the Sword of Light. NOTE: If you found the Altar of Darkness earlier in this guide, you can come back to either altar and convert the sword to Light or Dark. If you would like both swords at once, you will need to obtain another Stone-Sheathed Sword on NG+

title: Sword of Light
notes: Obtained by using the Stone-Sheathed Sword or the Sword of Darkness at the Altar of Light

title: Divine Bird Feathers
notes: Head back across the invisible bridge and into the large room. Head across to the Southwest tunnel, go into the next large room and turn right. Take the lift up. Head out the doorway to the Southeast of this new room. Continue South. Find this on a corpse in the middle of the water

title: Stone Cairn
notes: Head Northeast and up some rock. Continue North along the rockface and destroy this Stone Cairn to activate a spirit spring

title: Mottled Necklace +2
notes: Take the new spirit spring down. Then jump back up and to the Northeast. Head up the stairs. At the top, continue along this path and find this in a chest

title: Pest-Thread Spears
notes: Head back down the stairs. Jump to the pillar to the Southwest, then to the spirit spring. Use the spirit spring to jump up again to the Southwest. On this section, head South. Hug the rockface to your right and you will be back in the large room with the red pest enemies. Take the tunnel to the left of the stairs to find this

title: Hornsent
notes: Continue along this path and it will take you back to the stairs. Head up the stairs and you will be invaded by Hornsent. He will invade regardless of whether you sided with Leda before. Drops his Falx and Hornsent Armor

title: Falx
notes: Dropped by Hornsent Invader in the Ancient Ruins of Rauh

title: Hornsent Set
notes: Dropped by Hornsent Invader in the Ancient Ruins of Rauh

title: Church of the Bud, Main Entrance
notes: Continue up the stairs and to the left. Head outside to find this SoG

title: Romina, Saint of the Bud
notes: Through the entryway near the Church of the Bud, Main Entrance SoG. Drops the Remembrance of the Saint of the Bud

title: Remembrance of the Saint of the Bud
notes: Dropped by Romina, Saint of the Bud in the Ancient Ruins of Rauh. NOTE: DO NOT DUPLICATE THIS REMEMBRANCE. The boss is required for the second playthrough, so there is no reason to duplicate this on your first playthrough unless you intend to fight every remembrance boss on both playthroughs

title: Church of the Bud
notes: Found in the Romina boss arena after defeating her

title: Sealing Tree
notes: Head out the South doorway. Continue along the path and you will find a sealing tree. Examine it and choose to burn it. This will transport you to Enir-Ilim

title: Enir-Ilim: Outer Wall
notes: Once you interact with the sealing tree, you will be transported to Enir-Ilim. Look for the SoG once you arrive. NOTE: We are not doing this area yet. We are just getting the SoG and will return later

title: Spiraltree Seal
notes: Return to the Northern Nameless Mausoleum found earlier in the guide. Head outside and to the Southern edge of the cliff. Look for a ghost sitting in the chair that will vanish and give you this item

title: Jagged Peak
notes: To begin this section, return to the Dragon Pit Terminus SoG

title: Jagged Peak Drake
notes: Head outside and continue East. Fight this and it will drop a Dragon Heart

title: Dragon Heart
notes: Dropped by the first Jagged Peak Drake

title: Igon's Cookbook 1
notes: Head South through the canyon. Eventually you will see a small, broken down tower. Find this inside

title: Grand Altar of Dragon Communion
notes: Continue South from Igon's Cookbook 1 and you will find this location

title: Dragon Communion Priestess
notes: Found near the Grand Altar of Dragon Communion. Exhaust her dialogue and she will eventually give you the option to receive the Ancient Dragon's Blessing. NOTE: You can choose to give Thiollier's Concoction to the Dragon Communion Priestess. You will need to come back to this location in two separate playthroughs to get both endings for this questline

title: Giving Thiollier's Concoction to the Dragon Communion Priestess
notes: Wait until nightfall and you will see the Dragon Communion Priestess speaking to Lord Placidsax. Speak to her and give her Thiollier's Concoction. NOTE: This does lock you out of the Priestess Heart and the FlowerStone Gavel. Once she falls asleep, Use the "Wait" option at the SoG for one full day. Speak to her again and exhaust dialogue

title: Ghostflame Breath
notes: Can trade three Dragon Hearts at the Grand Altar of Dragon Communion for this incantation

title: Greater Potentate's Cookbook 6
notes: Head back toward the Jagged Peak Drake from before, North. Head to the Northeast and curve around East. Continue along the left side of the large canyon. At the spirit spring, turn to the North and follow the rock face down. Find this near the cliff edge

title: Foot of the Jagged Peak
notes: Return to the spirit spring. Use the spirit spring to ascend to the East, then head Southeast to a bridge. Cross it and find this SoG on the other side

title: Jagged Peak Drakes
notes: From here, head South. Jump up to the left and you'll notice to Jagged Peak Drakes. If you get close enough to them so that their health bar shows, you will notice they are damaging each other. You can safely wait until one or both dies. They each drop a Dragon Heart

title: Igon
notes: Found East of the two Jagged Peak Drakes. Exhaust dialogue and he will drop the Igon's Furled Finger

title: Igon's Furled Finger
notes: Given by Igon in Jagged Peak after defeating the Jagged Peak Drakes in the area

title: Scadutree Fragment
notes: Continue past Igon and up the next two spirit springs. Head through the canyon to the South. Hug the right side to avoid the boulders and continue making your way up. Find this against the wall below where the boulders are falling down

title: Ancient Dragon Senessax
notes: Head Northeast/East and find this boss in the water. Drops an Ancient Dragon Smithing Stone and Somber Ancient Dragon Smithing Stone

title: Ancient Dragon Smithing Stone
notes: Dropped by Ancient Dragon Senessax in the Jagged Peak

title: Somber Ancient Dragon Smithing Stone
notes: Dropped by Ancient Dragon Senessax in the Jagged Peak

title: Jagged Peak Mountainside
notes: Continue North and up the steep hill. Find this SoG at the top

title: Rock Heart
notes: From the Jagged Peak Mountainside SoG, head Southwest along the mountain. Once you pass a pale dragon corpse embeded in the rock, climb up the rock to the right of the descending path, still going Southwest. You will find a narrow rockway that eventually leads to a ghost in chair that will drop this item. NOTE: This requries the "Domain of Dragons" painting

title: Igon's Cookbook 2
notes: Head Northeast along the cliff edge to find this

title: Jagged Peak Summit
notes: You will find another spirit spring that leads to this SoG

title: Bayle the Dread
notes: Found just past the Jagged Peak Summit SoG. Drops the Heart of Bayle upon defeat

title: Heart of Bayle
notes: Dropped by Bayle the Dread in the Jagged Peak

title: Rest of the Dread Dragon
notes: Appears in Bayle's boss arena once defeated

title: Igon's Set
notes: Return to where you had found Igon near the two Jagged Peak Drakes, Southeast of the Foot of the Jagged Peak SoG. You will find this on the ground

title: Igon's Greatbow
notes: Return to where you had found Igon near the two Jagged Peak Drakes, Southeast of the Foot of the Jagged Peak SoG. You will find this on the ground

title: Igon's Bell Bearing
notes: Return to where you had found Igon near the two Jagged Peak Drakes, Southeast of the Foot of the Jagged Peak SoG. You will find this on the ground

title: Ancient Dragon Florissax
notes: Received from Dragon Communion Priestess if you gave her Thiollier's Concoction earlier in the guide and after you allow her to follow you

title: Dragonbolt of Florissax
notes: Received from Dragon Communion Priestess if you gave her Thiollier's Concoction earlier in the guide and after you allow her to follow you

title: Priestess Heart
notes: Return to the Grand Altar of Dragon Communion and find this where the Dragon Communion Priestess was. NOTE: Not obtainable if you gave her Thiollier's Concoction

title: Flowerstone Gavel
notes: Return to the Grand Altar of Dragon Communion and find this where the Dragon Communion Priestess was. NOTE: Not obtainable if you gave her Thiollier's Concoction

title: Bayle's Flame Lightning
notes: Trade in Heart of Bayle at the Grand Altar of Dragon Communion to receive this. NOTE: You will only receive one Heart of Bayle, so you will need to defeat him again on another playthrough in order to get the other item

title: Bayle's Tyranny
notes: Trade in Heart of Bayle at the Grand Altar of Dragon Communion to receive this. NOTE: You will only receive one Heart of Bayle, so you will need to defeat him again on another playthrough in order to get the other item

title: Charo's Hidden Grave
notes: To begin this section, return to the Grand Altar of Dragon Communion. Continue Southwest past the dragon corpse. Look for a path heading West

title: Grave Keeper's Cookbook 2
notes: Continue West and down into the water. Find this near the turtles

title: Tibia Mariner
notes: Continue West to fight this enemy. Drops Tibia's Cookbook

title: Tibia's Cookbook
notes: Dropped by the Tibia Mariner in Charo's Hidden Grave

title: Call of Tibia
notes: Head North up the hill from the Tibia Mariner fight

title: Rings of Spectral Light
notes: Head Southwest from the Call of Tibia location. Find this in front of the bird statue

title: Charo's Hidden Grave (SoG)
notes: Head back down the hill from before. Continue Northwest/West to find this SoG

title: Great Grave Glovewort
notes: Now that we have the SoGhere, head back South toward where you fought the Tibia Mariner, then head West. Look over the ledges for a large stone coffin you can jump to (this is above the Cerulean Coast area). Jump to it to find this

title: Death Rite Bird
notes: Continue Northwest under the stone arch and this boss will appear above the water. Drops the Ash of War: Ghostflame Call

title: Ash of War: Ghostflame Call
notes: Dropped by the Death Rite Bird in the Charo's Hidden Grave

title: Spirit Glaive
notes: Continue North from where you fought the Death Rite Bird. You will see a high point on the right to jump up to, then continue North. You will find this near some gravestones

title: Greater Potentate's Cookbook 14
notes: Head back South and jump back down to the water. Continue Southwest and find this near the giant flower enemy on a wooden platform

title: Hippopotamus
notes: Head up to the West of the large flower enemy, and find this hippopotamus roaming the water. Kill it for a Scadutree Fragment

title: Scadutree Fragment
notes: Dropped by the hippopotamus enemy in the Charo's Hidden Grave

title: Lamenter's Gaol
notes: Head Northwest and drop down to the right. Continue North, dropping down some ledges. Continue past the cages in the ground and you will find this location

title: Gaol Upper Level Key
notes: Continue through the cave. Look for another tunnel on the left just before the iron gate. Follow this path and enter the second room on the right to find this in a chest

title: Ghost
notes: Exit the room and continue across the narrow stone bridge and into the next room. Continue through the open cell on the left. Exhaust dialogue

title: Prattling Pate "Lamentation"
notes: Just past the ghost in the Lamenter's Gaol

title: Chilling Perfume Bottle
notes: Leave the room and head back across the narrow stone bridge to the right. Head back to the iron gate and use the key you found before. Continue through and down the ladder. Go through the door and into the room. Go through the first room on the right. Find this on a corpse

title: Clarifying Horn Charm +2
notes: Return to the big room and head to the West portion of the room. Continue through the doorway and drop into the hole. Follow the tunnel. Continue North past the giant rat. Then continue past another giant rat and find this on the ground near the metal grate

title: Falling Through the Hole
notes: Head through the tunnel to the South, then take the left path. Continue up the ladder and through the cell door. Once in the large room from before, head toward the Northern cell door, but jump up the rocks to the right of it. Continue through the cell door up above, then the next, and you will fall through a hole

title: Gaol Lower Level Key
notes: After falling through the hole, head out North. Continue up some stairs and go through the second door on the right. Follow this down and drop into the pit filled with jars. Find this in a chest near a large warrior jar enemy

title: Hefty Cracked Pot
notes: Climb on top of the center pile with smaller warrior jar enemies on top to find this

title: Rock Illusory Wall
notes: Drop down and then climb up the pile to the East to leave this room. Continue up and out the cell door. Head back toward the first door that was on your right, and roll into a little nook in the rock to reveal this illusory wall

title: Lamenting Visage
notes: Use the key from before to open the gate. Find this in the first room

title: Lamenter
notes: Leave the room through the West cell door. Drop down and head through the North cell door and continue back up the staircase and through the cell door at the top. Follow this and drop down two ledges to another room. Use the key from before to open the West cell door. Continue through the next door and take the ladder down to find this boss. Drops Lamenter's Mask

title: Lamenter's Mask
notes: Dropped by Lamenter boss in the Lamenter's Gaol

title: Furnace Golem
notes: Return to the entrance of the Lamenter's Gaol and head outside. Continue Southeast and up the right of the waterfall. Follow the area Southwest and uphill to find this Furnace Golem. Drops the Glovewort Crystal Tear. NOTE: You will need to climb to the cliffs above this Furnace Golem and use a Hefty Fire Pot or Hefty Furnace Pot to kill it

title: Glovewort Crystal Tear
notes: Dropped by the Furnace Golem in the Charo's Hidden Grave

title: Gravebird Ashes
notes: Use the spirit spring to jump up to the higher section and find this at the top of the hill on a corpse

title: Enir-Ilim
notes: To begin this section, return to the Enir-Ilim: Outer Wall SoG we had found earlier in the guide

title: First Rise
notes: Continue up the stairs. Head up the stairs to the right, then the stairs on the left and into the room. Jump up the small square ledges to get to this SoG

title: Shortcut to Belurat
notes: Head Southeast and down some stairs. Take the lift down. This opens a shortcut to Belurat

title: Revered Spirit Ashes
notes: Head back up the lift and back into the First Rise room. Head out the archway in the Southwest part of the room, and up the stairs. Go through the room on the right to the other side and kill the large enemy to obtain this

title: Spira
notes: Leave this room, and continue back up the stairs. Head up the stairs to your left. Then head up another small set of stairs and drop to the golden tree to the Northeast. Continue up the branches until you can jump off to the Northwest. Found in front of the altar near the lone enemy

title: Spiral Rise
notes: Drop down to the tree branch below this platform and head back Southwest. Continue up the stairs to your right, heading Northwest. Continue up the stairs to your right. Go through the door at the top of the stairs to find this SoG

title: Scadutree Fragment
notes: Found near the Spiral Rise SoG

title: Miquella's Cross
notes: Found near the Spiral Rise SoG

title: Inquisitor Ashes
notes: Head back out the door and down the stairs. Take the stairs to the left and turn right in the room to find this

title: Euporia
notes: Continue to the Southeast stairs and take the lift down. Head outside and down the stairs, and into the next room. Head out to the Southwest and down more stairs. Continue into the next room, down more stairs, and take the lift down. Head outside and through the door on the other side to find this

title: Horned Warrior Ashes
notes: Head out and up the stairs part way, then drop down to the right of the stairs to another staircase. Follow this up and into the room to find this

title: Gravebird Helm
notes: Head East along the rooftops and make your way up, eventually going into a window to enter a building. Continue up these stairs. Take the lift down. Part way down, jump to a platform to the Southwest to get this item

title: Somber Ancient Dragon Smithing Stone
notes: Drop down to the room below. Head out the doorway to the Northeast, down the stairs and into the next room, and through the doorway to the right to get this

title: Horned Warrior
notes: Head back to the room, and up the stairs to the left. Take the lift back up. Continue through the exit to the Southwest and up more stairs. Drops the Horned Warrior's Greatsword

title: Horned Warrior's Greatsword
notes: Dropped by the Horned Warrior near the top of Enir-Ilim

title: Cleansing Chamber Ante Room
notes: Head up the stairs to the South and head into the next building to find this SoG

title: Needle Knight Leda
notes: Head through the East doorway and up the stairs. Listen to Leda's speech and then she will disappear. To start this boss fight, you will need to interact with the red summon sign. You can summon Sir Ansbach here if you have given him the Secret Rite Scroll. You can summon Thiollier if you have followed his questline and DID NOT side with Sir Ansbach or Hornsent

title: Sanguine Noble Nataan
notes: Available if you failed to complete the questlines for Sir Ansbach, Hornsent, and Thiollier

title: Sir Ansbach
notes: Available for summon here if you sided with him during Leda's questline

title: Thiollier
notes: Only available if you did not side with Sir Ansbach or Hornsent during Leda's questline

title: Leda's Sword
notes: Dropped by Needle Knight Leda in Enir-Ilim

title: Moore's Bell Bearing
notes: Found in Needle Knight Leda's arena after you return home

title: Verdigris Greatshield
notes: Found in Needle Knight Leda's arena after you return home

title: Verdigris Set
notes: Found in Needle Knight Leda's arena after you return home

title: Freyja's Greatsword
notes: Found in Needle Knight Leda's arena after you return home

title: Freyja's Set
notes: Found in Needle Knight Leda's arena after you return home

title: Dane's Footwork
notes: Found in Needle Knight Leda's arena after you return home

title: Leda's Armor
notes: Continue through the doorway to the East of this room. To the right, you will find this on Leda's corpse

title: Divine Gate Front Staircase
notes: Continue up the stairs and find this SoG before the boss fog

title: Promised Consort Radahn
notes: Just past the Divine Gate Front Staircase SoG. Drops the remembrance of a God and a Lord. NOTE: At certain points in the fight, the boss will try to grab you and put a spell on you. Let him do this twice to get the Let Us Go Together gesture

title: Remembrance of a God and a Lord
notes: Dropped by Promised Consort Radahn. NOTE: YOU WILL NEED TO DUPLICATE THIS REMEMBRANCE IF YOU WANT EVERYTHING IN TWO PLAYTHROUGHS

title: Gate of Divinity
notes: Found in the Promised Consort Radahn boss arena after defeat

title: Thiollier's Hidden Needle
notes: Found in the Promised Consort Radahn boss arena after defeat

title: Thiollier's Set
notes: Found in the Promised Consort Radahn boss arena after defeat

title: Obsidian Lamina
notes: Found in the Promised Consort Radahn boss arena after defeat

title: Furious Blade of Ansbach
notes: Found in the Promised Consort Radahn boss arena after defeat

title: Ansbach's Set
notes: Found in the Promised Consort Radahn boss arena after defeat

title: Let Us Go Together
notes: Head to the center of the arena to find this. NOTE: Only obtainable if you let the boss grab you twice for his spell

title: Touch Memory
notes: Touch the glowing light in the center of the arena to get this cutscene. Doing so will grant you the Circlet of Light

title: Circlet of Light
notes: Given to the player after interacting with the light in the center of the Promised Consort Radahn boss arena and watching the cut scene

title: St. Trina's Blossom
notes: Return to where you met St. Trina before in the Garden of Deep Purple and you will find this on the ground

title: Remembrance/Boss Armor Section
notes: At any point after you beat bosses and/or receive their remembrance, you can continue to Roundtable hold to get things from Enia. NOTE: There are only a few locations where you can duplicate a remembrance in the DLC. to get every item in two playthroughs, you will need to duplicate the Remembrance of a God and a Lord on one of the playthroughs as there are three items you can receive. Because Messmer and Romina are required to get to the final boss of the DLC each time, it is recommended not to duplicate their remembrance. Metyr (Count Ymir questline) is also required to defeat in two playthroughs, so you shouldn't duplicate their remembrance either. This leaves you with two remembrances you can duplicate on the first playthrough, and three you can duplicate on the second playthrough, making FIVE of the TEN DLC remembrance bosses optional

title: Sword Lance
notes: Received for trading the Remembrance of the WIld Boar Rider to Enia at Roundtable

title: Blades of Stone
notes: Received for trading the Remembrance of the WIld Boar Rider to Enia at Roundtable

title: Spear of the Impaler
notes: Received for trading the Remembrance of the Impaler to Enia at Roundtable

title: Messmer's Orb
notes: Received for trading the Remembrance of the Impaler to Enia at Roundtable

title: Shadow Sunflower Blossom
notes: Received for trading the Remembrance of the Shadow Sunflower to Enia at Roundtable

title: Land of Shadow
notes: Received for trading the Remembrance of the Shadow Sunflower to Enia at Roundtable

title: Rellana's Twinblade
notes: Received for trading the Remembrance of the Twin Moon Knight to Enia at Roundtable

title: Rellana's Twin Moons
notes: Received for trading the Remembrance of the Twin Moon Knight to Enia at Roundtable

title: Poleblade of the Bud
notes: Received for trading the Remembrance of the Saint of the Bud to Enia at Roundtable

title: Rotten Butterflies
notes: Received for trading the Remembrance of the Saint of the Bud to Enia at Roundtable

title: Enraged Divine Beast
notes: Received for trading the Remembrance of the Dancing Lion to Enia at Roundtable

title: Ash of War; Divine Beast Frost Stomp
notes: Received for trading the Remembrance of the Dancing Lion to Enia at Roundtable

title: Greatsword of Radahn (Lord)
notes: Received for trading the remembrance of a God and a Lord to Enia at Roundtable

title: Greatsword of Radahn (Light)
notes: Received for trading the remembrance of a God and a Lord to Enia at Roundtable

title: Light of Miquella
notes: Received for trading the remembrance of a God and a Lord to Enia at Roundtable

title: Greatsword of Damnation
notes: Received for trading the Remembrance of the Lord of Frenzied Flame to Enia at Roundtable

title: Midra's Flame of Frenzy
notes: Received for trading the Remembrance of the Lord of Frenzied Flame to Enia at Roundtable

title: Staff of the Great Beyond
notes: Received for trading the Remembrance of the Mother of Fingers to Enia at Roundtable

title: Gazing Finger
notes: Received for trading the Remembrance of the Mother of Fingers to Enia at Roundtable

title: Putrescence Cleaver
notes: Received for trading in the Remembrance of Putrescence to Enia at Roundtable

title: Vortex of Putrescence
notes: Received for trading in the Remembrance of Putrescence to Enia at Roundtable

title: Rellana's Set
notes: Speak to Enia once you defeat this boss to obtain their armor set

title: Messmer's Set
notes: Speak to Enia once you defeat this boss to obtain their armor set

title: Gaius Set
notes: Speak to Enia once you defeat this boss to obtain their armor set

title: Young Lion's Set
notes: Speak to Enia once you defeat this boss to obtain their armor set

title: Farming Section
notes: There are no areas that are locked out at any point in the game so

title: Ascetic's Set
notes: From the Stagefront SoG, head down the stairs to the West. You'll find a curseblade ascetic to fight

title: Horned Warrior Set
notes: A Horned Warrior is found near the second SoG in Belurat

title: Black Knight Set
notes: A Black Knight is found near the Castle Ensis Checkpoint that respawns

title: Messmer Soldier Set
notes: From the Castle Front SoG, head back toward the great bridge and into the camp. Lots of soldiers here to farm for their armor

title: Messmer Soldier Shield
notes: From the Castle Front SoG, head back toward the great bridge and into the camp. Lots of soldiers here to farm for their shield

title: Messmer Soldier's Axe
notes: From the Castle Front SoG, head back toward the great bridge and into the camp. Lots of soldiers here to farm

title: Messmer Soldier's Spear
notes: From the Castle Front SoG, head back toward the great bridge and into the camp. Lots of soldiers here to farm

title: Common Soldier Set
notes: From the Castle Front SoG, head back toward the great bridge and into the camp. Lots of soldiers here to farm for their armor

title: Divine Bird Warrior Set
notes: From the Church of the Bud, Main Entrance, head East and off the ledge. Farm from the Divine Bird Warrior in the middle of the water

title: Shadow Militiaman Set
notes: From the Main Gate Plaza SoG, after you open the shortcut, you can head East and find several of these enemies

title: Fire Knight Set
notes: Multiple found in Shadow Keep. Easiest location is the Storehouse Loft. Drop off to the North. Head down the stairs and to the right to find one to kick off the ledge. Then you can take the ladder down and drop into the room to loot its corpse

title: Divine Beast Set
notes: From the Spiral Rise SoG, head out the door and down the stairs. Continue down the stairs and you will find the lightning Divine Beast who you can farm for this

title: Fire Knight Shortsword
notes: Drops from the Fire Knights in Shadow Keep. The Storehouse, Seventh Floor is the closest to farm

title: Fire Knight Greatsword
notes: Drops from the Fire Knight Wielding this weapon. Only one is available to farm. From the Storehouse, First Floor SoG, head back down the lift, then you can farm this Fire Knight just outside

title: Lizard Greatsword
notes: Farmed off of the imps that wield this weapon. Darklight Catacombs is a great spot to farm these.

title: Curseblade's Cirque
notes: From the Stagefront SoG, head down the stairs to the West. You'll find a curseblade ascetic to fight

title: Forked-Tongue Hatcher
notes: Dropped by imps that wield this. Best spot is the Scorpion River Catacombs

title: Bloodfiend's Fork
notes: Dropped by Bloodfiend enemies that wield these. Head into Rivermouth Cave to find these down in the hole. Several can be farmed in here

title: Golem Fist
notes: Farmed off of the golem enemies in Taylew's Ruined Forge
